Title: Altari Sofa
Description: If style is the question, then the Altari sofa is the answer. Sporting clean lines and sleek track arms, the decidedly contemporary profile is enhanced with plump cushioning and a chenille-feel upholstery, so pleasing to the touch. Sure to play well with so many color schemes, this sofa in slate gray includes a pair of understated floral pattern pillows for fashionably fresh appeal.

Title: Soundcheck Dual Power Reclining Sofa with Drop Down Table
Description: An impressive winner in home fashion, the Soundcheck power sofa shows us the beauty of today’s best reclining sofas. Inspired by vintage automobile interiors, the pleated upholstery in the lumbar section adds additional comfort for your lower back. This contemporary sofa is upholstered in all-over faux leather for feel-good pleasure, with contrast stitching for exceptional wear. When you want to get maximum relaxation, adjust the Easy View™ power adjustable headrest. This is how you bring home style and comfort.

Title: Jarreau Sofa Chaise Sleeper
Description: Small space living is easier than ever with the Jarreau sofa chaise sleeper. The soft cushions and oversized pillow backs are sure to be a comfortable seating treat. Sporting sleek arms and friendly apartment sizing, this sleeper makes a fashionable first impression, and is quick to convert into a sleeper with the included pullout cushion. Great to accommodate guests for an overnight stay.

Title: Tanavi 3-Piece Modular Sofa
Description: Blending a fresh, clean aesthetic with ultra-soft comfort that’s impossible to resist, this sofa sets the scene for living the dream. Whether your look is warm and cozy modern farmhouse or cool, crisp and contemporary, this masterfully crafted modular sofa tantalizes, with feather-fiber blend reversible cushions with pillowy plushness and a linen-like fabric that’s a breath of fresh air. Slim track arms and structural bolster pillows enhance the experience.

Title: Zardoni Sofa
Description: Feed your mid-century modern nostalgia with a contemporary twist in the Zardoni sofa. Colored in an attractive gray, it’s upholstered in a timeless texture. Classic tufted back and tapered peg legs are a nice revival. Linear profile with two toss pillows adds plenty of fresh style, perfect for small spaces.

Title: Dandrea Sofa
Description: Charming with Charles of London arms that beautifully go with the flow, the Dandrea sofa in bisque beige is richly elegant yet comfortably made for everyday living. Showcasing distressed at its best, the sofa’s turned bun feet with patina finish are aged to perfection. Five designer toss pillows make the most of moody blues.

Title: Mitchiner Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Bring your snacks and beverages and plan for a night with your feet up. This double reclining loveseat is plush in all the right places, and will support you longer than you can binge watch your favorite TV show. The neutral upholstery is ready for a patterned throw blanket and some of your time. Hide the remote in the console and claim your spot on the Mitchiner.

Title: Brebryan Loveseat
Description: The Brebryan loveseat speaks to those drawn to fresh, contemporary style with richly neutral appeal. Wrapped in a wonderfully plush fabric loaded with multi-tonal interest, the on-trend piece has a warm, welcoming charm. Coordinating accent pillows add to the indulgence. Kick back, relax and settle in for comfort with this cool addition for modern spaces.

Title: Atwater Living Elvia Futon
Description: The right seating makes a big difference in your daily life, so why not choose something that combines style, functionality and comfort in one piece. This futon's low armless profile, tufted detail and polished chrome-tone legs will set the mood for kicking back in cool mid-century style. For your comfort preference, the split back design allows you to adjust the backrest into a lounger or a sleeper (solo or together) with a single push or pull. Whether you're having friends over for coffee, hosting a movie night or planning a sleepover, this compact yet comfortable futon will let the good times roll.

Title: Grixdale Manual Reclining Loveseat
Description: The Grixdale reclining loveseat looks good and feels good, thanks to its timelessly modern design and ample cushioning. Beautiful brown leather match upholstery is an upscale addition to your family space.

Title: Dorsten Loveseat
Description: The contemporary Dorsten loveseat has comfort written all over it. From the plush cushions to the textured gray fabric, it’s a total winner for relaxation. The patterned throw pillows in blue, brown and tan complement the richly neutral upholstery.

Title: Donlen Queen Sofa Sleeper
Description: Dressed in glorious gray faux leather, the Donlen queen sofa sleeper is certain to be the center of attention. With tasteful tufting, padded armrests and a sleek tapered design, it combines style and comfort. This sofa's generous scale lets you kick back and relax at home solo or when hosting friends. What's more, the pull-out queen mattress, made with quality memory foam, comfortably accommodates overnight guests.

Title: Baskove 2-Piece Sectional with Chaise
Description: Bask in the beauty of the Baskove sectional. Reserved exclusively for those with an eye for fine contemporary design, this generously scaled sectional in auburn brown is dressed to impress in every way. Leather match upholstery provides incomparable comfort where it counts. Sleek track armrests, tufted box cushions and a sumptuous chaise are the embodiment of luxury.

Title: Maderla 2-Piece Sectional with Chaise
Description: If you love the idea of a luxe look that won't break the bank, make yourself comfortable with the alluring walnut brown Maderla sectional. Designed to look like the real thing, it's wrapped in a practical faux leather loaded with natural tonal variation and a soft hand feel. Appealing to a contemporary taste, its jumbo stitching, tufted styling and pillow top armrests are indulgently comfortable, with a streamlined look that tops off the high-end aesthetic made for everyday living.

Title: Deaza Accent Chair
Description: Rounding out your decor while providing sensible seating arrangements in small spaces, side chairs offer style and versatility to any interior design. Adding the statement-making appeal of glam style to your abode, the Deaza armchair features a rounded back, two scrolled arms and button-tufted accents around the back. An eye-catching nailhead trim and turned wood legs accent the solid color of the polyester velvet upholstery.

Title: Soletren Oversized Ottoman
Description: Flaunting a trendsetting silhouette, the Soletren oversized accent ottoman puts the contemporary in your contemporary home. Surface space is ample, giving you elongated plushness for foot relaxation. Chunky chenille fabric satisfies your need for a piece that feels as good as it looks.

Title: Avila Accent Chair
Description: Make it cozy in the transitional way with the Avila chair. Upholstered in beige linen-colored fabric with attached back and seat cushion, lumbar pillow and show wood frame in light brown finish, this seat welcomes comfort.

Title: Bladewood Manual Recliner
Description: Make a big impression in a smaller footprint with the chic styling of the Bladewood zero wall recliner. Thanks to its space-conscious design that requires a mere three inches between the wall and chair back, you can stretch out more efficiently. Wrapped in a fabulous faux leather loaded with pebbly texture and tonal variation that looks so natural, this designer recliner sports contoured tufting and contrasting baseball stitching for a style home run.

Title: Greaves Chair
Description: Make your living space that much more livable with the Greaves arm chair. Rest assured that its ultra-neutral upholstery with a textural chenille feel goes with anything and everything. Tailored box cushioning and tapered feet lend a clean, contemporary aesthetic. Make it even more enticing by pairing it with the available matching ottoman and reserve yourself the best seat in the house.

Title: Alcona Sofa
Description: Whether you’re creating a warm and cozy modern farmhouse or cool and contemporary escape, the Alcona sofa is sure to look right at home. High armrests with a rounded track design provide a chic, sheltering effect. Light linen-tone upholstery and 3-over-2 cushion styling is a beauty to behold.

Title: Ballister Power Lift Recliner
Description: Take charge of your seating with the Ballister power lift recliner. Its easy power button motion control allows you the full spectrum of comfort—from a gentle lift-and-tilt for standing up to a lay flat design ideal for an afternoon snooze. Not much gets past the power adjustable headrest and lumbar support, or even the independent motor controls to get that just right position. You’ll always stay connected with the included USB charging port in the power control, and relish in the hours of versatile support that never stops giving.

Title: Jaya Utility Design Coffee Table
Description: Designed to suit your style—and your budget—this versatile coffee table/console table is a big hit in small-space living. Thoughtful elements include rounded cornering for a safer—ouch-free—environment. That's especially nice if you have little ones running about. Underlying storage/display space is packed with possibilities.

Title: Nestor Coffee Table
Description: If there’s an accent piece with a flair for making traditional elements look so fit for modern-classic settings—the Nestor oval coffee table is it. It’s hard to not fall for the elegance and intricacy of acanthus leaf carvings and shapely serpentine legs. Swirls of metal add lovely dimension under a beveled glass inset tabletop, while tiered bottom shelf incorporates lovely symmetry.

Title: Jesolo Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Rustic character comes forth in the dark gray Jesolo reclining loveseat with center console. Designer stitching adds a fashion-forward touch to the soft cushions. Faux suede fabric speaks to your knack for superior-quality materials. High back provides ample support as you get off your feet for a bit. With just one pull of tab, you’ll be easing back into relaxation and popping your favorite beverage into a cup holder. Infinite levels of comfort await.

Title: Camus Modern Living Room Table 3-Piece Set
Description: Camnus Modern Living Series comprises of coffee table, end table, side table, and etc. The contemporary design showcases simplicity and elegance. Camnus Series features a sleek combination of wood and metal. The series offers various refreshing colors such as Americano, French Oak Grey and more. You can never go wrong with these vibrant colors as they blends perfectly well with most home settings. All of the furniture in the series are made of high quality particle board and premium quality metal tested for strength and durability. The assembly is very simple, all the hardware and illustrated instruction manual are provided. Wipe clean with clean damped cloth and avoid any harsh chemicals to avoid damaging the finish of the product. Pictures are for illustration purpose. All decor items are not included in this offer.

Title: JAYA Oval Coffee Table
Description: Furinno 15020WN Oval Coffee Table is a great fit for your modern simple lifestyle. The beautiful dark walnut color fits any room in your home. Large tabletop provides plenty of space and the built in shelf creates additional storage and display for your handy needs. There is a matching end table Furinno 15019WN to complete the look. It is easy to assemble, space saving and sturdy. The main material - medium density composite wood is manufactured in Malaysia and complied with the green rules of production. There is no foul smell, durable and the material is the most stable amongst the medium density composite woods.A simple attitude towards lifestyle is reflected directly on the design of Furinno Furniture, creating a trend of simply nature. All the products are produced and assembled 100-percent in Malaysia with 95% - 100% recycled materials. Care instructions: wipe clean with clean damped cloth. Avoid using harsh chemicals. Pictures are for illustration purpose. All decor items are not included in this offer.

Title: Braxton Coffee Table
Description: Simple and streamlined, the braxton coffee table is an ideal addition to your living room. With clean lines and sturdy steel construction, this coffee table offers storage and display space without overwhelming your space. The perfect spot for books, remotes, or your favorite art piece, this coffee table's slim frame blends seamlessly with your home's decor.

Title: Baxton Studio Kelly Cocktail Ottoman
Description: Add a touch of sophisticated grace to your home with the modern-style Kelly cocktail ottoman. The ottoman is fitted with a wood storage shelf to hold books, movies and more. Padded with foam for the utmost comfort, it's upholstered in linen fabric and enhanced with elegant button tufting. Excellent craftsmanship adds a weathered feel to the ottoman, giving it a hint of rustic charm.

Title: Simple Design Coffee Table
Description: Designed to suit your style—and your budget—this two-tone coffee table with shelving is a big hit in small-space living. Thoughtful elements include rounded cornering for a safer—ouch-free—environment. That's especially nice if you have little ones running about.

Title: Rogness Coffee Table
Description: If you want to add rustic flair to your seating arrangement, roll with the casual style and flexibility of the Rogness round coffee table. Its heavily distressed finish in dark rum-tone takes you back to a simpler time. The lower shelf provides extra storage and casters make it easily mobile, ideal for flexibility.

Title: Safavieh Mansel Coffee Table
Description: A top ski resort in the Italian alps inspired the modern rustic style of the contemporary Mansel coffee table. Designed for the cosmopolitan interior, its metallic angular base is expertly paired with a warm circular light gray top for timeless sophistication.

Title: Linon Ragan Coffee Table
Description: Elegant without demanding too much attention, this marble top coffee table is the ideal centerpiece for modern and bohemian living spaces. Soft curves in the trim of the mango wood base offer a subtle contrast to the clean lines of the spacious tabletop. A natural finish highlights knots and patterns in the woodgrain and creates a neutral two-tone colorway with the white marble, agreeable with almost any decor. Convenient storage is found in the open lower shelf settled between flared legs, rounding out this multipurpose piece.

Title: Powel Owens Coffee Table
Description: Mixing metal and wood in an updated industrial style provides a unique addition to your home. The round coffee table features an inlay patterned top in ash veneer in a gray finish.  Large nail heads adorn the apron. The sturdy metal base is made of curved legs finished in a pewter finish and includes a small circular shelf below.  Sturdy enough to take on the busiest of family rooms and sophisticated enough to anchor a formal sitting area.

Title: Coylin Coffee Table
Description: When it comes to clean-lined, modern style, the Coylin square coffee table comes full circle. Decked out in a chic finish, the angled metal base is striking from every angle. It’s topped off with clear glass with polished edging for a sense of refinement.

Title: Safavieh Found Wood Coffee Table
Description: Rustic chic meets eclectic elegance in this one-of-a-kind coffee table that juxtaposes a natural wood top with a sleek modern base. Repurposed with style, the reclaimed wood used in this table gives you something to feel good about. Due to the “found” nature of the wood top, each table is slightly different with its own grain variations and patterns.

Title: Fostead Coffee Table
Description: Satisfying your taste for contemporary styling, the Fostead coffee table is easy to love. Quality craftsmanship and classic design elements make it elegant without looking fussy. The marble top's unique color variations, fissures, mineral deposits and veining are natural formations that add to its beauty.

Title: Bayflynn Coffee Table
Description: Entertain with ease with the casual, contemporary Bayflynn coffee table. Designed for the modern tastemaker, the minimalist design wows with metal legs and a laminated surface with a whitewashed effect. A lower display shelf provides ample space for books and baskets, or for showcasing your special decor accessories.

Title: Kisper Coffee Table
Description: With its canted peg legs and low, linear profile, the Kisper coffee table is a mastery in mid-century minimalism. The look may be high-end gallery design, but the price is beautifully down to earth. Brushed dry brown finish is wonderfully easy on the eyes. Open shelving fuses form and function.

Title: Dorrinson Coffee Table
Description: Raise the bar on modern farmhouse design with the Dorrinson coffee table. Sporting a two-tone, gray and antiqued white color scheme and cross buck design, the table's unique sliding "barn door" moves to reveal shelved storage space. Easy roll casters add a cool touch that's right on trend.

Title: Elada Gray Finished Wood Coffee Table
Description: The clean, streamlined design of the Elada coffee table makes it a convenient addition to any living room. Made in Malaysia, the Elada is constructed from wood and features a neutral grey finish that complements many interior color palettes. The tabletop provides ample surface area to display decorations and hold beverages, while the lower shelf provides storage space. Requiring assembly, the Elada features tapered feet fitted with floor protector pads for elegance and practicality. Understated yet graceful, the Elada coffee table perfectly accents the modern home.

Title: Shybourne Over Ottoman Table
Description: With its casual, linear style design, the Shybourne over ottoman coffee table is designed to fit over upholstered ottomans for extra table space. Features faux concrete melamine top with metal base in a aged bronze-tone finish.

Title: Landen Walnut Coffee Table
Description: Create a vintage ambiance in your living room with the Landen coffee table. Made in Malaysia, the Landen is comprised of a walnut brown finished wood frame equipped with three open shelves to easily organize books, magazines, and other living room essentials. Its large tabletop is well suited for a potted plant and cup of espresso. Requiring assembly, the retro-inspired design is accented with splayed gold tone legs for a subtle touch of glamour. Fantastic utility with a chic aesthetic, the Landen TV stand is an exceptional addition to any home.

Title: Porter Lift Top Coffee Table
Description: Those drawn to the warm, homey feel of traditional interiors love how the Porter lift top coffee table rises to the occasion. Thanks to a spring loaded mechanism that elevates the tabletop, grabbing a bite or getting down to work is a lot more comfortable. Sporting a burnished finish and classic bun feet, it’s a table that exudes relaxed elegance.

Title: Surya Vortex Coffee Table
Description: Our Vortex Collection offers an enduring presentation of the modern form that will competently revitalize your decor space. Made in India with glass and metal. For optimal product care, wipe clean with a dry cloth. Manufacturers 30 Day Limited Warranty.

Title: Galahad Dual Power Recliner
Description: The Galahad power recliner might look crisp, clean and lean, but it’s packed with technologically advanced features that truly elevate the art of relaxation. Its zero-gravity mechanism lifts the ottoman four inches higher than traditional recliners (23" off the floor) for better blood flow from your legs to your heart. With the touch of a button, let the stress of the day float away care of an air massage system (with three pampering settings)—or get warm and toasty thanks to a heated seat element.  Crosshatch stitching adds fashion-forward flair. While ultra streamlined, this designer recliner doesn’t cut corners when it comes to quality.

Title: Latimer Dual Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: With a streamlined look designed to last, the Latimer power reclining loveseat is sure to become a living room mainstay. The brown upholstery has a laid-back-meets-luxe look well suited to transitional spaces.

Title: DHP Ashton Distressed Retro Coffee Table
Description: Can’t choose between mid-century lines and modern industrial flair? Have it both ways with this hairpin leg coffee table. Pairing a distressed gray finish with sturdy metal legs, this designer coffee table strikes a pose. The fact that this streamlined table can hold up to 40 lbs. makes it that much more enticing.

Title: Home Basics Coffee Table with Bin
Description: Meet the traditional coffee table with a functional and stylish twist. Between its mix of storage and display options, this coffee table anchors the overall look of your living room ever so gracefully. Use the lengthy top surface to lay out your meals. The long integrated shelf beneath the large tabletop adds extra space for magazines, books, board games, and magazines, while the cubed compartment  provides spare storage. Simply slide out the non-woven fabric bin from the cubed compartment to reveal spacious storage for coffee pods, creamer packets, individually wrapped tea bags, straws and coffee stirrers. Aside from the living room, you’ll be sure to find a place this stylish table. Assembly requires a  flathead screwdriver and crosshead screw driver.  Item dimensions may differ slightly due to the unique nature of the product. Color and finish may also differ from the images shown due to differences in monitor displays. Props and accessories are not included.

Title: Barilanni Coffee Table with Lift Top
Description: It's all about smart organization and keeping everything easily within reach with the traditional styled Barilanni lift top coffee table. Its compact design is defined with the open middle shelf, lower drawer and hidden storage compartments found under the lift top. Because the top springs forward, this table can easily be accommodating for dinners in front of the TV or setting up a mobile workspace.

Title: Realyn Coffee Table with Lift Top
Description: The Realyn lift top coffee table is traditional cottage styling taken to a new level. Antiqued two-tone finish blends a chipped white with a distressed wood finished top for a double serving of charm. Crafted with quality dovetail construction, this coffee table with drawer and open shelf space melds function with exceptional form.

Title: Kadin Coffee Table
Description: Merging modern and minimalist design, this two-tone coffee table turns display space into an art form. Dual finish of wood tones and black is right on trend. Streamlined design proves that less is more.

Title: Rosalia Butterfly Coffee Table
Description: Bring an easy-breezy sense of elegance to your living space with the exquisite Rosalia Butterfly coffee table. Graceful yet sturdy metal frame is adorned with an antiqued goldtone finish that’s aged to perfection. Clear glass tabletop adds to the butterflies’ floating-on-air quality.

Title: Calmoni Coffee Table
Description: Retro yet relevant. The Calmoni coffee table is a great case of mid-century influence with cool, contemporary flair. Ultra-linear tabletop is supported by canted round metal legs for a signature look that reflects your eye for beautiful things.

Title: Josef Retro Floating Top Coffee Table
Description: Elevate your sense of style with the Josef Retro floating top coffee table. Its low-slung, high-design aesthetic pairs an ultra-smooth white lacquer tabletop with a grainy wood finish base in a sophisticated shade of dark brown. Stainless steel connective posts take the look to another level.

Title: Keelin Mid Century Coffee Table
Description: Add a fashion-forward touch of geometry to your living room with the well-rounded Keelin Mid Century coffee table. Gray finish on the tabletop is an alluring contrast.  This contemporary piece sits on a circular base of black iron with a see-through look.

Title: Beginning Coffee Table
Description: Furinno Beginning Living Room Collection is the simplest of all; it includes end table, coffee table and TV stand. This collection showcases the beauty of simplicity that caters to different styles of home. Being the heart of living room and center of all activities, the Beginning Coffee Table has a sleek design and sits perfectly in the center of the living room. It has ample space to keep loose stuff organized. The coffee table is made of particle board tested for durability and strength. It can hold up to 30 lbs of weight. The assembly process is easy with the provided hardware pack and assembly instruction. Care instruction: wipe clean with clean damped cloth and avoid using harsh chemical to prevent damage to the furniture. All the pictures are for illustration purposes only; decor items are not included in the set.

Title: The Urban Port Drum Shape Wooden Coffee Table with Plank Base
Description: Showcasing a great piece of artistry, this round coffee table features a smooth, wide top that can be used for serving snacks or displaying decor. This piece has a narrow, flat base that provides stability, while the distressed brown finish adds depth to its plank wood texture. There may be a variation in color, finish, wood grain and knots due to various natural and artificial factors.

Title: Linon Charlotte Coffee Table
Description: Add a touch of mid-century modern style to your home with our charlotte coffee table.  The sleek lined design is finished in a rich, warm brown. A bottom shelf provides ample space for storage and display. The perfect addition to a living room or sitting area.

Title: Markridge Power Lift Recliner
Description: When it comes to exceptional comfort and style, the Markridge power lift recliner is right on the mark. This single motor lift recliner with 40" high back design has you covered from head to toe. Richly neutral, feel-good fabric is sure to blend beautifully in your space. Clean, transitional styling looks equally at home alongside contemporary and traditional decor.

Title: Stoneland Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: For those that love the cool look of leather but long for the warm feel of fabric, the Stoneland reclining sofa delivers both with ease. Its high-performance padded faux leather is remarkably durable and easy to clean, just the thing for family spaces. Channel-stitched back cushions provide indulgent lumbar support for maximum comfort—not to mention fashion-forward flair.

Title: Warnerton Dual Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Your modern living room awaits with the Warnerton power dual-sided reclining loveseat. Complete with practical faux leather upholstery, one-touch power controls, adjustable headrests and USB ports, it makes finding the best seat in the house a breeze. Cup holders and a storage console keep drinks, snacks and remotes close by. Go ahead—treat yourself to a high-design home theater experience, priced to put you at ease.

Title: Warnerton 3-Piece Dual Power Reclining Sectional
Description: Your modern living room awaits with the Warnerton power reclining sectional. Complete with practical faux leather upholstery, one-touch power controls, adjustable headrests and USB ports, it makes finding the best seat in the house a breeze. Flip-top armrests, a roomy storage console and cup holders galore keep drinks, snacks and remotes close by. Go ahead—treat yourself to a high-design home theater experience, priced to put you at ease.

Title: Correze 3-Piece Dual Power Reclining Modular Sofa
Description: Truly putting high design into recline, the Correze power sofa with gray leather match upholstery proves that just because you’re a recliner doesn’t mean you have to look like one. Deceptively beautiful, its ultra clean-lined aesthetic is as cool and contemporary as they come. Low-profile back has a super swank look. When you need more support for your head and neck, the press of a button engages the Easy View™ power adjustable headrest, designed to let you lean back and still have a primo view of the TV. Ever-so-subtle curves and stunning stitching perfect the aesthetic.

Title: Correze 6-Piece Dual Power Reclining Modular Sectional with Console and Chaise
Description: Truly putting high design into recline, the Correze power reclining sectional with chaise with gray leather match upholstery proves that just because you’re a recliner doesn’t mean you have to look like one. Deceptively beautiful, its ultra clean-lined aesthetic is as cool and contemporary as they come. Low-profile back has a super swank look. When you need more support for your head and neck, the press of a button engages the Easy View™ power adjustable headrest, designed to let you lean back and still have a primo view of the TV. Ever-so-subtle curves and stunning stitching perfect the aesthetic.

Title: Rackingburg Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: Once you recline in the Rackingburg rocker recliner with the pull of a tab, you will not want to get up. It's that comfortable with a bustle back and padded ottoman. Its look is amazing with dramatic cut and sew lines, jumbo stitching and affordable mahogany leather match upholstery—what a way to relax.

Title: Hazenburg Oversized Power Recliner
Description: For those that love the cool look of leather but long for the warm feel of fabric, the Hazenburg zero wall power recliner delivers both with ease. Its high-performance padded faux leather is remarkably durable and easy to clean, just the thing for family spaces. When it’s time to relax, the one-touch power control puts the perfect position at your fingertips. Channel-stitched back cushions provide indulgent lumbar support for maximum seating comfort—not to mention fashion-forward flair.

Title: Jesolo Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: Rustic character comes forth in the dark gray Jesolo rocker recliner. Designer stitching adds a fashion-forward touch to the soft cushions. Faux suede fabric speaks to your knack for superior-quality materials. High back provides ample support as you get off your feet for a bit. With just one pull of tab, you’ll be easing back into relaxation. Infinite levels of comfort await.

Title: Center Line 4-Piece Power Reclining Sectional
Description: For those seeking to curate a living room retreat that offers superior comfort and a contemporary aesthetic, the Center Line sleekly designed power reclining sectional will become your favorite source of at-home serenity. Rest on leather match upholstery, and use the one-touch power control to recline and adjust the headrests with ease. As you recharge after a long day, your devices can too with USB charging. This sectional is visually enticing in a luxe dark gray, with slope track arms and stitched detailing on the back to enhance its modern appeal.

Title: Stoneland Power Reclining Sofa
Description: For those that love the cool look of leather but long for the warm feel of fabric, the Stoneland power reclining sofa delivers both with ease. Its high-performance padded faux leather is remarkably durable and easy to clean, just the thing for family spaces. When it’s time to relax, the one-touch power control puts the perfect position at your fingertips. Channel-stitched back cushions provide indulgent lumbar support for maximum seating comfort—not to mention fashion-forward flair.

Title: Earhart Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: Every day is a good day with the Earhart reclining sofa around. Take a load off and forget your worries as you ease back into the luxurious feel of suede-like fabric. Need more comfort and support for your body? Cue the deep seating and tall back. Contrast jumbo stitching adds an element of style to the cushions.

Title: Watson Coffee Table
Description: Showing off big-time with oversized tabletop space, the Watson rectangular coffee table serves up major contemporary style. Drawing from the beauty of clean-lined mid-century design, it kicks it up a notch with oil-rubbed distressing for added character.

Title: Beaconfield Oversized Power Recliner
Description: The Beaconfield zero wall power recliner is made exclusively for those wanting a sumptuously comfortable recliner—that looks nothing like a recliner. Far from the usual leather/faux leather option, this power recliner is wrapped in a textural chenille upholstery that’s warm and cozy. Tufted box cushions and sloped pillow top armrests lend a rich, contemporary aesthetic, while exposed feet in a dark faux wood finish are something you’d see on an armchair, not a recliner. What a fashion-forward way to kick back in style.

Title: Havalance Lift Top Coffee Table with Storage
Description: With its richly rustic finish and textural mix, the Havalance lift-top coffee table goes to town on bygone beauty. Its distressed two-tone treatment blends a weathered gray with vintage white for an utterly charming effect. The lift-top design adds function to your very comfortable space.

Title: Manhattan Comfort 2-Piece Celine Coffee and End Table
Description: Elevate your space in style with the Celine accent table set, which adds a touch of edge and sophistication to your home. Create a bold statement with a C-shaped end table that tucks under the sofa or bed, and complete the living room area with a coffee table that is both seamless and functional. A mix of materials offers visual interest that enhances the space. Arrange coffee-table books and add a decorative tray, a vase of florals or scented candles to add warmth and give your home a personal touch.

Title: Skyler SOLID MANGO WOOD and Metal 34 inch Wide Square Industrial Coffee Table in Natural
Description: This table’s industrial sensibility and modern approach are ideal for the stylish individual who is looking for that perfect square coffee table. Combining a box-shaped steel frame and legs with solid wood shelves, it fits smoothly into most modern, contemporary or eclectic home designs. The table's square shape makes for a practical and functional fit in your living room, home office or family room.

Title: Johnelle Coffee Table
Description: Homey. Hearty. Heavenly hued. Luring with a distressed weathered gray finish and square baluster legs set on a broad lower shelf for great presence, the Johnelle coffee table is sure to make your homestead feel that much more like home. The look is beautified with elm veneers and a framed and plank-effect tabletop for a richly crafted masterpiece made for years of satisfaction.

Title: Ameriwood Home Winthrop Lift-Top Coffee Table
Description: Add a touch of farmhouse style to your sitting area with the rustic look of the Ameriwood Home Winthrop Lift-Top Coffee Table. This table possesses a special lift top feature to create a hidden storage area large enough to keep your remotes, magazines, laptop, coasters and more. Use the lift top to work or eat from a comfortable position on your couch. A second storage compartment provides even more space for a throw blanket, pillows or even kids’ toys. Made of laminated particleboard and durable engineered wood, the rustic brown wood grain finish will look great with your existing decor.

Title: Welota Manual Recliner
Description: Embrace contemporary comfort with the Welota recliner. Its richly neutral upholstery and no-fuss design give a new meaning to relaxed refinement. A double bustle back and curved armrests round out the look.

Title: Game Zone Dual Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: If you’re looking for the perfect seat for gaming, lounging or just relaxing, look no further than the indulgent comfort of the Game Zone power reclining loveseat. Sporting one-touch power controls, Easy View™ power adjustable headrests, cup holders, storage and chargers, this dual-sided reclining loveseat has everything you need for binge-watching or power playing. Padded cushions with waterfall back design and pillow top arms offer plenty of support, while leather alternative upholstery is given tuck and roll styling for a well-edited aesthetic. The loveseat’s center console is equipped with underneath storage, cup holders and USB charging. How’s that for handy?

Title: Kitching Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: If you're torn between the cool look of leather and warm feel of a microfiber fabric, the Kitching 2 seat power reclining sofa is a style compromise you’re sure to love. Designed for looks and luxuriousness, this decidedly contemporary sofa delivers big comfort without the bulk. Exceptionally clean lines and squared styling make all the difference. A feel-good experience from head to toe, it includes Easy View™ power adjustable headrests that let you fully recline and still have a primo view of the TV. Plus, you can chill out while you recharge thanks to a USB charging port built right into the one-touch power control.

Title: Family Den 3-Piece Dual Power Reclining Sectional
Description: With its sumptuous comfort and designer style, no wonder the Family Den power reclining sectional is such a crowd pleaser. Looking for a new twist on neutrals? Then you’re sure to love how this power sectional’s stone-tone padded velvet fabric is delightfully different, yet sure to blend beautifully with countless color schemes. Rest assured, the one-touch power control with adjustable positions includes an Easy View™ adjustable headrest that lets you lay back and still have a primo view of the TV. Zero-draw USB plug-ins at your fingertips keep you powered up as you chill out.

Title: Backtrack Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: With its fashion-forward sense of style, the Backtrack power reclining sofa has you covered with high-tech advancements and down-home comfort. Leather match upholstery keeps luxury comfortably within budget. Love being pampered? With the touch of a button, experience the pure bliss of an air massage system (with three settings), or chill out with the heated seat element. Distinctive elements of this power recliner include contemporary waterfall tufting that beautifully goes with the flow and a zero-gravity mechanism further raising the ottoman for better blood flow.

Title: Catanzaro Dual Power Recliner
Description: Let the luxury of the Catanzaro power recliner with adjustable headrest carry you away. Decidedly modern, with clean-lined divided back styling, this power recliner entices with a combination of genuine leather and expertly matched faux leather for a supple feel. Even when you’re kicking back you’ll still be perfectly positioned to read or watch TV thanks to the Easy View™ power adjustable headrest. And how’s this for a bonus: a convenient USB charging port located in the power control, so you can recharge while you chill.

Title: Dylan Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: You love the classic look of weatherworn leather—but you want a whole lot more comfort than a standard arm chair can offer. Rest assured, the Dylan rocker recliner, a high-quality faux leather option, gives you the best of all worlds. Curved, contemporary lines and stylish stitching details make quite a fashion statement. Plush padded arms, thick bustle-back cushion support and signature seating are an irresistibly comfortable combination.

Title: Calderwell Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Sleek and streamlined, the Calderwell power reclining sofa draws out your leisure time with its bustle back construction and thickly cushioned armrests. The super soft faux leather gets a high-end tweak with jumbo contrast stitching so you don’t have to sacrifice style for comfort. Sink into the comfortably supportive cushions and stretch your evening as long as you can with the handy USB port to power your devices.

Title: Relax-R Brampton Manual Recliner and Ottoman
Description: Celebrate and reward yourself with the Brampton recliner and ottoman in top grain leather from the Relax-R™ collection. Our top of the line recliner is the perfect way to end your day just relaxing. With an ageless appearance and superior quality, the Relax-R™ collection is your best choice for comfort and reliability. These recliners provide improved satisfaction, luxury and comfort. We add a substantial amount of memory foam in the seating and work hard to ensure that you have a rejuvenating place to rest after a hard day at work. With your comfort as a priority, the handle allows you to adjust the recline to your satisfaction. The matching therapeutic designed ottoman will also add to your relaxing experience.

Title: McClelland 6-Piece Power Reclining Sectional with Chaise
Description: Large-scale comfort is yours with the McClelland power reclining sectional with chaise. With supreme padding and plush upholstery, it's the hero for ultimate relaxation. The extra-wide seating gives you plenty of room to sit back, kick up your heels and enjoy.

Title: Acieona 3-Piece Manual Reclining Sectional
Description: What does the Acieona sectional have to offer? What DOESN'T it have is more like it. Both the sofa and loveseat offer dual-sided reclining. Sofa is centered by a drop-down table with cup holders—great whether you like having your laptop handy, or you’re simply doing the Sunday crossword. Loveseat also offers dual cup holders and a storage console. No worries about keeping devices charged, either, since the wedge has built-in electrical and USB charging stations. But here’s the best part: it’s over-the-top comfortable, with plush support in all the right places, wrapped in an ultra-soft chenille upholstery.

Title: Docker Push Back Recliner
Description: Beautifully designed, this recliner makes a stunning statement in any room. Its chic transitional look features a high camel back and rolled arms in gray upholstery with an elegant fretwork print. Solid wood legs in a black finish create a rich contrast that complements the design, while a removable cushion provides exceptional comfort.

Title: Benlocke 6-Piece Manual Reclining Modular Sectional with Chaise
Description: With plush cushions and wraparound pillow top arms, the Benlocke sectional takes comfort to a whole new level. Its herringbone-patterned velvet upholstery requires minimal care, making this relaxation station ideal for homes with children and pets. The reclining feature engages with the pull of a tab, putting pleasure and instant relaxation at your fingertips.

Title: Workhorse Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Saddle up for affordably priced luxury with the Workhorse reclining loveseat. Stylish elements of this contemporary reclining loveseat with console include biscuit back cushioning and incredibly thick and sumptuous pillow top armrests. Ultra neutral and wonderfully plush, the warm taupe upholstery is sure to complement an endless array of color schemes. Cushioned storage console and two cup holders add comfort and convenience.

Title: Wittlich Manual Swivel Glider Recliner
Description: You and plush cushions are two peas in a pod. That’s why the Wittlich swivel glider recliner will quickly find its way to your heart. Chenille fabric feels so good, you’ll never want to take your hands off of it. Track arms elevate the look with a touch of contemporary sensibility. Ease back into relaxation on the deep seating with one easy pull. Complete with 360-degree swivel, this recliner sets the bar for comfort.

Title: Colleyville 3-Piece Power Reclining Modular Sectional with Chaise
Description: Delightfully modern. Exceptionally comfortable. When it comes to modular furniture with easy-elegant appeal, it’s hard to beat the Colleyville power reclining sectional. Wrapped in a decadently plush stone-tone fabric for neutral versatility, this chic sectional is dressed to impress with a clean-lined divided back, curved track arms and a low-profile back for a relaxed, contemporary aesthetic.

Title: Center Point Manual Reclining Sofa with Drop Down Table
Description: Not your father's easy chair, the Center Point reclining sofa with drop-down table brilliantly showcases the next generation of recline design. Transform game or movie night into an interactive sensory experience with the touch of a button. Built-in LED lighting lets you choose from a range of colors for a captivatingly cool vibe. Use the light control button to sync with any device within range and cycle through the colors to the beat of the bassline. Sleek faux leather with distinctive stitching enhances the form and function of this simply striking piece.

Title: Next-Gen DuraPella Dual Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: This sleek, ultra-modern power reclining loveseat has it all. With designer looks and head-to-toe comfort, the Next-Gen DuraPella reclining loveseat with console has the upscale look of leather at a scaled-down faux leather price. Its two-tone upholstery is more durable and water-repellent than regular leather, an added bonus for families with children or pets. Features including wireless and USB charging, an adjustable headrest and an extended "zero-gravity" ottoman for improved circulation make this the next generation of power recliners.

Title: Clonmel Oversized Manual Recliner
Description: Large-scale comfort is yours with the Clonmel zero wall wide seat recliner. With supremely padded back, seat and arm cushions, it's the hero for ultimate relaxation. Microfiber upholstery is welcoming, soft and luxuriously covers the extra-wide seat. Recline back and kick up your feet to bolster your comfort level even more.

Title: Workhorse Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: Saddle up for affordably priced luxury with the Workhorse reclining sofa. Stylish elements of this contemporary reclining sofa include biscuit back cushioning and incredibly thick and sumptuous pillow top armrests. Ultra neutral and wonderfully plush, the warm taupe upholstery is sure to complement an endless array of color schemes. Discreetly placed (inside arm) reclining tab maintains streamlined style.

Title: Zak Push Back Recliner
Description: Update your living space with this transitional-style recliner. Rounded arms and a high rounded back give this chair a simple and beautiful silhouette. A tufted back and bronze-tone nailhead trim add an elegant touch to the design, while the removable seat cushion provides exceptional comfort. This recliner features solid wood legs with a brown finish and is upholstered in cream-colored fabric, creating a rich contrast that complements the look. Place it in your living room or bedroom for a comfortable and chic addition to your existing decor.

Title: Colleyville 5-Piece Power Reclining Modular Sectional with Chaise and 2 Reclining Seats
Description: Delightfully modern. Exceptionally comfortable. When it comes to modular furniture with easy-elegant appeal, it’s hard to beat the Colleyville power reclining sectional. Wrapped in a decadently plush stone-tone fabric for neutral versatility, it's dressed to impress with a clean-lined divided back, curved track arms and a low-profile back for a relaxed, contemporary aesthetic.

Title: Derwin Manual Reclining Sofa with Drop Down Table
Description: Rock the cool look of leather minus the hefty price tag with the Derwin reclining sofa. Rich with tonal variation, the faux leather upholstery sure looks like the real thing. And talk about indulgent comfort. Double stuffed armrests and sumptuous cushions cradle and support in all the right places. A distinctive biscuit back design enhances this sofa's contemporary flair. The drop down table and handy cup holders complete the experience.

Title: Draycoll Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Built for luxury, the Draycoll reclining loveseat with center console lets you kick back in reliable style. The thick, softly textured chenille upholstery provides a comfy surface on which to lounge. With bustle back construction and thickly cushioned armrests, this piece gives you the dependable support you need to unwind with the convenience of the center console to ease your evening.

Title: Trambley 6-Piece Dual Power Reclining Sectional
Description: Embrace contemporary comfort with the Trambley power reclining sectional. Its rich walnut colored upholstery and streamlined design give a new meaning to relaxed refinement. An updated bustle back and gently scooped seats round out the look.

Title: Wilhurst Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Embrace ultimate comfort and style. The Wilhurst reclining loveseat is covered in a feel-good blue-gray fabric that’s beautified with puckered stitching and biscuit-back tufting. Its drop-down table with cup holders adds functionality. The sofa’s enticing, generously stuffed armrests make it that much more of a dream scene.

Title: Derwin Swivel Glider Recliner
Description: Rock the cool look of leather minus the hefty price tag with the Derwin glider recliner. Rich with tonal variation, the faux leather upholstery sure looks like the real thing. And talk about indulgent comfort. Double stuffed armrests and sumptuous cushions cradle and support in all the right places. Distinctive biscuit back design enhances this recliner's contemporary flair. Smooth gliding motion and 360-degree swivel complete the experience.

Title: Thayer Push Back Recliner
Description: This recliner combines the classic with the contemporary. It features a unique arm design paired with an eye-catching pattern, for a style that's sure to become a cozy accent in your living space. A high-density foam filling and solid wood legs provide exceptional support and comfort, while the reclining feature makes it easy to kick back and relax.

Title: Colleyville 4-Piece Power Reclining Modular Sectional with Chaise and Console
Description: Delightfully modern. Exceptionally comfortable. When it comes to modular furniture with easy-elegant appeal, it’s hard to beat the Colleyville power reclining sectional. Wrapped in a decadently plush stone-tone fabric for neutral versatility, this chic sectional is dressed to impress with a clean-lined divided back, curved track arms and a low-profile back for a relaxed, contemporary aesthetic.

Title: Atwater Living Billie Rocker Manual Recliner
Description: The Baby Relax Billie Rocker Recliner Chair will lull your little angel to sleep with its soothing rock or recline mechanism and give mommy some much needed relaxation with its comfy pocket coil seating and soft yet stylish linen upholstered exterior.

Title: Mancin Manual Reclining Sofa with Drop Down Table
Description: The Mancin reclining sofa satisfies your high level of taste and yearning for comfort. The storage arms and plushly pillowed high back and seat are covered in a richly textured faux leather with diamond stitch quilting. Plus, built-in cup holders keep beverages close at hand. If convenience is a consideration, rest assured—this smart-design sofa features a drop-down table with additional cup holders, a docking station and reading lights.

Title: Draycoll Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: Built for luxury, the Draycoll rocker recliner lets you kick back in reliable style. The thick, softly textured chenille upholstery provides a comfy surface on which to lounge. With bustle back construction and thickly cushioned armrests, this piece gives you the dependable support you need to unwind.

Title: Relax-R Bishop Manual Recliner
Description: There’s no better way to enjoy some downtime than in your favorite Bishop recliner. This recliner from our Relax-R™ collection is sure to be a crowd pleaser. Crafted with a solid hardwood frame, this classic design is as sleek as it is affordable. Each model has heavy tubular steel construction providing durability. It also features a 360-degree swivel, three position articulating headrest and independent reclining functions to adjust to your personal comfort. This therapeutic design will be a relaxing retreat whether it's placed in your office or in your home.

Title: Vacherie Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: When it comes to comfort, style and value, the Vacherie faux leather reclining sofa in chocolate brown rocks. Tailored for feel-good flair, its fashion-forward bustle back design is enhanced with sculpted padding on the headrest for cradling support. Channel cushioning along the sides flows into thick, wrapped pillow top armrests that are truly over the top. And while it might look like you broke the bank, a sumptuously soft leather-like fabric keeps indulgence well within budget.

Title: Stoneland Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: For those that love the cool look of leather but long for the warm feel of fabric, the Stoneland rocker recliner delivers both with ease. Its high-performance padded faux leather is remarkably durable and easy to clean, just the thing for family spaces. Channel-stitched back cushions provide indulgent lumbar support for maximum comfort—not to mention fashion-forward flair.

Title: Gaspar Dual Power Recliner
Description: Longing for chic style without having to sacrifice superb comfort? Look no further than the Gaspar power recliner. Its real leather, paired with an expertly matched faux leather for affordability, has an inviting softness. Contemporary in design and full of convenient features, this recliner is ideal for busy sophisticates in need of a spot to unwind.

Title: Nantahala 6-Piece Manual Reclining Sectional with Chaise
Description: Sporting the look of perfectly "broken-in" leather, the Nantahala faux leather sectional has it all: looks, comfort and value. The combination of weathered saddle and coffee brown faux leather upholstery adds a nice contrasting element to the plump cushions, while jumbo stitching enhances the fashionable flair. Clean and simple divided back tailoring keeps this roomy sectional’s aesthetic cool and contemporary.

Title: Nantahala 6-Piece Manual Reclining Sectional with Chaise
Description: Sporting the look of perfectly "broken-in" leather, the Nantahala faux leather sectional has it all: looks, comfort and value. Its combination of weathered slate gray and black faux leather upholstery adds a nice contrasting element to the plump cushions, while jumbo stitching enhances the fashionable flair. Clean and simple divided back tailoring keeps this roomy sectional’s aesthetic cool and contemporary.

Title: StarLine Manual Recliner and Ottoman
Description: Scandinavian / European-styled recliner and ottoman. A swiveling recliner that feels like it was custom-made for you. The recliner has the ideal amount of support, with an adjustable recline degree for your comfort needs. Perfect for long naps or resting. Backed by quality, buy with confidence.

Title: Alphons Manual Reclining Loveseat
Description: Sincere in its styling, the Alphons reclining loveseat invites a relaxed sensibility into your space. Its neutral upholstery has a universal appeal, with pull-tab reclining making it easy to kick back in comfort. Providing high-quality functionality at an affordable price, this loveseat marries well with a myriad of design aesthetics.

Title: Next-Gen DuraPella 5-Piece Dual Power Reclining Sectional with Console
Description: If you’re looking for a brilliant blend of comfort, quality and flair, the Next-Gen Durapella faux leather power sectional excites and delights with sleek, modern style—priced to put you at ease. Appealing to those with an eye for contemporary design and high-tech features, this sand colored sectional offers adjustable headrests, zero-draw USB charging and a zero-wall recline to maximize your space. Distinctive elements include flared, sheltering armrests and subtly tufted seat cushions that add a high-design touch.

Title: Trambley 5-Piece Dual Power Reclining Sectional
Description: Embrace contemporary comfort with the Trambley power reclining sectional. Its rich walnut colored upholstery and streamlined design give a new meaning to relaxed refinement. An updated bustle back and gently scooped seats round out the look.

Title: Partymate 2-Piece Reclining Sectional
Description: Affordable luxury made easy. An essential for living room lounging, the Partymate sectional is a star in social spaces. Its sleek slate gray faux leather is well-suited for mixing and matching with your existing pieces. Pull tab reclining keeps you and your companions covered when it comes to comfort. And this functional piece is equally as fashionable, with design details like a channel-stitched back incorporating subtle visual interest.

Title: Samperstone 5-Piece Power Reclining Modular Sectional
Description: City sleek living. The Samperstone sectional is loaded with luxury. An ultra-stylish diamond stitch design pumps up the piece with eye-catching drama. And talk about style with purpose. This sectional supports you with a high back and faux leather upholstery in gorgeous gray. Its USB charging station powers up your tech life as you recline in comfort.

Title: Buncrana Dual Power Recliner
Description: Recline in the modern luxury and convenience of the Buncrana power recliner with high back and Easy View™ power adjustable headrest. With the touch of a button, you can easily position the recliner and its headrest for maximum comfort. Plus, with the convenient USB charging port, you can keep your electronics charged without having to get up. The genuine leather upholstery is paired with expertly matched faux leather for affordability. Bring a luxurious look full of details, such as nailhead trim and rolled armrests, to your living area—what a treat packed with comfort to be enjoyed for years to come.

Title: Next-Gen Gaucho Dual Power Recliner
Description: Modern comfort never looked so good. Sporting sloped track arms, wide, generous cushions and bustle-back stitching for high-fashion flair, the Next-Gen Gaucho power recliner is the ultimate choice in comfortably cool, contemporary style. Indulging with a suede-like faux leather that emulates nubuck leather, the recliner’s family- and pet-friendly upholstery is the stuff dreams are made of. Factor in the added perks of an Easy View™ power adjustable headrest and USB charging, and you’ve got a power recliner that truly caters with style, comfort and convenience.

Title: Lenox Push Back Recliner
Description: Add a classic update to your living space with this sumptuous recliner. With its high-density foam filling and a solid wood frame and legs, it provides exceptional comfort and support. Silvertone nailheads accent the chair for an elegant touch, while the reclining feature makes it easy to kick back and relax. The recliner's classic design spotlights a style that's sure to become a cozy focal point in your home.

Title: Huddle-Up Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: How can you not cuddle up in the decadently plush Huddle-Up reclining loveseat? Spicing things up in a warm and earthy nutmeg brown, this richly styled reclining loveseat is covered in a heavyweight padded velvet upholstery for a sense of luxury. Distinctive elements include wraparound padded armrests for a cool twist. Offering hidden storage, dual cup holders and and AC power and USB ports, the comfortably cushioned center console adds a home movie theater element.

Title: Mitchiner Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: The Mitchiner rocker recliner is the ideal seat for one. This recliner is plush in all the right places, and will support you longer than you can binge watch your favorite TV show. The neutral upholstery begs for a patterned throw pillow and some of your time. A recliner that’s this easy breezy belongs in your home.

Title: Relax-R Montreal Manual Recliner and Ottoman
Description: Celebrate and reward yourself with the Montreal recliner and ottoman in top grain leather from the Relax-R™ collection. Our top-of-the-line recliner is the perfect way to end your day just relaxing. With an ageless appearance and superior quality, the Relax-R™ collection is your best choice for comfort and reliability. The recliner provides improved satisfaction, luxury and comfort. We add a substantial amount of memory foam in the seating and work hard to ensure that you have a rejuvenating place to rest after a hard day at work. With your comfort as a priority, the handle allows you to adjust the recline to your satisfaction. The matching therapeutic designed ottoman will also add to your relaxing experience.

Title: Calderwell Power Recliner
Description: Sleek and streamlined, the Calderwell power rocker recliner draws out your leisure time with its bustle back construction and thickly cushioned armrests. The super soft faux leather gets a high-end tweak with jumbo contrast stitching so you don’t have to sacrifice style for comfort. Sink into the comfortably supportive cushions and stretch your evening as long as you can with the handy USB port to power your devices.

Title: Atwater Living Vertical Manual Recliner
Description: The Atwater Living vertical push back recliner seamlessly blends comfort and style. Designed with a sturdy frame and pocket coil seating to ensure full comfort, it's upholstered in soft faux leather and sits atop wood legs. Includes an RMT push back mechanism for optimal relaxation.

Title: Texline 3-Piece Dual Power Reclining Modular Loveseat
Description: Truly putting high design into recline, the Texline power reclining sectional with gray leather match upholstery proves that just because you’re a recliner doesn’t mean you have to look like one. Deceptively beautiful, its ultra clean-lined aesthetic is as cool and contemporary as they come. Low-profile back has a super swank look. When you need more support for your head and neck, the press of a button engages the Easy View™ power adjustable headrest, designed to let you lean back and still have a primo view of the TV. The zero wall design requires minimal space between wall and chair back, and indulgent pillow top seating gives an added layer of comfort.

Title: Alphons Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: Sincere in its styling, the Alphons rocker recliner invites a relaxed sensibility into your space. Its neutral upholstery has a universal appeal, with pull-tab reclining making it easy to kick back in comfort. Providing high-quality functionality at an affordable price, this recliner marries well with a myriad of design aesthetics.

Title: Mayall 6-Piece Power Reclining Sectional
Description: Embrace contemporary comfort with the Mayall power reclining sectional. Its richly neutral upholstery and streamlined design give a new meaning to relaxed refinement. An indulgent bustle back and gently scooped seats round out the look. Combining serenity, comfort and function, this sectional will be your favorite place to chill out and decompress.

Title: Lubec 5-Piece Power Reclining Sectional
Description: Dressed to impress. Made to caress. With the Lubec sectional with power, you get the best of both worlds: the cool look of leather and the warm, cozy feel of fabric. Sporting a transitional look that suits contemporary and classic interiors, the high-style sectional is wrapped in a taupe faux leather and enriched with divided back cushioning, jumbo stitching and roll armrests for fashionable flair.

Title: Next-Gen Gaucho 3-Piece Dual Power Reclining Modular Sofa
Description: Modern comfort never looked so good. Indulging with a suede-like faux leather that emulates nubuck leather, the sectional’s family- and pet-friendly upholstery is the stuff dreams are made of. Factor in the added perks of an Easy View™ power adjustable headrest and USB charging, and you’ve got a power reclining sectional that truly caters with style, comfort and convenience.

Title: Denoron Power Reclining Sofa
Description: If highly contemporary looks and a heavenly feel sit well with you, rest your eyes on the Denoran reclining power sofa. Decadently soft, the easy-care faux leather upholstery is enriched with jumbo contrast stitching and dramatic cut-and-sew lines for fashion-forward flair. Radius cut arm frame adds cool, curvaceous interest. At your fingertips: one-touch power control with a zero-draw USB plug-in that’s not only convenient but also energy efficient. When it comes to high style at a down-to-earth price, this power reclining sofa really brings it home.

Title: Burkner Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: If highly contemporary looks and a heavenly feel sit well with you, rest your eyes on the Burkner reclining power loveseat. When it comes to high style at a down-to-earth price, this power reclining loveseat really brings it home.

Title: Cicely Push Back Recliner
Description: Update your living room with the comfort and style of this recliner. Upholstered in a rich charcoal fabric, it features a high back with rounded arms for a sleek look. Bronze-tone nailhead trim adds an elegant accent to the design. The recliner's high-density foam filling and solid wood legs provide long-lasting comfort and support, while the reclining feature makes it easy to kick back and relax.

Title: Derwin Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Rock the cool look of leather minus the hefty price tag with the Derwin dual reclining loveseat. Rich with tonal variation, the faux leather upholstery sure looks like the real thing. Title: Hallstrung Dual Power Recliner
Description: Fashion-forward style. Sumptuous leather feel and appeal. Total comfort at your fingertips. It’s all yours for the taking with the Hallstrung power recliner with adjustable headrest. Wrapped in a lavish chocolate-colored upholstery, this decidedly contemporary power recliner tantalizes the senses in so many ways. Rest assured, leather match upholstery makes luxury affordable. Upping the comfort with 44" high back styling, this power recliner truly caters from head to toe. An Easy View™ power adjustable headrest allows you to lean back while propping up your head—perfect for chilling out in front of the TV—while an extended ottoman lets you stretch out all the more. And with a USB port in the power control panel, you hardly have to move a muscle to stay powered up.

Title: Glenvale 6-Piece Dual Power Reclining Modular Sectional with Console
Description: Longing for chic style without having to sacrifice superb comfort? Look no further than the Glenvale sectional. Edgy upholstery has an inviting softness thanks to the bustle back styling. Contemporary in design and full of convenient features, this sectional is ideal for busy sophisticates in need of a spot to unwind.

Title: Clonmel Manual Reclining Loveseat
Description: Large-scale comfort is yours with the Clonmel reclining loveseat. With supremely padded back, seat and arm cushions, it's the hero for ultimate relaxation. Microfiber upholstery is welcoming, soft and luxuriously covers the extra-wide seats. Recline back and kick up your feet to bolster your comfort level even more.

Title: Game Plan Oversized Dual Power Recliner
Description: Masterful in its interpretation of modern luxury, the Game Plan power recliner is sleekly tailored in top-grain leather. Subtle stitching accents and clean-lined track arms create contemporary character, inviting high-brow style into your home.

Title: Strikefirst Power Recliner
Description: An exceptional winner in home fashion, the Strikefirst power recliner shows us the beauty of today’s best recliners. Bold diamond stitching on the back and seat invites you to sit and stay awhile. Real leather brings feel-good pleasure and exceptional wear, while a skillfully matched faux leather upholstery keeps luxury right on budget. Title: McCaskill Oversized Manual Recliner
Description: Sink into the supple McCaskill recliner and prepare to be swept off your feet—literally. Its extra-wide seat and plush cushioning are divinely comfortable. It's wrapped in decadently soft leather match upholstery for a luxurious experience, saving you money without sacrificing style. Prominent stitching, linear track arms and a goes-with-anything gray hue add stylish touches.

Title: Mayall 3-Piece Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Embrace contemporary comfort with the Mayall power reclining sectional. Its richly neutral upholstery and streamlined design give a new meaning to relaxed refinement. An indulgent bustle back and gently scooped seats round out the look.

Title: CorLiving Oren Theater Power Recliner
Description: Do movie nights right in your brand new Oren PU Theater Recliner. Wrapped in sleek, durable PU fabric with framed topstitching for a luxury vibe. With the click of a button, you can recline to your desired position and adjust at any time. Equipped with a USB charger, you don't need to leave the comfort of your chair to plug in personal electronics. Generous padding and a metal-framed cup holder make your movie nights much more comfortable than any theatre. Just grab your popcorn and a blanket, and enjoy.

Title: Clonmel Power Reclining Loveseat

Title: Next-Gen Gaucho 6-Piece Power Reclining Sectional
Description: Modern comfort never looked so good. Indulging with a suede-like faux leather that emulates nubuck leather, the sectional’s family- and pet-friendly upholstery is the stuff dreams are made of. Title: McClelland 6-Piece Manual Reclining Modular Sectional with Chaise

Kick back and relax as the quiet motor powers a seamless transition to your optimal comfort and viewing level. The perfect addition to your entertainment or living space.

Title: Goal Keeper Dual Power Recliner

Title: Composer 3-Piece Dual Power Reclining Home Theater Seating

Ultra-cool lattice stitching elevates the look and ambient LED lighting completes the theater-style experience. So relax, kick off your shoes and enjoy the show.

Description: Marvel at the beauty of a subtle showstopper. The Miravel rocker recliner appeals to those with a uniquely chic eye for comfort pieces. Upping the comfort with 44" high back styling, this power loveseat truly caters from head to toe. An Easy View™ power adjustable headrest allows you to lean back while propping up your head—perfect for chilling out in front of the TV—while an extended ottoman lets you stretch out all the more. Ever-so-subtle curves and stunning stitching perfect the aesthetic.

Title: Atwater Living Mariella Swivel Glider Recliner
Description: Calm your lil' angel in complete joy with the beautiful Baby Relax Mariella Swivel Glider Recliner Chair. Its smooth mechanism allows for both a rotating swivel function and gliding motion and its built-in footrest offers total comfort while you are nursing.

Title: Wasson 5-Piece Dual Power Reclining Sectional
Description: Longing for chic style without having to sacrifice superb comfort? Look no further than the Wassan sectional. Its edgy upholstery has an inviting softness thanks to the bustle back styling. Contemporary in design and full of convenient features, this sectional is ideal for busy sophisticates in need of a spot to unwind.

Title: Glenvale 3-Piece Dual Power Reclining Modular Loveseat with Console
Description: Longing for chic style without having to sacrifice superb comfort? Look no further than the Glenvale sectional. Edgy upholstery has an inviting softness thanks to the bustle back styling. Contemporary in design and full of convenient features, this sectional is ideal for busy sophisticates in need of a spot to unwind.

Title: Enouvation E6 Wireless Power Pack for Reclining Furniture with 3 Power Seats
Description: The E6 Power Pack from Enouvation offers you the ability to go cordless on Power Motion furniture. This means you can float a Power Motion piece of furniture without having to see those unsightly, industrial cords. Enouvation Power Packs are tested to multiple UL standards and certified, having gone through rigorous testing. Each Power Pack comes with its own charger in box. The frequency in which your Power Pack will need to be recharged varies greatly on the amount of use. Patents pending. The Enouvation "E" Extension cable is suggested for use with every Enouvation Power Pack and offers 2 meters of extra cable wiring. By using your Power Pack in conjunction with an E cable, you are allowed the freedom to place your Power Pack in a convenient location under your furniture. Keep your Power Pack out of sight and in a safe spot, away from moving parts and mechanisms that might damage it. E cables can also assist in the connection of sectional pieces to be powered by a single Power Pack. Enouvation Y Splitter cable allows you to harness the power of a single Power Pack, for use on multiple furniture motors. This is especially useful for using a single Power Pack on a loveseat, sofa or multi piece reclining sectional.

Title: Battleville Dual Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: Double down on sleek style with the Battleville power reclining loveseat. It has a streamlined, space-conscious appeal, with two-tone upholstery in neutral hues creating subtly striking visual intrigue. And with one-touch reclining, adjustable headrests and wireless charging, this piece combines contemporary function and fashion into a single clean-lined design.

Title: McCaskill Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Sink into the supple McCaskill reclining loveseat and prepare to be swept off your feet—literally. Its extra-wide seats and plush cushioning are divinely comfortable. It's wrapped in decadently soft leather match upholstery for a luxurious experience, saving you money without sacrificing style. Prominent stitching, linear track arms and a goes-with-anything gray hue add stylish touches. Keep beverages and remotes close at hand thanks to the center console and cup holders.

Title: Next-Gen Gaucho Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Kick back, relax, and enjoy some sports on TV with the Next-Gen Gaucho reclining loveseat. You will love its double stuffed pillow top arms and soft-as-suede faux leather upholstery. Family-friendly espresso color and creative stitching add panache. Recline in comfort even if floor space is limited, thanks to the space-efficient zero wall design. This bustle back loveseat with console and cup holders will always be a win.

Title: Next-Gen Gaucho 5-Piece Dual Power Reclining Sectional
Description: Modern comfort never looked so good. Sporting sloped track arms, wide, generous cushions and bustle-back stitching for high-fashion flair, the Next-Gen Gaucho power sectional is the ultimate choice in comfortably cool, contemporary style. Indulging with a suede-like faux leather that emulates nubuck leather, the sectional’s family- and pet-friendly upholstery is the stuff dreams are made of. Factor in the added perks of an Easy View™ power adjustable headrest and USB charging, and you’ve got a power reclining sectional that truly caters with style, comfort and convenience.

Title: Mayall 3-Piece Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: Embrace contemporary comfort with the Mayall power reclining sectional. Its richly neutral upholstery and streamlined design give a new meaning to relaxed refinement. An indulgent bustle back and gently scooped seats round out the look. Combining serenity, comfort and function, this sectional will be your favorite place to chill out and decompress.

Title: CorLiving Oren Push Back Manual Recliner
Description: Sit back and relax in your Oren manual push-back recliner chair. Featuring a dual-function foot extension and a reclining back that will surely help you unwind and de-stress. The Oren recliner is generously foam padded and upholstered in a durable, soft, fabric making it perfect for any room. The clean lines make the Oren recliner a sleek and stylish option for your space without sacrificing your comfort

Title: Coombs Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: The Coombs reclining power loveseat with console makes it hip to be square. Brilliantly boxy profile and wide track arms infuse a highly contemporary look you don’t often find in reclining furniture. Rest assured, the trendy charcoal-tone upholstery is sumptuously soft—and made all the more enticing with deep channel tufting for clean-lined flair. Along with dual cup holders and handy storage in the center console, you’ll enjoy a one-touch power control with USB port to keep devices charged while you unplug.

Title: Next-Gen DuraPella 2-Piece Dual Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: If you’re looking for a brilliant blend of comfort, quality and flair, the Next-Gen Durapella faux leather power sectional excites and delights with sleek, modern style—priced to put you at ease. Appealing to those with an eye for contemporary design and high-tech features, this sand colored sectional offers adjustable headrests, zero-draw USB charging and a zero-wall recline to maximize your space. Distinctive elements include flared, sheltering armrests and subtly tufted seat cushions that add a high-design touch.

Title: Enouvation E10 Wireless Power Pack for Reclining Furniture with 3 Power Seats (App Included)
Description: At 10,000 mAh, the Enouvation E10 Power Pack offers a large power capacity in a small footprint, providing up to 2,000 motorized functions on a single charge. It's the most efficient power pack in the industry for power motion furniture, with more power at a fraction of the size. It includes an LED Power Indicator and interactive low power alert, in addition to its own charger. Take advantage of the optional Remote Power Management features by using the Entelligent App to quickly visualize your pack's power level, review charging history, receive low power alerts plus recharge reminders and shut off power remotely to conserve power when your pack is not in use. The included Enouvation Y Splitter cables allow you to provide power to multiple reclining pieces with just one Power Pack, while the included extension cables offer two extra meters each of wiring.

Title: Willamen Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: The Willamen reclining loveseat with console lets you share the most popular seat in the house with anyone you choose. Made of quality faux leather, its look and feel are rich yet affordable. Fashion-forward jumbo stitching adds the finishing touch to a handsome piece that is just waiting for some of your time.

Title: Goal Keeper 3-Piece Dual Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Setting a high bar for style, the Goal Keeper power reclining sectional is casual contemporary personified. Its sleek design is highlighted by track arms, while padded T-cushions soften the look. Trendy light gray upholstery harmonizes beautifully with existing furniture, opening the door to endless possibilities for your living room's modern aesthetic.

Title: Benndale Power Recliner
Description: For those with a penchant for refined relaxation, the Benndale power recliner delivers modern functionality in streamlined style. Immerse yourself in your favorite film or game with a built-in audio system while LED lighting sets the mood. Storage armrests corral your comfort essentials, with charging features to keep your electronics close by. And when it’s time to leave your sleek seating sanctuary, memory programmable positions allow you to pick up right where you left off.

Title: Wasson 3-Piece Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Longing for chic style without having to sacrifice superb comfort? Look no further than the Wassan sectional. Title: Potrol Recliner
