Title: Hallstrung 6-Piece Dual Power Reclining Sectional
Description: The luxuriously cozy Hallstrung reclining sectional makes you happy to be at home. Supple leather match upholstery is as comfortably affordable as it is attractive. High back design provides the support you need. Keep beverages nearby in the stainless steel cup holders. From the Easy View™ power headrest to the footrests, you're in control of your relaxation. Just plug in your device to the USB charging station and sit back, relax and enjoy your space.

Title: Cranedall 2-Piece Dual Power Reclining Modular Loveseat
Description: Load up on comfort and contemporary style—without hogging up space—with the Cranedall power reclining sectional. Wrapped in a heavyweight padded faux leather with a weathered effect that looks so natural, this super chic sectional with clean lines and jumbo contrast stitching includes not one but two zero wall power recliners requiring minimal space between the wall and chair back. How’s that for space efficiency? Rest assured, the one-touch power control with adjustable positions includes an Easy View™ adjustable headrest that lets you lay back and still have a primo view of the TV. Zero-draw USB plug-ins at your fingertips keep you powered up as you chill out.

Description: Extra room, extra comfort. The Paulestein wide seat power recliner does the work for you as you sit back, relax and kick up your feet. Description: Wrap yourself up in the cushioned comfort of the Wyerville power reclining sectional. Bustle back and pillow top armrests make spending time in the living room oh so sweet. Factor in the smoothly neutral upholstery and you’ve got an ultra-stylish power recliner that truly caters to your every move.

Title: Crenshaw Triple Power Recliner
Description: Bring home every element you need for an immersive seating experience in one sleek, tailored package. The Crenshaw power recliner is covered in smoky gray faux leather for a positively luxe look and feel. Memory programmable positions allow you to find your ideal comfort zone and stay there, while cup holders, storage arms and USB charging keep necessities within reach. Upping the cool factor are LED mood lights that pair harmoniously with a built-in sound system and sonic bass in the seat. Modern and multifunctional, this chair suits cinephiles and gamers alike.

Title: Henefer Dual Power Recliner
Description: Wowing in a deep and dramatic shade of midnight gray, the Henefer power recliner reflects a clean-lined approach whose time has come. Offering the cool look of leather—but with a warm and cozy feel—this ultra-contemporary recliner entices with an Easy View™ power headrest that lets you fully recline and still have a primo view of the TV. Factor in chicly wrapped armrests, jumbo contrast stitching and a one-touch power control with USB plug-in, and you’ve got exceptional form and function from head to toe.

Title: Mancin Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: The Mancin double reclining loveseat with console satisfies your high level of taste and yearning for comfort. The storage arms and plushly pillowed high back and seat are covered in a richly textured faux leather with diamond stitch quilting. Plus, built-in cup holders keep beverages close at hand.

Title: Kempten Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: You don’t just want to recline. You want to recline in high design. Wrapped in a fabulous black faux leather upholstery, the Kempten rocker recliner with 42" high back is everything you long for—and then some. Ultra clean lines, subtle curves and sumptuous comfort make it a sight for sore eyes and tired muscles. Here’s the showstopper: ambient blue LED lighting along the chair base for a movie theater experience enjoyed from the convenience of home.

Title: Bridgtrail Manual Recliner
Description: Sit back, relax and kick up your feet. Immerse yourself in total comfort as the Bridgtrail rocker recliner embraces you with the cool look of leather and the warm, cozy feel of fabric. Plush, pillowy cushions, an oversized headrest pillow and wide pillow top armrests feature heavyweight stitching in a stunning shade of charcoal gray. The warm, welcoming look fits easily with other colors in the room and is right at home with a variety of design styles. A comfortable big and tall high-back profile allows an abundance of softness that is over the top.

Title: Next-Gen Gaucho Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Kick back, relax, and enjoy some sports on TV with the Next-Gen Gaucho power reclining loveseat. You will love its double stuffed pillow top arms and soft-as-suede faux leather upholstery. Family-friendly espresso color and creative stitching add panache. Recline in infinite positions of comfort while you plug in your devices to the convenient USB charging station. This bustle back loveseat with console and cup holders will always be a win.

Title: Salvatore 5-Piece Power Reclining Sectional
Description: Easy on the eyes and incredibly comfortable, the high-end Salvatore power reclining sectional will upgrade the look and feel of your living room. Its automotive-inspired leather and faux leather keep luxury right on budget. The modular design allows pieces to be grouped together in a variety of ways. No matter how it's arranged, this sectional is just the right touch for reclining and relaxing in style..

Title: Renbuen Manual Recliner
Description: A large scale means large comfort with the Renbuen rocker recliner. Grid pattern and overstuffed armrests help create your at-home resting haven. With just one pull, you can recline in infinite positions of comfort. The effect seen in the smoke-colored upholstery creates a rustic look—perfect for your modern or casual setting.

Title: Hartsdale 2-Piece Power Reclining Modular Loveseat
Description: Fit for the comfort seeker in your household, the Hartsdale power sectional has that casually cool sensibility you love. Pillow top cushions with a feather-fiber blend are simply sumptuous. Chic and subtle chenille microfiber upholstery weaves in so much style.

Title: Trambley 3-Piece Dual Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Embrace contemporary comfort with the Trambley power reclining sectional. Its rich walnut colored upholstery and streamlined design give a new meaning to relaxed refinement. An updated bustle back and gently scooped seats round out the look.

Title: Hazenburg Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: For those that love the cool look of leather but long for the warm feel of fabric, the Hazenburg power reclining loveseat delivers both with ease. Its high-performance padded faux leather is remarkably durable and easy to clean, just the thing for family spaces. When it’s time to relax, the one-touch power control puts the perfect position at your fingertips. Channel-stitched back cushions provide indulgent lumbar support for maximum seating comfort—not to mention fashion-forward flair.

Title: Hogan Manual Reclining Loveseat
Description: With supremely padded back, seat and arm cushions, the Hogan reclining loveseat is the hero of comfort. Microfiber upholstery is soft and sumptuous and the extra-wide seat is large enough to practically accommodate the whole family. Recline the back and kick up your feet to bolster your comfort level even more.

Title: Team Time Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: If you agree it’s time to put the high design in recline, prepare to be impressed with the Team Time power reclining sofa in chocolate brown. Equipped with everything from a power adjustable headrest and USB charging ports, to stainless steel cup holders and chic padded armrests, it’s the clear winner for contemporary style and comfort. Ultra-cool vertical channel stitching, jumbo contrast stitching and a pad-on-pad arm design put this power reclining sofa in a class by itself.

Title: Boxberg Power Recliner
Description: Rock the cool look of leather minus the hefty price tag with the Boxberg rocker recliner with power. Rich with tonal variation, the indulgently soft upholstery sure looks like the real thing. And talk about indulgent comfort. Double stuffed armrests and sumptuous cushions cradle and support in all the right places. The recliner’s distinctive scooped stitching adds contemporary flair.

Title: Paulestein Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: Room for two, comfort for days. The Paulestein reclining power loveseat does the work for you as you sit back, relax and kick up your feet. It features a timeless two-over-two cushion design, wide track arms and irresistibly soft velvety blue upholstery. Contrast stitching and tufted details offer a crisp, clean look that is always in style. Geometric accent pillows add a splash of color.

Title: Kegler Recliner
Description: Prioritize comfort while still making a versatile style statement. Complementing a variety of color schemes, the Kegler rocker recliner's supremely plush seating lines you up for hours of leisure. Its one-pull reclining motion places you in optimal TV watching and naptime positions. If you’re reaching for a relaxed living room atmosphere, this chair is ready to provide.

Title: Hargis Push Back Recliner
Description: Add transitional style and comfort to your home with this recliner. The cozy chair boasts dual rows of silvertone nailhead accenting, thick padding, a high back and track arms. It features one recline position for comfort. The simple silhouette of this recliner is the perfect addition to your living space, making it easy to kick back and relax.

Title: Riptyme Swivel Glider Recliner
Description: If you agree it’s high time for better form and function from your furniture, the Riptyme swivel glider recliner might be just your style. Indulgently comfortable yet anything but bulky, its space-conscious design pairs slimmed-down armrests with a roomy seating zone for maximum comfort. This faux leather chair may be a recliner, but thanks to a handle tucked discreetly inside the armrest, it sure doesn’t look like one. And rest assured—the sumptuously cushioned high back is head and shoulders above the rest.

Title: McClelland 5-Piece Power Reclining Modular Sectional with Chaise
Description: Large-scale comfort is yours with the McClelland power reclining sectional with chaise. With supreme padding and plush upholstery, it's the hero for ultimate relaxation. The extra-wide seating gives you plenty of room to sit back, kick up your heels and enjoy.

Title: Buncrana Dual Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Recline in the modern luxury and convenience of the Buncrana power reclining loveseat with Easy View™ power adjustable headrest. With the touch of a button, you can easily position the recliner and its headrest for maximum comfort. Plus, with the convenient USB charging ports, electronics can be charged without having to get up. The genuine leather upholstery is paired with expertly matched faux leather for affordability. The center console tops off convenience with hidden storage under center armrest—perfect for tucking away remotes. You'll love keeping a drink at your side with the handy stainless steel cup holder.

Title: Denoron Power Recliner
Description: If highly contemporary looks and a heavenly feel sit well with you, rest your eyes on the Burkner power rocker recliner. Decadently soft, the padded faux leather upholstery is enriched with jumbo contrast stitching and dramatic cut-and-sew lines for fashion-forward flair. Radius cut arm frame adds cool, curvaceous interest. At your fingertips: one-touch power control with a zero-draw USB plug-in that’s not only convenient but also energy efficient. When it comes to high style at a down-to-earth price, this power recliner really brings it home.

Title: Warlin Dual Power Recliner
Description: With its decidedly contemporary styling, the Warlin power recliner has a sleek sensibility that seamlessly elevates your living room's style. Explore endless possibilities for comfort with its one-touch power control, zero-gravity reclining and adjustable headrests. A triple-tier back and chic black upholstery round out this simply stunning piece.

Title: Wyerville 5-Piece Dual Power Reclining Sectional
Description: Wrap yourself up in the cushioned comfort of the Wyerville power reclining sectional. Bustle back and pillow top armrests make spending time in the living room oh so sweet. Factor in the smoothly neutral upholstery and you’ve got an ultra-stylish power recliner that truly caters to your every move.

Title: Partymate 2-Piece Reclining Sectional
Description: Affordable luxury made easy. An essential for living room lounging, the Partymate sectional is a star in social spaces. Its sleek slate gray faux leather is well-suited for mixing and matching with your existing pieces. Pull tab reclining keeps you and your companions covered when it comes to comfort. And this functional piece is equally as fashionable, with design details like a channel-stitched back incorporating subtle visual interest.

Title: Grearview Dual Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: In an earthy brown tone, the Grearview power reclining loveseat with console and adjustable headrest offers the warm feel of fabric and the cool, rustic look of leather. Caressing you in comfort, the faux leather dual-sided recliner features luxurious bustle back cushions, plus jumbo window-pane stitching and nailhead trim for style. Easy View™ power adjustable headrests offer a primo view of the TV even when you're fully reclined. Chill out while you recharge thanks to a USB port built right into the one-touch power control. For added convenience, the center console includes 2 cup holders and a hidden storage compartment.

Title: Partymate 2-Piece Reclining Sectional
Description: Affordable luxury made easy. An essential for living room lounging, the Partymate sectional is a star in social spaces. A warm brown faux leather is well-suited for mixing and matching with your existing pieces. Pull tab reclining keeps you and your companions covered when it comes to comfort. And this functional piece is equally as fashionable, with design details like a channel-stitched back incorporating subtle visual interest.

Title: Game Plan Dual Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Masterful in its interpretation of modern luxury, the Game Plan power reclining loveseat with console is sleekly tailored in top-grain leather. It’s rich to the touch in tones of warm brown, inviting you to indulge in one-touch reclining. Design details polish off this lavish leather loveseat. Subtle stitching accents and clean-lined track arms create contemporary character, inviting high-brow style into your home.

Title: Erlangen Dual Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Coming in hot! It’s the Erlangen power reclining loveseat with center console and two cup holders. Top-of-the-line faux leather fabric gives you the upscale look you want for less. Not to mention it feels incredible. The extended ottomans provide extra lengths for leg comfort. Want to watch TV or read in comfort? Easily fix your view with the power adjustable headrest. Complete with dramatic, jumbo stitching, this piece is out to capture your heart with style and comfort.

Title: Dunbarton 3-Piece Reclining Sectional
Description: Double up on decidedly contemporary style with the Dunbarton reclining sectional. Fabric upholstery contrasts with faux leather for a subtly striking look, while the cocoa hue of both creates a cozy vibe. Its pull tab reclining motion allows you to rest in refinement, rounding out this simply stunning piece.

Title: Nason Manual Reclining Loveseat
Description: With feel-good fabric, you’re in for a great time on the Nason reclining loveseat. Recline back in infinite positions for comfort. Pillow top arms will make you never want to leave. Waterfall back design and rounded sides add plenty of style to this reclining loveseat’s function.

Title: Casanova Manual Recliner
Description: Looking at this mid-century arm chair, you’d never guess that it’s a recliner. Richly upholstered with bustle-back details and tapered wood legs, its streamlined good looks speak volumes. More than that, it’s discreet. What looks like an arm chair is actually a recliner, free of a lever or knob. Simply push back a bit and the leg rest kicks in.

Title: Nantahala 5-Piece Manual Reclining Sectional with Chaise
Description: Sporting the look of perfectly "broken-in" leather, the Nantahala faux leather sectional has it all: looks, comfort and value. The combination of weathered saddle and coffee brown faux leather upholstery adds a nice contrasting element to the plump cushions, while jumbo stitching enhances the fashionable flair. Clean and simple divided back tailoring keeps this roomy sectional’s aesthetic cool and contemporary.

Title: Mabton 2-Piece Dual Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: The challenge: design a cutting-edge power recliner you’d never guess was a recliner. Super sleek and streamlined, this sectional loveseat, in taupe gray with high-contrast jumbo stitching, might just be our best-kept secret. Rest assured, you’d be hard-pressed to find seating that looks so high end yet is so comfortably priced. Integrated elements include an Easy View™ adjustable headrest, which offers low-profile style when it’s down and a high level of comfort when you’re kicking back and reclining. Factor in one-touch power controls (each with a USB port) placed on the inside track arm, and you have the makings for one beautifully deceptive sectional.

Title: Mancin Manual Recliner
Description: The Mancin zero-wall recliner satisfies your high level of taste and yearning for comfort. The storage arms and plushly pillowed high back and seat are covered in a richly textured faux leather with diamond stitch quilting. Plus, built-in cup holders keep beverages close at hand. If space is a consideration, rest assured—this smart-design piece needs minimal clearance from the wall to fully recline.

Title: Goalie 3-Piece Manual Reclining Modular Sofa
Description: Score major style and comfort (at a price to put you at ease) with the Goalie sofa. Wrapped in a chunky, high-pile fabric that's wonderfully plush to the touch, its posh pewter tone is what's new in neutrals. Tailored touches include clean-lined divided back cushions with puckered pleating for a decidedly contemporary feel. Decadently thick pillow top armrests make this sofa impossible to resist. For the winning touch, there are not one but two zero wall recliners that require minimal space between the wall and chair back for maximum efficiency.

Title: Warrior Fortress Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: Inspired by luxury car interiors, the Warrior Fortress rocker recliner puts you in the driver’s seat like never before. Its matte faux leather upholstery and padded details are enriched with heavyweight baseball stitching for a chic, sporty aesthetic. An oversized headrest pillow and high back profile take the experience over the top.

Title: Colleyville 4-Piece Power Reclining Sectional with Chaise and 2 Reclining Seats
Description: Delightfully modern. Exceptionally comfortable. When it comes to modular furniture with easy-elegant appeal, it’s hard to beat the Colleyville power reclining sectional. Wrapped in a decadently plush stone-tone fabric for neutral versatility, it's dressed to impress with a clean-lined divided back, curved track arms and a low-profile back for a relaxed, contemporary aesthetic.

Title: Mouttrie Dual Power Recliner
Description: A modern addition to a great room, living room or family room, the Mouttri power recliner in smoke gray lures with its smokin’ hot way to recline. Unique pad-wrapped armrests provide a cool aesthetic and pillowy softness. Loaded with gorgeous texture, the velvety gray upholstery is sumptuously soft—and made all the more enticing with deep channel tufting for clean-lined flair. With an Easy View™ power adjustable headrest that lets you fully recline and still have a primo view of the TV—plus a USB port in each power control—you truly have it all at your fingertips.

Title: Coombs Oversized Power Recliner
Description: The Coombs wide seat power recliner makes it hip to be square. Brilliantly boxy profile and wide track arms infuse a highly contemporary look you don’t often find in reclining furniture. Rest assured, the trendy charcoal-tone upholstery is sumptuously soft—and made all the more enticing with deep channel tufting for clean-lined flair. The one-touch power control even includes a USB port to keep devices charged while you unplug.

Title: Atwater Living Faux Leather Home Theater Push Back Recliner
Description: Enjoy all of your favorite TV shows from this comfortable Atwater Living Home Theater recliner chair. For added comfort, it features a heavy-duty steel mechanism and foam seating. With faux leather upholstery, a sewn-in seat and decoratively stitched back cushions, it blends in easily with any room setting. The clean track arm design of this push back recliner lends it a contemporary look. With a durable construction and stylish finish, it combines both comfort and fashion with functionality. In addition, its compact design makes it ideal for any size home, including small spaces.

Title: Yacolt Dual Power Recliner
Description: Discover just how much better faux leather can be in the richly styled Yacolt power recliner. Outfitted with our latest and greatest padded faux leather with an authentic weathered effect, this ultra-comfortable recliner with power is the embodiment of everyday luxury. Sporting a 43" high-back design, built-out headrest for added support and extended ottoman, it truly has you covered from head to toe. An Easy View™ power adjustable headrest lets you fully recline and still have a primo view of the TV. Plus, you can chill out while you recharge thanks to a USB charging port in the one-touch power control.

Title: Next-Gen Gaucho Dual Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Prepare to be moved, because the Next-Gen Gaucho power reclining loveseat with console is not only fashionable and functional but also a whole lot of fun. With its warm and neutral tones and soft, plush microsuede upholstery, this highly contemporary piece suits your relaxed style. An adjustable headrest, extended ottoman and zero-gravity mechanism are yours at the touch of a button. Given the modern features, scoop seating and ample back pillow support, you’ll find it all too easy to get lost in comfort.

Title: Next-Gen Gaucho Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Kick back, relax, and enjoy some sports on TV with the Next-Gen Gaucho power reclining sofa. You will love its double stuffed pillow top arms and soft-as-suede faux leather upholstery. Family-friendly espresso color and creative stitching add panache. Recline in infinite positions of comfort while you plug in your devices to the convenient USB charging station. This bustle back sofa will always be a win.

Title: Arlington Power Lift Recliner
Description: Position yourself in ultimate and convenient comfort. The comfortable yet durable construction is covered in a soft leather gel, making this ergonomic power lift assist recliner perfect for people with limited mobility. Choose your comfort level with the touch of a button, powering the quiet motor through gentle moving transitions. The ideal solution to make life more accessible and enjoyable in your own home.

Title: Colleyville Manual Recliner
Description: Things are not always what they seem. And in the case of the Colleyville low leg recliner, that’s a good thing. Sporting a highly modern aesthetic, this ultra-chic seat may look like an arm chair, but it’s designed to let you recline simply by leaning back. No levers. No buttons. Just a crisp, clean design to suit your lifestyle beautifully.

Title: Rackingburg Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: Once you recline in the Rackingburg dual reclining power loveseat at the push of a button, you will not want to get up. It's that comfortable with bustle backs and padded ottomans. Its look is amazing with dramatic cut and sew lines, jumbo stitching and affordable mahogany leather match upholstery—what a way to relax.

Title: Erlangen Dual Power Recliner
Description: Coming in hot! It’s the Erlangen power recliner. Top-of-the-line faux leather fabric gives you the upscale look you want for less. Not to mention it feels incredible. Take a seat and raise your legs with one easy push of a button. The extended ottoman provides extra length for relaxing your legs. Want to watch TV or read in comfort? Easily fix your view with the power adjustable headrest. Complete with dramatic, jumbo stitching, this piece is out to capture your heart with style and comfort.

Title: Hartsdale 6-Piece Power Reclining Modular Sectional with Console
Description: Fit for the comfort seeker in your household, the Hartsdale power sectional has that casual contemporary sensibility you love. Pillow top cushions with a feather-fiber blend are simply sumptuous. Chic and subtle chenille microfiber upholstery weaves in so much style.

Title: Grixdale Manual Recliner
Description: The Grixdale rocker recliner looks good and feels good, thanks to its timelessly modern design and ample cushioning. Beautiful brown leather match upholstery is an upscale addition to your family space.

Title: Denoron Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: If highly contemporary looks and a heavenly feel sit well with you, rest your eyes on the Denoran reclining power loveseat. Decadently soft, the easy-care faux leather upholstery is enriched with jumbo contrast stitching and dramatic cut-and-sew lines for fashion-forward flair. Radius cut arm frame adds cool, curvaceous interest. At your fingertips: one-touch power control with a zero-draw USB plug-in that’s not only convenient but also energy efficient. When it comes to high style at a down-to-earth price, this power reclining loveseat really brings it home.

Title: Chasewood Power Recliner
Description: You've been looking for a piece that rests and restores after a hectic day, all while elevating your living room aesthetic. Enter the Chasewood power recliner. Casually cool with contemporary bustle-back construction, it has a broad appeal thanks to an on-trend dark gray hue. Leather match upholstery provides high-style living at a price you're sure to enjoy.

Title: McCaskill Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Sink into the supple McCaskill power reclining sofa and prepare to be swept off your feet—literally. Its extra-wide seats and plush cushioning are divinely comfortable. It's wrapped in decadently soft leather match upholstery for a luxurious experience, saving you money without sacrificing style. Prominent stitching, linear track arms and a goes-with-anything gray hue add stylish touches.

Title: Acieona Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: If its quilted bustle back weren’t enough, the Acieona loveseat has overstuffed arms that elevate comfort to new heights. Center console has handy cup holders as well as an ingenious storage compartment. Ultra-soft chenille upholstery makes this piece beyond luxurious.

Title: Next-Gen Gaucho Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: Kick back, relax, and enjoy some sports on TV with the Next-Gen Gaucho reclining sofa. You will love its double stuffed pillow top arms and soft-as-suede faux leather upholstery. Family-friendly espresso color and creative stitching add panache. Recline in comfort even if floor space is limited, thanks to the space-efficient zero wall design. This bustle back sofa will always be a win.

Title: Hallstrung 6-Piece Dual Power Reclining Sectional with Chaise
Description: The luxuriously cozy Hallstrung reclining sectional makes you happy to be at home. Leather match upholstery with two-tone color is as comfortably affordable as it is attractive. High back design provides the support you need. Keep beverages nearby in the stainless steel cup holders. From the Easy View™ power headrest to the footrests, you're in control of your relaxation. Just plug in your device to the USB charging station and sit back, relax and enjoy your space.

Title: Wurstrow Triple Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Big and bold, the Wurstrow power reclining loveseat with console and Easy View™ power adjustable headrests delivers comfort at the touch of a button. Easily position the recliner, its headrest and lumbar support to your liking for maximum comfort. Plus, with the convenient USB charging ports, cell phones or laptops can be charged without having to get up. Real leather is paired with expertly matched faux leather to level up affordable luxury. The detailing on the umber-colored upholstery creates a rustic look ideal for your modern or casual setting. The center console tops off convenience with hidden storage under center armrest—perfect for tucking away remotes. You'll love keeping drinks within reach with the two stainless steel cup holders.

Title: Wyerville 5-Piece Dual Power Reclining Sectional
Description: Wrap yourself up in the cushioned comfort of the Wyerville power reclining sectional. Bustle back and pillow top armrests make spending time in the living room oh so sweet. Factor in the smoothly neutral upholstery and you’ve got an ultra-stylish power recliner that truly caters to your every move.

Title: Renbuen Manual Recliner
Description: A large scale means large comfort with the Renbuen rocker recliner. Grid pattern and overstuffed armrests help create your at-home resting haven. With just one pull, you can recline in infinite positions of comfort. The effect seen in the umber-colored upholstery creates a rustic look—perfect for your modern or casual setting.

Title: Rackingburg Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Once you recline in the Rackingburg dual reclining power sofa at the push of a button, you will not want to get up. It's that comfortable with bustle backs and padded ottomans. Title: Hartsdale 5-Piece Power Reclining Modular Sectional

Description: With its decidedly contemporary styling, the Warlin power reclining loveseat with console has a sleek sensibility that seamlessly elevates your living room's style. Explore endless possibilities for comfort with its one-touch power control, zero-gravity reclining and adjustable headrests. A triple-tier back and chic white upholstery round out this simply stunning piece.

Title: Paulestein Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Room for two, comfort for days. The Paulestein reclining power sofa does the work for you as you sit back, relax and kick up your feet. It features a timeless two-over-two cushion design, wide track arms and irresistibly soft velvety blue upholstery. Contrast stitching and tufted details offer a modern look that is always in style. Geometric accent pillows add a splash of color.

Title: Next-Gen Gaucho 5-Piece Dual Power Reclining Sectional
Description: Modern comfort never looked so good. Sporting sloped track arms, wide, generous cushions and bustle-back stitching for high-fashion flair, the Next-Gen Gaucho power sectional is the ultimate choice in comfortably cool, contemporary style. Indulging with a suede-like faux leather that emulates nubuck leather, the sectional’s family- and pet-friendly upholstery is the stuff dreams are made of. Factor in the added perks of an Easy View™ power adjustable headrest and USB charging, and you’ve got a power reclining sectional that truly caters with style, comfort and convenience.

Title: McClelland 4-Piece Power Reclining Sectional
Description: Large-scale comfort is yours with the McClelland power reclining sectional. With supreme padding and plush upholstery, it's the hero for ultimate relaxation. The extra-wide seating gives you plenty of room to sit back, kick up your heels and enjoy.

Title: Battleville Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Double down on sleek style with the Battleville power reclining sofa. It has a streamlined, space-conscious appeal, with two-tone upholstery in neutral hues creating subtly striking visual intrigue. And with one-touch reclining, adjustable headrests and wireless charging, this piece combines contemporary function and fashion into a single clean-lined design.

Title: Burkner Power Recliner
Description: If highly contemporary looks and a heavenly feel sit well with you, rest your eyes on the Burkner power rocker recliner. Padded velvet upholstery has a plush high pile that's so soft to the touch. Jumbo contrast stitching adds fashion-forward flair, while radius cut arm frame incorporates cool, curvaceous interest. At your fingertips: one-touch power control with a zero-draw USB plug-in that’s not only convenient but also energy efficient. When it comes to high style at a down-to-earth price, this power recliner really brings it home.

Title: Ricmen Dual Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Life is so much better when you can enjoy the pleasure of real leather—at a price to put you at ease. That’s exactly what you get with the Ricmen power reclining loveseat with adjustable headrest. Thanks to leather match upholstery, you've got a reclining loveseat that feels like a million bucks but won’t break the bank. Tailored to those with an eye for contemporary design, this power reclining loveseat is dressed to impress with an upscale matte finish, clean-lined divided back tufting, distinctive jumbo stitching and chic pillow top armrests. Perhaps best of all: Easy View™ power adjustable headrests let you recline back and still have a primo view of the TV.

Title: McClelland Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Large-scale comfort is yours with the McClelland power reclining sofa. With supreme padding and plush upholstery it's the hero for ultimate relaxation. The extra-wide seating gives you plenty of room to sit back, kick up your heels and enjoy.

Title: Next-Gen Gaucho 5-Piece Dual Power Reclining Sectional
Description: Modern comfort never looked so good. Sporting sloped track arms, wide, generous cushions and bustle-back stitching for high-fashion flair, the Next-Gen Gaucho power sectional is the ultimate choice in comfortably cool, contemporary style. Indulging with a suede-like faux leather that emulates nubuck leather, the sectional’s family- and pet-friendly upholstery is the stuff dreams are made of. Factor in the added perks of an Easy View™ power adjustable headrest and USB charging, and you’ve got a power reclining sectional that truly caters with style, comfort and convenience.

Title: Relax-R Nova Manual Recliner with Ottoman
Description: There’s no better way to enjoy some downtime than in your favorite "Nova" recliner. This two-piece recliner in breathable faux leather from our “Relax-R™ collection” is sure to be a crowd pleaser. Crafted with solid hardwood frames, this classic design is as sleek as it is affordable. Each model has heavy tubular steel construction providing durability. It also features a 360-degree swivel and multiple reclining functions to adjust to your personal comfort. This therapeutic design will be a relaxing retreat whether it's placed in your office or in your home.

Title: Holcroft Manual Reclining Loveseat
Description: Indulge in feel-good luxury and crisp, contemporary style at a price sure to entice. Rest assured, the Holcroft reclining loveseat is covered in a supple, on-trend neutral upholstery for your pleasure. Sumptuous cushioning—made all the more indulgent with pillow top arms—cradles you in comfort from head to toe.

Title: Nantahala 5-Piece Manual Reclining Sectional with Chaise
Description: Sporting the look of perfectly "broken-in" leather, the Nantahala faux leather sectional has it all: looks, comfort and value. Its combination of weathered slate gray and black faux leather upholstery adds a nice contrasting element to the plump cushions, while jumbo stitching enhances the fashionable flair. Clean and simple divided back tailoring keeps this roomy sectional’s aesthetic cool and contemporary.

Title: Willamen Reclining Sofa with Drop Down Table
Description: The Willamen reclining sofa with drop-down table lets you share the most popular seat in the house with anyone you choose. Made of quality faux leather, its look and feel are rich yet affordable, with a drop-down table that includes a magazine pouch and USB charging. It can be the center of attention or quietly complement a variety of design styles and color schemes. Fashion-forward jumbo stitching adds the finishing touch to a handsome piece that is just waiting for some of your time.

Title: Hazenburg Power Reclining Sofa
Description: For those that love the cool look of leather but long for the warm feel of fabric, the Hazenburg power reclining sofa delivers both with ease. Its high-performance padded faux leather is remarkably durable and easy to clean, just the thing for family spaces. When it’s time to relax, the one-touch power control puts the perfect position at your fingertips. Channel-stitched back cushions provide indulgent lumbar support for maximum seating comfort—not to mention fashion-forward flair.

Title: Goalie 5-Piece Manual Reclining Modular Sectional
Description: Score major style and comfort (at a price to put you at ease) with the Goalie sectional. Wrapped in a chunky, high-pile fabric that's wonderfully plush to the touch, the posh pewter-tone sectional is what's new in neutrals. Tailored touches include clean-lined divided back cushions with puckered pleating for a decidedly contemporary feel. Decadently thick pillow top armrests make this sectional impossible to resist. For the winning touch, not one but two zero wall recliners that require minimal space between the wall and chair back for maximum efficiency.

Title: CorLiving Alder Manual Recliner
Description: Sit back and relax in your Alder manual recliner chair. The Alder recliner comes upholstered in a plush, durable soft fabric. It features a spring and foam padded seat that will keep you in complete comfort while reading, scrolling or catching up on the latest episode. Additionally, the solid wood legs give this recliner a modern feel making it the perfect complement to your living room, home office or bedroom.

Title: McHutton Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Wrap yourself up in the rich comfort of the McHutton power reclining sofa. Providing ultimate relaxation and support, this sofa makes spending time in the living room oh so sweet. Simply allow yourself to melt into the dark brown upholstery, and use the power control to recline with ease.

Title: Acieona Manual Swivel Rocker Recliner
Description: If its quilted bustle back weren’t enough, the Acieona swivel rocker recliner has overstuffed arms that elevate comfort to new heights. Ultra-soft chenille upholstery makes this piece beyond luxurious.

Title: McCaskill 3-Piece Power Reclining Sectional
Description: Sink into the supple McCaskill power reclining sectional and prepare to be swept off your feet—literally. Its extra-wide seats and plush cushioning are divinely comfortable. It's wrapped in decadently soft leather match upholstery for a luxurious experience, saving you money without sacrificing style. Prominent stitching, linear track arms and a goes-with-anything gray hue add stylish touches. Keep beverages and remotes close at hand thanks to the loveseat’s center console and cup holders.

Title: New Port Vance Manual Recliner
Description: Scandinavian / European-styled recliner. A swiveling recliner with self-store footrest that feels like it was custom-made for you. The recliner has the ideal amount of support, with an adjustable recline degree for your comfort needs. Perfect for long naps or resting.  Backed by quality, and buy with confidence.

Title: Hermiston Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: Tempting you to the pleasure of leather match upholstery—the Hermiston rocker recliner in walnut brown rocks a great look and feel at a comfortable price. A simple divided back design, wrapped pillow top armrests and trendy jumbo contrast stitching keep the aesthetic cool and contemporary, while still providing such a cozy experience.

Title: Next-Gen Gaucho 6-Piece Dual Power Reclining Sectional with Console
Description: Modern comfort never looked so good. Title: Ador AD-Infinix 2-D Massage Chair
Description: Ador AD- Infinix is an advanced 2D massage chair with Ergonomic SL-track rolling system. The chair comes equipped with computer body scan system, air massage with 18 airbags, heating on the lumbar, calf and foot roller massage with 8 automatic massage programs.

Title: Wyerville 6-Piece Dual Power Reclining Sectional

Title: Grixdale Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: The Grixdale reclining sofa looks good and feels good, thanks to its timelessly modern design and ample cushioning. Beautiful brown leather match upholstery is an upscale addition to your family space.

Title: Center Line 5-Piece Power Reclining Sectional
Description: For those seeking to curate a living room retreat that offers superior comfort and a contemporary aesthetic, the sleekly designed Center Line power reclining sectional will become your favorite source of at-home serenity. Rest on leather match upholstery, and use the one-touch power control to recline and adjust the headrests with ease. As you recharge after a long day, your devices can too with USB charging. This sectional is visually enticing in a stunning cream color, with slope track arms and stitched detailing on the back to enhance its modern appeal.

Title: Calderwell Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Sleek and streamlined, the Calderwell power reclining loveseat with center console draws out your leisure time with its bustle back construction and thickly cushioned armrests. The super soft faux leather gets a high-end tweak with jumbo contrast stitching so you don’t have to sacrifice style for comfort. Sink into the comfortably supportive cushions and stretch your evening as long as you can with the handy USB port to power your devices.

Title: Goal Keeper 5-Piece Dual Power Reclining Sectional
Description: Setting a high bar for style, the Goal Keeper power reclining sectional is casual contemporary personified. Its sleek design is highlighted by track arms, while padded T-cushions soften the look. Trendy light gray upholstery harmonizes beautifully with existing furniture, opening the door to endless possibilities for your living room's modern aesthetic.

Title: Urbino 3-Piece Power Reclining Sectional
Description: Dressed to impress even the most discerning urban hipster, the Urbino power reclining sectional in charcoal gray rocks a cool look with an even better feel. Rest assured, this designer sectional is covered in a padded microfiber upholstery that’s love at first touch. Accenting the clean lines and channel tufting: prominent jumbo stitching that adds a fresh, fashion-forward element and distinctive flair.

Title: Wentler Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Longing for chic style without having to sacrifice superb comfort? Look no further than the Wentler power reclining sofa. Its real leather, paired with an expertly matched faux leather for affordability, has an inviting softness. Contemporary in design and full of convenient features, this sofa is ideal for busy sophisticates in need of a spot to unwind.

Title: Colleyville 4-Piece Power Reclining Sectional with Chaise and 4 Reclining Seats

Title: Next-Gen Gaucho Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Prepare to be moved, because the Next-Gen Gaucho power reclining sofa is not only fashionable and functional but also a whole lot of fun. With its warm and neutral tones and soft, plush microsuede upholstery, this highly contemporary piece suits your relaxed style. An adjustable headrest, extended ottoman and zero-gravity mechanism are yours at the touch of a button. Given the modern features, scoop seating and ample back pillow support, you’ll find it all too easy to get lost in comfort.

Title: Colleyville 6-Piece Power Reclining Sectional
Description: Delightfully modern. Exceptionally comfortable. When it comes to modular furniture with easy-elegant appeal, it’s hard to beat the Colleyville power reclining sectional. Wrapped in a decadently plush stone-tone fabric for neutral versatility, this chic sectional is dressed to impress with a clean-lined divided back, curved track arms and a low-profile back for a relaxed, contemporary aesthetic.

Title: McAdoo Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: Don't simply make do with your living room furniture. Embrace contemporary comfort with the McAdoo power reclining loveseat. It brings a new meaning to relaxed refinement, with caramel faux leather upholstery making a subtle-but-striking style statement. Cozy yet curated in design, this sleek loveseat is sure to become your favorite spot to unwind.

Title: Starbot 4-Piece Dual Power Reclining Modular Sectional
Description: Destination: chic comfort. The Starbot power reclining sectional launches your living room into superior form with stellar attention to detail. Exemplifying attainable luxury, its handsome hue has an air of sophistication you’ll long to lounge in. And when you’re done basking in the glow of its sleek style, recline with indulgent motion features to welcome head-to-toe relaxation.

Title: Grearview Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: In an earthy brown tone, the Grearview 2-seat power reclining sofa with adjustable headrest offers the warm feel of fabric and the cool, rustic look of leather. Caressing you in comfort, the faux leather dual-sided recliner features luxurious bustle back cushions, plus jumbo window-pane stitching and nailhead trim for style. Easy View™ power adjustable headrests offer a primo view of the TV even when you're fully reclined, to enhance your relaxation. Chill out while you recharge thanks to a USB port built right into the one-touch power control.

Title: Wentler Dual Power Recliner
Description: Longing for chic style without having to sacrifice superb comfort? Look no further than the Wentler power recliner. Its real leather, paired with an expertly matched faux leather for affordability, has an inviting softness. Contemporary in design and full of convenient features, this recliner is ideal for busy sophisticates in need of a spot to unwind.

Title: Buncrana Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Recline in the modern luxury and convenience of the Buncrana power reclining sofa with a high back and Easy View™ power adjustable headrests. With the touch of a button, you can easily position the recliner and its headrest for maximum comfort. Plus, with the convenient USB charging ports, electronics can be charged without having to get up. The genuine leather upholstery is paired with expertly matched faux leather for affordability. Bring a luxurious look full of details, such as nailhead trim and rolled armrests, to your living area—what a treat of comfort to be enjoyed for years to come.

Title: Hartsdale 7-Piece Power Reclining Modular Sectional with Console and Chaise
Description: Fit for the comfort seeker in your household, the Hartsdale power sectional has that casually cool sensibility you love. Pillow top cushions with a feather-fiber blend are simply sumptuous. Chic and subtle chenille microfiber upholstery weaves in so much style.

Title: Besco Push Back Recliner
Description: Relax in the simple comfort of this recliner. Upholstered in a rich multi-hued brown fabric and featuring a high back and track arms that create a charming silhouette, this chair is the perfect accent to your existing decor. Solid wood legs with a dark coffee-colored finish, along with antiqued copper-tone nailhead trim, complement the upholstery for an alluring transitional look.

Title: Clonmel 3-Piece Power Reclining Sectional with Chaise
Description: Large-scale comfort is yours with the Clonmel 3-piece power reclining sectional. With supremely padded back, seat and arm cushions, it's the hero for ultimate relaxation. Microfiber upholstery is welcoming, soft and luxuriously covers the extra-wide seats. Everyone will want to recline in the power chaise. Simply push back while seated and the seat will smoothly recline to the position you want. The wall recliner is just as comfortable and can be reclined via the pull-tab, while the armless chair provides an extra cozy seat—what a way to bolster comfort levels.

Title: Center Line Dual Power Recliner
Description: For those seeking to curate a living room retreat that offers superior comfort and a contemporary aesthetic, the sleekly designed Center Line power recliner will become your favorite source of at-home serenity. Rest on leather match upholstery, and use the one-touch power control to recline and adjust the headrest with ease. As you recharge after a long day, your devices can too with USB charging. This recliner is visually enticing in a stunning cream color, with slope track arms and stitched detailing on the back to enhance its modern appeal.

Title: Riptyme Manual Swivel Glider Recliner
Description: If you agree it’s high time for better form and function from your furniture, the Riptyme swivel glider recliner with gentle rocking motion might be just your style. Indulgently comfortable yet anything but bulky, its space-conscious design pairs slimmed-down armrests with a roomy seating zone for maximum comfort. Rest assured, the sumptuously cushioned 41" high back is head and shoulders above the rest. Thanks to an EZ Pull tucked discreetly inside the armrest, while this faux leather chair may be a recliner, it sure doesn’t look like one.

Title: Santa Fe Manual Recliner
Description: For those on a mission to recline in high style, the high-leg Santa Fe recliner foots the bill. Ruggedly handsome—with a rustic finish, bustle-back plushness and the look of high-grain leather upholstery—this faux leather upholstered piece masters the art of mission-style design. Have the pleasure of reclining without the distraction of a lever or knob.

Title: Erlangen Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Coming in hot! It’s the Erlangen power reclining sofa. Top-of-the-line faux leather fabric gives you the upscale look you want for less. Not to mention it feels incredible. Take a seat and raise your legs with one easy push of a button. The extended ottomans provide extra lengths for leg comfort. Want to watch TV or read in comfort? Easily fix your view with the power adjustable headrest. Complete with dramatic, jumbo stitching, this piece is out to capture your heart with style and comfort.

Title: Bolzano Manual Reclining Loveseat
Description: Looking for a sleek 2-seater? The Bolzano reclining loveseat is your saving grace. Coffee brown microfiber cover is soft to the touch and padded for your comfort. Beautiful lines exhibit exceptional craftsmanship. Smaller-than-normal scale brings quality to even compact spaces. Now you can worry less about finding the perfect recliner for your room and relax more.

Title: Next-Gen DuraPella 3-Piece Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: If you’re looking for a brilliant blend of comfort, quality and flair, the Next-Gen Durapella faux leather power sectional excites and delights with sleek, modern style—priced to put you at ease. Appealing to those with an eye for contemporary design and high-tech features, this slate gray sectional offers adjustable headrests, zero-draw USB charging and a zero-wall recline to maximize your space. Distinctive elements include flared, sheltering armrests and subtly tufted seat cushions that add a high-design touch.

Title: Nantahala 5-Piece Manual Reclining Sectional
Description: Sporting the look of perfectly "broken-in" leather, the Nantahala faux leather sectional has it all: looks, comfort and value. Its combination of weathered slate gray and black faux leather upholstery adds a nice contrasting element to the plump cushions, while jumbo stitching enhances the fashionable flair. Clean and simple divided back tailoring keeps this roomy sectional’s aesthetic cool and contemporary.

Title: Card Player Dual Power Recliner
Description: You can bet on turning heads while delivering superior comfort with the Card Player power recliner. Its sleek cappuccino-hued upholstery is an ace when it comes to contemporary style. An extended zero-gravity ottoman ups the ante on at-home relaxation. Topped off with a heated seat and massage function, you’ll be all-in on this recliner.

Title: Foxfield Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: Looking to make your den that much cozier? Rest assured, the Foxfield rocker recliner has you covered. Indulgently cushioned with sumptuous bustle back styling, this value-priced recliner is wrapped in a richly neutral upholstery that’s oh-so soft.

Title: Bingen Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: Merging the handsome, stately looks of an armchair with kickback comfort from head to toe, the Bingen reclining sofa rocks on so many levels. Rest assured, leather match upholstery levels up the luxury while keeping the price well within reason. The recliner’s roll arm profile punctuated with oversized nailhead trim is an easy complement for contemporary and classic decor.

Title: Calderwell Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Sleek and streamlined, the Calderwell reclining loveseat with center console draws out your leisure time with its bustle back construction and thickly cushioned armrests. The super soft faux leather gets a high-end tweak with jumbo contrast stitching so you don’t have to sacrifice style for comfort. Sink into the comfortably supportive cushions and stretch your evening as long as you can with the added convenience of a center console at your fingertips.

Title: Follett Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: A classic split personality, the Follett overstuffed reclining sofa is a real softie on the inside, but all business on the outside. Rest assured, the soft suede-like material is a perfect complement to the faux leather exterior giving it just the right amount of interest and character. A perfectly paired piece, comfortably priced.

Title: Follett Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: A classic split personality, the Follett overstuffed reclining loveseat is a real softie on the inside, but all business on the outside. Rest assured, the soft suede-like material is a perfect complement to the faux leather exterior giving it just the right amount of interest and character. A perfectly paired piece, comfortably priced.

Title: Warlin Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: With its decidedly contemporary styling, the Warlin power reclining sofa has a sleek sensibility that seamlessly elevates your living room aesthetic. Explore endless possibilities for comfort with its one-touch power control, zero-gravity reclining and adjustable headrests. A triple-tier back and chic black upholstery round out this simply stunning piece.

Title: Urbino 3-Piece Manual Reclining Sectional
Description: Dressed to impress even the most discerning urban hipster, the Urbino reclining sectional in charcoal gray rocks a cool look with an even better feel. Rest assured, this designer sectional is covered in a padded microfiber upholstery that’s love at first touch. Accentuating the clean lines and channel tufting: prominent jumbo stitching that adds a fresh, fashion-forward element and distinctive flair.

Title: Grearview Oversized Dual Power Recliner
Description: In an earthy brown tone, the Grearview wide seat power recliner offers the warm feel of fabric and the cool, rustic look of leather. Caressing you in comfort, the faux leather dual-sided recliner features luxurious bustle back cushions, plus jumbo window-pane stitching and nailhead trim for style. Easy View™ power adjustable headrests offer a primo view of the TV even when you're fully reclined, to enhance your relaxation. Chill out while you recharge thanks to a USB port built right into the one-touch power control. For added convenience, the center console includes 2 cup holders and a hidden storage compartment.

Title: Colleyville 5-Piece Power Reclining Sectional with Chaise and 3 Reclining Seats
Description: Delightfully modern. Exceptionally comfortable. When it comes to modular furniture with easy-elegant appeal, it’s hard to beat the Colleyville power reclining sectional. Wrapped in a decadently plush stone-tone fabric for neutral versatility, this chic sectional is dressed to impress with a clean-lined divided back, curved track arms and a low-profile back for a relaxed, contemporary aesthetic.

Title: Wilhurst Manual Swivel Rocker Recliner
Description: Take ultimate comfort and style for a spin with the Wilhurst swivel rocker recliner in soothing blue-gray. Covered in a feel-good fabric beautified with puckered stitching and biscuit-back tufting, this quality recliner is set on a sturdy swivel, so you’ll always be in the flow of conversation. Generously stuffed armrests make it that much more of a dream scene.

Title: Boxberg Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: Rock the cool look of leather minus the hefty price tag with the Boxberg rocker recliner. Rich with tonal variation, the indulgently soft upholstery sure looks like the real thing. And talk about indulgent comfort. Double stuffed armrests and sumptuous cushions cradle and support in all the right places. The recliner’s distinctive scooped stitching adds contemporary flair.

Title: Capehorn Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: Sometimes seeing is believing. Rest assured the Capehorn reclining sofa is every bit as indulgent as it looks. Designed to put you in the lap of luxury, this generously scaled reclining sofa—wrapped in a wonderfully plush and practical granite gray upholstery—sports scooped pillow wrapped armrests and curvaceously cushioned head-neck support for feel-good flair.

Title: Backtrack Dual Power Recliner
Description: With its fashion-forward sense of style, the Backtrack power recliner has you covered with high-tech advancements and down-home comfort. Leather match upholstery keeps luxury comfortably within budget. Love being pampered? With the touch of a button, experience the pure bliss of an air massage system (with three settings), or chill out with the heated seat element. Distinctive elements of this power recliner include contemporary waterfall tufting that beautifully goes with the flow and a zero-gravity mechanism further raising the ottoman for better blood flow.

Title: Dorsten Manual Recliner
Description: The Dorsten rocker recliner has the corner on ultra-contemporary style made for easy, everyday living. Upholstered in a plush slate chenille, it takes neutral sophistication to another level. Kick back and relax. The look you love comes with a luxurious feel at a price to entice.

Title: Vacherie Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: When it comes to comfort, style and value, the Vacherie faux leather rocker recliner in black rocks. Tailored for feel-good flair, its fashion-forward bustle back design is enhanced with sculpted padding on the headrest for cradling support. Channel cushioning along the sides flows into thick, wrapped pillowtop armrests that are truly over the top. And while it might look like you broke the bank, a sumptuously soft leather-like fabric keeps indulgence well within budget.

Title: McClelland Oversized Power Recliner
Description: Large-scale comfort is yours with the McClelland power recliner. With supreme padding and plush upholstery, it's the hero for ultimate relaxation. The zero-wall design makes efficient use of space and the extra-wide seating gives you plenty of room to sit back, kick up your heels and enjoy.

Title: Backtrack Dual Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: With its fashion-forward sense of style, the Backtrack power reclining loveseat has you covered with high-tech advancements and down-home comfort. Leather match upholstery keeps luxury comfortably within budget. Love being pampered? With the touch of a button, experience the pure bliss of an air massage system (with three settings), or chill out with the heated seat element. Distinctive elements of this power recliner include contemporary waterfall tufting that beautifully goes with the flow and a zero-gravity mechanism further raising the ottoman for better blood flow.

Title: Lubec 6-Piece Power Reclining Sectional
Description: Dressed to impress. Made to caress. With the Lubec sectional with power, you get the best of both worlds: the cool look of leather and the warm, cozy feel of fabric. Sporting a transitional look that suits contemporary and classic interiors, the high-style sectional is wrapped in a taupe faux leather and enriched with divided back cushioning, jumbo stitching and roll armrests for fashionable flair.

Title: Brassville Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: A large scale means large comfort with the Brassville reclining sofa. Two wonderfully wide seats are upholstered in a textural, cottony soft fabric. Recline as far back as you please on pillowy arms and headrests. Bustle back tufting adds the right amount of casually cool style.

Title: Faust Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Clean, contemporary style and softly smooth comfort go hand in hand in the Faust power reclining sofa. Rich leather pairs with faux leather to make for a luxurious—yet affordable—place to lounge. Pillow top armrests provide irresistible comfort.

Title: Dorel Living Padded Massage Chair Manual Recliner
Description: Enjoy this Dorel Living padded massage rocker recliner with dual massaging and full comfort. This large-sized reclining rocking chair's overfilled design, padded arms and smooth reclining and rocking will meet all of your relaxation needs.

Title: McClelland 6-Piece Reclining Sectional with Chaise
Description: Large-scale comfort is yours with the McClelland reclining sectional with chaise. With supreme padding and plush upholstery, it's the hero for ultimate relaxation. The extra-wide seating gives you plenty of room to sit back, kick up your heels and enjoy.

Title: Brassville Power Reclining Sofa
Description: A large scale means large comfort with the Brassville power reclining sofa. Two wonderfully wide seats are upholstered in a textural, cottony soft fabric. Recline as far back as you please on pillowy arms and headrests at one easy touch of a button. Bustle back tufting adds the right amount of casually cool style.

Title: Stoneland Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: For those that love the cool look of leather but long for the warm feel of fabric, the Stoneland power reclining loveseat delivers both with ease. Its high-performance padded faux leather is remarkably durable and easy to clean, just the thing for family spaces. When it’s time to relax, the one-touch power control puts the perfect position at your fingertips. Channel-stitched back cushions provide indulgent lumbar support for maximum seating comfort—not to mention fashion-forward flair.

Title: Mayall 5-Piece Power Reclining Sectional
Description: Embrace contemporary comfort with the Mayall power reclining sectional. Its richly neutral upholstery and streamlined design give a new meaning to relaxed refinement. An indulgent bustle back and gently scooped seats round out the look. Combining serenity, comfort and function, this sectional will be your favorite place to chill out and decompress.

Title: Kempten Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: You don’t just want to recline. You want to recline in high design. Wrapped in a fabulous black faux leather upholstery, the Kempten reclining sofa with 42" high back is everything you long for—and then some. Ultra clean lines, subtle curves and sumptuous comfort make it a sight for sore eyes and tired muscles. Here’s the showstopper: ambient blue LED lighting along the sofa base for a movie theater experience enjoyed from the convenience of home.

Title: HyllMont Dual Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: The Hyllmont power reclining loveseat in trendy gray is proof of just how far recliners have come when it comes to form and function. Ultra cool and contemporary, this fully loaded power reclining loveseat makes it so easy to social distance and make home your haven. Dressed to impress with diamond stitching inspired by sports car interiors, this reclining loveseat is covered in a fabulous faux leather with pebbled effect for authenticity. High-tech advancements include a one-touch power control with Easy View™ adjustable headrest and USB plug-in. Hidden storage compartments in the armrests and console are a welcome touch.

Title: McClelland 7-Piece Reclining Sectional with Chaise
Description: Large-scale comfort is yours with the McClelland reclining sectional with chaise. With supreme padding and plush upholstery, it's the hero for ultimate relaxation. The extra-wide seating gives you plenty of room to sit back, kick up your heels and enjoy.

Title: Tambo Manual Recliner
Description: With plush cushions and angled pillow top arms, the Tambo rocker recliner takes comfort to a whole new level. Faux vintage leather requires minimal care, making this piece ideal in homes with children and pets. The seat reclines with the pull of a tab, putting total relaxation at your fingertips.

Title: Cranedall 5-Piece Dual Power Reclining Modular Sectional
Description: Load up on comfort and contemporary style—without hogging up space—with the Cranedall power reclining sectional. Wrapped in a heavyweight padded faux leather with a weathered effect that looks so natural, this super chic sectional with clean lines and jumbo contrast stitching includes not one but two zero wall power recliners requiring minimal space between the wall and chair back. How’s that for space efficiency? Rest assured, the one-touch power control with adjustable positions includes an Easy View™ adjustable headrest that lets you lay back and still have a primo view of the TV. Zero-draw USB plug-ins at your fingertips keep you powered up as you chill out.

Title: Rackingburg Manual Reclining Loveseat
Description: Once you recline in the Rackingburg dual reclining loveseat with the pull of a tab, you will not want to get up. It's that comfortable with bustle backs and padded ottomans. Its look is amazing with dramatic cut and sew lines, jumbo stitching and affordable mahogany leather match upholstery—what a way to relax.

Title: Man Fort Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: Roll out a cool look for your man cave or femme den with the Man Fort recliner. Waterfall cushioning on the high back is paired with a double-roll footrest for a high-style aesthetic that cradles you in comfort from head to toe. Tweed-weave neutral upholstery is decadently soft and loaded with texture.

Title: Wurstrow Triple Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Big and bold, the Wurstrow power reclining sofa with Easy View™ power adjustable headrests delivers comfort at the touch of a button. Easily position the recliner, its headrest and lumbar support to your liking for maximum comfort. Plus, with the convenient USB charging ports, cell phones or laptops can be charged without having to get up. Real leather is paired with expertly matched faux leather to level up affordable luxury. The detailing on the umber-colored upholstery creates a rustic look—perfect for your modern or casual setting.

Title: Next-Gen DuraPella 6-Piece Dual Power Reclining Sectional
Description: If you’re looking for a brilliant blend of comfort, quality and flair, the Next-Gen Durapella faux leather power sectional excites and delights with sleek, modern style—priced to put you at ease. Appealing to those with an eye for contemporary design and high-tech features, this slate gray sectional offers adjustable headrests, zero-draw USB charging and a zero-wall recline to maximize your space. Distinctive elements include flared, sheltering armrests and subtly tufted seat cushions that add a high-design touch.

Title: McClelland Reclining Loveseat
Description: Large-scale comfort is yours with the McClelland reclining loveseat. With supreme padding and plush upholstery, it's the hero for ultimate relaxation. The extra-wide seating gives you plenty of room to sit back, kick up your heels and enjoy.

Title: Mitchiner Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Bring your snacks and beverages and plan for a night with your feet up. This double reclining loveseat is plush in all the right places, and will support you longer than you can binge watch your favorite TV show. The neutral upholstery is ready for a patterned throw blanket and some of your time. Hide the remote in the console and claim your spot on the Mitchiner.

Title: Boxberg Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Rock the cool look of leather minus the hefty price tag with the Boxberg reclining loveseat with console. Rich with tonal variation, the indulgently soft upholstery sure looks like the real thing. And talk about indulgent comfort. Double stuffed armrests and sumptuous cushions cradle and support in all the right places. Distinctive scooped stitching enhances this reclining loveseat’s contemporary flair. Cup holders and hidden storage complete the experience.

Title: Draycoll Power Recliner
Description: Built for luxury, the Draycoll power rocker recliner lets you kick back in reliable style. The thick, softly textured chenille upholstery provides a comfy surface on which to lounge. With bustle back construction and thickly cushioned armrests, this piece gives you the dependable, powered support you need to unwind while the handy USB port provides the power to keep your devices going.

Title: Rackingburg Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: Once you recline in the Rackingburg dual reclining sofa with the pull of a tab, you will not want to get up. It's that comfortable with bustle backs and padded ottomans. Its look is amazing with dramatic cut and sew lines, jumbo stitching and affordable mahogany leather match upholstery—what a way to relax.

Title: Ballinasloe Manual Recliner
Description: A mastery in less is more, the Ballinasloe rocker recliner manages to make cool, contemporary design so warm and cozy. A new twist on neutral, the recliner’s soothing “smoky” gray upholstery is incredibly plush to the touch. Curved divided back and deeply tufted footrest give the clean-lined profile a sense of sumptuousness impossible to resist.

Title: Donlen Manual Recliner
Description: Dressed in glorious gray faux leather, the Donlen recliner is certain to be the center of attention. With tasteful tufting, padded armrests and a sleek tapered design, it combines style and comfort. This recliner's generous scale and reclining motion let you kick back and relax at home solo or when hosting friends.

Title: Wilhurst 3-Piece Reclining Sectional
Description: Embrace ultimate comfort and style. The Wilhurst reclining sectional is covered in a feel-good blue-gray fabric that's beautified with puckered stitching and biscuit-back tufting. A console and drop-down table, each with cup holders, add functionality. The sectional's enticing, generously stuffed armrests make it even more of a dream scene.

Title: Screen Time Power Recliner
Description: Whether you're entertaining guests or unwinding quietly by yourself, the Screen Time power recliner can make your TV room feel like a home theater. Sleek and stylish, this comfortable seat offers the convenience of one-touch power controls and USB charging. It's everything you need, right at your fingertips. Relax, recline and unwind with an extended ottoman that takes your comfort to the next level.

Title: Next-Gen DuraPella Power Recliner
Description: Relax like never before. Stretch out on the Next-Gen DuraPella power recliner with the look and feel of leather at a comfortably affordable faux leather price. Tufted cushions, roll arms and welting create a sophisticated presence and make a lasting impression. There's comfort from head to toe, thanks to the adjustable headrest, lumbar support and extended ottoman, while the zero gravity mechanism improves circulation and the zero wall design makes efficient use of space. When you're ready to be pampered, simply activate the heated seat and air massage at the touch of a button. Water-repellent and durable, this is the next generation of faux leather upholstery for everyday living.

Title: Mathias Manual Recliner
Description: Looking at this mid-century arm chair, you’d never guess that it’s a recliner. Richly upholstered with button-tufted details and tapered wood legs, its streamlined good looks speak volumes. More than that, it’s discreet. What looks like an arm chair is actually a recliner, free of a lever or knob. Simply push back a bit and the leg rest kicks in.

Title: Catanzaro Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Let the luxury of the Catanzaro 2-seat power reclining sofa carry you away. Decidedly modern, with clean-lined divided back styling, this reclining sofa entices with a combination of genuine leather and expertly matched faux leather for a supple feel. Even when you’re kicking back you’ll still be perfectly positioned to read or watch TV thanks to the Easy View™ power adjustable headrest. And how’s this for a bonus: a convenient USB charging port located in the power control, so you can recharge while you chill.

Title: Hartsdale 5-Piece Power Reclining Modular Sectional with Chaise
Description: Fit for the comfort seeker in your household, the Hartsdale power sectional has that casual contemporary sensibility you love. Pillow top cushions with a feather-fiber blend are simply sumptuous. Chic and subtle chenille microfiber upholstery weaves in so much style.

Title: Clonmel Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Large-scale comfort is yours with the Clonmel 2-seat reclining power sofa. With supremely padded back, seat and arm cushions, it's the hero for ultimate relaxation. Microfiber upholstery is welcoming, soft and luxuriously covers the extra-wide seats. Recline back and kick up your feet to bolster your comfort level even more.

Title: Gaspar Dual Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: Longing for chic style without having to sacrifice superb comfort? Look no further than the Gaspar power reclining loveseat. Its real leather, paired with an expertly matched faux leather for affordability, has an inviting softness. Contemporary in design and full of convenient features, this loveseat is ideal for busy sophisticates in need of a spot to unwind.

Title: Mabton 3-Piece Dual Power Reclining Sectional
Description: The challenge: design a cutting-edge power reclining sectional you’d never guess was a recliner. Super sleek and streamlined, the Mabton sectional, in taupe gray with high-contrast jumbo stitching, might just be our best-kept secret. Rest assured, you’d be hard-pressed to find seating that looks so high end yet is so comfortably priced. Integrated elements include an Easy View™ adjustable headrest, which offers low-profile style when it’s down and a high level of comfort when you’re kicking back and reclining. Factor in an ergonomic chaise and one-touch power controls (each with a USB port) placed on the inside track arm, and you have the makings for one beautifully deceptive sectional.

Title: Henefer 3-Piece Dual Power Reclining Sectional with Chaise
Description: Wowing in a deep and dramatic shade of midnight gray, the Henefer power reclining sectional reflects a clean-lined approach whose time has come. Offering the cool look of leather—but with a warm and cozy feel—this ultra-contemporary sectional includes a zero wall power recliner for space efficiency and an Easy View™ power headrest that lets you fully recline and still have a primo view of the TV. Factor in an ergonomic power reclining back chaise and an extended ottoman, and you’ve got a sectional that puts smart design in how you recline.

Title: Burkner Power Reclining Sofa
Description: If highly contemporary looks and a heavenly feel sit well with you, rest your eyes on the Burkner reclining power sofa. Padded velvet upholstery has a plush high pile that's so soft to the touch. Jumbo contrast stitching adds fashion-forward flair, while radius cut arm frame incorporates cool, curvaceous interest. At your fingertips: one-touch power control with a zero-draw USB plug-in that’s not only convenient but also energy efficient. When it comes to high style at a down-to-earth price, this power reclining sofa really brings it home.

Title: StarLine Milano Manual Recliner and Ottoman
Description: Scandinavian / European-styled recliner and ottoman. A swiveling recliner that feels like it was custom-made for you. The recliner has the ideal amount of support, with an adjustable recline degree for your comfort needs. Perfect for long naps or resting. Backed by quality, buy with confidence.

Title: Mouttrie Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: A modern addition to a great room, living room or family room, the Mouttri power reclining sofa in smoke gray lures with its smokin’ hot way to recline. Unique pad-wrapped armrests provide a cool aesthetic and pillowy softness. Loaded with gorgeous texture, the velvety gray upholstery is sumptuously soft—and made all the more enticing with deep channel tufting for clean-lined flair. With an Easy View™ power adjustable headrest that lets you fully recline and still have a primo view of the TV—plus a USB port in each power control—you truly have it all at your fingertips.

Title: Ricmen Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Life is so much better when you can enjoy the pleasure of real leather—at a price to put you at ease. That’s exactly what you get with the Ricmen power reclining sofa. Thanks to leather match upholstery, you've got a reclining sofa that feels like a million bucks but won’t break the bank. Tailored to those with an eye for contemporary design, this power reclining sofa is dressed to impress with an upscale matte finish, clean-lined divided back tufting, distinctive jumbo stitching and chic pillow top armrests. Perhaps best of all: Easy View™ power adjustable headrests let you recline back and still have a primo view of the TV.

Title: Bolzano Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: Looking for a sleek seat? The Bolzano rocker recliner is your saving grace. Coffee brown microfiber cover is soft to the touch and padded for your comfort. Beautiful lines exhibit exceptional craftsmanship. Smaller-than-normal scale brings quality to even compact spaces. Now you can worry less about finding the perfect recliner for your room and relax more.

Title: Soundcheck Dual Power Reclining Sofa with Drop Down Table
Description: An impressive winner in home fashion, the Soundcheck power sofa shows us the beauty of today’s best reclining sofas. Inspired by vintage automobile interiors, the pleated upholstery in the lumbar section adds additional comfort for your lower back. This contemporary sofa is upholstered in all-over faux leather for feel-good pleasure, with contrast stitching for exceptional wear. When you want to get maximum relaxation, adjust the Easy View™ power adjustable headrest. This is how you bring home style and comfort.

Title: Vacherie Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: When it comes to comfort, style and value, the Vacherie faux leather reclining loveseat in black rocks. Tailored for feel-good flair, its fashion-forward bustle back design is enhanced with sculpted padding on the headrest for cradling support. Channel cushioning along the sides flows into thick, wrapped pillowtop armrests that are truly over the top. And while it might look like you broke the bank, a sumptuously soft leather-like fabric keeps indulgence well within budget.

Title: Nantahala 6-Piece Manual Reclining Sectional
Description: Sporting the look of perfectly "broken-in" leather, the Nantahala faux leather sectional has it all: looks, comfort and value.
