Its combination of weathered slate gray and black faux leather upholstery adds a nice contrasting element to the plump cushions, while jumbo stitching enhances the fashionable flair. Clean and simple divided back tailoring keeps this roomy sectional’s aesthetic cool and contemporary.

Title: Austere Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: The Austere reclining loveseat with console lives up to its name—if we’re talking sparing that "puffy" look you might expect from a recliner. When it comes to contemporary style, it doesn't hold back. Subtle touches such as sporty jumbo stitching, nailhead trim and a "weather worn" effect on the upholstery provide a buttoned-up appeal and fresh feel. Center console with dual cup holders brings a handy element to this handsome piece.

Title: Starbot 7-Piece Dual Power Reclining Modular Sectional with Consoles
Description: Destination: chic comfort. The Starbot power reclining sectional launches your living room into superior form with stellar attention to detail. Exemplifying attainable luxury, its handsome hue has an air of sophistication you’ll long to lounge in. And when you’re done basking in the glow of its sleek style, recline with indulgent motion features to welcome head-to-toe relaxation.

Title: Lynwood Manual Recliner Chair
Description: Kick your feet up in this comfortable recliner. Upholstered in a soft, easy-to-maintain fabric with foam padded cushions for ultimate relaxation, this recliner is also paired with stylish nail head trim accents. The perfect addition to any living room, bedroom, nursery or entertainment space in your home.

Title: Samperstone 6-Piece Power Reclining Modular Sectional
Description: City sleek living. The Samperstone sectional is loaded with luxury. An ultra-stylish diamond stitch design pumps up the piece with eye-catching drama. And talk about style with purpose. This sectional supports you with a high back and faux leather upholstery in gorgeous gray. Its USB charging station powers up your tech life as you recline in comfort. Cheers to the stainless steel cup holders, too.

Title: Huddle-Up Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: How can you not cuddle up in the decadently plush Huddle-Up rocker recliner? Spicing things up in a warm and earthy nutmeg brown, this richly styled recliner is covered in a heavyweight padded velvet upholstery for a sense of luxury. Distinctive elements include wraparound padded armrests for a cool twist.

Title: Kincord 4-Piece Power Reclining Sectional
Description: You could play it safe. Or you could choose to stand out in the crowd with the brilliantly styled Kincord sectional with power. Ultra cool, ultra contemporary and ultra comfortable, this fashion-forward sectional sports a fabulous faux leather enhanced with contrasting stitching that’s right on point. Rest assured, sumptuous pillow top armrests and sleek channel cushioning feel every bit as good as they look. Enlightened elements include a power control with USB plug-in and blue LED lighting (by the cup holders) to create a home theater experience worthy of A-listers.

Title: Faust Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: Clean, contemporary style and softly smooth comfort go hand in hand in the Faust power reclining loveseat with console. Rich leather pairs with faux leather to make for a luxurious—yet affordable—place to lounge. Pillow top armrests provide irresistible comfort.

Title: Kennebec Power Recliner
Description: Whether it's Friday movie nights or Sunday afternoon football that moves you, the Kennebec biscuit back power recliner makes it all that much more enticing from the comfort of your abode. Plushly padded in all the right places, striking black upholstery is pure delight.

Title: McCade Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: Comfort is yours for the taking with the McCade reclining sofa. Supportive back is plush in all the right places, enhancing your seating experience. Feel-good fabric is elevated with detailed stitching. Rounded sides are fashion-forward and topped with pillowy armrests. With one easy pull, you’re on your way to endless relaxation.

Title: McClelland Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: Large-scale comfort is yours with the McClelland dual seat reclining sofa. With supreme padding and plush upholstery, it's the hero for ultimate relaxation. The extra-wide seating gives you plenty of room to sit back, kick up your heels and enjoy.

Title: Mabton 5-Piece Dual Power Reclining Sectional
Description: The challenge: design a cutting-edge power reclining sectional you’d never guess was a recliner. Super sleek and streamlined, the Mabton sectional, in taupe gray with high-contrast jumbo stitching, might just be our best-kept secret. Rest assured, you’d be hard-pressed to find seating that looks so high end yet is so comfortably priced. Integrated elements include an Easy View™ adjustable headrest, which offers low-profile style when it’s down and a high level of comfort when you’re kicking back and reclining. Factor in one-touch power controls (each with a USB port) placed on the inside track arm, and you have the makings for one beautifully deceptive sectional.

Title: Mouttrie Dual Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: A modern addition to a great room, living room or family room, the Mouttri power reclining loveseat in smoke gray lures with its smokin’ hot way to recline. Unique pad-wrapped armrests provide a cool aesthetic and pillowy softness. Loaded with gorgeous texture, the velvety gray upholstery is sumptuously soft—and made all the more enticing with deep channel tufting for clean-lined flair. With an Easy View™ power adjustable headrest that lets you fully recline and still have a primo view of the TV—plus a USB port in each power control—you truly have it all at your fingertips.

Title: Bolzano Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: Looking for a sleek 2-seater? The Bolzano reclining sofa is your saving grace. Coffee brown microfiber cover is soft to the touch and padded for your comfort. Beautiful lines exhibit exceptional craftsmanship. Smaller-than-normal scale brings quality to even compact spaces. Now you can worry less about finding the perfect recliner for your room and relax more.

Title: Olsberg Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: Seamlessly merging classic elements with modern trends, the Olsberg recliner invites you to bring home the best of then and now. Wrapped in a fabulous steel gray upholstery with sumptuous suede-like feel, this easy-elegant reclining chair is dressed to impress with updated roll arm styling and tailored touches including nailhead trim and window pane stitching.

Title: Wilhurst Manual Reclining Sofa with Drop Down Table
Description: Embrace ultimate comfort and style. The Wilhurst reclining sofa is covered in a feel-good blue-gray fabric that’s beautified with puckered stitching and biscuit-back tufting. Its drop-down table with cup holders adds functionality. The sofa’s enticing, generously stuffed armrests make it that much more of a dream scene.

Title: Game Plan Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Masterful in its interpretation of modern luxury, the Game Plan power reclining sofa is sleekly tailored in top-grain leather. It’s rich to the touch in tones of warm brown, inviting you to indulge in one-touch reclining. Design details polish off this lavish leather sofa. Subtle stitching accents and clean-lined track arms create contemporary character, inviting high-brow style into your home.

Title: Wyerville 6-Piece Dual Power Reclining Sectional
Description: Wrap yourself up in the cushioned comfort of the Wyerville power reclining sectional. Bustle back and pillow top armrests make spending time in the living room oh so sweet. Factor in the smoothly neutral upholstery and you’ve got an ultra-stylish power recliner that truly caters to your every move.

Title: Accrington Manual Recliner
Description: Looking for the perfect blend of decadent comfort and contemporary flair? Feast your eyes on the Accrington rocker recliner. Tufted box cushioning and thick pillow top armrests brilliantly merge style and a sumptuous feel. Wonderfully plush to the touch, the recliner's earthy brown-tone fabric is the ultimate choice for a richly neutral look.

Title: Navi Manual Recliner
Description: If you love the cool look of leather but long for the warm feel of fabric, you can take comfort in the Navi rocker recliner. Wrapped in a fabulous faux leather with a weathered hue and hint of pebbly texture to resemble the real deal, this decidedly modern recliner proves less is more. Elements include angled side profiling and track armrests wrapped with a layer of pillowy softness for that little something extra. Prominent jumbo stitching and clean-lined divided back styling lend fashion-forward flair.

Title: Earhart Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: Every day is a good day with the Earhart rocker recliner around. Take a load off and forget your worries as you ease back into the luxurious feel of suede-like fabric. Need more comfort and support for your body? Cue the deep seating and tall back. Contrast jumbo stitching adds an element of style to the cushions.

Title: Workhorse Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: Saddle up for affordably priced luxury with the Workhorse rocker recliner. Stylish elements of this contemporary recliner include biscuit back cushioning and incredibly thick and sumptuous pillow top armrests. Ultra neutral and wonderfully plush, the warm taupe upholstery is sure to complement an endless array of color schemes.

Title: Larkinhurst Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: Dramatically transform your living space with the rustic look of weathered leather you love—at a fraction of the cost. That’s the beauty of the Larkinhurst faux leather rocker recliner. Washed in earthy Southwestern tones, with overstuffed back pillow support, jumbo window-pane stitching and gentle rocking motion, it envelops you in comfort and quality. Classic roll arms bring in just enough of a traditional touch.

Title: Dendron Power Recliner
Description: The structured style of the Dendron power recliner brings a sense of rich refinement to your space at a reasonable price. A contemporized bustle back makes this chic piece supremely comfortable, while curved padded arm rests provide a clean-lined design element. With its curated look and a blend of real and faux leather, you'll be lounging in luxury.

Title: Calderwell Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: Sleek and streamlined, the Calderwell reclining sofa draws out your leisure time with its bustle back construction and thickly cushioned armrests. The super soft faux leather gets a high-end tweak with jumbo contrast stitching so you don’t have to sacrifice style for comfort. Sink into the comfortably supportive cushions and stretch your evening as long as you can.

Title: Clonmel Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: Large-scale comfort is yours with the Clonmel 2-seat reclining sofa. With supremely padded back, seat and arm cushions, it's the hero for ultimate relaxation. Microfiber upholstery is welcoming, soft and luxuriously covers the extra-wide seats. Recline back and kick up your feet to bolster your comfort level even more.

Title: Marwood Manual Recliner
Description: Inspired by penthouse living, the Marwood recliner in brown upholstery is high-end design made comfortably affordable. Striking a pose with a clean, boxy profile softened by bustle back styling, this sumptuous seat sports hidden cup holders for an ultra-modern twist.

Title: Draycoll Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Built for luxury, the Draycoll power reclining loveseat with center console lets you kick back in reliable style. The thick, softly textured chenille upholstery provides a comfy surface on which to lounge. With bustle back construction and thickly cushioned armrests, this piece gives you the dependable, powered support you need to unwind with the convenience of the center console to ease your evening.

Title: Next-Gen DuraPella Dual Power Recliner
Description: This sleek, ultra-modern power recliner has it all. With designer looks and head-to-toe comfort, the Next-Gen DuraPella recliner has the upscale look of leather at a scaled-down faux leather price. Its two-tone upholstery is more durable and water-repellent than regular leather, an added bonus for families with children or pets. Features including wireless and USB charging, an adjustable headrest and an extended "zero-gravity" ottoman for improved circulation make this the next generation of power recliners.

Title: Alphons Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: Sincere in its styling, the Alphons reclining sofa invites a relaxed sensibility into your space. Its neutral upholstery has a universal appeal, with pull-tab reclining making it easy to kick back in comfort. Providing high-quality functionality at an affordable price, this sofa marries well with a myriad of design aesthetics.

Title: McAdoo Power Recliner
Description: Don't simply make do with your living room furniture. Embrace contemporary comfort with the McAdoo power recliner. It brings a new meaning to relaxed refinement, with caramel faux leather upholstery making a subtle-but-striking style statement. Cozy yet curated in design, this sleek recliner is sure to become your favorite spot to unwind.

Title: New Port Autumn Manual Recliner
Description: Scandinavian / European-styled recliner. A swiveling recliner with self-store footrest that feels like it was custom-made for you. The recliner has the ideal amount of support, with an adjustable recline degree for your comfort needs. Perfect for long naps or resting.  Backed by quality, and buy with confidence.

Title: Mopton Power Lift Recliner
Description: The Mopton power lift recliner does the work for you. After you've been sitting and relaxing or reclining fully for a refreshing snooze, it puts you back on your feet with the touch of a button. In a neutral tone of chocolate brown, this faux leather recliner looks and feels great in any room. It's designed for long-lasting durability, so you'll be able to enjoy it for quite a while.

Title: Lucina Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: The Lucina rocker recliner sets the foundation for all proclaimed casually cool spaces. Adorned in a soft microfiber upholstery, it features track arms and a welted seat cushion. A gentle rocking motion perfects the laid-back vibe.

Title: Ludden Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: An “easy chair" that’s wonderfully easy on the body and the budget. Ludden recliner delights the senses with ultra plush upholstery in a handsomely textured twill. Divided bustle design and puckered stitching meld comfort and style. Ample pillow top armrests make it an all-the-more restful place to unwind.

Title: Texline 3-Piece Dual Power Reclining Modular Sofa
Description: Truly putting high design into recline, the Texline sofa with gray leather match upholstery proves that just because you’re a recliner doesn’t mean you have to look like one. Deceptively beautiful, its ultra clean-lined aesthetic is as cool and contemporary as they come. Low-profile back has a super swank look. When you need more support for your head and neck, the press of a button engages the Easy View™ power adjustable headrest, designed to let you lean back and still have a primo view of the TV. The zero wall design requires minimal space between wall and chair back, and indulgent pillow top seating gives an added layer of comfort.

Title: McCade Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Comfort is yours for the taking with the McCade reclining loveseat with center console. Supportive back is plush in all the right places, enhancing your seating experience. Feel-good fabric is elevated with detailed stitching. Rounded sides are fashion-forward and topped with pillowy armrests. With one easy pull, you’re on your way to endless relaxation.

Title: Austere Oversized Manual Recliner
Description: The Austere zero wall recliner lives up to its name—if we’re talking minimizing space requirements and sparing that "puffy" look you might expect from a recliner. When it comes to contemporary style, it doesn't hold back. Subtle touches such as sporty jumbo stitching, nailhead trim and a "weather worn" effect on the upholstery give this handsome piece a buttoned-up appeal and fresh feel.

Title: McCade Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: Comfort is yours for the taking with the McCade rocker recliner. Supportive back is plush in all the right places, enhancing your seating experience. Feel-good fabric is elevated with detailed stitching. Rounded sides are fashion-forward and topped with pillowy armrests. With one easy pull, you’re on your way to endless relaxation.

Title: Rackingburg Power Recliner
Description: Once you recline in the Rackingburg power rocker recliner with the push of a button, you will not want to get up. It's that comfortable with a bustle back and padded ottoman. Its look is amazing with dramatic cut and sew lines, jumbo stitching and affordable mahogany leather match upholstery—what a way to relax.

Title: Boxberg Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: Rock the cool look of leather minus the hefty price tag with the Boxberg reclining sofa. Rich with tonal variation, the indulgently soft upholstery sure looks like the real thing. And talk about indulgent comfort. Double stuffed armrests and sumptuous cushions cradle and support in all the right places. Distinctive scooped stitching enhances this reclining sofa’s contemporary flair.

Title: Lorreze Power Lift Recliner
Description: The Lorreze power lift recliner does the work for you, easing you to your feet from a relaxed sitting position or fully reclined. Irresistibly comfortable and ruggedly handsome, the neutral steel gray shade fits most any color scheme and room decor. It has a heating element in the seat, plus a massage function to ensure total relaxation, so complete comfort is a foregone conclusion. With heavyweight padded faux leather for long-lasting durability, you'll be able to enjoy this recliner for quite a while.

Title: Hartsdale 3-Piece Power Reclining Modular Sofa Chaise
Description: Fit for the comfort seeker in your household, the Hartsdale power sectional has that casual contemporary sensibility you love. Pillow top cushions with a feather-fiber blend are simply sumptuous. Chic and subtle chenille microfiber upholstery weaves in so much style.

Title: Drakestone Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: Intensify comfort in style with the Drakestone rocker recliner. Simply pull the chair lever to recline and with the hand-held remote, heat the seat and put on the massage. Enjoy the super plush feel of the tufted upholstery and pillow top armrests—what a way to unwind and relax.

Title: Stoneland Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: For those that love the cool look of leather but long for the warm feel of fabric, the Stoneland reclining loveseat with console delivers both with ease. Its high-performance padded faux leather is remarkably durable and easy to clean, just the thing for family spaces. Channel-stitched back cushions provide indulgent lumbar support for maximum comfort—not to mention fashion-forward flair.

Title: Cranedall Oversized Dual Power Recliner
Description: Load up on comfort and contemporary style with the Cranedall wide seat power recliner. Wrapped in a heavyweight padded faux leather with a weathered effect that looks so natural, this super chic recliner is enriched with clean lines and jumbo contrast stitching. Rest assured, the one-touch power control with adjustable positions includes an Easy View™ adjustable headrest that lets you lay back and still have a primo view of the TV. A zero-draw USB plug-in at your fingertips keeps you powered up as you chill out.

Title: Hartsdale 3-Piece Power Reclining Modular Sofa
Description: Fit for the comfort seeker in your household, the Hartsdale power sectional has that casual contemporary sensibility you love. Pillow top cushions with a feather-fiber blend are simply sumptuous. Chic and subtle chenille microfiber upholstery weaves in so much style.

Title: Nerviano Manual Recliner
Description: Indulge in comfort—while saving on space—with the Nerviano zero wall recliner. Clever zero wall design means you only need a few inches of room between the back of the chair and the wall to fully recline. Making high comfort highly affordable, this smartly tailored recliner with a clean-lined divided back is wrapped in a plush, textural upholstery that’s a pleasure for the senses.

Title: Kitching Dual Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: If you're torn between the cool look of leather and warm feel of a microfiber fabric, the Kitching power reclining loveseat is a style compromise you’re sure to love. Designed for looks and luxuriousness, this decidedly contemporary loveseat delivers big comfort without the bulk. Exceptionally clean lines and squared styling make all the difference. A feel-good experience from head to toe, it includes Easy View™ power adjustable headrests that let you fully recline and still have a primo view of the TV. Plus, you can chill out while you recharge thanks to a USB charging port built right into the one-touch power control.

Title: McTeer Power Recliner
Description: If you’ve got a penchant for simple, contemporary beauty, the McTeer power recliner has your name written all over it. One-touch power control means any position is yours – whether fully reclined or sitting upright. The pillow top arms and back cushion surround your body in luxurious, plush chenille that’s irresistible to the touch. Mocha colored upholstery makes it easy to match with other modern decor for a fashionable and comfortable space.

Title: Brassville Oversized Manual Recliner
Description: A large scale means large comfort with the Brassville recliner. Wonderfully wide seat is upholstered in a textural, cottony soft fabric. Recline as far back as you please on pillowy arms and headrest. Bustle back tufting adds the right amount of casually cool style.

Title: Altari Manual Recliner
Description: If style is the question, then the Altari rocker recliner is the answer. Clean-lined profile is beautifully contemporary. Plush chenille fabric and plump cushioning make it so easy to comfortably kick up your heels. Richly neutral hue complements a variety of decor.

Title: Austere Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: The Austere reclining sofa lives up to its name—if we’re talking sparing that "puffy" look you might expect from a recliner. When it comes to contemporary style, it doesn't hold back. Subtle touches such as sporty jumbo stitching, nailhead trim and a "weather worn" effect on the upholstery give this handsome piece a buttoned-up appeal and fresh feel.

Title: Tulen Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: The Tulen rocker recliner puts the win in winning. Its waterfall back design and doubly plump pillow top arms team up with soft chenille fabric to go for the goal. Ample seating room makes the comfort possibilities endless. Sit back and relax. You won’t go wrong with this recliner.

Title: Brassville Oversized Power Recliner
Description: A large scale means large comfort with the Brassville power recliner. Wonderfully wide seat is upholstered in a textural, cottony soft fabric. Recline as far back as you please on pillowy arms and headrest at one easy touch of a button. Bustle back tufting adds the right amount of casually cool style.

Title: Acieona Manual Reclining Sofa with Drop Down Table
Description: If its quilted bustle back weren’t enough, the Acieona reclining sofa has overstuffed arms that elevate comfort to new heights. Drop down the middle seat’s back to reveal a handy table top and cup holders, as well as an ingenious storage pocket. Ultra-soft chenille upholstery makes this piece beyond luxurious.

Title: Next-Gen DuraPella Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: This sleek, ultra-modern power reclining sofa has it all. With designer looks and head-to-toe comfort, the Next-Gen DuraPella reclining sofa with drop-down table has the upscale look of leather at a scaled-down faux leather price. Its two-tone upholstery is more durable and water-repellent than regular leather, an added bonus for families with children or pets. Features including wireless and USB charging, an adjustable headrest and an extended "zero-gravity" ottoman for improved circulation make this the next generation of power recliners.

Title: Osaki OS-Pro Honor 3D Massage Chair
Description: Introducing Osaki’s latest 3D massage chair that has been in the works for many years, carefully engineered and designed in Japan. The chair is thoughtfully designed for comfort and an incredible massage experience. The innovative brushless motors make it one of the most reliable and quiet motors in the industry.

Title: Betrillo Manual Recliner
Description: Great design draws inspiration from various places, and the Betrillo rocker recliner is no exception. Diamond-stitched pattern seen in high-end handbags and luxury car interiors is simply irresistible on this sumptuous, generously padded seating experience. Durable, easy-care leather alternative delivers the look you crave at a price that’s decidedly easy on your purse. With one easy pull, you’re on your way to endless relaxation.

Title: Titan TP-Cosmo 2D Massage Chair
Description: Titan TP-Cosmo is a 2D massage chair with an advanced ergonomic SL-track rolling system. Unlike other 2D massage chairs, the TP-Cosmo comes with 12 different auto massage programs, 3 modes of pneumatic massage function, and selection of three different air pressure parts.

Title: McClelland Oversized Recliner
Description: Large-scale comfort is yours with the McClelland recliner. With supreme padding and plush upholstery it's the hero for ultimate relaxation. The zero-wall design makes efficient use of space and the extra-wide seating gives you plenty of room to sit back, kick up your heels and enjoy.

Title: Capehorn Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: Sometimes seeing is believing. Rest assured the Capehorn rocker recliner is every bit as indulgent as it looks. Designed to put you in the lap of luxury, this generously scaled recliner—wrapped in a wonderfully plush and practical earthy brown upholstery—sports scooped pillow wrapped armrests and curvaceously cushioned head-neck support for feel-good flair.

Title: Enouvation E6 Wireless Power Pack for Recliners
Description: The E6 Power Pack from Enouvation offers you the ability to go cordless on Power Motion furniture. This means you can float a Power Motion piece of furniture without having to see those unsightly, industrial cords. Enouvation Power Packs are tested to multiple UL standards and certified, having gone through rigorous testing. Each Power Pack comes with its own charger in box. The frequency with which your Power Pack will need to be recharged varies greatly on the amount of use. Patents pending.

Title: Warrior Fortress Power Recliner
Description: Inspired by luxury car interiors, the Warrior Fortress power rocker recliner puts you in the driver’s seat like never before. Its matte faux leather upholstery and padded details are enriched with heavyweight baseball stitching for a chic, sporty aesthetic. An oversized headrest pillow and high back profile take the experience over the top.

Title: HyllMont Dual Power Recliner
Description: The Hyllmont power recliner in weathered gray is proof of just how far recliners have come when it comes to form and function. Ultra cool and contemporary, this fully loaded power recliner makes it so easy to social distance and make home your haven. Dressed to impress with diamond stitching inspired by sports car interiors, this recliner is covered in a fabulous faux leather with pebbled effect for authenticity. High-tech advancements include a one-touch power control with Easy View™ adjustable headrest and USB plug-in. Hidden storage compartments in the armrests are a welcome touch.

Title: Wurstrow Triple Power Recliner
Description: Big and bold, the Wurstrow power recliner with Easy View™ power adjustable headrest delivers comfort at the touch of a button. Easily position the recliner, its headrest and lumbar support to your liking for maximum comfort. Plus, with the convenient USB charging port, a cell phone or laptop can be charged without having to get up. Real leather is paired with expertly matched faux leather to level up affordable luxury. The detailing on the umber-colored upholstery creates a rustic look—perfect for your modern or casual setting.

Title: Correze Dual Power Modular Recliner
Description: Truly putting high design into recline, the Correze power recliner with gray leather match upholstery proves that just because you’re a recliner doesn’t mean you have to look like one. Deceptively beautiful, its ultra clean-lined aesthetic is as cool and contemporary as they come. Low-profile back has a super swank look. When you need more support for your head and neck, the press of a button engages the Easy View™ power adjustable headrest, designed to let you lean back and still have a primo view of the TV. Ever-so-subtle curves and stunning stitching perfect the aesthetic.

Title: Texline Dual Power Recliner
Description: Truly putting high design into recline, the Texline recliner in gray leather match upholstery proves that just because you’re a recliner doesn’t mean you have to look like one. Deceptively beautiful, its ultra clean-lined aesthetic is as cool and contemporary as they come. The low-profile back has a super swank look. When you need more support for your head and neck, the press of a button engages the Easy View™ power adjustable headrest, designed to let you lean back and still have a primo view of the TV. To save space, the zero wall design requires minimal space between wall and chair back. Indulgent pillow top seating gives an added layer of comfort.

Title: Dunwell Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: There is power in beauty with the Dunwell power reclining sofa. Handsome crackle effect in the upholstery gives the appearance of supple leather but this recliner is all about the warmth of fabric. Contrast jumbo stitching adds a stylish touch. Double stuffed armrests cuff your body in comfort. Adjust your head and recline back with one easy touch.

Title: Garristown Dual Power Recliner
Description: Wouldn’t it be great if the cool look of leather could be blended with the warm feel of fabric? Find a beautiful balance of contemporary style and cozy comfort in the Garristown power rocker recliner. Sporting a sultry gray UltraPella upholstery, this chic faux leather recliner is empowering in every which way. The Easy View™ power headrest allows you the perfect view of the TV, even when you’re lying back. And if you’re never far from your cell phone or laptop, you’ll surely appreciate the one-touch power control with USB charging port.

Title: Next-Gen DuraPella Dual Power Recliner
Description: It’s time to rethink the way you relax—and time to experience the joys of the Next-Gen DuraPella power recliner. Taking a fashion-forward approach to the art of relaxation, the recliner—with a one-touch power control and an energy-efficient USB plug-in—will elevate your style and raise your standard of living. Its zero-gravity mechanism lifts the ottoman higher than traditional recliners to improve circulation. And talk about low maintenance. This designer recliner is wrapped in durable, water-repellent upholstery that's family- and pet-friendly.

Title: Dunwell Dual Power Recliner
Description: There is power in beauty with the Dunwell power rocker recliner. Handsome crackle effect in the upholstery gives the appearance of supple leather but this recliner is all about the warmth of fabric. Contrast jumbo stitching adds a stylish touch. Double stuffed armrests cuff your body in comfort. Adjust your head and recline back with one easy touch.

Title: Turbulance Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Looking for seating with all the bells and whistles? The Turbulance power reclining sofa has you covered. Get double the relaxation—recline your body then adjust your headrest. Pull down the middle seat to reveal a drop down table ready to hold your magazines and remotes. With USB charging ports, your devices will enjoy this sofa, too. Stainless steel cup holders accompany you on either side. All wrapped up in quality faux leather with fashion-forward jumbo stitching for a look and feel you’ll love.

Title: Beaconfield Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: The Beaconfield power reclining loveseat is made exclusively for those wanting a sumptuously comfortable recliner—that looks nothing like a recliner. Far from the usual leather/faux leather option, this power reclining loveseat is wrapped in a textural chenille upholstery that’s warm and cozy. Tufted box cushions and sloped pillow top armrests lend a rich, contemporary aesthetic, while exposed feet in a dark faux wood finish are something you’d see on an armchair, not a recliner.  What a fashion-forward way to kick back in style.

Title: Huddle-Up Manual Reclining Sofa with Drop Down Table
Description: How can you not cuddle up in the decadently plush Huddle-Up reclining sofa. Spicing things up in a warm and earthy nutmeg brown, this richly styled reclining sofa is covered in a heavyweight padded velvet upholstery for a sense of luxury. Distinctive elements include wraparound padded armrests for a cool twist, along with a few hidden surprises. Pull the center back cushion forward to reveal a drop-down table with dual cup holders and AC power and USB ports. Under the center seat: a roomy storage drawer designed to make every inch of space count!

Title: StarLine Turin Manual Recliner
Description: Scandinavian / European-styled recliner. A swiveling recliner that feels like it was custom-made for you. The recliner has the ideal amount of support, with an adjustable recline degree for your comfort needs. Perfect for long naps or resting. Backed by quality, and buy with confidence.

Title: Game Zone Dual Power Recliner
Description: If you’re looking for the perfect seat for gaming, lounging or just relaxing, look no further than the indulgent comfort of the Game Zone power recliner. Sporting one-touch power controls, an Easy View™ power adjustable headrest, cup holders, storage and chargers, it has everything you need for binge-watching or power playing. Padded cushions with waterfall back design and pillow top arms offer plenty of support, while leather alternative upholstery is given tuck and roll styling for a well-edited aesthetic.

Title: Coombs Oversized Manual Recliner
Description: The Coombs wide seat recliner makes it hip to be square. Brilliantly boxy profile and wide track arms infuse a highly contemporary look you don’t often find in reclining furniture. Rest assured, the trendy charcoal-tone upholstery is sumptuously soft—and made all the more enticing with deep channel tufting for clean-lined flair.

Title: Dorel Living Sanders Power Lift Recliner
Description: When it comes time to relax and unwind, the Dorel Living Sanders power lift recliner offers you unrivaled positioning, well-being, stability and support. Designed with comfort and convenience in mind, the recliner features an attached remote control that services the power recline and lift function and can be stored in the small pouch on the side when not in use. Upholstered in woven chenille fabric, the recliner features a plush pillow arm design, a padded seat and footrest and elegant channel tufting on the seat back, which brings additional comfort and lumbar support. With the touch of a button, the power lift quietly and gently eases you from the ultimate recline into a lift and tilt position, to effortlessly get you back on your feet.

Title: Hallstrung Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Stay happy at home with the Hallstrung 2-seat reclining power sofa with Easy View™ power adjustable headrests. Comfort is immediate when you're in control of your relaxation. Simply adjust the seat's position and headrest with the easy one-touch power control buttons. Plus, with the convenient USB charging ports, cell phones or laptops can be charged without having to get up. Rest assured, leather match upholstery makes luxury affordable. The chocolate-colored upholstery provides a modern look in a high back design that's traditional—what a great way to unwind and watch TV.

Title: McGann Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: Rock the cool look of leather and the warm feel of fabric with the McGann rocker recliner. Sporting sumptuously thick cushioning, fashion-forward jumbo stitching and a richly tailored aesthetic, this smartly priced recliner with gentle rocking motion is a bestseller for good reason.

Title: Brookdale Push Back Recliner
Description: This push back recliner offers a classic update to your living space. Featuring a high back and round arms, the chair creates a charming transitional look. Its gray tweed upholstery is accented by pewter-tone nailhead detailing, and pairs perfectly with the light gray finish on the solid wood legs. Sit back and relax in your living space by incorporating this recliner into your existing decor.

Title: Tulen Manual Reclining Loveseat
Description: The Tulen reclining loveseat puts the win in winning. Its waterfall back design and doubly plump pillow top arms team up with soft chenille fabric to go for the goal. Ample seating room makes the comfort possibilities endless. Sit back and relax. You won’t go wrong with this reclining loveseat.

Title: AmaMedic AmaMedic Hilux 4D Massage Chair
Description: Introducing the ALL NEW luxurious AmaMedic Hilux 4D massage chair, designed with all the newest technology, luxury, and stylish elegance. Even the smallest of details have been carefully inspected and crafted with the highest quality.

Title: Next-Gen DuraPella 3-Piece Dual Power Reclining Sectional
Description: It’s time to rethink the way you relax—and time to experience the joys of this power reclining sectional. Taking a fashion-forward approach to the art of relaxation, the Next-Gen DuraPella sectional—with a one-touch power control and an energy-efficient USB plug-in—will elevate your style and raise your standard of living. Its zero-gravity mechanism lifts the ottoman higher than traditional recliners to improve circulation. And talk about low maintenance. This designer sectional is wrapped in durable, water-repellent upholstery that's family- and pet-friendly.

Title: Clonmel Oversized Power Recliner
Description: Large-scale comfort is yours with the Clonmel zero wall wide seat power recliner. With supremely padded back, seat and arm cushions, it's the hero for ultimate relaxation. Microfiber upholstery is welcoming, soft and luxuriously covers the extra-wide seat. Recline back and kick up your feet to bolster your comfort level even more.

Title: Nason Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: With rounded sides, you’re in for a rocking good time on the Nason rocker recliner. Recline back in infinite positions for comfort. Pillow top arms and feel-good fabric will make you never want to leave. Waterfall back design adds plenty of style to this recliner’s function.

Title: StarLine Lyric Manual Recliner and Ottoman
Description: This European-styled recliner and ottoman features a swiveling recliner that feels like it was custom-made for you. The recliner has the ideal amount of support, with an adjustable recline degree for your comfort needs. Perfect for long naps or resting and backed by quality, you can buy this comfortable chair with confidence.

Title: Earhart Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Every day is a good day with the Earhart reclining loveseat around. Take a load off and forget your worries as you ease back into the luxurious feel of suede-like fabric. Need more comfort and support for your body? Cue the deep seating and tall back. Contrast jumbo stitching adds an element of style to the cushions. Easily place drinks and small living room essentials in the center storage console with cup holders.

Title: Kempten Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: You don’t just want to recline. You want to recline in high design. Wrapped in a fabulous black faux leather upholstery, the Kempten reclining loveseat with 42" high back is everything you long for—and then some. Ultra clean lines, subtle curves and sumptuous comfort make it a sight for sore eyes and tired muscles. Here’s the showstopper: ambient blue LED lighting along the loveseat base for a movie theater experience enjoyed from the convenience of home.

Title: Arroyo Push Back Recliner
Description: Relax in comfort with this beautifully designed recliner. The chair is upholstered in a mushroom-colored fabric that creates a warm and welcoming look. A dark coffee-colored finish on its solid wood legs complements the upholstery, while simple button detailing on the back adds an elegant touch. With a high back and track arms, this recliner brings comfort and a chic transitional touch to your living space.

Title: Nason Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: With feel-good fabric, you’re in for a great time on the Nason reclining sofa. Recline back in infinite positions for comfort. Pillow top arms will make you never want to leave. Waterfall back design and rounded sides add plenty of style to this reclining sofa’s function.

Title: StarLine Cadence Manual Recliner and Ottoman
Description: This European-styled recliner and ottoman features a swiveling recliner that feels like it was custom-made for you. The recliner has the ideal amount of support, with an adjustable recline degree for your comfort needs. Perfect for long naps or resting and backed by quality, you can buy this comfortable chair with confidence.

Title: Turbulance Dual Power Recliner
Description: Looking for a seat with all the bells and whistles? The Turbulance power recliner has you covered. Get double the relaxation—recline your body then adjust your headrest. With USB charging ports, your devices will enjoy this recliner, too. Stainless steel cup holders accompany you on either side. All wrapped up in quality faux leather with fashion-forward jumbo stitching for a look and feel you’ll love.

Title: Linda Push Back Recliner
Description: This beautifully designed recliner offers an elegant and sophisticated update to your living room decor. The chair is upholstered in a tonal printed fabric that creates a rich transitional look. Rounded arms and pewter-tone nailhead detailing add the perfect touches to elevate the design, while an elm wood finish on the solid wood legs complements the upholstery.

Title: Rowlett Triple Power Recliner
Description: Inspired by luxury automotive interiors, the Rowlett power recliner is just where you want to be when it’s time to downshift for the day. Loaded with comfort and streamlined for high style, this decidedly modern power recliner in fashion-forward faux leather cradles you from head to toe. The one-touch power control puts comfort—and convenience—at your fingertips with features including an Easy View™ adjustable headrest, power lumbar support and zero draw USB plug-in for energy efficiency. And how’s this for a nice surprise: hidden cup holders (with magnetic locking system) to maximize the minimalism of this sleek recliner.

Title: Warnerton Dual Power Recliner
Description: Your modern living room awaits with the Warnerton power recliner. Complete with practical faux leather beautified with diamond lattice stitching, one-touch power control, adjustable headrest and a USB charging port, it makes finding the best seat in the house a breeze. Cup holders and armrest console storage keep drinks, snacks and remotes close by. Go ahead—treat yourself to a high-design home theater experience, priced to put you at ease.

Title: Samir Power Lift Recliner
Description: How beautifully the Samir power lift recliner elevates your level of comfort. On those days when you need a little pampering, you’re sure to love the heat-and-massage element incorporated within the back cushion. Sporting a sleek design, with a unique crescent back and double-stitched tailoring, this power lift recliner has the corner on contemporary style.

Title: Turbulance Dual Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: Looking for seating with all the bells and whistles? The Turbulance power reclining loveseat has you covered. Get double the relaxation—recline your body then adjust your headrest. Pull up the center console to stash your remotes. With USB charging ports, your devices will enjoy this loveseat, too. With four stainless steel cup holders, you’ll have drinks galore. All wrapped up in quality faux leather with fashion-forward jumbo stitching for a look and feel you’ll love.

Title: Boerna Dual Power Recliner
Description: Power up with the ultra-modern Boerna power recliner. Inspired by sports car interiors, the seating area is covered in real leather for your pleasure. An advanced one-touch power control puts everything at your fingertips, including an Easy View™ power headrest, USB port and wireless charging for your phone. If that’s not enough, how does this sound? Integrated wireless speakers, armrests with storage, and pull-out compartments to keep cup holders out of sight yet right at hand.

Title: Kincord Manual Recliner
Description: Ultra cool, ultra contemporary and ultra comfortable, the Kincord rocker recliner sports a fabulous faux leather enhanced with jumbo stitching for fashion-forward flair. “Divided” cushion design on the back and footrest is indulgent yet anything but bulky. Scooped sides give the pillow top armrests that much more allure.

Title: Whitehill Power Lift Recliner
Description: Enjoy comfort to the max in the Whitehill power lift recliner. After sitting and relaxing or snoozing in a fully reclined position, it eases you upright and back on your feet with the touch of a button. Dual motor capability lets you recline back and elevate your legs independently for custom comfort positioning. With USB charging at your fingertips, you can power up electronic devices as you unwind. The heavyweight padded faux leather has long-lasting durability, and its neutral chocolate hue complements most color schemes, so it looks as good as it feels.

Title: Francesca Power Recliner
Description: Master statement-making contemporary comfort with the Francesca power recliner. It displays a striking yet streamlined profile, with auburn-hued leather match upholstery balancing natural beauty and refined design. An adjustable headrest and USB charging polish off this richly crafted piece.

Title: Correze 5-Piece Dual Power Reclining Modular Sectional with Chaise
Description: Truly putting high design into recline, the Correze power reclining sectional with gray leather match upholstery proves that just because you’re a recliner doesn’t mean you have to look like one. Deceptively beautiful, its ultra clean-lined aesthetic is as cool and contemporary as they come. Low-profile back has a super swank look. When you need more support for your head and neck, the press of a button engages the Easy View™ power adjustable headrest, designed to let you lean back and still have a primo view of the TV. Ever-so-subtle curves and stunning stitching perfect the aesthetic.

Title: Coombs Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: The Coombs reclining sofa makes it hip to be square. Brilliantly boxy profile and wide track arms infuse a highly contemporary look you don’t often find in reclining furniture. Rest assured, the trendy charcoal-tone upholstery is sumptuously soft—and made all the more enticing with deep channel tufting for clean-lined flair.

Title: Calderwell Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: Sleek and streamlined, the Calderwell rocker recliner draws out your leisure time with its bustle back construction and thickly cushioned armrests. The super soft faux leather gets a high-end tweak with jumbo contrast stitching so you don’t have to sacrifice style for comfort. Sink into the comfortably supportive cushions and stretch your evening as long as you can.

Title: Dendron Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: The structured style of the Dendron power reclining loveseat brings a sense of rich refinement to your space at a reasonable price. A contemporized bustle back makes this chic piece supremely comfortable, while curved padded arm rests provide a clean-lined design element. With its curated look and a blend of real and faux leather, you'll be lounging in luxury.

Title: Stoneland Power Recliner
Description: For those that love the cool look of leather but long for the warm feel of fabric, the Stoneland power rocker recliner delivers both with ease. Its high-performance padded faux leather is remarkably durable and easy to clean, just the thing for family spaces. When it’s time to relax, the one-touch power control puts the perfect position at your fingertips. Channel-stitched back cushions provide indulgent lumbar support for maximum seating comfort—not to mention fashion-forward flair.

Title: Linon Griffin Live Edge Coffee Table
Description: Bring a touch of the outdoors into your home with this distinctive live edge coffee table. Four unique tree sections join together to create what will surely be a favorite showpiece. Live edges give a rustic look, while the top is polished to provide a smooth surface. The generously sized tabletop provides a perfect stage for drinks, snacks, books and magazines. Levelers under the four tapered legs ensure a stable surface to keep your belongings safe. Perfect in a living room, bedroom, office or den.

Title: Modway Transmit 1-Drawer Storage Coffee Table
Description: Harness the iconic energy of mid-century modern design with the Transmit coffee table. A full-extension white lacquer drawer contrasts the walnut grain laminate, creating an eye-catching look. Splayed and tapered legs add a bit of flair to this stylish storage piece. Use it to display or store magazines, books or your favorite sofa-side beverage.

Title: Linon Owens Cocktail Table
Description: Mixing metal with wood, the transitional Franklin Cocktail Table provides a unique addition to your home. The round table features an umber brown oak woodgrain veneer with nailheads along the apron. The sturdy metal base is made of curved legs and includes a small circular shelf. Some assembly required.

Title: Latimer Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: With a streamlined look designed to last, the Latimer power reclining sofa is sure to become a living room mainstay. The brown upholstery has a laid-back-meets-luxe look well suited to transitional spaces.

Title: Correze 5-Piece Dual Power Reclining Modular Sectional
Description: Truly putting high design into recline, the Correze power reclining sectional with gray leather match upholstery proves that just because you’re a recliner doesn’t mean you have to look like one. Deceptively beautiful, its ultra clean-lined aesthetic is as cool and contemporary as they come. Low-profile back has a super swank look. When you need more support for your head and neck, the press of a button engages the Easy View™ power adjustable headrest, designed to let you lean back and still have a primo view of the TV. Ever-so-subtle curves and stunning stitching perfect the aesthetic.

Title: Hartsdale 6-Piece Power Reclining Modular Sectional with Console and Chaise
Description: Fit for the comfort seeker in your household, the Hartsdale power sectional has that casually cool sensibility you love. Pillow top cushions with a feather-fiber blend are simply sumptuous. Chic and subtle chenille microfiber upholstery weaves in so much style.

Title: Benlocke 3-Piece Manual Reclining Modular Sectional with Chaise
Description: With plush cushions and wraparound pillow top arms, the Benlocke sectional takes comfort to a whole new level. Its herringbone-patterned velvet upholstery requires minimal care, making this relaxation station ideal for homes with children and pets. The reclining feature engages with the pull of a tab, putting pleasure and instant relaxation at your fingertips.

Title: Owner's Box Dual Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: When it comes to style, you’ve got game. Rest assured, the Owner’s Box power reclining loveseat is sure to win you over with its ultra-cool looks and major league features. Showcasing all the bells and whistles, this designer reclining loveseat is inspired by sports car interiors—with a fabulous faux leather accentuated with horizonal channel tufting. An advanced one-touch power control with an Easy View™ power headrest puts you in the driver’s seat. On top of a cup holder and hidden storage on each armrest, you’ve got a center console with two more cup holders and storage for remotes and more.

Title: Mabton Dual Power Recliner
Description: The challenge: Design a cutting-edge power recliner you’d never guess was a recliner. Super sleek and streamlined, the Mabton recliner in taupe gray with high-contrast jumbo stitching might just be our best-kept secret. Rest assured, you’d be hard-pressed to find seating that looks so high end yet is so comfortably priced. Integrated elements include an Easy View™ adjustable headrest, which offers low-profile style when it’s down and a high level of comfort when you’re kicking back and reclining. Factor in a one-touch power control (with a USB port) placed on the inside track arm, and you have the makings for one beautifully deceptive piece of furniture.

Title: Samperstone 3-Piece Power Reclining Modular Loveseat
Description: City sleek living. The Samperstone loveseat is loaded with luxury. An ultra-stylish diamond stitch design pumps up the piece with eye-catching drama. And talk about style with purpose. This loveseat supports you with a high back and faux leather upholstery in gorgeous gray. Its USB charging station powers up your tech life as you recline in comfort. Cheers to the stainless steel cup holders, too.

Title: McCaskill 3-Piece Manual Reclining Sectional
Description: Sink into the supple McCaskill sectional and prepare to be swept off your feet—literally. Its extra-wide seats and plush cushioning are divinely comfortable. It's wrapped in decadently soft leather match upholstery for a luxurious experience, saving you money without sacrificing style. Prominent stitching, linear track arms and a goes-with-anything gray hue add stylish touches. Keep beverages and remotes close at hand thanks to the loveseat’s center console and cup holders.

Title: Texline 5-Piece Dual Power Reclining Modular Sectional
Description: Truly putting high design into recline, the Texline sectional with gray leather match upholstery proves that just because you’re a recliner doesn’t mean you have to look like one. Deceptively beautiful, its ultra clean-lined aesthetic is as cool and contemporary as they come. Low-profile back has a super swank look. When you need more support for your head and neck, the press of a button engages the Easy View™ power adjustable headrest, designed to let you lean back and still have a primo view of the TV. The zero wall design requires minimal space between wall and chair back, and indulgent pillow top seating gives an added layer of comfort.

Title: Correze 2-Piece Dual Power Reclining Modular Loveseat
Description: Truly putting high design into recline, the Correze power reclining sectional with gray leather match upholstery proves that just because you’re a recliner doesn’t mean you have to look like one. Deceptively beautiful, its ultra clean-lined aesthetic is as cool and contemporary as they come. Low-profile back has a super swank look. When you need more support for your head and neck, the press of a button engages the Easy View™ power adjustable headrest, designed to let you lean back and still have a primo view of the TV. Ever-so-subtle curves and stunning stitching perfect the aesthetic.

Title: Catanzaro Dual Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: Let the luxury of the Catanzaro power reclining loveseat with console carry you away. Decidedly modern, with clean-lined divided back styling, this reclining loveseat entices with a combination of genuine leather and expertly matched faux leather for a supple feel. Even when you’re kicking back you’ll still be perfectly positioned to read or watch TV thanks to the Easy View™ power adjustable headrest. And how’s this for a bonus: a convenient USB charging port located in the power control, so you can recharge while you chill.

Title: Beaconfield Power Reclining Sofa
Description: The Beaconfield power reclining sofa is made exclusively for those wanting a sumptuously comfortable recliner—that looks nothing like a recliner. Far from the usual leather/faux leather option, this power reclining sofa is wrapped in a textural chenille upholstery that’s warm and cozy. Tufted box cushions and sloped pillow top armrests lend a rich, contemporary aesthetic, while exposed feet in a dark faux wood finish are something you’d see on an armchair, not a recliner. What a fashion-forward way to kick back in style.

Title: Ricmen 3-Piece Dual Power Reclining Sectional
Description: Life is so much better when you can enjoy the pleasure of real leather—at a price to put you at ease. That’s exactly what you get with the Ricmen sectional with power. Thanks to leather match upholstery, you've got a reclining sectional that feels like a million bucks but won’t break the bank. Tailored to those with an eye for contemporary design, this power reclining sectional is dressed to impress with an upscale matte finish, clean-lined divided back tufting, distinctive jumbo stitching and chic pillow top armrests. Perhaps best of all: Easy View™ power adjustable headrests let you recline back and still have a primo view of the TV.

Title: Gerdanet Lift Top Coffee Table with Storage
Description: The Gerdanet coffee table offers a fresh take on urban style with a casual lift top design and replicated butcher block finish. The metal base elevates the table and provides open space to add a lightness to your room.

Title: Linon Whitley Antique Coffee Table
Description: Transform your living space with a coffee table that provides a perfect combination of fashion and function. The off white finish of this piece is sure to brighten up any space. In addition to its spacious table top, this piece provides two easy-glide drawers, making it easy to keep remotes organized, as well as on open bottom shelf to stow away books and magazines or display decor items of your choice.

Title: Camiburg Coffee Table
Description: Raise the bar on modern farmhouse design with the Camiburg storage coffee table. Sporting a rough-sawn wood grain effect and cross buck accents, the table's unique sliding "barn door" moves to reveal shelved storage space. Easy roll casters add a cool touch that's right on trend.

Title: Hennington Coffee Table
Description: A striking example of rustic refinement, the Hennington coffee table is generously scaled to accommodate your entertainment needs with ease. Made with pine wood and veneer beautified with a complex bisque finish, this designer coffee table includes a top with melamine inset for mixed-media interest.

Title: Chanzen Coffee Table
Description: With its urban contemporary styling, the Chanzen coffee table provides your room with a lodge-style feel that's at once warm and welcoming. The two-tone finish is an on-trend addition to your contemporary decor, while the lower shelf provides extra storage for books, magazines or your favorite accessories.

Title: Bodalli Coffee Table
Description: Contemporary style gets a modern attitude in the Bodalli coffee table. A tempered glass top showcases the replicated travertine stone shelf. The box design of the metal frame creates open space to offer the illusion of more room.

Title: Linon Blaine Coffee Table
Description: This sturdy coffee table makes itself at home in living rooms of all shapes and styles. A welcoming and versatile centerpiece, you can use its wide, smooth surface to showcase your favorite display items or serve trays of food when guests come over. The large lower shelf offers extra storage, and the crisscross sides add interest to this modern farmhouse piece. It is crafted from solid pine with an antique white finish that allows the beauty of the wood grain to show through. It also works perfectly as a media stand holding a TV, plus ample space below.

Title: Arlenbry Coffee Table with Lift Top
Description: Raise the bar on modern farmhouse design with the Arlenbry lift top coffee table. Sporting a handsome weathered oak effect and cross buck design, this table's handy spring-loaded mechanism brings the tabletop closer to you. This versatile table makes it easier than ever to eat, work or play from the comfort of your sofa.

Title: Freedan Lift Top Coffee Table with Storage
Description: Raise the bar on modern farmhouse design with the Jandoree lift top coffee table. Sporting a grayish brown replicated wood grain effect, its handy spring-loaded mechanism brings the tabletop closer to you. This versatile table makes it easier than ever to eat, work or play from the comfort of your sofa.

Title: Yarlow Tray Top Coffee Table
Description: The Yarlow rectangular coffee table offers a casual, contemporary look for modern living. This piece provides a unique tray-style design as a small space living solution. It has a replicated blackened wood finish with a grayed, textural grain for a classic look. The metal base elevates the table to create open space, adding a sense of lightness to your room.

Title: Waylowe Coffee Table
Description: Let your love of cool, contemporary style take shape with the Waylowe round coffee table. Top features exotic wood grain melamine in a light tan, natural wood coloration. Sporting an aged black finish, the tubular honeycomb metal base is buzzing with interest.

Title: Jandoree Coffee Table
Description: The Feedan coffee table is designed for the modern tastemaker. Minimalist design blends grayish brown surfaces with gunmetal gray metal legs for a look that’s cool and contemporary and a vibe that’s warm and inviting.

Title: Arlenbry Coffee Table
Description: Raise the bar on modern farmhouse design with the Arlenbry storage coffee table. Sporting a handsome weathered oak effect and cross buck accents, the table's unique sliding "barn door" moves to reveal shelved storage space. Easy roll casters add a cool touch that's right on trend.

Title: Braddoni Coffee Table
Description: If you long for more transparency, you’re sure to love the Braddoni coffee table. Pairing a clear glass tabletop with see-through acrylic legs, it’s a mastery in minimalism. Chrome-tone stretcher takes the contemporary vibe to the max.

Title: Shellmond Coffee Table With Storage
Description: The classic galvanized metal tub—with a new sense of purpose. Sporting a split lift wood top that allows for handy storage, the Shellmond round coffee table is sure to add a uniquely charming touch to your modern farmhouse.

Title: Warnerton Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Your modern living room awaits with the Warnerton power reclining sofa. Complete with practical faux leather upholstery, one-touch power controls, adjustable headrests and USB ports, it makes finding the best seat in the house a breeze. What a perk that the center seat is crafted with a drop-down table with power/USB plug-ins and dual cup holders. Armrests with storage and cup holders keep drinks, snacks and remotes close by. Go ahead—treat yourself to a high-design home theater experience, priced to put you at ease.

Title: Starbot 5-Piece Dual Power Reclining Modular Sectional
Description: Destination: chic comfort. The Starbot power reclining sectional launches your living room into superior form with stellar attention to detail. Exemplifying attainable luxury, its handsome hue has an air of sophistication you’ll long to lounge in. And when you’re done basking in the glow of its sleek style, recline with indulgent motion features to welcome head-to-toe relaxation.

Title: Francesca Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Master statement-making contemporary comfort with the Francesca power reclining sofa. It displays a striking yet streamlined profile, with auburn-hued leather match upholstery balancing natural beauty and refined design. Adjustable headrests and USB charging polish off this richly crafted piece.

Title: Garristown Dual Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: Wouldn’t it be great if the cool look of leather could be blended with the warm feel of fabric? Find a beautiful balance of contemporary style and cozy comfort in the Garristown power reclining loveseat. Sporting a sultry gray UltraPella upholstery, this chic faux leather power loveseat is empowering in every which way. The Easy View™ power headrest allows you the perfect view of the TV, even when you’re lying back. And if you’re never far from your cell phone or laptop, you’ll surely appreciate the one-touch power control with USB charging port.

Title: Windron Nesting Coffee Table (Set of 2)
Description: This space-saving design mixes metal, glass and natural marble into modern coffee tables with a contemporary edge. Designed to make the most of your space, the Windron nesting table set features one white natural marble tabletop and one inset black glass tabletop, both supported by open metal frames with black powder coated finish. With ample display surfaces, these tables make a naturally cool addition to any space.

Title: Correze 6-Piece Dual Power Reclining Modular Sectional with Console
Description: Truly putting high design into recline, the Correze power reclining sectional with gray leather match upholstery proves that just because you’re a recliner doesn’t mean you have to look like one. Deceptively beautiful, its ultra clean-lined aesthetic is as cool and contemporary as they come. Low-profile back has a super swank look. When you need more support for your head and neck, the press of a button engages the Easy View™ power adjustable headrest, designed to let you lean back and still have a primo view of the TV. Ever-so-subtle curves and stunning stitching perfect the aesthetic.

Title: Alessandro Power Recliner
Description: Impressive in scale while keeping an air of refinement, the Alessandro power recliner stuns with soft, supple leather match upholstery in garnet. Sink into the seating area and cater to your comfort with one-touch power reclining and an adjustable headrest. Complete with USB charging, this recliner makes a surefire statement in your contemporary living room.

Title: McCaskill Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Sink into the supple McCaskill reclining loveseat and prepare to be swept off your feet—literally. Its extra-wide seats and plush cushioning are divinely comfortable. It's wrapped in decadently soft leather match upholstery for a luxurious experience, saving you money without sacrificing style. Prominent stitching, linear track arms and a goes-with-anything gray hue add stylish touches. Keep beverages and remotes close at hand thanks to the center console and cup holders.

Title: Correze 3-Piece Dual Power Reclining Modular Loveseat with Console
Description: Truly putting high design into recline, the Correze power loveseat with gray leather match upholstery proves that just because you’re a recliner doesn’t mean you have to look like one. Deceptively beautiful, its ultra clean-lined aesthetic is as cool and contemporary as they come. Low-profile back has a super swank look. When you need more support for your head and neck, the press of a button engages the Easy View™ power adjustable headrest, designed to let you lean back and still have a primo view of the TV. Ever-so-subtle curves and stunning stitching perfect the aesthetic.

Title: Garristown Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Wouldn’t it be great if the cool look of leather could be blended with the warm feel of fabric? Find a beautiful balance of contemporary style and cozy comfort in the Garristown power reclining sofa. Sporting a sultry gray UltraPella fabric, this chic faux leather sofa is empowering in every which way. The Easy View™ power headrest allows you the perfect view of the TV, even when you’re lying back. And if you’re never far from your cell phone or laptop, you’ll surely appreciate the one-touch power control with USB charging port.

Title: Center Point Manual Recliner
Description: Not your father’s easy chair, the Center Point recliner brilliantly showcases the next generation of recline design. Transform game or movie night into an interactive sensory experience with the touch of a button. Built-in LED lighting lets you choose from a range of colors for a captivatingly cool vibe. Use the light control button to sync with any device within range and cycle through the colors to the beat of the bassline. Sleek faux leather with distinctive stitching enhances the form and function of this simply striking piece.

Title: Benlocke 5-Piece Manual Reclining Modular Sectional with Chaise
Description: With plush cushions and wraparound pillow top arms, the Benlocke sectional takes comfort to a whole new level. Its herringbone-patterned velvet upholstery requires minimal care, making this relaxation station ideal for homes with children and pets. The reclining feature engages with the pull of a tab, putting pleasure and instant relaxation at your fingertips.

Title: Potrol Recliner
Description: Relax. The Potrol rocker recliner indulges you in supreme comfort, conjuring images of a restful retreat that’s all yours. Accessibly neutral faux leather encourages luxurious lounging that won’t break the bank. One-pull reclining assists in ushering hours of simply stylish bliss.

Title: McCaskill Oversized Power Recliner
Description: Sink into the supple McCaskill power recliner and prepare to be swept off your feet—literally. Its extra-wide seat and plush cushioning are divinely comfortable. It's wrapped in decadently soft leather match upholstery for a luxurious experience, saving you money without sacrificing style. Prominent stitching, linear track arms and a goes-with-anything gray hue add stylish touches.

Title: Relax-R Bishop Manual Recliner
Description: There’s no better way to enjoy some downtime than in your favorite Bishop recliner. This recliner from our Relax-R™ collection is sure to be a crowd pleaser. Crafted with a solid hardwood frame, this classic design is as sleek as it is affordable. Each model has heavy tubular steel construction providing durability. It also features a 360-degree swivel, three position articulating headrest and independent reclining functions to adjust to your personal comfort. This therapeutic design will be a relaxing retreat whether it's placed in your office or in your home.

Title: Starbot 2-Piece Dual Power Reclining Modular Loveseat
Description: Destination: chic comfort. The Starbot power reclining loveseat launches your living room into superior form with stellar attention to detail. Exemplifying attainable luxury, its handsome hue has an air of sophistication you’ll long to lounge in. And when you’re done basking in the glow of its sleek style, recline with indulgent motion features to welcome head-to-toe relaxation.

Title: Haroflyn Coffee Table
Description: Showcasing a butcher block style top, the Haroflyn coffee table is a cool commingling of contemporary flair and rustic ease. Its complex gray finish is rich with tonal variation for a driftwoody element.

Title: Wynora Coffee Table
Description: Add a bright spot to your contemporary space with the Wynora coffee table. A clear glass top provides a great view of the replicated Carrara marble shelf below. A goldtone finish on the metal frame heightens the modern aesthetic.

Title: Shawnalore Coffee Table Ottoman
Description: Inspired pieces create inspired spaces. The Shawnalore ottoman coffee table charms your home with farmhouse style. White textural finish highlights the weatherworn feel of the wood tones and purposeful nail holes. Thick tufted cushion top with linen look cover is pleasingly soft. Stow away fashionable books on the planked bottom shelf.

Title: Norcastle Coffee Table
Description: The Norcastle oval coffee table deserves a toast for incorporating so many elements so seamlessly. Swirls of metal accents add a  lovely dimension under a beveled glass inset tabletop. Their fanciful pattern is echoed in the carvings and curves of the richly stained legs and stretchers.

Title: Bolanburg Lift Top Coffee Table
Description: Enjoy beautiful cottage style in the classic Bolanburg lift top coffee table. Sporting a plank-effect top and a textured two-tone finish, this coffee table blends timeworn character with modern functionality. The convenient spring-lift design creates the perfect spot for an impromptu work session, with no need to head to office for a workspace. A spacious lower shelf lends dimension to the design.

Title: Havalance Coffee Table
Description: With its richly rustic finish and textural mix, the Havalance coffee table goes to town on bygone beauty. Its distressed two-tone treatment blends a weathered gray with vintage white for an utterly charming effect. Robust legs lend a hearty, substantial look that feels right at home.

Title: Todoe Lift Top Coffee Table
Description: Mixed material lift top table truly elevates rustic-industrial style. Weather-washed pine wood and veneers are contrasted with canted metal legs and corner bracket accents for a uniquely chic merger of earthy beauty and contemporary flair. A handy spring-loaded mechanism brings the tabletop to you, while two drawers with removable storage trays are packed with possibilities.

Title: Stanah Lift Top Coffee Table
Description: Earthy, rustic character. Clean, contemporary lines. The best of both stack up beautifully in the Stanah lift top coffee table. A simple, blocky profile is enriched with a two-tone finish with deep distressing for a decidedly different aesthetic.

Title: Alymere Coffee Table with Lift Top
Description: Rich wood and rustic metal work so well together in the Alymere lift top coffee table. We love how the curvaceous shape of the table’s serpentine legs is echoed in the scrolled metal accents—for a modern-classic style that’s substantial without being heavy. This lift top table is ideal for informal dinners in front of the television, adding function to great form. A fixed shelf provides display space for your favorite whatnots while drawers keep essentials out of sight.

Title: Carynhurst Hinged Lift Top Coffee Table
Description: Double up on form and function with the Carynhurst square coffee table with storage. Its dual-lid tabletop provides easy access to the roomy storage space. Crafted with a distressed whitewash finish, crossbuck detailing and metal bracket appliques, this generously scaled coffee table is rustic farmhouse living at its best.

Title: Gately Coffee Table with Lift Top
Description: With its clean lines and ample storage space, the Gately coffee table proves you don’t have to sacrifice style for functionality. Subtle moulding adds flair, while table’s finish blends well with a variety of color schemes. Hate clutter? Store books, throws, remotes and more in table’s two drawers or two storage cubbies. Lift top reveals additional storage underneath.

Title: Realyn Coffee Table
Description: Elevating the art of traditional cottage styling, the Realyn oval coffee table is sure to serve you beautifully for years to come. Antiqued two-tone aesthetic blends a chipped white with a distressed wood finished top for added charm. Classic cabriole legs and shapely lower shelf are a lovely twist. Decorative corbels add refinement.

Title: Fridley Nesting Coffee Table (Set of 2)
Description: Beautiful to behold, the Fridley nesting coffee table set is loaded with style. Featuring an urban contemporary profile, the coffee table features a suspended drum design and a durable faux cement melamine lift top with hidden storage. Equipped with casters for easy access, the rolling trunk does double duty as serving space and storage. Perfect for mixed-use living arrangements.

Title: Wesling Coffee Table
Description: Topped with a rich, thick slab of sustainable mango wood, bathed in a light rustic finish, Wesling coffee table wows with clean-lined style and a hearty presence. Classic X-brace base with stretcher is crafted of a contrasting metal for a merge of mixed media elements and a touch of modern industrial.

Title: Grixdale Manual Reclining Loveseat
Description: The Grixdale reclining loveseat looks good and feels good, thanks to its timelessly modern design and ample cushioning. Beautiful brown leather match upholstery is an upscale addition to your family space.

Title: Dorrinson Coffee Table with Lift Top
Description: Raise the bar on modern farmhouse design with the Dorrinson lift top coffee table. Sporting a two-tone gray and antiqued white color scheme, this piece makes a statement wherever it lands. Its handy spring-loaded mechanism brings the tabletop closer to you. This versatile table makes it easier than ever to eat, work or play from the comfort of your sofa.

Title: Roman Dual Power Recliner
Description: Grounded with its umber hue, positively luxurious with a mix of real leather and expertly matched faux leather. The spacious Roman power recliner indulges you in contemporary comfort with a one-touch power control and an adjustable headrest. Its upholstery elevates your aesthetic with an eye-catching crackle effect, simultaneously amplifying the large-scale silhouette.

Title: Strikefirst Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: An exceptional winner in home fashion, the Strikefirst power reclining loveseat shows us the beauty of today’s best recliners. Bold diamond stitching on the back and seat invites you to sit and stay awhile. Real leather brings feel-good pleasure and exceptional wear, while a skillfully matched faux leather upholstery keeps luxury right on budget. When you want to get maximum relaxation, use the power adjustable headrest and extended ottoman for additional comfort. Each power control contains USB and wireless charging, plus a hidden cup holder. A zero gravity mechanism completes the luxurious design.

Title: Hoopster 6-Piece Triple Power Reclining Modular Sectional with Touchscreen Console
Description: Stylish in design and function, the Hoopster power reclining sectional with console creates a comfortable place to gather with family and friends. This sectional, upholstered in heavyweight faux leather with quilting and jumbo stitching, invites you to sink into plush opulence at an affordable price. The zero-wall power reclining mechanism features infinite positions for comfort. Conveniently plug in your devices to the USB charging station. Appealing to those with an eye for sumptuous design and high-tech features, this gunmetal gray sectional will always be a win.

Title: Starbot 6-Piece Dual Power Reclining Modular Sectional with Console
Description: Destination: chic comfort. The Starbot power reclining sectional launches your living room into superior form with stellar attention to detail. Exemplifying attainable luxury, its handsome hue has an air of sophistication you’ll long to lounge in. And when you’re done basking in the glow of its sleek style, recline with indulgent motion features to welcome head-to-toe relaxation.

Title: Riptyme Manual Swivel Glider Recliner
Description: If you agree it’s high time for better form and function from your furniture, the Riptyme swivel glider recliner with gentle rocking motion might be just your style. Indulgently comfortable yet anything but bulky, its space-conscious design pairs slimmed-down armrests with a roomy seating zone for maximum comfort.
