Rest assured, the sumptuously cushioned 41" high back is head and shoulders above the rest. Thanks to an EZ Pull tucked discreetly inside the armrest, while this faux leather chair may be a recliner, it sure doesn’t look like one.

Title: Next-Gen Gaucho 3-Piece Dual Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Modern comfort never looked so good. Sporting sloped track arms, wide, generous cushions and bustle-back stitching for high-fashion flair, the Next-Gen Gaucho power sectional is the ultimate choice in comfortably cool, contemporary style. Indulging with a suede-like faux leather that emulates nubuck leather, the sectional’s family- and pet-friendly upholstery is the stuff dreams are made of. Factor in the added perks of an Easy View™ power adjustable headrest and USB charging, and you’ve got a power reclining sectional that truly caters with style, comfort and convenience.

Title: Draycoll Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: Built for luxury, the Draycoll rocker recliner lets you kick back in reliable style. The thick, softly textured chenille upholstery provides a comfy surface on which to lounge. With bustle back construction and thickly cushioned armrests, this piece gives you the dependable support you need to unwind.

Title: Olsberg Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: Seamlessly merging classic elements with modern trends, the Olsberg recliner invites you to bring home the best of then and now. Wrapped in a fabulous steel gray upholstery with sumptuous suede-like feel, this easy-elegant reclining chair is dressed to impress with updated roll arm styling and tailored touches including nailhead trim and window pane stitching.

Title: Coombs Oversized Power Recliner
Description: The Coombs wide seat power recliner makes it hip to be square. Brilliantly boxy profile and wide track arms infuse a highly contemporary look you don’t often find in reclining furniture. Rest assured, the trendy charcoal-tone upholstery is sumptuously soft—and made all the more enticing with deep channel tufting for clean-lined flair. The one-touch power control even includes a USB port to keep devices charged while you unplug.

Title: Willamen Recliner
Description: The Willamen rocker recliner is sure to be the most popular seat in the house. With the rich-yet-affordable look and feel of faux leather, it invites attention and is right at home in a variety of design styles and color schemes. Jumbo stitching adds the finishing touch to a handsome piece that is just waiting for some of your time.

Title: Tambo Manual Recliner
Description: With plush cushions and angled pillow top arms, the Tambo rocker recliner takes comfort to a whole new level. Faux vintage leather requires minimal care, making this piece ideal in homes with children and pets. The seat reclines with the pull of a tab, putting total relaxation at your fingertips.

Title: Workhorse Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: Saddle up for affordably priced luxury with the Workhorse rocker recliner. Stylish elements of this contemporary recliner include biscuit back cushioning and incredibly thick and sumptuous pillow top armrests. Ultra neutral and wonderfully plush, the warm taupe upholstery is sure to complement an endless array of color schemes.

Title: Kincord Manual Recliner
Description: Ultra cool, ultra contemporary and ultra comfortable, the Kincord rocker recliner sports a fabulous faux leather enhanced with jumbo stitching for fashion-forward flair. “Divided” cushion design on the back and footrest is indulgent yet anything but bulky. Scooped sides give the pillow top armrests that much more allure.

Title: Altari Manual Recliner
Description: If style is the question, then the Altari rocker recliner is the answer. Clean-lined profile is beautifully contemporary. Plush chenille fabric and plump cushioning make it so easy to comfortably kick up your heels. Richly neutral hue complements a variety of decor.

Title: Nallynx Coffee Table
Description: Make your living room a more open and clean space with the Nallynx clear glass, metal and acrylic coffee table. The contemporary design, mixed media and clear glass tabletop are sure to match any modern or contemporary sofas, sectionals or futons you already have.

Title: Kegler Recliner
Description: Prioritize comfort while still making a versatile style statement. Complementing a variety of color schemes, the Kegler rocker recliner's supremely plush seating lines you up for hours of leisure. Its one-pull reclining motion places you in optimal TV watching and naptime positions. If you’re reaching for a relaxed living room atmosphere, this chair is ready to provide.

Title: Tyler Creek Coffee Table with Lift Top
Description: Shabby chic with a hint of down home country. The Tyler Creek lift top coffee table with textured black finish is all the talk of today’s design world. Wood grain shows through the weathered gray-brown top in all of its earthy pleasure. Framed drawers are adorned with lovely traditional hardware. Smooth-gliding drawers make it easy for you to store away your belongings in style. Lift top transforms your space into a workstation without a hitch.

Title: Valebeck Coffee Table with Lift Top
Description: To those with an eye for the best in rustic farmhouse living, the two-tone Valebeck square coffee table doubles up on form and function. Clever split style design pairs a spring lift top with hinged lid revealing a handy storage compartment. Designer touches include plank-effect styling, distress marks and industrial brackets for added character.

Title: Carynhurst Lift Top Coffee Table
Description: Unlock a quaint touch of farmhouse style and convenience in your living area with the Carynhurst lift top coffee table. Its design is inspired by the rugged looks of an antique storage trunk. Metal keyhole and bracket accents with rivets, a planked effect and large recessed bun feet dress up this charming piece. The distressed light gray finish enhances the wood's natural grain, which delivers a naturally aged feel. You’ll love its generous scale, offering a roomy top that's ideal for displaying accents and more. Lift the top and enjoy the accommodating work or dining surface. Under the lift top, there's a fully finished storage area—deeply spacious for organization.

Title: Shawnalore Coffee Table
Description: With its distinctive whitewash finish, plank-effect styling and distressed touches that lend a reclaimed sensibility, the Shawnalore coffee table serves up a delightful twist on farmhouse style. Crafted with solid pine wood, this rustically refined coffee table is sure to satisfy for years to come.

Title: Bayflynn Lift Top Coffee Table with Storage
Description: If you’re going for a simply striking addition to your space, the Bayflynn lift-top coffee table really makes a statement, creating an openly elegant place to showcase your style. With its replicated vintage barn wood effect in a subtly whitewashed color tone, this piece is decidedly understated yet rich with character. Lift-top design with hidden storage trays gives it just enough flair.

Title: Wystfield Coffee Table with Lift Top
Description: Double take. Sporting a two-tone finish, dual-sided lid design and expansive storage space, the Wystfield square coffee table takes the art of rustic farmhouse living to a new level. Designer touches include plank-effect styling, heavy distressing and industrial bracket hardware.

Title: Charzine Coffee Table
Description: Blending a sleek, geometric design and a warm wood finish, the Charzine contemporary coffee table feels right at home in so many different living spaces.

Title: Waltleigh Coffee Table
Description: The clean-cut profile of the Waltleigh coffee table works equally well in casual and contemporary settings. A distressed brown finish highlights the rich wood grain for a warmly weathered appeal. Dress up the wood table with decor on the lower shelf to suit your style needs.

Title: Derrylin Lift Top Coffee Table
Description: Reinvented for the here and now, the Derrylin lift-top coffee table rocks a vintage industrial design with a traditional vibe. Its metal accent trim and bronze-tone metal base are ready to embrace the modern demands of everyday life. Two spacious storage bins provide additional storage, while the center lift top transforms into a casual work center or extra dining space when needed.

Title: Cariton Coffee Table
Description: Oversized yet far from overdone, the Cariton coffee table masters the art of simplicity. Bold, blocky profile is enriched with plank-effect styling and a textured grayish brown finish for a look that’s cool and contemporary and a vibe that’s warm and inviting. Its generous scale makes it a natural complement for spacious sectionals.

Title: Aldwin Coffee Table With Storage
Description: Double up on form and function with the Aldwin square coffee table with storage. Its dual lid tabletop provides easy access to the roomy storage space. Crafted with solid pine wood treated to a weathered gray finish, this generously scaled coffee table is rustic farmhouse living at its best.

Title: Ballinasloe Manual Recliner
Description: A mastery in less is more, the Ballinasloe rocker recliner manages to make cool, contemporary design so warm and cozy. A new twist on neutral, the recliner’s soothing “smoky” gray upholstery is incredibly plush to the touch. Curved divided back and deeply tufted footrest give the clean-lined profile a sense of sumptuousness impossible to resist.

Title: Wystfield Coffee Table
Description: The Wystfield coffee table is expertly crafted with a distressed vintage white finish and contrasting aged natural pine tabletop. This generously sized coffee table combines a look you'll love with the storage you need. Sliding barn doors on both sides hide easy-access storage cubbies perfect for magazines, throws, board games and more. An open shelf in the middle provides more storage or room for decorative items. This attractive table blends rustic and natural style while lending a unique feel to your home.

Title: Chasewood Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: You've been looking for a piece that rests and restores after a hectic day, all while elevating your living room aesthetic. Enter the Chasewood power reclining loveseat. Casually cool with contemporary bustle-back construction, it has a broad appeal thanks to an on-trend dark gray hue. Leather match upholstery provides high-style living at a price you're sure to enjoy.

Title: Starbot 3-Piece Dual Power Reclining Modular Sofa
Description: Destination: chic comfort. The Starbot power reclining sofa launches your living room into superior form with stellar attention to detail. Exemplifying attainable luxury, its handsome hue has an air of sophistication you’ll long to lounge in. And when you’re done basking in the glow of its sleek style, recline with indulgent motion features to welcome head-to-toe relaxation.

Title: Center Point Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Not your father's easy chair, the Center Point reclining loveseat with console brilliantly showcases the next generation of recline design. Transform game or movie night into an interactive sensory experience with the touch of a button. Built-in LED lighting lets you choose from a range of colors for a captivatingly cool vibe. Use the light control button to sync with any device within range and cycle through the colors to the beat of the bassline. Sleek faux leather with distinctive stitching enhances the form and function of this simply striking piece.

Title: Woodsway Manual Reclining Loveseat
Description: Twice the style, twice the comfort. Lounge in the casual luxury of the two-tone Woodsway reclining loveseat. Pillow top armrests and a modernized bustle back pamper with the plushness you crave, while the pull tab reclining motion leaves you relaxed and rested.

Title: The Man-Den Triple Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Reserved for him and made for her, The Man-Den power reclining loveseat in gray delivers all the comfort and style you could ask for. Inspired by sports car interiors, the leather match upholstery has a “perforated automotive” treatment for that much more appeal. Positioned at your fingertips, the advanced one-touch power control puts you in the driver’s seat with everything from an Easy View™ power headrest and power lumbar support, to a USB port and wireless charging for your phone. Talk about fully loaded. And with integrated cup holders and hidden storage compartments under the posh, padded armrests, this designer power reclining loveseat makes the most of every inch of space.

Title: Bolanburg Coffee Table with Lift Top
Description: Store, serve and showcase your favorite things with the Bolanburg lift top coffee table. Its textured antique white finish creates a vintage two-tone look that will endure for years.

Title: Center Line 3-Piece Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: For those seeking to curate a living room retreat that offers superior comfort and a contemporary aesthetic, the sleekly designed Center Line power reclining loveseat with console will become your favorite source of at-home serenity. Rest on leather match upholstery, and use the one-touch power control to recline and adjust the headrests with ease. As you recharge after a long day, your devices can too with USB charging. This loveseat is visually enticing in a stunning cream color, with slope track arms and stitched detailing on the back to enhance its modern appeal.

Title: Francesca Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Master statement-making contemporary comfort with the Francesca power reclining loveseat. It displays a striking yet streamlined profile, with auburn-hued leather match upholstery balancing natural beauty and refined design. Adjustable headrests and USB charging polish off this richly crafted piece.

Title: Next-Gen DuraPella Dual Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: It’s time to rethink the way you relax—and time to experience the joys of the Next-Gen DuraPella power reclining loveseat. Taking a fashion-forward approach to the art of relaxation, the loveseat—with a one-touch power control and an energy-efficient USB plug-in—will elevate your style and raise your standard of living. Its zero-gravity mechanism lifts the ottoman higher than traditional recliners to improve circulation. And talk about low maintenance. This designer recliner is wrapped in durable, water-repellent upholstery that's family- and pet-friendly.

Title: Welota Manual Reclining Loveseat
Description: Embrace contemporary comfort with the Welota reclining loveseat. Its richly neutral upholstery and no-fuss design give a new meaning to relaxed refinement. A double bustle back and curved armrests round out the look.

Title: Huddle-Up Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: How can you not cuddle up in the decadently plush Huddle-Up rocker recliner? Spicing things up in a warm and earthy nutmeg brown, this richly styled recliner is covered in a heavyweight padded velvet upholstery for a sense of luxury. Distinctive elements include wraparound padded armrests for a cool twist.

Title: Darcy Manual Recliner
Description: Talk about fine lines and great curves. That’s the beauty of the Darcy rocker recliner—made to suit your appreciation for clean, contemporary style. Comfy pillow top armrests, designer tailoring and an ultra-soft upholstery that holds up to everyday living complete this fashion statement.

Title: Benndale Power Recliner
Description: For those with a penchant for refined relaxation, the Benndale power recliner delivers modern functionality in streamlined style. Immerse yourself in your favorite film or game with a built-in audio system while LED lighting sets the mood. Storage armrests corral your comfort essentials, with charging features to keep your electronics close by. And when it’s time to leave your sleek seating sanctuary, memory programmable positions allow you to pick up right where you left off.

Title: Wittlich Manual Swivel Glider Recliner
Description: You and plush cushions are two peas in a pod. That’s why the Wittlich swivel glider recliner will quickly find its way to your heart. Chenille fabric feels so good, you’ll never want to take your hands off of it. Track arms elevate the look with a touch of contemporary sensibility. Ease back into relaxation on the deep seating with one easy pull. Complete with 360-degree swivel, this recliner sets the bar for comfort.

Title: Woodsway Manual Swivel Glider Recliner
Description: Twice the style, twice the comfort. Lounge in the casual luxury of the two-tone Woodsway swivel glider recliner. Pillow top armrests and a modernized bustle back pamper with the plushness you crave, while the gentle swivel, gliding motion relaxes and keeps you in the flow of conversation.

Title: Hermiston Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: Tempting you to the pleasure of leather match upholstery—the Hermiston rocker recliner in walnut brown rocks a great look and feel at a comfortable price. A simple divided back design, wrapped pillow top armrests and trendy jumbo contrast stitching keep the aesthetic cool and contemporary, while still providing such a cozy experience.

Title: Miravel Recliner
Description: Marvel at the beauty of a subtle showstopper. The Miravel rocker recliner appeals to those with a uniquely chic eye for comfort pieces. Its personality is one of playful simplicity, with amply cushioned arms softening the structured silhouette. One-pull reclining adds a layer of function to the fashionable piece. Whether in casual, contemporary or eclectic spaces, this recliner's on-trend styling makes an impression.

Title: Ludden Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: An “easy chair" that’s wonderfully easy on the body and the budget. Ludden recliner delights the senses with ultra plush upholstery in a handsomely textured twill. Divided bustle design and puckered stitching meld comfort and style. Ample pillow top armrests make it an all-the-more restful place to unwind.

Title: McTeer Power Recliner
Description: If you’ve got a penchant for simple, contemporary beauty, the McTeer power recliner has your name written all over it. One-touch power control means any position is yours – whether fully reclined or sitting upright. The pillow top arms and back cushion surround your body in luxurious, plush chenille that’s irresistible to the touch. Mocha colored upholstery makes it easy to match with other modern decor for a fashionable and comfortable space.

Title: Wurstrow Triple Power Recliner
Description: Big and bold, the Wurstrow power recliner with Easy View™ power adjustable headrest delivers comfort at the touch of a button. Easily position the recliner, its headrest and lumbar support to your liking for maximum comfort. Plus, with the convenient USB charging port, a cell phone or laptop can be charged without having to get up. Real leather is paired with expertly matched faux leather to level up affordable luxury. The detailing on the umber-colored upholstery creates a rustic look—perfect for your modern or casual setting.

Title: Larkinhurst Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: Dramatically transform your living space with the rustic look of weathered leather you love—at a fraction of the cost. That’s the beauty of the Larkinhurst faux leather rocker recliner. Washed in earthy Southwestern tones, with overstuffed back pillow support, jumbo window-pane stitching and gentle rocking motion, it envelops you in comfort and quality. Classic roll arms bring in just enough of a traditional touch.

Title: Montiflyn Coffee Table
Description: Add a natural spin with a modern vibe to your living space with the Montiflyn coffee table. Its top captivates with a distressed vintage white finish. Featuring a dynamically layered base in a light goldtone, this table epitomizes contemporary style. With striking character, it's sure to garner attention.

Title: McClelland Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: Large-scale comfort is yours with the McClelland power reclining loveseat. With supreme padding and plush upholstery it's the hero for ultimate relaxation. The extra-wide seating gives you plenty of room to sit back, kick up your heels and enjoy.

Title: McAdoo Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Don't simply make do with your living room furniture. Embrace contemporary comfort with the McAdoo power reclining sofa. It brings a new meaning to relaxed refinement, with caramel faux leather upholstery making a subtle-but-striking style statement. Cozy yet curated in design, this sleek loveseat is sure to become your favorite spot to unwind.

Title: Card Player Dual Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: You can bet on turning heads while delivering superior comfort with the Card Player power reclining loveseat. Its sleek cappuccino-hued upholstery is an ace when it comes to contemporary style. An extended zero-gravity ottoman ups the ante on at-home relaxation. Topped off with a heated seat and massage function, you’ll be all-in on this recliner.

Title: Drakestone Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: Intensify comfort in style with the Drakestone rocker recliner. Simply pull the chair lever to recline and with the hand-held remote, heat the seat and put on the massage. Enjoy the super plush feel of the tufted upholstery and pillow top armrests—what a way to unwind and relax.

Title: Ballister Power Lift Recliner
Description: Take charge of your seating with the Ballister power lift recliner. Its easy power button motion control allows you the full spectrum of comfort—from a gentle lift-and-tilt for standing up to a lay flat design ideal for an afternoon snooze. Not much gets past the power adjustable headrest and lumbar support, or even the independent motor controls to get that just right position. You’ll always stay connected with the included USB charging port in the power control, and relish in the hours of versatile support that never stops giving.

Title: Woodsway Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: Twice the style, twice the comfort. Lounge in the casual luxury of the two-tone Woodsway reclining sofa. Pillow top armrests and a modernized bustle back pamper with the plushness you crave, while the pull tab reclining motion leaves you relaxed and rested.

Title: Ricmen Oversized Dual Power Recliner
Description: Life is so much better when you can enjoy the pleasure of real leather—at a price to put you at ease. That’s exactly what you get with the Ricmen wide seat power recliner. Thanks to leather match upholstery, you've got a recliner that feels like a million bucks but won’t break the bank. Tailored to suit those with an eye for contemporary design, this power recliner is dressed to impress with an upscale matte finish, clean-lined divided back tufting, distinctive jumbo stitching and chic pillow top armrests. Perhaps best of all: an Easy View™ power adjustable headrest lets you recline back and still have a primo view of the TV.

Title: The Man-Den Triple Power Recliner
Description: Reserved for him and made for her, The Man-Den power recliner in gray delivers all the comfort and style you could ask for. Inspired by sports car interiors, the leather match upholstery has a “perforated automotive” treatment for that much more appeal. Positioned at your fingertips, the advanced one-touch power control puts you in the driver’s seat with everything from an Easy View™ power headrest and power lumbar support, to a USB port and wireless charging for your phone. And with an integrated cup holder and hidden storage compartments under the posh, padded armrests, this designer power recliner makes the most of every inch of space.

Title: Draycoll Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Built for luxury, the Draycoll power reclining sofa lets you kick back in reliable style. The thick, softly textured chenille upholstery provides a comfy surface on which to lounge. With bustle back construction and thickly cushioned armrests, this piece gives you the dependable support you need to unwind while the handy USB port provides the power to keep your devices going.

Title: Hartsdale 3-Piece Power Reclining Modular Loveseat with Console
Description: Fit for the comfort seeker in your household, the Hartsdale power sectional has that casual contemporary sensibility you love. Pillow top cushions with a feather-fiber blend are simply sumptuous. Chic and subtle chenille microfiber upholstery weaves in so much style.

Title: Stoneland Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: For those that love the cool look of leather but long for the warm feel of fabric, the Stoneland rocker recliner delivers both with ease. Its high-performance padded faux leather is remarkably durable and easy to clean, just the thing for family spaces. Channel-stitched back cushions provide indulgent lumbar support for maximum comfort—not to mention fashion-forward flair.

Title: Draycoll Power Recliner
Description: Built for luxury, the Draycoll power rocker recliner lets you kick back in reliable style. The thick, softly textured chenille upholstery provides a comfy surface on which to lounge. With bustle back construction and thickly cushioned armrests, this piece gives you the dependable, powered support you need to unwind while the handy USB port provides the power to keep your devices going.

Title: Coombs Oversized Manual Recliner
Description: The Coombs wide seat recliner makes it hip to be square. Brilliantly boxy profile and wide track arms infuse a highly contemporary look you don’t often find in reclining furniture. Rest assured, the trendy charcoal-tone upholstery is sumptuously soft—and made all the more enticing with deep channel tufting for clean-lined flair.

Title: Battleville Dual Power Recliner
Description: Double down on sleek style with the Battleville power recliner. It has a streamlined, space-conscious appeal, with two-tone upholstery in neutral hues creating subtly striking visual intrigue. And with one-touch reclining, an adjustable headrest and wireless charging, this piece combines contemporary function and fashion into a single clean-lined design.

Title: Francesca Power Recliner
Description: Master statement-making contemporary comfort with the Francesca power recliner. It displays a striking yet streamlined profile, with auburn-hued leather match upholstery balancing natural beauty and refined design. An adjustable headrest and USB charging polish off this richly crafted piece.

Title: Calderwell Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: Sleek and streamlined, the Calderwell rocker recliner draws out your leisure time with its bustle back construction and thickly cushioned armrests. The super soft faux leather gets a high-end tweak with jumbo contrast stitching so you don’t have to sacrifice style for comfort. Sink into the comfortably supportive cushions and stretch your evening as long as you can.

Title: StarLine Cadence Manual Recliner and Ottoman
Description: This European-styled recliner and ottoman features a swiveling recliner that feels like it was custom-made for you. The recliner has the ideal amount of support, with an adjustable recline degree for your comfort needs. Perfect for long naps or resting and backed by quality, you can buy this comfortable chair with confidence.

Title: Stoneland Power Recliner
Description: For those that love the cool look of leather but long for the warm feel of fabric, the Stoneland power rocker recliner delivers both with ease. Its high-performance padded faux leather is remarkably durable and easy to clean, just the thing for family spaces. When it’s time to relax, the one-touch power control puts the perfect position at your fingertips. Channel-stitched back cushions provide indulgent lumbar support for maximum seating comfort—not to mention fashion-forward flair.

Title: Jesolo Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: Rustic character comes forth in the dark gray Jesolo rocker recliner. Designer stitching adds a fashion-forward touch to the soft cushions. Faux suede fabric speaks to your knack for superior-quality materials. High back provides ample support as you get off your feet for a bit. With just one pull of tab, you’ll be easing back into relaxation. Infinite levels of comfort await.

Title: Beaconfield Oversized Power Recliner
Description: The Beaconfield zero wall power recliner is made exclusively for those wanting a sumptuously comfortable recliner—that looks nothing like a recliner. Far from the usual leather/faux leather option, this power recliner is wrapped in a textural chenille upholstery that’s warm and cozy. Tufted box cushions and sloped pillow top armrests lend a rich, contemporary aesthetic, while exposed feet in a dark faux wood finish are something you’d see on an armchair, not a recliner. What a fashion-forward way to kick back in style.

Title: Mancin Manual Recliner
Description: The Mancin zero-wall recliner satisfies your high level of taste and yearning for comfort. The storage arms and plushly pillowed high back and seat are covered in a richly textured faux leather with diamond stitch quilting. Plus, built-in cup holders keep beverages close at hand. If space is a consideration, rest assured—this smart-design piece needs minimal clearance from the wall to fully recline.

Title: Warrior Fortress Power Recliner
Description: Inspired by luxury car interiors, the Warrior Fortress power rocker recliner puts you in the driver’s seat like never before. Its matte faux leather upholstery and padded details are enriched with heavyweight baseball stitching for a chic, sporty aesthetic. An oversized headrest pillow and high back profile take the experience over the top.

Title: Partymate Recliner
Description: Affordable luxury made easy. The Partymate recliner is an essential for living room lounging. Its warm brown faux leather is well-suited for mixing and matching with your existing pieces. Pull tab reclining keeps you covered when it comes to comfort. And this functional piece is equally as fashionable, with design details like a channel-stitched back incorporating subtle visual interest.

Title: Mabton 3-Piece Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: The challenge: design a cutting-edge power reclining sofa you’d never guess was a recliner. Super sleek and streamlined, the Mabton sectional sofa, in taupe gray with high-contrast jumbo stitching, might just be our best-kept secret. Rest assured, you’d be hard-pressed to find seating that looks so high end yet is so comfortably priced. Integrated elements include an Easy View™ adjustable headrest, which offers low-profile style when it’s down and a high level of comfort when you’re kicking back and reclining. Factor in one-touch power controls (each with a USB port) placed on the inside track arm, and you have the makings for one beautifully deceptive sectional.

Title: Next-Gen DuraPella Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: It’s time to rethink the way you relax—and time to experience the joys of the Next-Gen DuraPella power reclining sofa. Taking a fashion-forward approach to the art of relaxation, the sofa—with a one-touch power control and an energy-efficient USB plug-in—will elevate your style and raise your standard of living. Its zero-gravity mechanism lifts the ottoman higher than traditional recliners to improve circulation. And talk about low maintenance. This designer recliner is wrapped in durable, water-repellent upholstery that's family- and pet-friendly.

Title: Bladen Manual Recliner
Description: If you love the cool look of leather but long for the warm feel of fabric, you’ll find the Bladen rocker recliner fits the bill beautifully. Rest assured, the textural, multi-tonal upholstery is rich with character and interest—while plush, pillowy cushions merge comfort and support with a high-style design.

Title: Center Line 3-Piece Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: For those seeking to curate a living room retreat that offers superior comfort and a contemporary aesthetic, the Center Line sleekly designed power reclining sectional will become your favorite source of at-home serenity. Rest on leather match upholstery, and use the one-touch power control to recline and adjust the headrests with ease. As you recharge after a long day, your devices can too with USB charging. This sectional is visually enticing in a luxe dark gray, with slope track arms and stitched detailing on the back to enhance its modern appeal.

Title: Tulen Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: The Tulen reclining sofa puts the win in winning. Its waterfall back design and doubly plump pillow top arms team up with soft chenille fabric to go for the goal. Ample seating room makes the comfort possibilities endless. Sit back and relax. You won’t go wrong with this reclining loveseat.

Title: Starbot 3-Piece Dual Power Reclining Modular Loveseat with Console
Description: Destination: chic comfort. The Starbot power reclining loveseat with console launches your living room into superior form with stellar attention to detail. Exemplifying attainable luxury, its handsome hue has an air of sophistication you’ll long to lounge in. And when you’re done basking in the glow of its sleek style, recline with indulgent motion features to welcome head-to-toe relaxation.

Title: Owner's Box Dual Power Recliner
Description: When it comes to style, you’ve got game. Rest assured, the Owner’s Box power recliner is sure to win you over with its ultra-cool looks and major league features. Showcasing all the bells and whistles, this designer recliner is inspired by sports car interiors—with a fabulous faux leather accentuated with horizontal channel tufting. An advanced one-touch power control with an Easy View™ power headrest puts you in the driver’s seat. Dual cup holders and armrests with hidden storage take the form and function to another level.

Title: Center Line 6-Piece Power Reclining Sectional
Description: For those seeking to curate a living room retreat that offers superior comfort and a contemporary aesthetic, the sleekly designed Center Line power reclining sectional will become your favorite source of at-home serenity. Rest on leather match upholstery, and use the one-touch power control to recline and adjust the headrests with ease. As you recharge after a long day, your devices can too with USB charging. This sectional is visually enticing in a stunning cream color, with slope track arms and stitched detailing on the back to enhance its modern appeal.

Title: HyllMont Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: The Hyllmont power reclining sofa in trendy gray is proof of just how far recliners have come when it comes to form and function. Ultra cool and contemporary, this fully loaded power reclining sofa makes it so easy to social distance and make home your haven. Dressed to impress with diamond stitching inspired by sports car interiors, this reclining sofa is covered in a fabulous faux leather with pebbled effect for authenticity. High-tech advancements include a one-touch power control with Easy View™ adjustable headrest and USB plug-in and a drop-down table with cup holders, flip-up light and AC power/USB plug-ins.

Title: Game Zone Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: If you’re looking for the perfect seat for gaming, lounging or just relaxing, look no further than the indulgent comfort of the Game Zone power reclining sofa. Sporting one-touch power controls, Easy View™ power adjustable headrests, cup holders, storage and chargers, this dual-sided reclining sofa has everything you need for binge-watching or power playing. Padded cushions with waterfall back design and pillow top arms offer plenty of support, while leather alternative upholstery is given tuck and roll styling for a well-edited aesthetic. The stationary middle seat has hidden depths, just fold it forward to reveal a table-top with cup holders, USB charging a storage pocket and overhead lights. How’s that for handy?

Title: Ernestine Power Lift Recliner
Description: The next generation of recliners has arrived in fine style. Beyond its perfectly placed pillow support and sumptuous chenille-feel upholstery, the Ernestine power lift recliner with dual motor design takes custom comfort to a new level. With the touch of a button, its power lift feature gently eases you from the ultimate slumber into a lift-and-tilt position to get you back on your feet, effortlessly.

Title: Kempten Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: You don’t just want to recline. You want to recline in high design. Wrapped in a fabulous black faux leather upholstery, the Kempten rocker recliner with 42" high back is everything you long for—and then some. Ultra clean lines, subtle curves and sumptuous comfort make it a sight for sore eyes and tired muscles. Here’s the showstopper: ambient blue LED lighting along the chair base for a movie theater experience enjoyed from the convenience of home.

Title: Draycoll Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: Built for luxury, the Draycoll reclining sofa lets you kick back in reliable style. The thick, softly textured chenille upholstery provides a comfy surface on which to lounge. With bustle back construction and thickly cushioned armrests, this piece gives you the dependable support you need to unwind after a trying day.

Title: Catanzaro Dual Power Recliner
Description: Let the luxury of the Catanzaro power recliner with adjustable headrest carry you away. Decidedly modern, with clean-lined divided back styling, this power recliner entices with a combination of genuine leather and expertly matched faux leather for a supple feel. Even when you’re kicking back you’ll still be perfectly positioned to read or watch TV thanks to the Easy View™ power adjustable headrest. And how’s this for a bonus: a convenient USB charging port located in the power control, so you can recharge while you chill.

Title: Composer Dual Power Recliner
Description: Movie nights will be forever changed with the Composer power recliner. The adjustable Easy View™ headrest allows a primo view of the TV no matter how far back you recline and the extended ottoman provides extra room to really stretch out. Ultra-cool lattice stitching elevates the look and ambient LED lighting completes the theater-style experience. So relax, kick off your shoes and enjoy the show.

Title: HyllMont Dual Power Recliner
Description: The Hyllmont power recliner in weathered gray is proof of just how far recliners have come when it comes to form and function. Ultra cool and contemporary, this fully loaded power recliner makes it so easy to social distance and make home your haven. Dressed to impress with diamond stitching inspired by sports car interiors, this recliner is covered in a fabulous faux leather with pebbled effect for authenticity. High-tech advancements include a one-touch power control with Easy View™ adjustable headrest and USB plug-in. Hidden storage compartments in the armrests are a welcome touch.

Title: Warlin Dual Power Recliner
Description: With its decidedly contemporary styling, the Warlin power recliner has a sleek sensibility that seamlessly elevates your living room's style. Explore endless possibilities for comfort with its one-touch power control, zero-gravity reclining and adjustable headrests. A triple-tier back and chic black upholstery round out this simply stunning piece.

Title: Next-Gen Gaucho Dual Power Recliner
Description: Modern comfort never looked so good. Sporting sloped track arms, wide, generous cushions and bustle-back stitching for high-fashion flair, the Next-Gen Gaucho power recliner is the ultimate choice in comfortably cool, contemporary style. Indulging with a suede-like faux leather that emulates nubuck leather, the recliner’s family- and pet-friendly upholstery is the stuff dreams are made of. Factor in the added perks of an Easy View™ power adjustable headrest and USB charging, and you’ve got a power recliner that truly caters with style, comfort and convenience.

Title: Game Zone Dual Power Recliner
Description: If you’re looking for the perfect seat for gaming, lounging or just relaxing, look no further than the indulgent comfort of the Game Zone power recliner. Sporting one-touch power controls, an Easy View™ power adjustable headrest, cup holders, storage and chargers, it has everything you need for binge-watching or power playing. Padded cushions with waterfall back design and pillow top arms offer plenty of support, while leather alternative upholstery is given tuck and roll styling for a well-edited aesthetic.

Title: Texline Dual Power Recliner
Description: Truly putting high design into recline, the Texline recliner in gray leather match upholstery proves that just because you’re a recliner doesn’t mean you have to look like one. Deceptively beautiful, its ultra clean-lined aesthetic is as cool and contemporary as they come. The low-profile back has a super swank look. When you need more support for your head and neck, the press of a button engages the Easy View™ power adjustable headrest, designed to let you lean back and still have a primo view of the TV. To save space, the zero wall design requires minimal space between wall and chair back. Indulgent pillow top seating gives an added layer of comfort.

Title: Jesolo Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: Rustic character comes forth in the dark gray Jesolo reclining sofa. Designer stitching adds a fashion-forward touch to the soft cushions. Faux suede fabric speaks to your knack for superior-quality materials. High back provides ample support as you get off your feet for a bit. With just one pull of tab, you’ll be easing back into relaxation. Infinite levels of comfort await.

Title: Rowlett Triple Power Recliner
Description: Inspired by luxury automotive interiors, the Rowlett power recliner is just where you want to be when it’s time to downshift for the day. Loaded with comfort and streamlined for high style, this decidedly modern power recliner in fashion-forward faux leather cradles you from head to toe. The one-touch power control puts comfort—and convenience—at your fingertips with features including an Easy View™ adjustable headrest, power lumbar support and zero draw USB plug-in for energy efficiency. And how’s this for a nice surprise: hidden cup holders (with magnetic locking system) to maximize the minimalism of this sleek recliner.

Title: Mitchiner Manual Reclining Sofa with Drop Down Table
Description: Your to-do list is complete, now it’s time for ultimate relaxation. This double reclining sofa is plush in all the right places, and will support you longer than you can binge watch your favorite TV show. The neutral upholstery is ready for a patterned throw pillow and some of your time. The middle seat’s back drops down into convenient table top with cup holders, the perfect resting spot for tablets and magazines.

Title: The Man-Den Triple Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Reserved for him and made for her, The Man-Den power reclining sofa in gray delivers all the comfort and style you could ask for. Inspired by sports car interiors, the leather match upholstery has a “perforated automotive” treatment for that much more appeal. Positioned at your fingertips, the advanced one-touch power control puts you in the driver’s seat with everything from an Easy View™ power headrest and power lumbar support, to a USB port and wireless charging for your phone. Talk about fully loaded. The middle seat reveals a pull-down table with dimmable reading lights and cup holders. And with integrated cup holders and hidden storage compartments under the posh, padded armrests, this designer power reclining sofa makes the most of every inch of space.

Title: Strikefirst Power Reclining Sofa
Description: An exceptional winner in home fashion, the Strikefirst power reclining sofa shows us the beauty of today’s best recliners. Bold diamond stitching on the back and seat invites you to sit and stay awhile. Real leather brings feel-good pleasure and exceptional wear, while a skillfully matched faux leather upholstery keeps luxury right on budget. Enjoy hidden cup holders and plenty of storage, as well as a drop-down table. When you want to get maximum relaxation, use the power adjustable headrest and extended ottoman for additional comfort. Each power control contains USB and wireless charging, plus a hidden cup holder. A zero gravity mechanism completes the luxurious design.

Title: Owner's Box Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: When it comes to style, you’ve got game. Rest assured, the Owner’s Box power reclining sofa is sure to win you over with its ultra-cool looks and major league features. Showcasing all the bells and whistles, this designer reclining sofa is inspired by sports car interiors—with a fabulous faux leather accentuated with horizonal channel tufting. An advanced one-touch power control with an Easy View™ power headrest puts you in the driver’s seat. Dual cup holders and armrests with hidden storage take the form and function to another level, while a middle seat with drop-down table, cup holders and docking station cater to your every want and need.

Title: Enouvation E10 Wireless Power Pack for Recliners (App Included)
Description: At 10,000 mAh, the Enouvation E10 Power Pack offers a large power capacity in a small footprint, providing up to 2,000 motorized functions on a single charge. It's the most efficient power pack in the industry for power motion furniture, with more power at a fraction of the size. It includes an LED Power Indicator and interactive low power alert, in addition to its own charger. Take advantage of the optional Remote Power Management features by using the Entelligent App to quickly visualize your pack's power level, review charging history, receive low power alerts plus recharge reminders and shut off power remotely to conserve power when your pack is not in use.

Title: Bladewood Manual Recliner
Description: Make a big impression in a smaller footprint with the chic styling of the Bladewood zero wall recliner. Thanks to its space-conscious design that requires a mere three inches between the wall and chair back, you can stretch out more efficiently. Wrapped in a fabulous faux leather loaded with pebbly texture and tonal variation that looks so natural, this designer recliner sports contoured tufting and contrasting baseball stitching for a style home run.

Title: Card Player Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: You can bet on turning heads while delivering superior comfort with the Card Player power reclining sofa. Its sleek cappuccino-hued upholstery is an ace when it comes to contemporary style. An extended zero-gravity ottoman ups the ante on at-home relaxation. Topped off with a heated seat and massage function, you’ll be all-in on this recliner.

Title: Boerna Dual Power Recliner
Description: Power up with the ultra-modern Boerna power recliner. Inspired by sports car interiors, the seating area is covered in real leather for your pleasure. An advanced one-touch power control puts everything at your fingertips, including an Easy View™ power headrest, USB port and wireless charging for your phone. If that’s not enough, how does this sound? Integrated wireless speakers, armrests with storage, and pull-out compartments to keep cup holders out of sight yet right at hand.

Title: Tambo 2-Piece Manual Reclining Sectional
Description: With plush cushions and wraparound pillow top arms, the Tambo sectional takes comfort to a whole new level. Faux vintage leather requires minimal care, making this relaxation station ideal in homes with children and pets. Reclining feature engages with the pull of a tab, putting pleasure at your fingertips.

Title: Hazenburg Oversized Power Recliner
Description: For those that love the cool look of leather but long for the warm feel of fabric, the Hazenburg zero wall power recliner delivers both with ease. Its high-performance padded faux leather is remarkably durable and easy to clean, just the thing for family spaces. When it’s time to relax, the one-touch power control puts the perfect position at your fingertips. Channel-stitched back cushions provide indulgent lumbar support for maximum seating comfort—not to mention fashion-forward flair.

Title: Samir Power Lift Recliner
Description: How beautifully the Samir power lift recliner elevates your level of comfort. On those days when you need a little pampering, you’re sure to love the heat-and-massage element incorporated within the back cushion. Sporting a sleek design, with a unique crescent back and double-stitched tailoring, this power lift recliner has the corner on contemporary style.

Title: Roman Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Grounded with its umber hue, positively luxurious with a mix of real leather and expertly matched faux leather. The spacious Roman power reclining sofa indulges you in contemporary comfort with one-touch power controls and adjustable headrests. Its upholstery elevates your aesthetic with an eye-catching crackle effect, simultaneously amplifying the large-scale silhouette.

Title: Rackingburg Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: Once you recline in the Rackingburg rocker recliner with the pull of a tab, you will not want to get up. It's that comfortable with a bustle back and padded ottoman. Its look is amazing with dramatic cut and sew lines, jumbo stitching and affordable mahogany leather match upholstery—what a way to relax.

Title: Warnerton Dual Power Recliner
Description: Your modern living room awaits with the Warnerton power recliner. Complete with practical faux leather beautified with diamond lattice stitching, one-touch power control, adjustable headrest and a USB charging port, it makes finding the best seat in the house a breeze. Cup holders and armrest console storage keep drinks, snacks and remotes close by. Go ahead—treat yourself to a high-design home theater experience, priced to put you at ease.

Title: Nason Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: With rounded sides, you’re in for a rocking good time on the Nason rocker recliner. Recline back in infinite positions for comfort. Pillow top arms and feel-good fabric will make you never want to leave. Waterfall back design adds plenty of style to this recliner’s function.

Title: Whitehill Power Lift Recliner
Description: Enjoy comfort to the max in the Whitehill power lift recliner. After sitting and relaxing or snoozing in a fully reclined position, it eases you upright and back on your feet with the touch of a button. Dual motor capability lets you recline back and elevate your legs independently for custom comfort positioning. With USB charging at your fingertips, you can power up electronic devices as you unwind. The heavyweight padded faux leather has long-lasting durability, and its neutral chocolate hue complements most color schemes, so it looks as good as it feels.

Title: Owner's Box Dual Power Recliner
Description: When it comes to style, you’ve got game. Rest assured, the Owner’s Box power recliner is sure to win you over with its ultra-cool looks and major league features. Showcasing all the bells and whistles, this designer recliner is inspired by sports car interiors—with a fabulous faux leather accentuated with horizontal channel tufting. An advanced one-touch power control with an Easy View™ power headrest puts you in the driver’s seat. Dual cup holders and armrests with hidden storage take the form and function to another level.

Title: Center Point Manual Recliner
Description: Not your father’s easy chair, the Center Point recliner brilliantly showcases the next generation of recline design. Transform game or movie night into an interactive sensory experience with the touch of a button. Built-in LED lighting lets you choose from a range of colors for a captivatingly cool vibe. Use the light control button to sync with any device within range and cycle through the colors to the beat of the bassline. Sleek faux leather with distinctive stitching enhances the form and function of this simply striking piece.

Title: Safavieh Soho Tufted Foldable Sofa Bed
Description: Add style and function to any room with this mid-century modern inspired classic loveseat that instantly transforms into a foldable sofa bed. With sleek metal legs and a sturdy wood frame, it makes the perfect addition to any bedroom, living room or spare room, offering a practical solution for overnight guests. Whether it's used for sleeping, watching television, reading or simply lounging around, this futon is a designer favorite.

Title: Novogratz Tallulah Futon
Description: The Novogratz Tallulah Memory Foam Futon is exactly what you need and more! Bringing elegance and sophistication into your home with its vintage silhouette, rounded lines and button-tufted details. Designed with a soft velvet upholstery, this piece of furniture is both compact and multi-functional. Made with a sturdy wood frame, the Tallulah Memory Foam Futon is designed to offer nothing but superior comfort! The seat cushions are filled with high-density foam and responsive memory foam that will cradle your body to help relieve pressure points while you are watching TV or taking a much needed afternoon nap. The backrest features a split-back design that can be independently reclined to convert between multiple positions: sitting, lounging and sleeping. In other words, this means that you will now have an extra bed for overnight guests! Available in multiple colors, the Novogratz Tallulah Memory Foam Futon is finished with slanted wooden legs to add a last touch of chic style!

Title: Novogratz Cassidy Convertible Couch
Description: Vintage in design, the Novogratz Upholstered Cassidy Futon has the perfect touch of modern style to give your living room the wow factor it deserves. Upholstered in soft velvet, the versatile Cassidy Futon has plush rolled arms and button-tufted details on the back cushions. One of the best features is the multiple trendy colors in which it is offered which gives you the choice of adding a pop of color or opt for a more neutral tone. The Cassidy has a strong wood frame that sits on solid rubber wood legs with scrollwork details. What’s more, its multi-functional design offers the possibility to independently recline the backrest between sitting, lounging and sleeping to fit with the situation. Whether you want to read a good book, lounge back to watch a movie or lay down for a nap, the Novogratz Cassidy Futon has your back! Available in multiple color options. Ideal for your living room, guest bedroom or home office.

Title: Novogratz Regal Futon
Description: The 1950s are back in a big way, and living rooms across the country are being given a modern twist on the mid-century look that made straight lines and low profiles so popular. The Novogratz futon captures all that and more, with grey linen upholstery, a tufted back, wide winged arms, sleek style, and a wood frame that offers full support. The wood legs round off the look, with extra center legs that provide extra stability. You can also personalize your comfort level thanks to the split back, which allows you and a guest to each sit up or lounge back. Or simply open the Novogratz up into a sleeper sofa for overnight guests to spend the night. We’ve also added padding under the feet to protect your floors. Just add the Novogratz ottoman to really complete the look!

Title: Card Player Dual Power Recliner
Description: You can bet on turning heads while delivering superior comfort with the Card Player power recliner. Its sleek cappuccino-hued upholstery is an ace when it comes to contemporary style. An extended zero-gravity ottoman ups the ante on at-home relaxation. Topped off with a heated seat and massage function, you’ll be all-in on this recliner.

Title: Novogratz Perry Storage Futon Sectional
Description: Resolving to keep your home neat and tidy for the upcoming year? Well, the Novogratz Perry Sectional Futon with Storage is exactly the classic multi-functional piece of furniture that you need to stay organized! Featuring slightly curved contouring along the armrests and upholstery in your choice of lush gray velvet or rich faux camel leather, the sofa exudes a thoroughly modern style and tone. Devised for compact living room or basement den areas, the chaise can be configured on either side of the futon and includes a large storage compartment to hide all of your stuff. Also, the adjustable backrest reclines to convert the couch into a comfortable and super convenient sleeper bed for visiting family or friends. Designed with longevity in mind, the Perry has been constructed with a durable wood frame that sits upon robust dark wood legs. Let the multi-purpose Perry re-define your space. Now that’s what we call a New Year’s solution!

Title: Novogratz Skylar Futon
Description: The Novogratz Skylar Coil Futon stands out from the rest and makes a statement! Modern and trendy, the futon is designed with a ribbed tufted cushioned back that features vertical stitching details in the backrest. The Skylar is upholstered in rich velvet and sits on trendy gold powder coated metal legs to add a touch of modern glam to your room décor. This upholstered futon is constructed with pocket coil seating to offer optimal comfort for you and your guests during a movie night. This versatile futon is also the perfect solution for accommodating overnight guests as its multi-functional split-back design allows you to independently recline the backrest between three positions: sitting, lounging and sleeping. Available in a variety of colors, the Novogratz Skylar Coil Futon is a great option if you want a piece that will instantaneously add functionality and personality to your home. What are you waiting for?

Title: Novogratz Stevie Futon
Description: The Novogratz Stevie Futon is the perfect modern sofa bed for those who want practicality without compromising on style. Designed with rounded edges on the armrests, back and seat, the Stevie also features some button tufted detailing in the soft velvet upholstery. This convertible sofa bed is constructed with a strong plywood frame to ensure that it will last you through university and make it into your first apartment. To make this futon even better, the Novogratz Stevie Futon is built with a multi-functional design that allows you to recline the backrest between three position with an easy push or pull. This means you get to choose if you want your futon to be in a sitting position for long hours of studying, in a lounging position for a weekend long movie marathon, or in a sleeping position for hosting your friends overnight during the weekend. Available in multiple trendy colors, the Novogratz Stevie Futon is the ideal option to add a pop of style to your living room, home office or guest bedroom.

Title: McCaskill Oversized Power Recliner
Description: Sink into the supple McCaskill power recliner and prepare to be swept off your feet—literally. Its extra-wide seat and plush cushioning are divinely comfortable. It's wrapped in decadently soft leather match upholstery for a luxurious experience, saving you money without sacrificing style. Prominent stitching, linear track arms and a goes-with-anything gray hue add stylish touches.

Title: Yandel Power Lift Recliner
Description: Double your pleasure and your sense of style with the Yandel power lift recliner. Dual motor capability gives you the freedom to recline back and elevate your legs independently for more custom comfort positioning. And with the touch of a button, power lift feature gently eases you from the ultimate slumber into a lift-and-tilt position to get you back on your feet, effortlessly.  Designer upholstery may look like gently battered leather, but it’s actually a feel-good fabric with warm, cozy appeal.

Title: Novogratz Palm Springs Linon Split Futon
Description: If you like sleek lines, mid-century looks and all the style and panache of the 1950s, then the Novogratz Palm Springs futon is perfect for you. The linen upholstery comes in your choice of mustard, navy or persimmon, and includes a tufted back and stitched piping that round out the impressive look—as well as a solid wood frame for the utmost in support. The tapered wooden legs add an extra bit of flair, plus center feet ensure the sofa bed is always stable and comfortable. We’ve also added padding under all the legs to keep your floors looking like new. Thanks to its split back, the Novogratz futon allows you and a guest to sit up or lounge back for your ideal comfort level. Just put both sides flat at night to create an extremely welcoming space for your guests to tuck in and spend the night.

Title: Ricmen Oversized Dual Power Recliner
Description: Life is so much better when you can enjoy the pleasure of real leather—at a price to put you at ease. That’s exactly what you get with the Ricmen wide seat power recliner. Thanks to leather match upholstery, you've got a recliner that feels like a million bucks but won’t break the bank. Tailored to suit those with an eye for contemporary design, this power recliner is dressed to impress with an upscale matte finish, clean-lined divided back tufting, distinctive jumbo stitching and chic pillow top armrests. Perhaps best of all: an Easy View™ power adjustable headrest lets you recline back and still have a primo view of the TV.

Title: Hallstrung Dual Power Recliner
Description: Fashion-forward style. Sumptuous leather feel and appeal. Total comfort at your fingertips. It’s all yours for the taking with the Hallstrung power recliner with adjustable headrest. Wrapped in a lavish chocolate-colored upholstery, this decidedly contemporary power recliner tantalizes the senses in so many ways. Rest assured, leather match upholstery makes luxury affordable. Upping the comfort with 44" high back styling, this power recliner truly caters from head to toe. An Easy View™ power adjustable headrest allows you to lean back while propping up your head—perfect for chilling out in front of the TV—while an extended ottoman lets you stretch out all the more. And with a USB port in the power control panel, you hardly have to move a muscle to stay powered up.

Title: McGann Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: Rock the cool look of leather and the warm feel of fabric with the McGann rocker recliner. Sporting sumptuously thick cushioning, fashion-forward jumbo stitching and a richly tailored aesthetic, this smartly priced recliner with gentle rocking motion is a bestseller for good reason.

Title: Brassville Oversized Power Recliner
Description: A large scale means large comfort with the Brassville power recliner. Wonderfully wide seat is upholstered in a textural, cottony soft fabric. Recline as far back as you please on pillowy arms and headrest at one easy touch of a button. Bustle back tufting adds the right amount of casually cool style.

Title: Darcy Manual Recliner
Description: Talk about fine lines and great curves. That’s the beauty of the Darcy rocker recliner—made to suit your appreciation for clean, contemporary style. Comfy pillow top armrests, designer tailoring and an ultra-soft upholstery that holds up to everyday living complete this fashion statement.

Title: Bladen Manual Recliner
Description: If you love the cool look of leather but long for the warm feel of fabric, you’ll find the Bladen rocker recliner fits the bill beautifully. Rest assured, the textural, multi-tonal upholstery is rich with character and interest—while plush, pillowy cushions merge comfort and support with a high-style design.

Title: Next-Gen DuraPella Dual Power Recliner
Description: It’s time to rethink the way you relax—and time to experience the joys of the Next-Gen DuraPella power recliner. Taking a fashion-forward approach to the art of relaxation, the recliner—with a one-touch power control and an energy-efficient USB plug-in—will elevate your style and raise your standard of living. Its zero-gravity mechanism lifts the ottoman higher than traditional recliners to improve circulation. And talk about low maintenance. This designer recliner is wrapped in durable, water-repellent upholstery that's family- and pet-friendly.

Title: Galahad Dual Power Recliner
Description: The Galahad power recliner might look crisp, clean and lean, but it’s packed with technologically advanced features that truly elevate the art of relaxation. Its zero-gravity mechanism lifts the ottoman four inches higher than traditional recliners (23" off the floor) for better blood flow from your legs to your heart. With the touch of a button, let the stress of the day float away care of an air massage system (with three pampering settings)—or get warm and toasty thanks to a heated seat element.  Crosshatch stitching adds fashion-forward flair. While ultra streamlined, this designer recliner doesn’t cut corners when it comes to quality.

Title: Navi Manual Recliner
Description: If you love the cool look of leather but long for the warm feel of fabric, you can take comfort in the Navi rocker recliner. Wrapped in a fabulous faux leather with a weathered hue and hint of pebbly texture to resemble the real deal, this decidedly modern recliner proves less is more. Elements include angled side profiling and track armrests wrapped with a layer of pillowy softness for that little something extra. Prominent jumbo stitching and clean-lined divided back styling lend fashion-forward flair.

Title: The Man-Den Triple Power Recliner
Description: Reserved for him and made for her, The Man-Den power recliner in gray delivers all the comfort and style you could ask for. Inspired by sports car interiors, the leather match upholstery has a “perforated automotive” treatment for that much more appeal. Positioned at your fingertips, the advanced one-touch power control puts you in the driver’s seat with everything from an Easy View™ power headrest and power lumbar support, to a USB port and wireless charging for your phone. And with an integrated cup holder and hidden storage compartments under the posh, padded armrests, this designer power recliner makes the most of every inch of space.

Title: Mabton Dual Power Recliner
Description: The challenge: Design a cutting-edge power recliner you’d never guess was a recliner. Super sleek and streamlined, the Mabton recliner in taupe gray with high-contrast jumbo stitching might just be our best-kept secret. Rest assured, you’d be hard-pressed to find seating that looks so high end yet is so comfortably priced. Integrated elements include an Easy View™ adjustable headrest, which offers low-profile style when it’s down and a high level of comfort when you’re kicking back and reclining. Factor in a one-touch power control (with a USB port) placed on the inside track arm, and you have the makings for one beautifully deceptive piece of furniture.

Title: Earhart Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: Every day is a good day with the Earhart rocker recliner around. Take a load off and forget your worries as you ease back into the luxurious feel of suede-like fabric. Need more comfort and support for your body? Cue the deep seating and tall back. Contrast jumbo stitching adds an element of style to the cushions.

Title: Novogratz Elle Convertible Sofa Bed and Couch
Description: Modern in design, the Novogratz Elle Futon is the simple yet eye-catching addition you are looking for to complete your home décor. Perfect for your living room, home office or guest bedroom, the Elle is upholstered in soft velvet with square button tufted detailing on the backrest and the seat. What’s more, it sits of solid and trendy metal legs! Multi-functional and practical, the Novogratz Elle Futon is built with a versatile design that easily converts between three positions. With an easy push or pull, you can choose between a sitting, lounging or sleeping position; making it the ideal piece to add extra sleeping space for when you need to host friends or family overnight. The frame is built in sturdy wood and strong metal so you know it will stay with you for years to come. Available in multiple stylish colors, the Novogratz Elle Futon is exactly what you are looking for!

Title: Novogratz Brittany Futon
Description: Be embraced by the comfortable cushioning of the Novogratz Brittany Futon. With its ribbed tufted cushioned back, the Novogratz Brittany Futon gives your body all the support you need to sit and relax for hours. The combination of curved armrests and slanted legs work together to provide a unique rounded look that stands out. The stylish upholstery adds another element of elegance making this a perfect statement piece for any living space. Designed with a multi-position split-back, the Brittany independently converts between a sitting, lounging and sleeping position with an easy push and pull motion. The futon is also equipped with extra bag legs that provide extra support for your overnight guests when in a sleeping position.  Available in multiple trendy colors that will either add a pop of color to your space or provide a neutral statemen piece to build your décor around. Pair with the rest of the Brittany collection to get the complete look!

Title: Novogratz Beatrice Coil Futon
Description: We could look at, and sit on, the Novogratz Beatrice Coil Futon all day! The mid-century modern futon is upholstered with a rich velvet fabric that features button-tufted details on the backrest. The strong frame also sits on solid wood legs with an intricate scrollwork design. What’s even better, the Beatrice is just as comfortable as it is beautiful! The couch features pocket coil seating to provide you and your guests a comfortable spot to hang out after a long week at work. The Beatrice has a multi-functional split back design that easily converts between sitting, lounging and sleeping positions. It also features plastic metal legs that can be attached on the back of the backrest to provide additional support when the sofa bed is in sleeping position! Available in multiple trendy colors, the Novogratz Beatrice Coil Futon makes the perfect versatile piece to add a pop a style to your home.

Title: Kids Sofa Futon
Description: Add a pop of color to any room with the Atwater Living Mandy Kids Sofa Futon. This futon makes the perfect addition to any bedroom, living room or spare room. Offering great versatility, this futon can easily adjust and convert into a lounger or bed within seconds. Built with a strong frame, this futon offers a practical solution for overnight guests. Whether it be used for sleeping, watching television, reading or simply lounging around, your child will make good use of this futon.

Title: Mark Futon & Lounger
Description: On the lookout for an ultra-contemporary look? The Mark futon and lounger marks the spot. Clean lines, square tufting and armless frame add up to a cutting-edge aesthetic. Split-back design allows you to go from sitting to lounging to sleeping positions with ease. What beautiful proof that big style is made to suit small spaces.

Title: Elvia Convertible Futon
Description: Bringing big style to small living areas, this convertible futon is a smart, space-saving choice for those with an eye for contemporary style. Made to quickly convert into a lounger or sleeper, this sleek futon with fashion-forward tufting and split back sports a feel-good fabric and eye-catching chrome-tone legs for a high-design aesthetic.

Title: Pamela Futon
Description: Whether reserved for the occasional overnight guest—or enjoyed day in, day out—this sleek, chic futon in gray proves that high style can be made comfortably affordable. Sure to please those with highly contemporary taste, it wows with linear, boxy profiling, tapered chrome-tone metal legs and clean-lined track arms.

Title: Elvia Convertible Futon
Description: Bringing big style to small living areas, this convertible futon is a smart, space-saving choice for those with an eye for contemporary style. Made to quickly convert into a lounger or sleeper, this sleek futon with fashion-forward tufting and split back sports a fabulous faux leather and eye-catching chrome-tone legs for a high-design aesthetic.

Title: Atwater Living Elvia Futon
Description: The right seating makes a big difference in your daily life, so why not choose something that combines style, functionality and comfort in one piece. This futon's low armless profile, tufted detail and polished chrome-tone legs will set the mood for kicking back in cool mid-century style. For your comfort preference, the split back design allows you to adjust the backrest into a lounger or a sleeper (solo or together) with a single push or pull. Whether you're having friends over for coffee, hosting a movie night or planning a sleepover, this compact yet comfortable futon will let the good times roll.

Title: Atwater Living Lenna Tufted Futon
Description: Nothing speaks of style and comfort quite like this delightful futon. This futon sleeper features a fresh spin on vintage style with lux velvet upholstery, adorned with vertical channel stitching and button tufted details. Thick cushioning and padded armrests ensure utmost comfort no matter how you prefer to lounge. Simply recline the back cushions to the perfect position for sitting, lounging or sleeping. This versatile sleeper futon is ideal for today's multi-purpose living spaces.

Title: Clonmel Oversized Power Recliner
Description: Large-scale comfort is yours with the Clonmel zero wall wide seat power recliner. With supremely padded back, seat and arm cushions, it's the hero for ultimate relaxation. Microfiber upholstery is welcoming, soft and luxuriously covers the extra-wide seat. Recline back and kick up your feet to bolster your comfort level even more.

Title: Boxberg Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: Rock the cool look of leather minus the hefty price tag with the Boxberg rocker recliner. Rich with tonal variation, the indulgently soft upholstery sure looks like the real thing. And talk about indulgent comfort. Double stuffed armrests and sumptuous cushions cradle and support in all the right places. The recliner’s distinctive scooped stitching adds contemporary flair.

Title: Otis Futon
Description: Built with a strong wood frame, this futon is upholstered in rich microfiber and features memory foam cushions with tufted detailing for the perfect combination of contemporary style, durability and comfort. This futon allows you to lounge in style and comfort by easily converting between three positions: sitting, lounging and sleeping. With a simple push or pull, you can change the futon to the desired position. Blending into any decor aesthetic, it's the ideal addition to your living room, office or guest bedroom.

Title: DHP Paxson Futon with USB
Description: This futon with USB port provides style and functionality like you’ve never seen before. With a mid-century low-profile design, it features diagonal stitching on the back and seat cushions and sits on solid wood legs. For your convenience, the multifunctional split-back design that allows seats to independently recline between three positions: sitting, lounging and sleeping. This means you can accommodate overnight guests with a simple push and pull motion. Its USB port, located on the side of the futon, makes this the ideal piece for small living spaces such as your living room, guest bedroom or home office, allowing you to plug in and charge your electronics without having to get up. This futon is truly one of a kind and exactly what your home has been missing.

Title: Lorreze Power Lift Recliner
Description: The Lorreze power lift recliner does the work for you, easing you to your feet from a relaxed sitting position or fully reclined. Irresistibly comfortable and ruggedly handsome, the neutral steel gray shade fits most any color scheme and room decor. It has a heating element in the seat, plus a massage function to ensure total relaxation, so complete comfort is a foregone conclusion. With heavyweight padded faux leather for long-lasting durability, you'll be able to enjoy this recliner for quite a while.

Title: Brassville Oversized Manual Recliner
Description: A large scale means large comfort with the Brassville recliner. Wonderfully wide seat is upholstered in a textural, cottony soft fabric. Recline as far back as you please on pillowy arms and headrest. Bustle back tufting adds the right amount of casually cool style.

Title: Ernestine Power Lift Recliner
Description: The next generation of recliners has arrived in fine style. Beyond its perfectly placed pillow support and sumptuous chenille-feel upholstery, the Ernestine power lift recliner with dual motor design takes custom comfort to a new level. With the touch of a button, its power lift feature gently eases you from the ultimate slumber into a lift-and-tilt position to get you back on your feet, effortlessly.

Title: Next-Gen DuraPella Dual Power Recliner
Description: This sleek, ultra-modern power recliner has it all. With designer looks and head-to-toe comfort, the Next-Gen DuraPella recliner has the upscale look of leather at a scaled-down faux leather price. Its two-tone upholstery is more durable and water-repellent than regular leather, an added bonus for families with children or pets. Features including wireless and USB charging, an adjustable headrest and an extended "zero-gravity" ottoman for improved circulation make this the next generation of power recliners.

Title: Roman Dual Power Recliner
Description: Grounded with its umber hue, positively luxurious with a mix of real leather and expertly matched faux leather. The spacious Roman power recliner indulges you in contemporary comfort with a one-touch power control and an adjustable headrest. Its upholstery elevates your aesthetic with an eye-catching crackle effect, simultaneously amplifying the large-scale silhouette.

Title: Euro Upholstered Storage Futon
Description: This ultra-modern futon features subtle tufted seat stitching, bold seams and chrome-tone legs. Perfect for small space living, it comes with storage pockets on the outside of the arm to hold your favorite magazines and books. Do you have unexpected overnight guests? Simply fold down the arms and backrest to convert this futon into a convenient and comfortable sleeper. This futon is ideal for a living room, home office or guest bedroom.

Title: Euro Upholstered Storage Futon
Description: This ultra-modern futon features subtle tufted seat stitching, bold seams and chrome-tone legs. Perfect for small space living, it comes with storage pockets on the outside of the arm to hold your favorite magazines and books. Do you have unexpected overnight guests? Simply fold down the arms and backrest to convert this futon into a convenient and comfortable sleeper. This futon is ideal for a living room, home office or guest bedroom.

Title: DHP Jilian Storage Futon
Description: In the mood for an easy casual decor piece that adds to your space rather than subtracts from it? The DHP Jilian Storage Futon is the space saver that you’ve been looking for. Featuring a multiposition backrest that enables seater, lounger, or sleeper conversion, it provides you with choices to match your comfort level at any given moment. Great as an additional bed for guests, you’ll never have to scrounge for accommodations when out-of-towners drop by for a visit. Upholstered in soft microfiber, the stylish couch showcases sleek modern chrome legs and a clean-lined frame. And let’s not forget to mention the two pullout storage compartment drawers (located at the bottom of the futon sofa) that give you just the right amount of space to store (or hide) your living room knickknacks, books, or remotes. Sleeping, lounging, and sitting in comfort—what more could you ask for?

Title: DHP Carson 6 Inch Thermobonded High Density Full Futon Mattress
