Description: There’s nothing better than a good night’s sleep, which is why you should get the DHP Carson six-inch thermobonded high-density polyester fill futon mattress to make sure everyone in your home is sleeping comfortably. Composed of polyester fiber padding, this futon mattress is built to last through years of daily wear and tear without losing its shape, thanks to its tufted design. Designed to fit any regular full-size futon, this mattress will provide comfort and support for when you binge watch your favorite television series or when your friends need a bed to sleep overnight.

Title: DHP Elowen 6 Inch Square Quilted Microfiber Full Futon Mattress
Description: Functional and versatile, the DHP Elowen six-inch polyester filled quilted top mattress will make a great addition to your home. Made to fit full-size futon frames, this mattress easily folds when you are transitioning between a sleeping and a sitting position. It is composed of polyester fiber with a soft square quilted microfiber cover that is extremely low maintenance. When you need to clean it, simply wipe with a damp cloth. Whether you are purchasing this mattress for yourself or for your guests to sleep on when they stay overnight, the GREENGUARD Gold Certification guarantees that they sleep without any worries as it guarantees standards for low chemical emissions into indoor air during product usage.

Title: DHP Bran Convertible Futon
Description: Looking for casual up to date style that is totally within reach? Let us introduce you to the Bran futon. Use this piece to create the ideal office seating area for visitors or to entertain family and friends at home. Whatever the case, this futon will enhance any living room, home office or professional setting with its polished profile. Inspired by mid-century modern sensibilities, the futon conveys a laid-back aesthetic with stylish horizontal stitching and tapered legs. Upholstered in easy-care microfiber, its soft to the touch feel will activate a feeling of comfort. Made with a sturdy wood frame, its workmanship leaves a lasting impression.

Title: Woodsway Manual Swivel Glider Recliner
Description: Twice the style, twice the comfort. Lounge in the casual luxury of the two-tone Woodsway swivel glider recliner. Pillow top armrests and a modernized bustle back pamper with the plushness you crave, while the gentle swivel, gliding motion relaxes and keeps you in the flow of conversation.

Title: Baxton Studio Colby Sofa Bed
Description: With this sleeper sofa, you don't have to sacrifice space, style or comfort. The Colby sofa folds down in seconds to convert from a sofa to a bed. Its neutral gray hue blends easily with most any color scheme and adds a touch of style to any room. Solid rubberwood legs provide sturdy support. Channel tufting takes your interior design to the next level.

Title: CosmoLiving by Cosmopolitan Adley Coil Futon
Description: The CosmoLiving Adley Coil Futon is something to get excited about and full on obsess over! Gamify your living room with this flawless piece of furniture. The Adley is a modern centerpiece that commands attention with its velvet upholstery, rounded armrests and black metal legs. It comes in a variety of trendy colors that promise to bring your home décor to a completely new level. Bonus: It features a multi-functional split-back design that allows you to independently convert the backrest between three positions: sitting, lounging and sleeping. Thanks to the coils, afternoon naps are about to reach a new comfort level. What are you waiting for? The CosmoLiving Adley Coil Futon is going to bring your home all the way up – and leave all your guests feeling some type of way!

Title: Atwater Living Ronson Futon Frame
Description: The Atwater Living Ronson Wood Arm Futon with Espresso Wood Finish represents timeless style. With built-in side pockets, a strong metal base and solid wood arms, pair it with an 8" coil futon mattress (sold separately) to convert it into a full size bed.

Title: DHP Bran Convertible Futon
Description: Imagine a furniture piece that provides you with flexibility and an abundance of style all in one compact package. Meet the DHP Bran Convertible Futon. Not only does it look spectacular but it adapts to your level of comfort effortlessly. Drawing inspiration from mid-century design, the Bran will elevate your living room, home office or professional setting with a heightened sense of style. Upholstered in an easy-to-maintain soft feel microfiber fabric, the futon expresses a laid-back tone with casually tapered legs and horizontal stitching. Quality workmanship is also one of the Bran’s benchmark features. Built with a strong wood frame, it includes a reclinable backrest that can be adjusted between sitting, lounging, and sleeping positions, making it the perfect guest sleeper bed for those out-of-the-blue family visits. Offered in various color options, the Bran is the answer to all your small space living woes.

Title: Strikefirst Power Recliner
Description: An exceptional winner in home fashion, the Strikefirst power recliner shows us the beauty of today’s best recliners. Bold diamond stitching on the back and seat invites you to sit and stay awhile. Real leather brings feel-good pleasure and exceptional wear, while a skillfully matched faux leather upholstery keeps luxury right on budget. When you want to get maximum relaxation, use the power adjustable headrest and extended ottoman for additional comfort. Each power control contains USB and wireless charging, plus a hidden cup holder. A zero gravity mechanism completes the luxurious design.

Title: Bolzano Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: Looking for a sleek seat? The Bolzano rocker recliner is your saving grace. Coffee brown microfiber cover is soft to the touch and padded for your comfort. Beautiful lines exhibit exceptional craftsmanship. Smaller-than-normal scale brings quality to even compact spaces. Now you can worry less about finding the perfect recliner for your room and relax more.

Title: Tulen Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: The Tulen rocker recliner puts the win in winning. Its waterfall back design and doubly plump pillow top arms team up with soft chenille fabric to go for the goal. Ample seating room makes the comfort possibilities endless. Sit back and relax. You won’t go wrong with this recliner.

Title: Lucina Manual Rocker Recliner
Description: The Lucina rocker recliner sets the foundation for all proclaimed casually cool spaces. Adorned in a soft microfiber upholstery, it features track arms and a welted seat cushion. A gentle rocking motion perfects the laid-back vibe.

Title: Markridge Power Lift Recliner
Description: When it comes to exceptional comfort and style, the Markridge power lift recliner is right on the mark. This single motor lift recliner with 40" high back design has you covered from head to toe. Richly neutral, feel-good fabric is sure to blend beautifully in your space. Clean, transitional styling looks equally at home alongside contemporary and traditional decor.

Title: Soundcheck Dual Power Recliner
Description: An impressive winner in home fashion, the Soundcheck power recliner shows us the beauty of today’s best recliners. Inspired by vintage automobile interiors, the pleated upholstery in the lumbar section adds additional comfort for your lower back. This contemporary recliner is upholstered in all-over faux leather for feel-good pleasure, with contrast stitching for exceptional wear. When you want to get maximum relaxation, adjust the Easy View™ power adjustable headrest. This is how you bring home style and comfort.

Title: Backtrack Dual Power Recliner
Description: With its fashion-forward sense of style, the Backtrack power recliner has you covered with high-tech advancements and down-home comfort. Leather match upholstery keeps luxury comfortably within budget. Love being pampered? With the touch of a button, experience the pure bliss of an air massage system (with three settings), or chill out with the heated seat element. Distinctive elements of this power recliner include contemporary waterfall tufting that beautifully goes with the flow and a zero-gravity mechanism further raising the ottoman for better blood flow.

Title: Cranedall Oversized Dual Power Recliner
Description: Load up on comfort and contemporary style with the Cranedall wide seat power recliner. Wrapped in a heavyweight padded faux leather with a weathered effect that looks so natural, this super chic recliner is enriched with clean lines and jumbo contrast stitching. Rest assured, the one-touch power control with adjustable positions includes an Easy View™ adjustable headrest that lets you lay back and still have a primo view of the TV. A zero-draw USB plug-in at your fingertips keeps you powered up as you chill out.

Title: Composer Dual Power Recliner
Description: Movie nights will be forever changed with the Composer power recliner. The adjustable Easy View™ headrest allows a primo view of the TV no matter how far back you recline and the extended ottoman provides extra room to really stretch out. Ultra-cool lattice stitching elevates the look and ambient LED lighting completes the theater-style experience. So relax, kick off your shoes and enjoy the show.

Title: McClelland Oversized Recliner
Description: Large-scale comfort is yours with the McClelland recliner. With supreme padding and plush upholstery it's the hero for ultimate relaxation. The zero-wall design makes efficient use of space and the extra-wide seating gives you plenty of room to sit back, kick up your heels and enjoy.

Title: Yandel Power Lift Recliner
Description: Double your pleasure and your sense of style with the Yandel power lift recliner. Dual motor capability gives you the freedom to recline back and elevate your legs independently for more custom comfort positioning. And with the touch of a button, power lift feature gently eases you from the ultimate slumber into a lift-and-tilt position to get you back on your feet, effortlessly.  Designer upholstery may look like gently battered leather, but it’s actually a feel-good fabric with warm, cozy appeal.

Title: Nerviano Manual Recliner
Description: Indulge in comfort—while saving on space—with the Nerviano zero wall recliner. Clever zero wall design means you only need a few inches of room between the back of the chair and the wall to fully recline. Making high comfort highly affordable, this smartly tailored recliner with a clean-lined divided back is wrapped in a plush, textural upholstery that’s a pleasure for the senses.

Title: Turbulance Dual Power Recliner
Description: Looking for a seat with all the bells and whistles? The Turbulance power recliner has you covered. Get double the relaxation—recline your body then adjust your headrest. With USB charging ports, your devices will enjoy this recliner, too. Stainless steel cup holders accompany you on either side. All wrapped up in quality faux leather with fashion-forward jumbo stitching for a look and feel you’ll love.

Title: Sophie 3-Piece Modular Sofa
Description: With sumptuously soft velvet upholstery, the Sophie sectional puts your love of luxury on display. The clean-cut appearance of this light gray sectional blends beautifully with your tasteful surroundings. Best of all, the modular design lets you stage the pieces solo or rearrange them for a look that's always fresh.

Title: Antonlini Sofa
Description: We can’t wait to see the look of comfort on your face when you sit on the Antonlini sofa. Plush cushions are covered in linen weave chenille for an incredibly soft hand. Roll arms maintain the casual cool look. Vine motif pillows bring in a calm and steady piece of nature as crosshatch kidney pillow infuses a trendsetting pattern. Solid charcoal color velvet pillows pile on the texture—perfect to curl up with as you sink back into the deep seats. And with a neutral hue, it complements your home effortlessly.

Title: Atwater Living Nova Modern Leather Futon
Description: Go back in time with the stylish EveryRoom Nova Modern Futon. This mid-century styled sofa bed is a modern twist on a classic look, boasting bold lines, tapered wood legs and an irresistible faux leather upholstery available in your choice of blue or gray. Set it in your living room as an eye-catching centerpiece, or add it as a pop of exciting style and color in your home office. This functional futon can be used in a lounging position—which is perfect for reading or watching your favourite movie—or it can be reclined all the way back for a sleep area that can accommodate up to two guests. The Nova Modern Futon is a fashionable way to add some extra sleeping space to your home! Want to extend this stunning look? Pair the modern futon with the matching Nova chair to create a special space you’ll want to spend your time in. The futon, which can support up to 600 lbs. in maximum weight, ships in one box. Setup of this furniture is easy and fast, thanks to its simple assembly. The Nova Futon is guaranteed to bring plenty of interest to your space with its unique design!

Title: Atwater Living Moira Futon, Blue Velvet
Description: The Moira futon is the perfect modern, multifunctional piece to add to any room in your home. Ideal for overnight guests, it converts between three positions: sitting, lounging and sleeping. Available in multiple colors.

Title: Darcy Sofa Chaise
Description: Talk about fine lines and great curves. That’s the beauty of the Darcy sofa chaise—made to suit your appreciation for clean, contemporary style. A striking flared frame, comfy pillow top armrests and an ultra-soft upholstery that holds up to everyday living complete this fashion statement. Versatile chaise has a movable ottoman and reversible cushion and can be used on right or left side.

Title: Atwater Living Mason Metal Futon Frame
Description: The EveryRoom Mason Metal Futon Frame is meant for comfort however you chose to take it. A must-have piece for any modern home, this futon frame offers you comfort and versatility. Its sleek streamlined foundation features clean lines and a solid metal mesh. Equipped with two retainer clips we guarantee your futon mattress won’t slide off. The clever split back design allows you to easily change your futon frame to a sitting, lounging or sleeping position with just one push and pull.

Title: Atwater Living Lucia Upholstered Futon
Description: The Lucia upholstered futon is both vintage and modern with its button-tufted velvet upholstery and solid wood fluted legs. The split back design easily converts between sitting, lounging and sleeping positions. Available in multiple colors.

Title: Joyce Coil Futon
Description: Designed with a soft velvet upholstery, slim track arms and slanted solid wood legs, this futon is a modern dream come true. Not only is it right on trend, but it's also the multi-functional piece you never knew you needed, but now can’t live without. A split-back design allows you to independently recline the backrests into multiple positions. Simply push or pull your futon to instantly convert it into a lounger or bed. The sturdy wood frame and independently encased coils provide comfort and support to accommodate your overnight guests.

Title: Atwater Living Karen Futon Sectional with Storage
Description: Showcase your trendy style with the Atwater Living Karen futon sectional with storage. This piece exudes comfort and luxury with its black velvet upholstery, while vertical stitching on the back adds a splash of flair. Its multifunctional design makes this futon sectional truly versatile, with a split-back couch design that independently converts between three positions: sitting, lounging and sleeping. To top it off, the reclining chaise offers additional storage and can be placed on either side of the sectional, allowing you to create extra room in small spaces.

Title: Jodi Coil Futon
Description: Offering style, comfort and functionality, this futon is the optimal solution to small space living. The sublime minimalistic design is showcased through natural linen upholstery, gracefully wing-shaped armrests and tapered wood legs for added warmth. The thick encased coil and foam cushions provide supreme comfort for long hours of relaxation. Designed to accommodate multiple positions, this futon easily coverts from a lounger to sleeper, so you can enjoy this masterpiece anytime day or night.

Title: Atwater Living Jake Upholstered Futon
Description: Wowza! The Jake small space futon features luxe linen upholstery and square tufting. This cozy couch is ideal for overnight guests easily converting between three positions: sitting, lounging and sleeping.

Title: Atwater Living Palma Storage Futon Sectional
Description: Having trouble deciding what you want? You can have it all with the Atwater Living Palma storage sectional futon. Upholstered in a cool black chenille, it's the perfect stylish centerpiece to bring your living room decor to the next level. What’s more, its multifunctional design is made to accommodate all your moods. With a simple push or pull, you can convert the futon between its three positions: sitting, lounging or sleeping. The chaise can be put on either side on the futon and includes a hidden storage compartment, ideal for creating extra room in small spaces.

Title: Game Zone Dual Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: If you’re looking for the perfect seat for gaming, lounging or just relaxing, look no further than the indulgent comfort of the Game Zone power reclining loveseat. Sporting one-touch power controls, Easy View™ power adjustable headrests, cup holders, storage and chargers, this dual-sided reclining loveseat has everything you need for binge-watching or power playing. Padded cushions with waterfall back design and pillow top arms offer plenty of support, while leather alternative upholstery is given tuck and roll styling for a well-edited aesthetic. The loveseat’s center console is equipped with underneath storage, cup holders and USB charging. How’s that for handy?

Title: Roman Dual Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Grounded with its umber hue, positively luxurious with a mix of real leather and expertly matched faux leather. The spacious Roman power reclining loveseat indulges you in contemporary comfort with one-touch power controls and adjustable headrests. Its upholstery elevates your aesthetic with an eye-catching crackle effect, simultaneously amplifying the large-scale silhouette.

Title: Beamerton Sofa
Description: What could be better than the feel of real leather? It’s yours for the taking—at a comfortably affordable price—with the Beamerton sofa. Rest assured, the seating area and armrests are covered in genuine leather for an incomparable experience. Plush roll arms and distinctive details such as box-stitched cushions and prominent bun feet reflect a sense of richly rustic charm that never goes out of style.

Title: Angleton Loveseat
Description: Serving up a refined, upscale look—at an incomparable value price—the Angleton loveseat lures from every angle. Crisp, 2-over-2 cushion design, wide track arms and black tapered feet lend a clean, contemporary aesthetic. Velvety soft upholstery in a chic sandstone gray upholstery takes neutral to another level. Matching feather-filled throw pillows master the art of minimalism.

Title: Belziani Sofa
Description: Providing a versatile option to layer in your living area, the Belziani sofa exudes classic styling in a fresh new color. Whether it's used as an inviting accent or paired with the matching loveseat, it makes a rich addition for those who demand the best. Chosen for quality and a luxury feel, the leather match upholstery is pure pleasure.

Title: Stracelen Sofa
Description: Everyone can have the best seat in the house with the Stracelen sofa. Nailhead trim puts the finishing touches on the traditional roll arms you love. Reversible seat cushions with high-pile chenille fabric keep your sofa feeling plush. Textured velvet and European-influenced jacquard pillows add another layer of comfort. Turned feet in a burnished light brown finish show that style and quality flow from top to bottom.

Title: Lanett Sofa
Description: The Lanett sofa is dressed to impress with the grace of traditional design, upgraded with sumptuous modern comfort. Plush and supportive cushions that fully wrap around the armrests are such a treat, as is the oversized pillow back. Luxe upholstery is pure indulgence.

Title: Ballina Sofa
Description: With its uniquely chic blend of elements, the Ballina sofa breaks the rules in a beautiful way. Crisp and clean—with just a hint of classic flair—this designer sofa stands out with its sleek track arms and prominent nailhead trim punctuating the linear profile. Truly setting this contemporary sofa apart—an exposed walnut-tone rail for a high-end, furniture gallery aesthetic. Reversible cushions and decorative pillows in relaxed, muted hues make this sofa befitting everything from modern farmhouse to urban chic spaces.

Title: Game Plan Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Masterful in its interpretation of modern luxury, the Game Plan power reclining sofa is sleekly tailored in top-grain leather. It’s rich to the touch in tones of warm brown, inviting you to indulge in one-touch reclining. Design details polish off this lavish leather sofa. Subtle stitching accents and clean-lined track arms create contemporary character, inviting high-brow style into your home.

Title: Tibbee Sofa
Description: Inspired by high-end menswear, the Tibbee sofa is tailored to perfection and dressed to impress. Button-less tufting on the back cushions is richly subtle. Sleek, flared armrests enhance Tibbee’s clean-lined, simply striking profile.

Title: Stoneland Power Reclining Sofa
Description: For those that love the cool look of leather but long for the warm feel of fabric, the Stoneland power reclining sofa delivers both with ease. Its high-performance padded faux leather is remarkably durable and easy to clean, just the thing for family spaces. When it’s time to relax, the one-touch power control puts the perfect position at your fingertips. Channel-stitched back cushions provide indulgent lumbar support for maximum seating comfort—not to mention fashion-forward flair.

Title: Salvatore 3-Piece Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Easy on the eyes and incredibly comfortable, the high-end Salvatore power reclining sofa will upgrade the look and feel of your living room. Its automotive-inspired leather and faux leather keep luxury right on budget. The modular design allows pieces to be grouped together in a variety of ways. No matter how it's arranged, this sofa is just the right touch for reclining and relaxing in style..

Title: Buncrana Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Recline in the modern luxury and convenience of the Buncrana power reclining sofa with a high back and Easy View™ power adjustable headrests. With the touch of a button, you can easily position the recliner and its headrest for maximum comfort. Plus, with the convenient USB charging ports, electronics can be charged without having to get up. The genuine leather upholstery is paired with expertly matched faux leather for affordability. Bring a luxurious look full of details, such as nailhead trim and rolled armrests, to your living area—what a treat of comfort to be enjoyed for years to come.

Title: Harleson Sofa
Description: True classic character comes to life in the Harleson sofa. Set back pleated rolled arms and warm brown exposed frame with bun feet are beautifully traditional. Lovely detailing carries itself through the herringbone weave in the soft upholstery. Seat cushions reverse to maintain durable comfort. Vintage-inspired jumbo nailhead trim graces the design. Plaid and botanical pillows in dark brown are a timeless touch.

Title: Valerano Queen Sofa Sleeper
Description: The Valerano queen sofa sleeper has the corner on casual contemporary style and everyday comfort. Chic and subtly innovative, its crosshatched chenille upholstery is a forward-thinking take on fashionable neutrals. The sleek frame gets a soft, streamlined touch with sloping track arms. And with a queen size sleeper perfect for hosting guests, it's sure to appeal to your relaxed approach to modern flair.

Title: Alandari Loveseat
Description: Sporting a pleasing roll arm for classic flair, the Alandari loveseat in soft gray exudes an easy elegance sure to please. Feel-good upholstery with linen texturing is made for everyday luxury. Muted-tone toss pillows are a soothing, sophisticated complement.

Title: Stracelen Loveseat
Description: Everyone can have the best seat in the house with the Stracelen loveseat. Nailhead trim puts the finishing touches on the traditional roll arms you love. Reversible seat cushions with high-pile chenille fabric keep your loveseat feeling plush. European-influenced jacquard pillows add another layer of comfort. Turned feet in a burnished light brown finish show that style and quality flow from top to bottom.

Title: Velletri Loveseat
Description: For the style enthusiast on a mission. The Velletri loveseat takes a unique approach to design. Two back cushions flaunt a vintage-inspired “Paris” script. Throw pillows continue the charm with gray-infused scroll and plaid patterns. Flared arms and neutral hue lend to transitional appeal. Covered in a luxurious linen-like chenille, its softness and luxurious comfort will keep you coming back.

Title: Karinne Loveseat
Description: Craving casual refinement? The Karinne loveseat has you covered. Its decidedly contemporary frame cradles sizable cushions in an ultra-soft neutral hue, lightening the mood in your living room with simple style and everyday comfort. Solid and geometric accent pillows perfect the chic-meets-cozy vibe.

Title: Clonmel Manual Reclining Loveseat
Description: Large-scale comfort is yours with the Clonmel reclining loveseat. With supremely padded back, seat and arm cushions, it's the hero for ultimate relaxation. Microfiber upholstery is welcoming, soft and luxuriously covers the extra-wide seats. Recline back and kick up your feet to bolster your comfort level even more.

Title: Derwin Manual Reclining Sofa with Drop Down Table
Description: Rock the cool look of leather minus the hefty price tag with the Derwin reclining sofa. Rich with tonal variation, the faux leather upholstery sure looks like the real thing. And talk about indulgent comfort. Double stuffed armrests and sumptuous cushions cradle and support in all the right places. A distinctive biscuit back design enhances this sofa's contemporary flair. The drop down table and handy cup holders complete the experience.

Title: Erlangen Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Coming in hot! It’s the Erlangen power reclining sofa. Top-of-the-line faux leather fabric gives you the upscale look you want for less. Not to mention it feels incredible. Take a seat and raise your legs with one easy push of a button. The extended ottomans provide extra lengths for leg comfort. Want to watch TV or read in comfort? Easily fix your view with the power adjustable headrest. Complete with dramatic, jumbo stitching, this piece is out to capture your heart with style and comfort.

Title: Vacherie Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: When it comes to comfort, style and value, the Vacherie faux leather reclining sofa in chocolate brown rocks. Tailored for feel-good flair, its fashion-forward bustle back design is enhanced with sculpted padding on the headrest for cradling support. Channel cushioning along the sides flows into thick, wrapped pillow top armrests that are truly over the top. And while it might look like you broke the bank, a sumptuously soft leather-like fabric keeps indulgence well within budget.

Title: Mouttrie Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: A modern addition to a great room, living room or family room, the Mouttri power reclining sofa in smoke gray lures with its smokin’ hot way to recline. Unique pad-wrapped armrests provide a cool aesthetic and pillowy softness. Loaded with gorgeous texture, the velvety gray upholstery is sumptuously soft—and made all the more enticing with deep channel tufting for clean-lined flair. With an Easy View™ power adjustable headrest that lets you fully recline and still have a primo view of the TV—plus a USB port in each power control—you truly have it all at your fingertips.

Title: Nemoli Loveseat
Description: The Nemoli loveseat sets the scene for a modern space full of casual flair. Its textured chenille with solid microfiber upholstery provides a luxuriously soft feel that’s inviting. Gently flared arms and plush seat cushions welcome comfort and relaxation. The on-trend slate-colored upholstery offers a perfect background for the two decorative pillows to pop with beauty.

Title: Card Player Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: You can bet on turning heads while delivering superior comfort with the Card Player power reclining sofa. Its sleek cappuccino-hued upholstery is an ace when it comes to contemporary style. An extended zero-gravity ottoman ups the ante on at-home relaxation. Topped off with a heated seat and massage function, you’ll be all-in on this recliner.

Title: Next-Gen DuraPella 3-Piece Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: If you’re looking for a brilliant blend of comfort, quality and flair, the Next-Gen Durapella faux leather power sectional excites and delights with sleek, modern style—priced to put you at ease. Appealing to those with an eye for contemporary design and high-tech features, this slate gray sectional offers adjustable headrests, zero-draw USB charging and a zero-wall recline to maximize your space. Distinctive elements include flared, sheltering armrests and subtly tufted seat cushions that add a high-design touch.

Title: Lanett Loveseat
Description: The Lanett loveseat is dressed to impress with the grace of traditional design, upgraded with sumptuous modern comfort. Plush and supportive cushions that fully wrap around the armrests are such a treat, as is the oversized pillow back. Luxe upholstery is pure indulgence.

Title: Game Zone Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: If you’re looking for the perfect seat for gaming, lounging or just relaxing, look no further than the indulgent comfort of the Game Zone power reclining sofa. Sporting one-touch power controls, Easy View™ power adjustable headrests, cup holders, storage and chargers, this dual-sided reclining sofa has everything you need for binge-watching or power playing. Padded cushions with waterfall back design and pillow top arms offer plenty of support, while leather alternative upholstery is given tuck and roll styling for a well-edited aesthetic. The stationary middle seat has hidden depths, just fold it forward to reveal a table-top with cup holders, USB charging a storage pocket and overhead lights. How’s that for handy?

Title: Backtrack Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: With its fashion-forward sense of style, the Backtrack power reclining sofa has you covered with high-tech advancements and down-home comfort. Leather match upholstery keeps luxury comfortably within budget. Love being pampered? With the touch of a button, experience the pure bliss of an air massage system (with three settings), or chill out with the heated seat element. Distinctive elements of this power recliner include contemporary waterfall tufting that beautifully goes with the flow and a zero-gravity mechanism further raising the ottoman for better blood flow.

Title: Turbulance Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Looking for seating with all the bells and whistles? The Turbulance power reclining sofa has you covered. Get double the relaxation—recline your body then adjust your headrest. Pull down the middle seat to reveal a drop down table ready to hold your magazines and remotes. With USB charging ports, your devices will enjoy this sofa, too. Stainless steel cup holders accompany you on either side. All wrapped up in quality faux leather with fashion-forward jumbo stitching for a look and feel you’ll love.

Title: Draycoll Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Built for luxury, the Draycoll reclining loveseat with center console lets you kick back in reliable style. The thick, softly textured chenille upholstery provides a comfy surface on which to lounge. With bustle back construction and thickly cushioned armrests, this piece gives you the dependable support you need to unwind with the convenience of the center console to ease your evening.

Title: Brassville Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: A large scale means large comfort with the Brassville reclining loveseat. Seats are upholstered in a textural, cottony soft fabric. Recline as far back as you please on pillowy arms and headrests. Bustle back tufting adds the right amount of casually cool style. With a storage console and two convenient cup holders, you’ll want to stay here forever.

Title: Calderwell Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Sleek and streamlined, the Calderwell power reclining loveseat with center console draws out your leisure time with its bustle back construction and thickly cushioned armrests. The super soft faux leather gets a high-end tweak with jumbo contrast stitching so you don’t have to sacrifice style for comfort. Sink into the comfortably supportive cushions and stretch your evening as long as you can with the handy USB port to power your devices.

Title: Coombs Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: The Coombs reclining sofa makes it hip to be square. Brilliantly boxy profile and wide track arms infuse a highly contemporary look you don’t often find in reclining furniture. Rest assured, the trendy charcoal-tone upholstery is sumptuously soft—and made all the more enticing with deep channel tufting for clean-lined flair.

Title: Hazenburg Power Reclining Sofa
Description: For those that love the cool look of leather but long for the warm feel of fabric, the Hazenburg power reclining sofa delivers both with ease. Its high-performance padded faux leather is remarkably durable and easy to clean, just the thing for family spaces. When it’s time to relax, the one-touch power control puts the perfect position at your fingertips. Channel-stitched back cushions provide indulgent lumbar support for maximum seating comfort—not to mention fashion-forward flair.

Title: Coombs Power Reclining Sofa
Description: The Coombs power reclining sofa makes it hip to be square. Brilliantly boxy profile and wide track arms infuse a highly contemporary look you don’t often find in reclining furniture. Rest assured, the trendy charcoal-tone upholstery is sumptuously soft—and made all the more enticing with deep channel tufting for clean-lined flair. The one-touch power control even includes a USB port to keep devices charged while you unplug.

Title: Clonmel Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: Large-scale comfort is yours with the Clonmel 2-seat reclining sofa. With supremely padded back, seat and arm cushions, it's the hero for ultimate relaxation. Microfiber upholstery is welcoming, soft and luxuriously covers the extra-wide seats. Recline back and kick up your feet to bolster your comfort level even more.

Title: McCaskill Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: Sink into the supple McCaskill reclining sofa and prepare to be swept off your feet—literally. Its extra-wide seats and plush cushioning are divinely comfortable. It's wrapped in decadently soft leather match upholstery for a luxurious experience, saving you money without sacrificing style. Prominent stitching, linear track arms and a goes-with-anything gray hue add stylish touches.

Title: Kempten Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: You don’t just want to recline. You want to recline in high design. Wrapped in a fabulous black faux leather upholstery, the Kempten reclining sofa with 42" high back is everything you long for—and then some. Ultra clean lines, subtle curves and sumptuous comfort make it a sight for sore eyes and tired muscles. Here’s the showstopper: ambient blue LED lighting along the sofa base for a movie theater experience enjoyed from the convenience of home.

Title: McClelland Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Large-scale comfort is yours with the McClelland power reclining sofa. With supreme padding and plush upholstery it's the hero for ultimate relaxation. The extra-wide seating gives you plenty of room to sit back, kick up your heels and enjoy.

Title: Rackingburg Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: Once you recline in the Rackingburg dual reclining sofa with the pull of a tab, you will not want to get up. It's that comfortable with bustle backs and padded ottomans. Its look is amazing with dramatic cut and sew lines, jumbo stitching and affordable mahogany leather match upholstery—what a way to relax.

Title: Dunwell Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: There is power in beauty with the Dunwell power reclining sofa. Handsome crackle effect in the upholstery gives the appearance of supple leather but this recliner is all about the warmth of fabric. Contrast jumbo stitching adds a stylish touch. Double stuffed armrests cuff your body in comfort. Adjust your head and recline back with one easy touch.

Title: McCaskill Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Sink into the supple McCaskill power reclining sofa and prepare to be swept off your feet—literally. Its extra-wide seats and plush cushioning are divinely comfortable. It's wrapped in decadently soft leather match upholstery for a luxurious experience, saving you money without sacrificing style. Prominent stitching, linear track arms and a goes-with-anything gray hue add stylish touches.

Title: Hallstrung Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Stay happy at home with the Hallstrung 2-seat reclining power sofa with Easy View™ power adjustable headrests. Comfort is immediate when you're in control of your relaxation. Simply adjust the seat's position and headrest with the easy one-touch power control buttons. Plus, with the convenient USB charging ports, cell phones or laptops can be charged without having to get up. Rest assured, leather match upholstery makes luxury affordable. The chocolate-colored upholstery provides a modern look in a high back design that's traditional—what a great way to unwind and watch TV.

Title: Bolzano Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: Looking for a sleek 2-seater? The Bolzano reclining sofa is your saving grace. Coffee brown microfiber cover is soft to the touch and padded for your comfort. Beautiful lines exhibit exceptional craftsmanship. Smaller-than-normal scale brings quality to even compact spaces. Now you can worry less about finding the perfect recliner for your room and relax more.

Title: Grearview Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: In an earthy brown tone, the Grearview 2-seat power reclining sofa with adjustable headrest offers the warm feel of fabric and the cool, rustic look of leather. Caressing you in comfort, the faux leather dual-sided recliner features luxurious bustle back cushions, plus jumbo window-pane stitching and nailhead trim for style. Easy View™ power adjustable headrests offer a primo view of the TV even when you're fully reclined, to enhance your relaxation. Chill out while you recharge thanks to a USB port built right into the one-touch power control.

Title: Game Plan Dual Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Masterful in its interpretation of modern luxury, the Game Plan power reclining loveseat with console is sleekly tailored in top-grain leather. It’s rich to the touch in tones of warm brown, inviting you to indulge in one-touch reclining. Design details polish off this lavish leather loveseat. Subtle stitching accents and clean-lined track arms create contemporary character, inviting high-brow style into your home.

Title: Francesca Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Master statement-making contemporary comfort with the Francesca power reclining loveseat. It displays a striking yet streamlined profile, with auburn-hued leather match upholstery balancing natural beauty and refined design. Adjustable headrests and USB charging polish off this richly crafted piece.

Title: Falan Loveseat
Description: Restrained in design with its light linen-hued upholstery, the Falan loveseat is classic style reimagined. Nailhead trim emphasizes the exposed bun feet and roll arms, adding tasteful flair. Versatile but not without eye-catching elements, this is a piece that modern traditionalists will be clamoring for.

Title: Elbiani Loveseat
Description: The Elbiani loveseat suits those searching for a fresh take on versatile style, seamlessly transitioning from casual to modern with your decor. Its flexible character comes courtesy of a chunky fabric. Matte black wood trim creates innovative contrast. A virtuoso of form and function, this loveseat is a superb addition to your simply sophisticated seating arrangement.

Title: Morrillo 3-Piece Modular Sofa
Description: Create the highbrow, contemporary living room of your dreams at a price you can afford with the Morrillo sofa. Its leather upholstery wows with its luxe look and feel. The sectional's sleek, striking silhouette has a linear appeal, lending a chic and curated touch to your space.

Title: Next-Gen DuraPella 2-Piece Dual Power Reclining Modular Loveseat
Description: If you’re looking for a brilliant blend of comfort, quality and flair, the Next-Gen Durapella faux leather power sectional excites and delights with sleek, modern style—priced to put you at ease. Appealing to those with an eye for contemporary design and high-tech features, this slate gray sectional offers adjustable headrests, zero-draw USB charging and a zero-wall recline to maximize your space. Distinctive elements include flared, sheltering armrests and subtly tufted seat cushions that add a high-design touch.

Title: Morrillo 2-Piece Modular Loveseat
Description: Create the highbrow, contemporary living room of your dreams at a price you can afford with the Morrillo loveseat. Its leather upholstery wows with its luxe look and feel. The sectional's sleek, striking silhouette has a linear appeal, lending a chic and curated touch to your space.

Title: Merson 4-Piece Modular Sofa
Description: Seeking a piece to perfectly anchor your space's casual contemporary aesthetic? The pinnacle of chic comfort, the Merson sectional has a universal appeal thanks to its cream-colored upholstery. All that's left for you to do is stretch out and revel in the feeling of style made simple.

Title: Modway Viola Chesterfield Button Tufted Loveseat
Description: Blending whimsical design with regal opulence, the Viola loveseat puts a contemporary twist on a timeless classic. Featuring deep button tufting and roll arms, this vintage yet modern Chesterfield settee is a beautiful focal point for your space. Upholstered in soft and durable stain-resistant performance velvet with dense foam padding and classic cabriole legs, this loveseat is modern elegance at its finest.

Title: Modway Prospect Channel Tufted Loveseat
Description: A fresh take on a familiar classic, the Prospect loveseat fills your living space with the feeling of luxury. Sporting a barrel back design, it comes upholstered in stain-resistant performance velvet. Chic channel tufting updates the Chesterfield-inspired profile with retro modern flair.

Title: McClelland Reclining Loveseat
Description: Large-scale comfort is yours with the McClelland reclining loveseat. With supreme padding and plush upholstery, it's the hero for ultimate relaxation. The extra-wide seating gives you plenty of room to sit back, kick up your heels and enjoy.

Title: McClelland Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: Large-scale comfort is yours with the McClelland power reclining loveseat. With supreme padding and plush upholstery it's the hero for ultimate relaxation. The extra-wide seating gives you plenty of room to sit back, kick up your heels and enjoy.

Title: Merwin Loveseat
Description: Don't give up on comfort to create the curated living room look you crave. Refined yet relaxed, the Merwin loveseat's clean-lined construction and cream colored upholstery seamlessly suit contemporary spaces.

Title: McAdoo Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: Don't simply make do with your living room furniture. Embrace contemporary comfort with the McAdoo power reclining loveseat. It brings a new meaning to relaxed refinement, with caramel faux leather upholstery making a subtle-but-striking style statement. Cozy yet curated in design, this sleek loveseat is sure to become your favorite spot to unwind.

Title: Miravel Loveseat
Description: Marvel at the beauty of a subtle showstopper. The Miravel loveseat appeals to those with a uniquely chic eye for comfort pieces. Its personality is one of playful simplicity, with curving, tapered arms incorporating movement into the structured silhouette. Whether in casual, contemporary or eclectic spaces, this loveseat’s on-trend styling makes an impression.

Title: Mayall 3-Piece Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: Embrace contemporary comfort with the Mayall power reclining sectional. Its richly neutral upholstery and streamlined design give a new meaning to relaxed refinement. An indulgent bustle back and gently scooped seats round out the look. Combining serenity, comfort and function, this sectional will be your favorite place to chill out and decompress.

Title: McCade Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Comfort is yours for the taking with the McCade reclining loveseat with center console. Supportive back is plush in all the right places, enhancing your seating experience. Feel-good fabric is elevated with detailed stitching. Rounded sides are fashion-forward and topped with pillowy armrests. With one easy pull, you’re on your way to endless relaxation.

Title: Manhattan Comfort Trillium Loveseat
Description: Sophistication — now with a little more ritz. This loveseat achieves the enigmatic balance between tasteful refinement and utter decadence of true upscale design. Featuring sumptuous velvet, lush vertical channeling, and a rose gold finish, the luxurious materials are streamlined into clean, precise lines. The overall look is sophisticated, elegant, and powerful.

Title: Maderla Loveseat
Description: If you love the idea of a luxe look that won't break the bank, make yourself comfortable with the alluring walnut brown Maderla loveseat. Designed to look like the real thing, it's wrapped in a practical faux leather loaded with natural tonal variation and a soft hand feel. Appealing to a contemporary taste, its jumbo stitching, tufted styling and pillow top armrests are indulgently comfortable, with a streamlined look that tops off the high-end aesthetic made for everyday living.

Title: Marwood Manual Reclining Loveseat
Description: Inspired by penthouse living, the Marwood loveseat in brown upholstery is high-end design made comfortably affordable. Striking a pose with a clean, boxy profile softened by bustle back styling, this sumptuous seat sports hidden cup holders for an ultra-modern twist.

Title: Leesworth Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: Focus on function. The practical Leesworth power reclining loveseat balances contemporary character and irresistible comfort. Affordable leather match upholstery keeps your style up to speed without breaking the bank. Reclining with the touch of a button, this piece plays well in relaxed, luxe seating areas made for quality time.

Title: Latimer Dual Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: With a streamlined look designed to last, the Latimer power reclining loveseat is sure to become a living room mainstay. The brown upholstery has a laid-back-meets-luxe look well suited to transitional spaces.

Title: Karinne Loveseat
Description: Craving casual refinement? The Karinne loveseat has you covered. Its decidedly contemporary frame cradles sizable cushions in an ultra-soft neutral hue, lightening the mood in your living room with simple style and everyday comfort. Solid and geometric accent pillows perfect the chic-meets-cozy vibe.

Title: Kilmartin Manual Reclining Loveseat
Description: Living room lounging, with a touch of simply stunning character. The Kilmartin reclining loveseat seamlessly complements your contemporary cozy space. Accented by jumbo stitching, the versatile chocolate faux leather is a tried-and-true approach to everyday style. And with only a simple pull needed to extend the recliner on either side, this piece proves homey, inviting design and superb comfort go hand in hand.

Title: Holcroft Manual Reclining Loveseat
Description: Indulge in feel-good luxury and crisp, contemporary style at a price sure to entice. Rest assured, the Holcroft reclining loveseat is covered in a supple, on-trend neutral upholstery for your pleasure. Sumptuous cushioning—made all the more indulgent with pillow top arms—cradles you in comfort from head to toe.

Title: Lucina Loveseat
Description: The Lucina loveseat sets the foundation for all proclaimed casually cool spaces. Adorned in a soft microfiber upholstery, it features track arms and welted seat cushions. Charming accent pillows perfect the laid-back vibe.

Title: Goal Keeper 2-Piece Dual Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: Setting a high bar for style, the Goal Keeper power reclining sectional is casual contemporary personified. Its sleek design is highlighted by track arms, while padded T-cushions soften the look. Trendy light gray upholstery harmonizes beautifully with existing furniture, opening the door to endless possibilities for your living room's modern aesthetic.

Title: Glenvale 3-Piece Dual Power Reclining Modular Loveseat with Console
Description: Longing for chic style without having to sacrifice superb comfort? Look no further than the Glenvale sectional. Edgy upholstery has an inviting softness thanks to the bustle back styling. Contemporary in design and full of convenient features, this sectional is ideal for busy sophisticates in need of a spot to unwind.

Title: Grearview Dual Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: In an earthy brown tone, the Grearview power reclining loveseat with console and adjustable headrest offers the warm feel of fabric and the cool, rustic look of leather. Caressing you in comfort, the faux leather dual-sided recliner features luxurious bustle back cushions, plus jumbo window-pane stitching and nailhead trim for style. Easy View™ power adjustable headrests offer a primo view of the TV even when you're fully reclined. Chill out while you recharge thanks to a USB port built right into the one-touch power control. For added convenience, the center console includes 2 cup holders and a hidden storage compartment.

Title: Rocky Loveseat
Description: Inspired by iconic mid-century designs, this clean-lined loveseat lends any layout a dash of modern flair as it offers a seat for two. A pecan brown finish outfits the angular frame for a warm and natural touch. Up top, the back and seat are filled with foam, supported by sinuous springs and wrapped in polyester upholstery in blue hues for an approachable and inviting look. Tufted details dot the back for a touch of texture.

Title: Faust Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Clean, contemporary style and softly smooth comfort go hand in hand in the Faust power reclining sofa. Rich leather pairs with faux leather to make for a luxurious—yet affordable—place to lounge. Pillow top armrests provide irresistible comfort.

Title: Hogan Manual Reclining Loveseat
Description: With supremely padded back, seat and arm cushions, the Hogan reclining loveseat is the hero of comfort. Microfiber upholstery is soft and sumptuous and the extra-wide seat is large enough to practically accommodate the whole family. Recline the back and kick up your feet to bolster your comfort level even more.

Title: Modway Velour Sofa
Description: Update your home or apartment with the mid-century style and modern day convenience of the Velour sofa. This comfortable living room sofa features a tailored profile with elegant biscuit tufting and two bolster pillows. Covered in chic faux leather upholstery, this luxe sofa has a contemporary appeal you're sure to love.

Title: Gimma 2-Piece Modular Loveseat
Description: Kick back in blissful comfort with the boldly designed Gimma sectional loveseat. Its neutral upholstery gets a deliciously dramatic twist with flange welting and a boucle-like weave on the fabric. Plush feather-fiber blend cushions, deep seats and on-trend track arms merge cozy seating with a contemporary aesthetic.

Title: Keycrest Loveseat
Description: Make the most of your living space when you embrace the mod flair of the Keycrest loveseat. Draped in leather upholstery, its richly relaxed feel invites you to sink in and get cozy in contemporary style.

Title: Latimer Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: With a streamlined look designed to last, the Latimer power reclining sofa is sure to become a living room mainstay. The brown upholstery has a laid-back-meets-luxe look well suited to transitional spaces.

Title: Beamerton Queen Sofa Sleeper
Description: What could be better than the feel of real leather? It’s yours for the taking—at a comfortably affordable price—with the Beamerton sofa sleeper. Rest assured, the seating area and armrests are covered in genuine leather for an incomparable experience. Plush roll arms and distinctive details such as box-stitched cushions and prominent bun feet reflect a sense of richly rustic charm that never goes out of style. Memory foam queen mattress comfortably accommodates overnight guests.

Title: Atwater Living Regency Sofa
Description: Classic lines and contemporary design make the Atwater Living Regency Sofa a timeless piece for living rooms and seating areas. This small spaces sofa is the perfect blend of form and function with ergonomic seating and generous padding. The sinuous spring foundation and pocket coil seat cushions combine to offer ideal comfort with no compromise to style. Upholstered in a soft gray linen-look fabric that is easy to maintain, this sofa achieves a clean and simple silhouette and will work well with any home decor.

Title: Ricmen Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Life is so much better when you can enjoy the pleasure of real leather—at a price to put you at ease. That’s exactly what you get with the Ricmen power reclining sofa. Thanks to leather match upholstery, you've got a reclining sofa that feels like a million bucks but won’t break the bank. Tailored to those with an eye for contemporary design, this power reclining sofa is dressed to impress with an upscale matte finish, clean-lined divided back tufting, distinctive jumbo stitching and chic pillow top armrests. Perhaps best of all: Easy View™ power adjustable headrests let you recline back and still have a primo view of the TV.

Title: Clonmel Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Large-scale comfort is yours with the Clonmel 2-seat reclining power sofa. With supremely padded back, seat and arm cushions, it's the hero for ultimate relaxation. Microfiber upholstery is welcoming, soft and luxuriously covers the extra-wide seats. Recline back and kick up your feet to bolster your comfort level even more.

Title: Falan Sofa
Description: Restrained in design with its light linen-hued upholstery, the Falan sofa is classic style reimagined. Nailhead trim emphasizes the exposed bun feet and roll arms, adding tasteful flair. Versatile but not without eye-catching elements, this is a piece that modern traditionalists will be clamoring for.

Title: Lonoke Sofa
Description: The Lonoke sofa speaks to those drawn to fresh, contemporary style with richly neutral appeal. Subtle and sophisticated, the plush upholstery and dark tri-block legs are a natural complement for so many color schemes. Two accent pillows make the seating even more welcoming. Curling up on this sofa to enjoy a night in is never out of the question.

Title: Alphons Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: Sincere in its styling, the Alphons reclining sofa invites a relaxed sensibility into your space. Its neutral upholstery has a universal appeal, with pull-tab reclining making it easy to kick back in comfort. Providing high-quality functionality at an affordable price, this sofa marries well with a myriad of design aesthetics.

Title: Glynlea Sofa Chaise
Description: Comfortable and chic, the Glynlea sofa chaise completes your living room retreat. Radiating an air of relaxed refinement, it effortlessly elevates your modern aesthetic with its gray upholstery and structured silhouette. And with plenty of room to sit with friends or stretch out on your own, this sofa chaise has both style and seating space to spare.

Title: Merwin Sofa
Description: Don't give up on comfort to create the curated living room look you crave. Refined yet relaxed, the Merwin sofa's clean-lined construction and cream colored upholstery seamlessly suit contemporary spaces.

Title: Savesto 3-Piece Modular Sofa
Description: Looking comfortable. Feeling comfortable. That’s what modern farmhouse living is all about. What better way to embrace the modern farmhouse trend than with the Savesto sectional sofa in ivory white. As casually cool as they are luxurious, the sectional’s reversible back and seat cushions are feather filled and wrapped in a cottony soft fabric. Crisp, clean lines and track arm styling simply work.

Title: Kitching Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: If you're torn between the cool look of leather and warm feel of a microfiber fabric, the Kitching 2 seat power reclining sofa is a style compromise you’re sure to love. Designed for looks and luxuriousness, this decidedly contemporary sofa delivers big comfort without the bulk. Exceptionally clean lines and squared styling make all the difference. A feel-good experience from head to toe, it includes Easy View™ power adjustable headrests that let you fully recline and still have a primo view of the TV. Plus, you can chill out while you recharge thanks to a USB charging port built right into the one-touch power control.

Title: Woodsway Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: Twice the style, twice the comfort. Lounge in the casual luxury of the two-tone Woodsway reclining sofa. Pillow top armrests and a modernized bustle back pamper with the plushness you crave, while the pull tab reclining motion leaves you relaxed and rested.

Title: Cahalan Sofa
Description: Stunning in its simplicity, the beautifully upholstered Cahalan sofa has a soft, neutral tone that speaks to your sense of style. The natural hue is easy on the eyes and blends effortlessly into your decor.

Title: McAdoo Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Don't simply make do with your living room furniture. Embrace contemporary comfort with the McAdoo power reclining sofa. It brings a new meaning to relaxed refinement, with caramel faux leather upholstery making a subtle-but-striking style statement. Cozy yet curated in design, this sleek loveseat is sure to become your favorite spot to unwind.

Title: Austere Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: The Austere reclining sofa lives up to its name—if we’re talking sparing that "puffy" look you might expect from a recliner. When it comes to contemporary style, it doesn't hold back. Subtle touches such as sporty jumbo stitching, nailhead trim and a "weather worn" effect on the upholstery give this handsome piece a buttoned-up appeal and fresh feel.

Title: Neira Right-Arm Facing Sofa
Description: A mastery in minimalism, this right-arm facing sofa makes clean-lined, contemporary style too tempting to resist. The Neira sofa with delightfully neutral microfiber upholstery is punctuated with assorted accent pillows for an added layer of color, comfort and texture. More than simply practical, the loose, reversible cushions infuse a casually cool sensibility.

Title: Nikko Sofa
Description: The Nikko sofa is a stunning and eye-catching piece perfect for adding personality to any space. Made in Malaysia, the Nikko is constructed from sturdy wood padded with soft foam and upholstered in smooth, tan-colored faux leather. The angular frame showcases warm walnut tones and features long legs that form ergonomic armrests. Requiring assembly, sleek channel tufting provides unique visual charm while ensuring plush comfort that lasts. With a nod to mid-century design, the Nikko sofa is an ideal accent piece for the modern home.

Title: Manhattan Comfort Trillium Sofa
Description: Sophistication — now with a little more ritz. This sofa achieves the enigmatic balance between tasteful refinement and utter decadence of true upscale design. Featuring sumptuous velvet, lush vertical channeling, and a rose gold finish, the luxurious materials are streamlined into clean, precise lines. The overall look is sophisticated, elegant, and powerful.

Title: Baxton Studio Charlotte 3-Seater Sofa
Description: Bring a classic, cozy look to your living space with this 3-seater sofa. The Charlotte sofa is constructed with durable wood in a warm walnut brown finish. It features plush foam-padded cushions upholstered in an elegant taupe fabric, making it the best seat in the house. The slatted back and armrests provide a clean look reminiscent of mission-style design. Sophisticated from any angle, this sofa is well suited for the home as well as offices and public reception areas.

Title: Upholstered 3 Seater Sofa
Description: This lovely sofa is sure to provide beauty and comfort for your home. Its contemporary design, which seats up to three comfortably, features polyester upholstery, slightly tapered legs, square arms and a cushioned back and seat for enhanced comfort. Assembly for the sofa is easy with the provided parts, hardware and step-by-step illustrated instructions. Wipe clean with a damp cloth and avoid any harsh chemicals to avoid damaging the finish of the product. Relax and enjoy the company of friends and family in style.

Title: CosmoLiving Highland Sofa Couch
Description: Coming in hot – the CosmoLiving Highland Sofa with Pillows is everything you need and more. This super chic couch is upholstered in a seafoam green velvet fabric and features a simplistic top-notch design. The included 2 accent pillows add to its overall looks – because it’s all about the deets and comfort. Its sturdy metal construction features a gold metal finish, which takes this CosmoLiving piece to a whole other level. Stylish and fab, this couch has a thin track arm style and is guaranteed to glow in any room.

Title: Capehorn Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: Sometimes seeing is believing. Rest assured the Capehorn reclining sofa is every bit as indulgent as it looks. Designed to put you in the lap of luxury, this generously scaled reclining sofa—wrapped in a wonderfully plush and practical granite gray upholstery—sports scooped pillow wrapped armrests and curvaceously cushioned head-neck support for feel-good flair.

Title: Derwin Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Rock the cool look of leather minus the hefty price tag with the Derwin dual reclining loveseat. Rich with tonal variation, the faux leather upholstery sure looks like the real thing. And talk about indulgent comfort. Double stuffed armrests and sumptuous cushions cradle and support in all the right places. A distinctive biscuit back design enhances this recliner's contemporary flair. The center console and handy cup holders complete the experience.

Title: Darlow Loveseat
Description: The Darlow loveseat juxtaposes timeless touches and modern style, bringing an aura of casual luxury to your living room. Softer than most in a navy blue velvet, this piece has a streamlined design that fits easily in smaller spaces. Roll-shaped bolster pillows provide comfort, while narrow track arms and peg legs add a clean, contemporary look. Convenient dual USB port keeps devices close at hand and ready for use.

Title: Coombs Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: The Coombs reclining power loveseat with console makes it hip to be square. Brilliantly boxy profile and wide track arms infuse a highly contemporary look you don’t often find in reclining furniture. Rest assured, the trendy charcoal-tone upholstery is sumptuously soft—and made all the more enticing with deep channel tufting for clean-lined flair. Along with dual cup holders and handy storage in the center console, you’ll enjoy a one-touch power control with USB port to keep devices charged while you unplug.

Title: Correze 2-Piece Dual Power Reclining Modular Loveseat
Description: Truly putting high design into recline, the Correze power reclining sectional with gray leather match upholstery proves that just because you’re a recliner doesn’t mean you have to look like one. Deceptively beautiful, its ultra clean-lined aesthetic is as cool and contemporary as they come. Low-profile back has a super swank look. When you need more support for your head and neck, the press of a button engages the Easy View™ power adjustable headrest, designed to let you lean back and still have a primo view of the TV. Ever-so-subtle curves and stunning stitching perfect the aesthetic.

Title: Center Point Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Not your father's easy chair, the Center Point reclining loveseat with console brilliantly showcases the next generation of recline design. Transform game or movie night into an interactive sensory experience with the touch of a button. Built-in LED lighting lets you choose from a range of colors for a captivatingly cool vibe. Use the light control button to sync with any device within range and cycle through the colors to the beat of the bassline. Sleek faux leather with distinctive stitching enhances the form and function of this simply striking piece.

Title: Manhattan Comfort Vector Sofa
Description: Dynamic. Contemporary. Upscale. Freshen up your living space with the Vector Sofa. Featuring a subtly geometric frame and open cutout feet, the design combines clean architectural lines with posh texture for an eye catching look. Rows of deep button tufts accentuate either end of the sofa, emphasizing the plush cushioning beneath its tailored velvet upholstery. It’s luxe polished brass finish perfects the look.

Title: Atwater Living Lucas Sleeper Sofa with Memory Foam Mattress
Description: The Lucas sleeper sofa is the small space living dream come true. Contemporary design with a touch of classic modern style, this sleeper sofa with linen upholstery and tufted details complements any home design style. Comfort remains the priority with its independently encased coil seat cushion and memory foam pull-out mattress allows your overnight guests to sleep in complete comfort.

Title: Center Line 3-Piece Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: For those seeking to curate a living room retreat that offers superior comfort and a contemporary aesthetic, the sleekly designed Center Line power reclining loveseat with console will become your favorite source of at-home serenity. Rest on leather match upholstery, and use the one-touch power control to recline and adjust the headrests with ease. As you recharge after a long day, your devices can too with USB charging. This loveseat is visually enticing in a stunning cream color, with slope track arms and stitched detailing on the back to enhance its modern appeal.

Title: Cascilla Loveseat
Description: Revamp your sleekly styled living room sanctuary with the Cascilla loveseat. Well-suited to contemporary spaces with a calming neutral upholstery in slate gray, it makes a subtle design statement in your space whether you’re hosting guests or enjoying a night in. Enamoring with its streamlined design, it’s a simply stylish way to sink into superior comfort.

Title: Carten Loveseat
Description: If you’re looking for a brilliant blend of comfort, quality and flair, you’re sure to be enamored with the simply stylish Carten loveseat. Inviting in a warm khaki-hued upholstery, it's neutral enough to slip into any scene. Sporting a streamlined silhouette and cozy cushions, this piece is modern relaxation at its best.

Title: Caretti Loveseat
Description: Easy on the eyes and irresistibly comfortable, the Caretti loveseat is covered in luxurious chenille microfiber in a light, neutral hue that blends beautifully in a room. Wide track arms have a contemporary look and plush cushions cradle you comfortably. Textured accent pillows in complementary colors add subtle contrast.

Title: Camley Loveseat
Description: Grace your living room with the Camley loveseat's casually chic style. Making high comfort highly affordable, this smartly tailored piece is wrapped in a light, neutral upholstery that’s a pleasure for the senses.

Title: Darcy Loveseat
Description: Talk about fine lines and great curves. That’s the beauty of the Darcy loveseat—made to suit your appreciation for clean, contemporary style. A striking flared frame, comfy pillow top armrests and an ultra-soft upholstery that holds up to everyday living complete this fashion statement.

Title: Cranedall 3-Piece Dual Power Reclining Modular Loveseat with Console
Description: Load up on comfort and contemporary style—without hogging up space—with the Cranedall power reclining sectional. Wrapped in a heavyweight padded faux leather with a weathered effect that looks so natural, this super chic sectional with clean lines and jumbo contrast stitching includes not one but two zero wall power recliners requiring minimal space between the wall and chair back. How’s that for space efficiency? Rest assured, the one-touch power control with adjustable positions includes an Easy View™ adjustable headrest that lets you lay back and still have a primo view of the TV. Zero-draw USB plug-ins at your fingertips keep you powered up as you chill out.

Title: Caladeron Loveseat
Description: The Caladeron loveseat combines the clean lines of mid-century style with the cozy softness of your favorite blanket to create your favorite piece of furniture. The textured chenille upholstery evokes a feeling of comfort and security while the faint chevron pattern, bolster pillows and exposed black metal legs add sophistication.

Title: Cahalan Loveseat
Description: Stunning in its simplicity, the beautifully upholstered Cahalan loveseat has a soft, neutral tone that speaks to your sense of style. The natural hue is easy on the eyes and blends effortlessly into your decor.

Title: Betrillo Loveseat
Description: Great design draws inspiration from various places, and the Betrillo loveseat is no exception. Diamond-stitched pattern seen in high-end handbags and luxury car interiors is simply irresistible on this sumptuous, generously padded seating experience. Durable, easy-care leather alternative delivers the look you crave at a price that’s decidedly easy on your purse.

Title: Baxton Studio Clemence Loveseat
Description: Fit for a French aristocrat, this loveseat adds elegance to any room in the home. Constructed from mahogany wood, the Clemence loveseat has a natural whitewashed finish for an antique look. Stunning craftsmanship is shown on the intricately carved frame and woven rattan back. Adding beauty and comfort to your space, the loveseat is upholstered in an elegant ivory fabric and features thick foam padding on the seat and armrests. Two matching accent pillows complete the look.

Title: Beaconfield Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: The Beaconfield power reclining loveseat is made exclusively for those wanting a sumptuously comfortable recliner—that looks nothing like a recliner. Far from the usual leather/faux leather option, this power reclining loveseat is wrapped in a textural chenille upholstery that’s warm and cozy. Tufted box cushions and sloped pillow top armrests lend a rich, contemporary aesthetic, while exposed feet in a dark faux wood finish are something you’d see on an armchair, not a recliner.  What a fashion-forward way to kick back in style.

Title: Claremont Loveseat
Description: This lovely loveseat is sure to provide beauty and comfort for your home. The contemporary design features polyester upholstery, slightly tapered legs, square arms and a cushioned back and seat for enhanced comfort. Assembly for the loveseat is easy with the provided parts, hardware and step-by-step illustrated instructions. Wipe clean with a damp cloth and avoid any harsh chemicals to avoid damaging the finish of the product. Relax and enjoy the company of friends and family in style.

Title: Baxton Studio Charlotte 2-Seater Loveseat
Description: Bring a classic, cozy look to your living space with this 2-seater loveseat. The Charlotte loveseat is constructed with durable wood in a warm walnut brown finish. It features plush foam-padded cushions upholstered in an elegant taupe fabric, making it the best seat in the house. The slatted back and armrests provide a clean look reminiscent of mission-style design. Sophisticated from any angle, this loveseat is well suited for the home as well as offices and public reception areas.

Title: Bales 2-Piece Modular Seating
Description: Be bold with a modern take on seating. The Bales accent chair set has an armless design and carries a checkered taupe upholstery neutral enough to fit in any style while elevating it at the same time. Thanks to its modular design, making the transformation from sofa to chaise is practically effortless.

Title: Alphons Manual Reclining Loveseat
Description: Sincere in its styling, the Alphons reclining loveseat invites a relaxed sensibility into your space. Its neutral upholstery has a universal appeal, with pull-tab reclining making it easy to kick back in comfort. Providing high-quality functionality at an affordable price, this loveseat marries well with a myriad of design aesthetics.

Title: Austere Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: The Austere reclining loveseat with console lives up to its name—if we’re talking sparing that "puffy" look you might expect from a recliner. When it comes to contemporary style, it doesn't hold back. Subtle touches such as sporty jumbo stitching, nailhead trim and a "weather worn" effect on the upholstery provide a buttoned-up appeal and fresh feel. Center console with dual cup holders brings a handy element to this handsome piece.

Title: Backtrack Dual Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: With its fashion-forward sense of style, the Backtrack power reclining loveseat has you covered with high-tech advancements and down-home comfort. Leather match upholstery keeps luxury comfortably within budget. Love being pampered? With the touch of a button, experience the pure bliss of an air massage system (with three settings), or chill out with the heated seat element. Distinctive elements of this power recliner include contemporary waterfall tufting that beautifully goes with the flow and a zero-gravity mechanism further raising the ottoman for better blood flow.

Title: Allena 2-Piece Sectional Loveseat
Description: Contemporary fashion meets streamlined design in the Allena loveseat. You'll love the comfort and style of the suede-like fabric and how easily its warm gray hue blends with your decor. Best of all, the modular design lets you stage the pieces solo or group them together to suit your mood.

Title: Gaspar Dual Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: Longing for chic style without having to sacrifice superb comfort? Look no further than the Gaspar power reclining loveseat. Its real leather, paired with an expertly matched faux leather for affordability, has an inviting softness. Contemporary in design and full of convenient features, this loveseat is ideal for busy sophisticates in need of a spot to unwind.

Title: Sorrento Loveseat
Description: Showcasing minimalist, post-modern design, the Sorrento loveseat adds unique charm to any space. Made in Malaysia, the Sorrento is constructed from sturdy wood padded with soft foam and upholstered in smooth, tan-colored faux leather. The Stunning wood frame showcases a warm walnut brown finish and features long legs that form ergonomic armrests. Requiring assembly, the loveseat is accented with elegant button tufting that lends dimension and character. Featuring an eye-catching design that radiates retro design influence, the Sorrento loveseat elevates the personality of any space.

Title: McClelland Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: Large-scale comfort is yours with the McClelland dual seat reclining sofa. With supreme padding and plush upholstery, it's the hero for ultimate relaxation. The extra-wide seating gives you plenty of room to sit back, kick up your heels and enjoy.

Title: Atwater Living Regency Loveseat
Description: Classic, clean comfort, all in one package. This Regency-style loveseat is upholstered in gray linen, featuring ergonomic pocket coil seating with extra padded cushions and a sinuous spring foundation. Whether you're curling up to read a novel or lounging for a movie marathon, this loveseat will serve its purpose. Pair it with the matching sofa (sold separately).

Title: Brassville Power Reclining Sofa
Description: A large scale means large comfort with the Brassville power reclining sofa. Two wonderfully wide seats are upholstered in a textural, cottony soft fabric. Recline as far back as you please on pillowy arms and headrests at one easy touch of a button. Bustle back tufting adds the right amount of casually cool style.

Title: Brassville Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: A large scale means large comfort with the Brassville reclining sofa. Two wonderfully wide seats are upholstered in a textural, cottony soft fabric. Recline as far back as you please on pillowy arms and headrests. Bustle back tufting adds the right amount of casually cool style.

Title: TOV Furniture Adina Loveseat
Description: Our all-glam, no-nonsense Adina loveseat dares to be different. Handmade with an amply crystal tufted back and perched upon tall curved gold stainless steel legs, this comfortable all velvet piece is sure to dazzle in any room.

Title: Warlin Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: With its decidedly contemporary styling, the Warlin power reclining sofa has a sleek sensibility that seamlessly elevates your living room aesthetic. Explore endless possibilities for comfort with its one-touch power control, zero-gravity reclining and adjustable headrests. A triple-tier back and chic black upholstery round out this simply stunning piece.

Title: Next-Gen Gaucho Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Prepare to be moved, because the Next-Gen Gaucho power reclining sofa is not only fashionable and functional but also a whole lot of fun. With its warm and neutral tones and soft, plush microsuede upholstery, this highly contemporary piece suits your relaxed style. An adjustable headrest, extended ottoman and zero-gravity mechanism are yours at the touch of a button. Given the modern features, scoop seating and ample back pillow support, you’ll find it all too easy to get lost in comfort.

Title: Next-Gen Gaucho Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: Kick back, relax, and enjoy some sports on TV with the Next-Gen Gaucho reclining sofa. You will love its double stuffed pillow top arms and soft-as-suede faux leather upholstery. Family-friendly espresso color and creative stitching add panache. Recline in comfort even if floor space is limited, thanks to the space-efficient zero wall design. This bustle back sofa will always be a win.

Title: Next-Gen Gaucho Power Reclining Sofa
