Description: Kick back, relax, and enjoy some sports on TV with the Next-Gen Gaucho power reclining sofa. You will love its double stuffed pillow top arms and soft-as-suede faux leather upholstery. Family-friendly espresso color and creative stitching add panache. Recline in infinite positions of comfort while you plug in your devices to the convenient USB charging station. This bustle back sofa will always be a win.

Title: Calderwell Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Sleek and streamlined, the Calderwell power reclining sofa draws out your leisure time with its bustle back construction and thickly cushioned armrests. The super soft faux leather gets a high-end tweak with jumbo contrast stitching so you don’t have to sacrifice style for comfort. Sink into the comfortably supportive cushions and stretch your evening as long as you can with the handy USB port to power your devices.

Title: Draycoll Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Built for luxury, the Draycoll power reclining sofa lets you kick back in reliable style. The thick, softly textured chenille upholstery provides a comfy surface on which to lounge. With bustle back construction and thickly cushioned armrests, this piece gives you the dependable support you need to unwind while the handy USB port provides the power to keep your devices going.

Title: Burkner Power Reclining Sofa
Description: If highly contemporary looks and a heavenly feel sit well with you, rest your eyes on the Burkner reclining power sofa. Padded velvet upholstery has a plush high pile that's so soft to the touch. Jumbo contrast stitching adds fashion-forward flair, while radius cut arm frame incorporates cool, curvaceous interest. At your fingertips: one-touch power control with a zero-draw USB plug-in that’s not only convenient but also energy efficient. When it comes to high style at a down-to-earth price, this power reclining sofa really brings it home.

Title: Calderwell Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: Sleek and streamlined, the Calderwell reclining sofa draws out your leisure time with its bustle back construction and thickly cushioned armrests. The super soft faux leather gets a high-end tweak with jumbo contrast stitching so you don’t have to sacrifice style for comfort. Sink into the comfortably supportive cushions and stretch your evening as long as you can.

Title: Denoron Power Reclining Sofa
Description: If highly contemporary looks and a heavenly feel sit well with you, rest your eyes on the Denoran reclining power sofa. Decadently soft, the easy-care faux leather upholstery is enriched with jumbo contrast stitching and dramatic cut-and-sew lines for fashion-forward flair. Radius cut arm frame adds cool, curvaceous interest. At your fingertips: one-touch power control with a zero-draw USB plug-in that’s not only convenient but also energy efficient. When it comes to high style at a down-to-earth price, this power reclining sofa really brings it home.

Title: Wurstrow Triple Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Big and bold, the Wurstrow power reclining sofa with Easy View™ power adjustable headrests delivers comfort at the touch of a button. Easily position the recliner, its headrest and lumbar support to your liking for maximum comfort. Plus, with the convenient USB charging ports, cell phones or laptops can be charged without having to get up. Real leather is paired with expertly matched faux leather to level up affordable luxury. The detailing on the umber-colored upholstery creates a rustic look—perfect for your modern or casual setting.

Title: Boxberg Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: Rock the cool look of leather minus the hefty price tag with the Boxberg reclining sofa. Rich with tonal variation, the indulgently soft upholstery sure looks like the real thing. And talk about indulgent comfort. Double stuffed armrests and sumptuous cushions cradle and support in all the right places. Distinctive scooped stitching enhances this reclining sofa’s contemporary flair.

Title: Huddle-Up Manual Reclining Sofa with Drop Down Table
Description: How can you not cuddle up in the decadently plush Huddle-Up reclining sofa. Spicing things up in a warm and earthy nutmeg brown, this richly styled reclining sofa is covered in a heavyweight padded velvet upholstery for a sense of luxury. Distinctive elements include wraparound padded armrests for a cool twist, along with a few hidden surprises. Pull the center back cushion forward to reveal a drop-down table with dual cup holders and AC power and USB ports. Under the center seat: a roomy storage drawer designed to make every inch of space count!

Title: Earhart Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: Every day is a good day with the Earhart reclining sofa around. Take a load off and forget your worries as you ease back into the luxurious feel of suede-like fabric. Need more comfort and support for your body? Cue the deep seating and tall back. Contrast jumbo stitching adds an element of style to the cushions.

Title: Francesca Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Master statement-making contemporary comfort with the Francesca power reclining sofa. It displays a striking yet streamlined profile, with auburn-hued leather match upholstery balancing natural beauty and refined design. Adjustable headrests and USB charging polish off this richly crafted piece.

Title: Follett Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: A classic split personality, the Follett overstuffed reclining sofa is a real softie on the inside, but all business on the outside. Rest assured, the soft suede-like material is a perfect complement to the faux leather exterior giving it just the right amount of interest and character. A perfectly paired piece, comfortably priced.

Title: Workhorse Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: Saddle up for affordably priced luxury with the Workhorse reclining sofa. Stylish elements of this contemporary reclining sofa include biscuit back cushioning and incredibly thick and sumptuous pillow top armrests. Ultra neutral and wonderfully plush, the warm taupe upholstery is sure to complement an endless array of color schemes. Discreetly placed (inside arm) reclining tab maintains streamlined style.

Title: Nason Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: With feel-good fabric, you’re in for a great time on the Nason reclining sofa. Recline back in infinite positions for comfort. Pillow top arms will make you never want to leave. Waterfall back design and rounded sides add plenty of style to this reclining sofa’s function.

Title: Wilhurst Manual Reclining Sofa with Drop Down Table
Description: Embrace ultimate comfort and style. The Wilhurst reclining sofa is covered in a feel-good blue-gray fabric that’s beautified with puckered stitching and biscuit-back tufting. Its drop-down table with cup holders adds functionality. The sofa’s enticing, generously stuffed armrests make it that much more of a dream scene.

Title: Acieona Manual Reclining Sofa with Drop Down Table
Description: If its quilted bustle back weren’t enough, the Acieona reclining sofa has overstuffed arms that elevate comfort to new heights. Drop down the middle seat’s back to reveal a handy table top and cup holders, as well as an ingenious storage pocket. Ultra-soft chenille upholstery makes this piece beyond luxurious.

Title: Mouttrie Dual Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: A modern addition to a great room, living room or family room, the Mouttri power reclining loveseat in smoke gray lures with its smokin’ hot way to recline. Unique pad-wrapped armrests provide a cool aesthetic and pillowy softness. Loaded with gorgeous texture, the velvety gray upholstery is sumptuously soft—and made all the more enticing with deep channel tufting for clean-lined flair. With an Easy View™ power adjustable headrest that lets you fully recline and still have a primo view of the TV—plus a USB port in each power control—you truly have it all at your fingertips.

Title: Rackingburg Manual Reclining Loveseat
Description: Once you recline in the Rackingburg dual reclining loveseat with the pull of a tab, you will not want to get up. It's that comfortable with bustle backs and padded ottomans. Its look is amazing with dramatic cut and sew lines, jumbo stitching and affordable mahogany leather match upholstery—what a way to relax.

Title: Vacherie Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: When it comes to comfort, style and value, the Vacherie faux leather reclining loveseat in black rocks. Tailored for feel-good flair, its fashion-forward bustle back design is enhanced with sculpted padding on the headrest for cradling support. Channel cushioning along the sides flows into thick, wrapped pillowtop armrests that are truly over the top. And while it might look like you broke the bank, a sumptuously soft leather-like fabric keeps indulgence well within budget.

Title: Stoneland Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: For those that love the cool look of leather but long for the warm feel of fabric, the Stoneland reclining loveseat with console delivers both with ease. Its high-performance padded faux leather is remarkably durable and easy to clean, just the thing for family spaces. Channel-stitched back cushions provide indulgent lumbar support for maximum comfort—not to mention fashion-forward flair.

Title: Burkner Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: If highly contemporary looks and a heavenly feel sit well with you, rest your eyes on the Burkner reclining power loveseat. Padded velvet upholstery has a plush high pile that's so soft to the touch. Jumbo contrast stitching adds fashion-forward flair, while radius cut arm frame incorporates cool, curvaceous interest. At your fingertips: one-touch power control with a zero-draw USB plug-in that’s not only convenient but also energy efficient. When it comes to high style at a down-to-earth price, this power reclining loveseat really brings it home.

Title: Brassville Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: A large scale means large comfort with the Brassville power reclining loveseat. Seats are upholstered in a textural, cottony soft fabric. Recline as far back as you please on pillowy arms and headrests at one easy touch of a button. Bustle back tufting adds the right amount of casually cool style. With a storage console and two convenient cup holders, you’ll want to stay here forever.

Title: Stoneland Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: For those that love the cool look of leather but long for the warm feel of fabric, the Stoneland reclining sofa delivers both with ease. Its high-performance padded faux leather is remarkably durable and easy to clean, just the thing for family spaces. Channel-stitched back cushions provide indulgent lumbar support for maximum comfort—not to mention fashion-forward flair.

Title: Dunwell Dual Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: There is power in beauty with the Dunwell power reclining loveseat. Handsome crackle effect in the upholstery gives the appearance of supple leather but this recliner is all about the warmth of fabric. Contrast jumbo stitching adds a stylish touch. Double stuffed armrests cuff your body in comfort. Adjust your head and recline back with one easy touch.

Title: Follett Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: A classic split personality, the Follett overstuffed reclining loveseat is a real softie on the inside, but all business on the outside. Rest assured, the soft suede-like material is a perfect complement to the faux leather exterior giving it just the right amount of interest and character. A perfectly paired piece, comfortably priced.

Title: Buncrana Dual Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Recline in the modern luxury and convenience of the Buncrana power reclining loveseat with Easy View™ power adjustable headrest. With the touch of a button, you can easily position the recliner and its headrest for maximum comfort. Plus, with the convenient USB charging ports, electronics can be charged without having to get up. The genuine leather upholstery is paired with expertly matched faux leather for affordability. The center console tops off convenience with hidden storage under center armrest—perfect for tucking away remotes. You'll love keeping a drink at your side with the handy stainless steel cup holder.

Title: Workhorse Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Saddle up for affordably priced luxury with the Workhorse reclining loveseat. Stylish elements of this contemporary reclining loveseat with console include biscuit back cushioning and incredibly thick and sumptuous pillow top armrests. Ultra neutral and wonderfully plush, the warm taupe upholstery is sure to complement an endless array of color schemes. Cushioned storage console and two cup holders add comfort and convenience.

Title: Draycoll Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Built for luxury, the Draycoll power reclining loveseat with center console lets you kick back in reliable style. The thick, softly textured chenille upholstery provides a comfy surface on which to lounge. With bustle back construction and thickly cushioned armrests, this piece gives you the dependable, powered support you need to unwind with the convenience of the center console to ease your evening.

Title: Erlangen Dual Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Coming in hot! It’s the Erlangen power reclining loveseat with center console and two cup holders. Top-of-the-line faux leather fabric gives you the upscale look you want for less. Not to mention it feels incredible. The extended ottomans provide extra lengths for leg comfort. Want to watch TV or read in comfort? Easily fix your view with the power adjustable headrest. Complete with dramatic, jumbo stitching, this piece is out to capture your heart with style and comfort.

Title: Olsberg Loveseat
Description: Seamlessly merging classic elements with modern trends, the Olsberg loveseat invites you to bring home the best of then and now. Wrapped in a fabulous steel gray upholstery with sumptuous suede-like feel, this easy-elegant loveseat is dressed to impress with updated roll arm styling and tailored touches including nailhead trim and window pane stitching. What you can’t see is every bit as impressive. Reversible seat cushions crafted with our highest quality coils provide a bit of bounce and plenty of comfort and support.

Title: Almanza Loveseat
Description: With its elegant Charles of London arms, soothing shades and sumptuous comfort, the Almanza loveseat brings a classic look beautifully into the present. Loaded with multi-tonal interest, the loveseat’s wheat-hue upholstery is a fresh choice in neutrals. Marvelously muted ikat pillows enhance the warm, cozy feel, while clean-lined tapered feet in a dark finish infuse modern appeal.

Title: Correze 3-Piece Dual Power Reclining Modular Loveseat with Console
Description: Truly putting high design into recline, the Correze power loveseat with gray leather match upholstery proves that just because you’re a recliner doesn’t mean you have to look like one. Deceptively beautiful, its ultra clean-lined aesthetic is as cool and contemporary as they come. Low-profile back has a super swank look. When you need more support for your head and neck, the press of a button engages the Easy View™ power adjustable headrest, designed to let you lean back and still have a primo view of the TV. Ever-so-subtle curves and stunning stitching perfect the aesthetic.

Title: Calderwell Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Sleek and streamlined, the Calderwell reclining loveseat with center console draws out your leisure time with its bustle back construction and thickly cushioned armrests. The super soft faux leather gets a high-end tweak with jumbo contrast stitching so you don’t have to sacrifice style for comfort. Sink into the comfortably supportive cushions and stretch your evening as long as you can with the added convenience of a center console at your fingertips.

Title: Kempten Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: You don’t just want to recline. You want to recline in high design. Wrapped in a fabulous black faux leather upholstery, the Kempten reclining loveseat with 42" high back is everything you long for—and then some. Ultra clean lines, subtle curves and sumptuous comfort make it a sight for sore eyes and tired muscles. Here’s the showstopper: ambient blue LED lighting along the loveseat base for a movie theater experience enjoyed from the convenience of home.

Title: Coombs Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: The Coombs reclining loveseat with console makes it hip to be square. Brilliantly boxy profile and wide track arms infuse a highly contemporary look you don’t often find in reclining furniture. Rest assured, the trendy charcoal-tone upholstery is sumptuously soft—and made all the more enticing with deep channel tufting for clean-lined flair. Dual cup holders and storage in the center console are a mighty handy touch.

Title: Wurstrow Triple Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Big and bold, the Wurstrow power reclining loveseat with console and Easy View™ power adjustable headrests delivers comfort at the touch of a button. Easily position the recliner, its headrest and lumbar support to your liking for maximum comfort. Plus, with the convenient USB charging ports, cell phones or laptops can be charged without having to get up. Real leather is paired with expertly matched faux leather to level up affordable luxury. The detailing on the umber-colored upholstery creates a rustic look ideal for your modern or casual setting. The center console tops off convenience with hidden storage under center armrest—perfect for tucking away remotes. You'll love keeping drinks within reach with the two stainless steel cup holders.

Title: Morelos Loveseat
Description: When it comes to style, less is more with the Morelos loveseat. Taking minimalism to the max, it wows with a crisp, clean profile, sleek track arms and a simplified 2-over-2 cushion design. Dressed to impress those who demand the best, this ultra-contemporary loveseat sports leather match upholstery for incomparable comfort and value.

Title: Rackingburg Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: Once you recline in the Rackingburg dual reclining power loveseat at the push of a button, you will not want to get up. It's that comfortable with bustle backs and padded ottomans. Its look is amazing with dramatic cut and sew lines, jumbo stitching and affordable mahogany leather match upholstery—what a way to relax.

Title: Hazenburg Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: For those that love the cool look of leather but long for the warm feel of fabric, the Hazenburg power reclining loveseat delivers both with ease. Its high-performance padded faux leather is remarkably durable and easy to clean, just the thing for family spaces. When it’s time to relax, the one-touch power control puts the perfect position at your fingertips. Channel-stitched back cushions provide indulgent lumbar support for maximum seating comfort—not to mention fashion-forward flair.

Title: Gleston Loveseat
Description: Raise your standard of living with the Gleston loveseat in onyx black. Reserved exclusively for those with a penchant for high-glam home decor, this ultra-chic loveseat is dressed to impress with a clean-lined profile, 2-over-2 cushion styling and sleek track arms punctuated with nailhead trim. Easy on the eyes and alluring to the touch, this decidedly contemporary loveseat is covered in a low-pile soft velvet that’s impossible to resist. Abstract-patterned throw pillows enhance the posh appeal.

Title: Denoron Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: If highly contemporary looks and a heavenly feel sit well with you, rest your eyes on the Denoran reclining power loveseat. Decadently soft, the easy-care faux leather upholstery is enriched with jumbo contrast stitching and dramatic cut-and-sew lines for fashion-forward flair. Radius cut arm frame adds cool, curvaceous interest. At your fingertips: one-touch power control with a zero-draw USB plug-in that’s not only convenient but also energy efficient. When it comes to high style at a down-to-earth price, this power reclining loveseat really brings it home.

Title: Samperstone 3-Piece Power Reclining Modular Loveseat
Description: City sleek living. The Samperstone loveseat is loaded with luxury. An ultra-stylish diamond stitch design pumps up the piece with eye-catching drama. And talk about style with purpose. This loveseat supports you with a high back and faux leather upholstery in gorgeous gray. Its USB charging station powers up your tech life as you recline in comfort. Cheers to the stainless steel cup holders, too.

Title: Renly Loveseat
Description: With its graceful curves and rich elements, the Renly loveseat in slate blue embraces a sense of tradition in a way that feels fresh and new. A favorite among romantics, the loveseat's Charles of London arms and rollback profile are beauty to behold. Crisp and clean 2-over-2 cushion styling and monochromatic throw pillows prove that less can be more.

Title: McCaskill Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Sink into the supple McCaskill reclining loveseat and prepare to be swept off your feet—literally. Its extra-wide seats and plush cushioning are divinely comfortable. It's wrapped in decadently soft leather match upholstery for a luxurious experience, saving you money without sacrificing style. Prominent stitching, linear track arms and a goes-with-anything gray hue add stylish touches. Keep beverages and remotes close at hand thanks to the center console and cup holders.

Title: Boxberg Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Rock the cool look of leather minus the hefty price tag with the Boxberg reclining loveseat with console. Rich with tonal variation, the indulgently soft upholstery sure looks like the real thing. And talk about indulgent comfort. Double stuffed armrests and sumptuous cushions cradle and support in all the right places. Distinctive scooped stitching enhances this reclining loveseat’s contemporary flair. Cup holders and hidden storage complete the experience.

Title: Altonbury Loveseat
Description: Tailor your space with the tidy structure of the Altonbury loveseat. Decorative stitching and button tufting on the box cushion make for a very neat appearance. With leather match upholstery, this piece prioritizes luxury at a price you can afford.

Title: Ricmen Dual Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Life is so much better when you can enjoy the pleasure of real leather—at a price to put you at ease. That’s exactly what you get with the Ricmen power reclining loveseat with adjustable headrest. Thanks to leather match upholstery, you've got a reclining loveseat that feels like a million bucks but won’t break the bank. Tailored to those with an eye for contemporary design, this power reclining loveseat is dressed to impress with an upscale matte finish, clean-lined divided back tufting, distinctive jumbo stitching and chic pillow top armrests. Perhaps best of all: Easy View™ power adjustable headrests let you recline back and still have a primo view of the TV.

Title: Stoneland Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: For those that love the cool look of leather but long for the warm feel of fabric, the Stoneland power reclining loveseat delivers both with ease. Its high-performance padded faux leather is remarkably durable and easy to clean, just the thing for family spaces. When it’s time to relax, the one-touch power control puts the perfect position at your fingertips. Channel-stitched back cushions provide indulgent lumbar support for maximum seating comfort—not to mention fashion-forward flair.

Title: Garristown Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Wouldn’t it be great if the cool look of leather could be blended with the warm feel of fabric? Find a beautiful balance of contemporary style and cozy comfort in the Garristown power reclining sofa. Sporting a sultry gray UltraPella fabric, this chic faux leather sofa is empowering in every which way. The Easy View™ power headrest allows you the perfect view of the TV, even when you’re lying back. And if you’re never far from your cell phone or laptop, you’ll surely appreciate the one-touch power control with USB charging port.

Title: HyllMont Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: The Hyllmont power reclining sofa in trendy gray is proof of just how far recliners have come when it comes to form and function. Ultra cool and contemporary, this fully loaded power reclining sofa makes it so easy to social distance and make home your haven. Dressed to impress with diamond stitching inspired by sports car interiors, this reclining sofa is covered in a fabulous faux leather with pebbled effect for authenticity. High-tech advancements include a one-touch power control with Easy View™ adjustable headrest and USB plug-in and a drop-down table with cup holders, flip-up light and AC power/USB plug-ins.

Title: Hartsdale 3-Piece Power Reclining Modular Sofa Chaise
Description: Fit for the comfort seeker in your household, the Hartsdale power sectional has that casual contemporary sensibility you love. Pillow top cushions with a feather-fiber blend are simply sumptuous. Chic and subtle chenille microfiber upholstery weaves in so much style.

Title: Center Line 3-Piece Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: For those seeking to curate a living room retreat that offers superior comfort and a contemporary aesthetic, the Center Line sleekly designed power reclining sectional will become your favorite source of at-home serenity. Rest on leather match upholstery, and use the one-touch power control to recline and adjust the headrests with ease. As you recharge after a long day, your devices can too with USB charging. This sectional is visually enticing in a luxe dark gray, with slope track arms and stitched detailing on the back to enhance its modern appeal.

Title: Sophie 3-Piece Modular Sofa Chaise
Description: With sumptuously soft velvet upholstery, the Sophie sectional puts your love of luxury on display. The clean-cut appearance of this light gray sectional blends beautifully with your tasteful surroundings. Best of all, the modular design lets you stage the pieces solo or rearrange them for a look that's always fresh.

Title: Gimma 3-Piece Modular Sofa with Chaise
Description: Kick back in blissful comfort with the boldly designed Gimma sectional sofa with chaise. Its neutral upholstery gets a deliciously dramatic twist with flange welting and a boucle-like weave on the fabric. Plush feather-fiber blend cushions, deep seats and on-trend track arms merge cozy seating with a contemporary aesthetic.

Title: Zada 2-Piece Sectional with Chaise
Description: Decadently soft microfiber lends big-time comfort and style to the Zada sectional. A warm, welcoming contemporary design is on full display with its wide track arms and clean lines. Fun faux fur toss pillows bring a bit of glam. A matching faux fur ottoman is available separately.

Title: Greaves Sofa Chaise
Description: Make your living space that much more livable with the Greaves sofa chaise. You’re sure to love its L-shaped design that makes it all too enticing to kick up your heels and relax. The fact that this sofa chaise can be positioned with the chaise on the right or the left only adds to its appeal. And you can rest assured that its ultra-neutral upholstery with a textural chenille feel goes with anything and everything. Wide track armrests, box cushions and tapered feet lend a clean, contemporary aesthetic.

Title: Kestrel Sofa Chaise
Description: Dressed to impress and put to the test. If you love the idea of beauty with substance, rest your eyes on the Kestrel sofa chaise. Designed for looks and longevity, this decidedly modern sofa chaise with clean lines and flared arms includes our exclusive platform foundation system made to resist sagging and maintain a tight, wrinkle-free aesthetic. Wrapped in an easy-breezy driftwood-tone upholstery, it’s what's new in neutrals.

Title: Strikefirst Power Reclining Sofa
Description: An exceptional winner in home fashion, the Strikefirst power reclining sofa shows us the beauty of today’s best recliners. Bold diamond stitching on the back and seat invites you to sit and stay awhile. Real leather brings feel-good pleasure and exceptional wear, while a skillfully matched faux leather upholstery keeps luxury right on budget. Enjoy hidden cup holders and plenty of storage, as well as a drop-down table. When you want to get maximum relaxation, use the power adjustable headrest and extended ottoman for additional comfort. Each power control contains USB and wireless charging, plus a hidden cup holder. A zero gravity mechanism completes the luxurious design.

Title: Benlocke 3-Piece Manual Reclining Modular Sectional with Chaise
Description: With plush cushions and wraparound pillow top arms, the Benlocke sectional takes comfort to a whole new level. Its herringbone-patterned velvet upholstery requires minimal care, making this relaxation station ideal for homes with children and pets. The reclining feature engages with the pull of a tab, putting pleasure and instant relaxation at your fingertips.

Title: Dorsten Sofa Chaise
Description: The Dorsten sofa chaise has the corner on ultra-contemporary style made for easy, everyday living. Upholstered in a plush slate chenille, it takes neutral sophistication to another level. And talk about accommodating. Thanks to a versatile chaise with movable ottoman and reversible seat cushions, you can enjoy the chaise on either side to suit your space.

Title: Clonmel Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: Large-scale comfort is yours with the Clonmel reclining power loveseat. With supremely padded back, seat and arm cushions, it's the hero for ultimate relaxation. Microfiber upholstery is welcoming, soft and luxuriously covers the extra-wide seats. Recline back and kick up your feet to bolster your comfort level even more.

Title: Warnerton Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Your modern living room awaits with the Warnerton power reclining sofa. Complete with practical faux leather upholstery, one-touch power controls, adjustable headrests and USB ports, it makes finding the best seat in the house a breeze. What a perk that the center seat is crafted with a drop-down table with power/USB plug-ins and dual cup holders. Armrests with storage and cup holders keep drinks, snacks and remotes close by. Go ahead—treat yourself to a high-design home theater experience, priced to put you at ease.

Title: Mitchiner Manual Reclining Sofa with Drop Down Table
Description: Your to-do list is complete, now it’s time for ultimate relaxation. This double reclining sofa is plush in all the right places, and will support you longer than you can binge watch your favorite TV show. The neutral upholstery is ready for a patterned throw pillow and some of your time. The middle seat’s back drops down into convenient table top with cup holders, the perfect resting spot for tablets and magazines.

Title: Arroyo Sofa Chaise
Description: For a fresh spot in your space, turn to the Arroyo sofa chaise. This invigorating piece breathes warmth into your home with its striking caramel faux leather upholstery, modern bolster pillows and tapered legs. Wind down at the end of a long day and sink into this canyon of comfort.

Title: Enderlin Sofa
Description: A brilliant take on urban chic styling, the Enderlin sofa in vibrant blue makes high design highly affordable. Distinctive elements include quilted channel stitching for clean-lined allure and a velvety soft fabric you'll love living with. Sculptural track arms up the wow factor. If you’re looking for big style on more modest scale, you’re sure to appreciate this sofa’s space-conscious 82" wide profile.

Title: Cascilla Sofa Chaise
Description: Revamp your sleekly styled living room sanctuary with the Cascilla sofa chaise. Well-suited to contemporary spaces with a calming neutral upholstery in slate gray, it makes a subtle design statement in your space whether you’re hosting guests or enjoying a night in. Enamoring with its streamlined design, it’s a simply stylish way to sink into superior comfort.

Title: Renly Sofa
Description: With its graceful curves and rich elements, the Renly sofa in slate blue embraces a sense of tradition in a way that feels fresh and new. A favorite among romantics, the sofa’s Charles of London arms and rollback profile are beauty to behold. Crisp and clean 2-over-2 cushion styling and monochromatic throw pillows prove that less can be more.

Title: Hollyann Sofa
Description: Cool takes a new shape in your living room with the Hollyann sofa. Rounding out your stylish, urban space, this piece sports a velvety soft upholstery and sleek, tapered legs. Curl up with comfort, and really turn around your home decor.

Title: Roman Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Grounded with its umber hue, positively luxurious with a mix of real leather and expertly matched faux leather. The spacious Roman power reclining sofa indulges you in contemporary comfort with one-touch power controls and adjustable headrests. Its upholstery elevates your aesthetic with an eye-catching crackle effect, simultaneously amplifying the large-scale silhouette.

Title: Catanzaro Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Let the luxury of the Catanzaro 2-seat power reclining sofa carry you away. Decidedly modern, with clean-lined divided back styling, this reclining sofa entices with a combination of genuine leather and expertly matched faux leather for a supple feel. Even when you’re kicking back you’ll still be perfectly positioned to read or watch TV thanks to the Easy View™ power adjustable headrest. And how’s this for a bonus: a convenient USB charging port located in the power control, so you can recharge while you chill.

Title: Maderla Sofa
Description: If you love the idea of a luxe look that won't break the bank, make yourself comfortable with the alluring walnut brown Maderla sofa. Designed to look like the real thing, it's wrapped in a practical faux leather loaded with natural tonal variation and a soft hand feel. Appealing to a contemporary taste, its jumbo stitching, tufted styling and pillow top armrests are indulgently comfortable, with a streamlined look that tops off the high-end aesthetic made for everyday living.

Title: Norlou Sofa
Description: Looking for a peaceful retreat? The Norlou sofa is at your service. Its super plush padding and substantial pillowtop armrests make for an easy getaway. The sofa's subtle warm taupe hue and pleasantly soft texture are so appealing that you won’t want to leave.

Title: Navi Sofa
Description: If you love the cool look of leather but long for the warm feel of fabric, you can take comfort in the Navi sofa. Wrapped in a fabulous faux leather with a weathered hue and hint of pebbly texture to resemble the real deal, this decidedly modern sofa proves less is more. Elements include angled side profiling and track armrests wrapped with a layer of pillowy softness for that little something extra. Prominent jumbo stitching and clean-lined divided back styling lend fashion-forward flair.

Title: Belcampo Loveseat
Description: The sumptuously comfortable Belcampo loveseat makes it easy to camp out in style. Inspired by quality menswear, the linen-weave upholstery naturally works in a rich jute tone. Crisply tailored box cushions and roll arms give the loveseat a modern classic shape sure to complement so many aesthetics. Sporting shades of warm terracotta and indigo blue, the pair of decorative pillows add fashionable flair.

Title: Altonbury Sofa
Description: Tailor your space with the tidy structure of the Altonbury sofa. Decorative stitching and button tufting on the box cushion make for a very neat appearance. With leather match upholstery, this piece prioritizes luxury at a price you can afford.

Title: Acieona Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: If its quilted bustle back weren’t enough, the Acieona loveseat has overstuffed arms that elevate comfort to new heights. Center console has handy cup holders as well as an ingenious storage compartment. Ultra-soft chenille upholstery makes this piece beyond luxurious.

Title: Miravel Loveseat
Description: Marvel at the beauty of a subtle showstopper. The Miravel loveseat appeals to those with a uniquely chic eye for comfort pieces. Its personality is one of playful simplicity, with curving, tapered arms incorporating movement into the structured silhouette. Whether in casual, contemporary or eclectic spaces, this loveseat’s on-trend styling makes an impression.

Title: Bolzano Manual Reclining Loveseat
Description: Looking for a sleek 2-seater? The Bolzano reclining loveseat is your saving grace. Coffee brown microfiber cover is soft to the touch and padded for your comfort. Beautiful lines exhibit exceptional craftsmanship. Smaller-than-normal scale brings quality to even compact spaces. Now you can worry less about finding the perfect recliner for your room and relax more.

Title: Hallstrung Dual Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Fashion-forward style. Sumptuous leather feel and appeal. Total comfort at your fingertips. It’s all yours for the taking with the Hallstrung power reclining loveseat with console. Wrapped in a rich chocolate brown upholstery, this decidedly contemporary power loveseat tantalizes the senses in so many ways. Rest assured, leather match upholstery makes luxury affordable. Upping the comfort with 44" high back styling, this power loveseat truly caters from head to toe. An Easy View™ power adjustable headrest allows you to lean back while propping up your head—perfect for chilling out in front of the TV—while an extended ottoman lets you stretch out all the more. And with a USB port in each power control panel, you hardly have to move a muscle to stay powered up.

Title: Enderlin Loveseat
Description: A brilliant take on urban chic styling, the Enderlin loveseat in vibrant blue makes high design highly affordable. Distinctive elements include quilted channel stitching for clean-lined allure and a velvety soft fabric you'll love living with. Sculptural track arms up the wow factor. If you’re looking for big style on more modest scale, you’re sure to appreciate this loveseat’s space-conscious 59" wide profile.

Title: Miravel Sofa
Description: Marvel at the beauty of a subtle showstopper. The Miravel sofa appeals to those with a uniquely chic eye for comfort pieces. Its personality is one of playful simplicity, with curving, tapered arms incorporating movement into the structured silhouette. Whether in casual, contemporary or eclectic spaces, this sofa’s on-trend styling makes an impression.

Title: Kennewick Loveseat
Description: Melding the contemporary style you love with the cozy feel you crave, the Kennewick loveseat turns easy living into an art form. The loveseat’s ultra-linear frame is enriched with generous bolster arm pillows and an indulgent velvet upholstery that’s the stuff dreams are made of. Slim track arms, sleek tapered feet and distinctive accent stitching are among the finer details that set this loveseat apart.

Title: Nason Manual Reclining Loveseat
Description: With feel-good fabric, you’re in for a great time on the Nason reclining loveseat. Recline back in infinite positions for comfort. Pillow top arms will make you never want to leave. Waterfall back design and rounded sides add plenty of style to this reclining loveseat’s function.

Title: Tibbee Loveseat
Description: Inspired by high-end menswear, the Tibbee loveseat is tailored to perfection and dressed to impress. Button-less tufting on the back cushions is richly subtle. Sleek, flared armrests enhance Tibbee’s clean-lined, simply striking profile.

Title: Macleary Loveseat
Description: Get comfortable with a modern aesthetic when you add the Macleary loveseat to your home or office. A clean, linear design fits so well into any sophisticated space. With velvet upholstery and a sleek metal accent leg, this piece elevates your decor to up-to-the-minute cool.

Title: Corvara Loveseat
Description: The sumptuously soft Corvara loveseat invites you to slip into something more comfortable—and contemporary. Elements include sloped setback armrests that go with the flow, reversible cushions and velvet dark gray upholstery that feels every bit as wonderful as it looks. Patterned toss pillows “neutralize” in a high-design way.

Title: Cashton Loveseat
Description: Need a simple style refresh? Liven up your living room essentials with the Cashton loveseat. A chunky silhouette holds invitingly ample cushioning you'll long to lounge in. Crosshatched upholstery and accent pillows give the otherwise casual design a delightful visual texture that's perfect for settings from classic to contemporary.

Title: Roman Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Grounded with its umber hue, positively luxurious with a mix of real leather and expertly matched faux leather. The spacious Roman power reclining sofa indulges you in contemporary comfort with one-touch power controls and adjustable headrests. Its upholstery elevates your aesthetic with an eye-catching crackle effect, simultaneously amplifying the large-scale silhouette.

Title: Arcola Loveseat
Description: If modern subtlety is your style, settle into the heavenly texture of the Arcola loveseat. The tremendously soft upholstery has a slight herringbone pattern that adds depth and richness to the java color. The metal accent legs elevate this piece as well as the style of it and add a decidedly chic sense to your space.

Title: Lonoke Loveseat
Description: The Lonoke loveseat speaks to those drawn to fresh, contemporary style with richly neutral appeal. Subtle and sophisticated, the plush upholstery and dark tri-block legs are a natural complement for so many color schemes. Two accent pillows make the seating even more welcoming. Curling up on this loveseat to enjoy a night in is never out of the question.

Title: Hartsdale 2-Piece Power Reclining Modular Loveseat
Description: Fit for the comfort seeker in your household, the Hartsdale power sectional has that casually cool sensibility you love. Pillow top cushions with a feather-fiber blend are simply sumptuous. Chic and subtle chenille microfiber upholstery weaves in so much style.

Title: Mahoney Loveseat
Description: Reliable comfort, reimagined. Suitable for a variety of spaces, the Mahoney loveseat invites you to say hello to approachable, everyday style. It expertly balances classic details, like a tufted back, with a contemporary structure. Satisfyingly soft, multi-hued upholstery rounds out the relaxed feel of this smartly designed piece.

Title: Barrali Loveseat
Description: First impressions are everything, and the Barrali loveseat sets the bar. Chenille gray fabric turns heads with its plushness—simply fabulous from top to bottom. Clean lines speak to a fresh aesthetic, accentuated by nickel-tone nailhead trim for the wow effect. Throw pillows in contemporary abstract designs infuse delightful textures. This loveseat is a stunning ode to all that is fashion.

Title: Dendron Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: The structured style of the Dendron power reclining loveseat brings a sense of rich refinement to your space at a reasonable price. A contemporized bustle back makes this chic piece supremely comfortable, while curved padded arm rests provide a clean-lined design element. With its curated look and a blend of real and faux leather, you'll be lounging in luxury.

Title: Alessandro Dual Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Impressive in scale while keeping an air of refinement, the Alessandro power reclining loveseat stuns with soft, supple leather match upholstery in garnet. Sink into the seating area and cater to your comfort with one-touch power reclining and an adjustable headrest. Complete with USB charging, this loveseat makes a surefire statement in your contemporary living room.

Title: Texline 3-Piece Dual Power Reclining Modular Loveseat
Description: Truly putting high design into recline, the Texline power reclining sectional with gray leather match upholstery proves that just because you’re a recliner doesn’t mean you have to look like one. Deceptively beautiful, its ultra clean-lined aesthetic is as cool and contemporary as they come. Low-profile back has a super swank look. When you need more support for your head and neck, the press of a button engages the Easy View™ power adjustable headrest, designed to let you lean back and still have a primo view of the TV. The zero wall design requires minimal space between wall and chair back, and indulgent pillow top seating gives an added layer of comfort.

Title: Cranedall 2-Piece Dual Power Reclining Modular Loveseat
Description: Load up on comfort and contemporary style—without hogging up space—with the Cranedall power reclining sectional. Wrapped in a heavyweight padded faux leather with a weathered effect that looks so natural, this super chic sectional with clean lines and jumbo contrast stitching includes not one but two zero wall power recliners requiring minimal space between the wall and chair back. How’s that for space efficiency? Rest assured, the one-touch power control with adjustable positions includes an Easy View™ adjustable headrest that lets you lay back and still have a primo view of the TV. Zero-draw USB plug-ins at your fingertips keep you powered up as you chill out.

Title: Kitching Dual Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: If you're torn between the cool look of leather and warm feel of a microfiber fabric, the Kitching power reclining loveseat is a style compromise you’re sure to love. Designed for looks and luxuriousness, this decidedly contemporary loveseat delivers big comfort without the bulk. Exceptionally clean lines and squared styling make all the difference. A feel-good experience from head to toe, it includes Easy View™ power adjustable headrests that let you fully recline and still have a primo view of the TV. Plus, you can chill out while you recharge thanks to a USB charging port built right into the one-touch power control.

Title: Huddle-Up Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: How can you not cuddle up in the decadently plush Huddle-Up reclining loveseat? Spicing things up in a warm and earthy nutmeg brown, this richly styled reclining loveseat is covered in a heavyweight padded velvet upholstery for a sense of luxury. Distinctive elements include wraparound padded armrests for a cool twist. Offering hidden storage, dual cup holders and and AC power and USB ports, the comfortably cushioned center console adds a home movie theater element.

Title: Vayda Loveseat
Description: Laid-back luxury meets neutral practicality in the Vayda loveseat. Taking its cues from contemporary design, this clean-lined piece is outfitted with angular arms for a layer of geometric expression. Softly upholstered, sizable cushions keep you comfortable, while black faux fur accent pillows bring a touch of soft glam. With this loveseat, winning style and superb functionality go hand in hand.

Title: Lainee Loveseat
Description: Smooth to the touch and soft as velvet. The irresistibly comfortable Lainee loveseat is upholstered in a head-turning honey color that delights with a delicious look and feel. This plush loveseat has a single cushion to prevent sagging and seat separation. The richly relaxed aesthetic is perfected by posh toss pillows.

Title: Fermoy Loveseat
Description: The Fermoy loveseat’s timeless flair is easy to love. Curvaceous Charles of London arms beautifully go with the flow, as does this loveseat’s rich pewter-tone upholstery for a new twist on neutral. Fine details including elegantly turned bun feet and four designer toss pillows perfect the aesthetic.

Title: Warnerton Dual Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Your modern living room awaits with the Warnerton power dual-sided reclining loveseat. Complete with practical faux leather upholstery, one-touch power controls, adjustable headrests and USB ports, it makes finding the best seat in the house a breeze. Cup holders and a storage console keep drinks, snacks and remotes close by. Go ahead—treat yourself to a high-design home theater experience, priced to put you at ease.

Title: Zarina Sofa
Description: The Zarina sofa lets you make a high-style statement at a comfortably affordable price. Richly traditional roll arms are given a modern punch care of oversized nailhead trim in a black nickel-tone finish. Linen-weave upholstery in fresh and clean sandstone beige is complemented with designer pillows that add texture and sophistication.

Title: Maggie Loveseat
Description: Classic comfort gets a mod twist with the Maggie loveseat. Its minimalistic approach and structured silhouette bring a clean-lined design element to your living room. Sink into the positively plush cushions while relaxing solo, or curl up with a glass of wine while hosting guests. And with neutral upholstery that suits both casual and contemporary spaces, this loveseat offers endless style possibilities.

Title: Alandari Sofa
Description: Sporting a pleasing roll arm and classic 3-over-3 cushion styling, the Alandari sofa in soft gray exudes an easy elegance sure to please. Feel-good upholstery with linen texturing is made for everyday luxury. Muted-tone toss pillows are a soothing, sophisticated complement.

Title: Center Point Manual Reclining Sofa with Drop Down Table
Description: Not your father's easy chair, the Center Point reclining sofa with drop-down table brilliantly showcases the next generation of recline design. Transform game or movie night into an interactive sensory experience with the touch of a button. Built-in LED lighting lets you choose from a range of colors for a captivatingly cool vibe. Use the light control button to sync with any device within range and cycle through the colors to the beat of the bassline. Sleek faux leather with distinctive stitching enhances the form and function of this simply striking piece.

Title: Draycoll Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: Built for luxury, the Draycoll reclining sofa lets you kick back in reliable style. The thick, softly textured chenille upholstery provides a comfy surface on which to lounge. With bustle back construction and thickly cushioned armrests, this piece gives you the dependable support you need to unwind after a trying day.

Title: Nicorvo Sofa
Description: Enticing with a coffee brown faux leather, beautified with a gently weathered effect and designer stitching, the Nicorvo sofa merges a richly traditional sense of style with modern comfort. Roll arms, turned bun feet and prominent nailhead trim incorporate distinctive character. Four plush accent pillows are a sumptuous touch.

Title: Belcampo Sofa
Description: The sumptuously comfortable Belcampo sofa makes it easy to camp out in style. Inspired by quality menswear, the linen-weave upholstery naturally works in a rich jute tone. Crisply tailored box cushions and roll arms give the sofa a modern classic shape sure to complement so many aesthetics. Sporting shades of warm terracotta and indigo blue, four decorative pillows add fashionable flair.

Title: Kananwood Sofa
Description: The sumptuously styled Kananwood sofa proves that a richly traditional look doesn’t have to break the bank. Flared effect gives the classic roll arms a relaxed feel, while the choice of a plush chenille upholstery in oatmeal is earthy elegance at its best. Distinctively turned bun feet in a dark finish add to the sofa's substantial presence.

Title: Donlen Sofa
Description: Dressed in glorious gray faux leather, the Donlen sofa is certain to be the center of attention. With tasteful tufting, padded armrests and a sleek tapered design, it combines style and comfort. This sofa's generous scale lets you kick back and relax at home solo or when hosting friends.

Title: Fermoy Sofa
Description: The Fermoy sofa’s timeless flair is easy to love. Curvaceous Charles of London arms beautifully go with the flow, as does this sofa’s rich pewter-tone upholstery for a new twist on neutral. Fine details including elegantly turned bun feet and four designer toss pillows perfect the aesthetic.

Title: Josanna Sofa
Description: With a timeless classic Chesterfield styling that's very much in vogue, the Josanna sofa makes a brilliant statement. Its beautifully neutral silvery gray velvet fabric looks as good as it feels. Nailhead trim, button tufting and high shelter arms give the sofa an effortlessly elegant appeal. The hidden leg design is an on-trend addition for modern spaces.

Title: Velletri Sofa
Description: For the style enthusiast on a mission. The Velletri sofa takes a unique approach to design. Two back cushions flaunt a vintage-inspired “Paris” script. Throw pillows continue the charm with gray-infused scroll and plaid patterns. Flared arms and neutral hue lend to transitional appeal. Covered in a luxurious linen-like chenille, its softness and luxurious comfort will keep you coming back.

Title: Almanza Sofa
Description: With its elegant Charles of London arms, soothing shades and sumptuous comfort, the Almanza sofa brings a classic look beautifully into the present. Loaded with multi-tonal interest, the sofa’s wheat-hue upholstery is a fresh choice in neutrals. Marvelously muted accent pillows include ikat patterning, diamond texturing and a crisp laundry stripe for a warm, cozy feel, while clean-lined tapered feet in a dark finish infuse modern appeal.

Title: Deakin Sofa
Description: Stealing the show in on-trend, wonderfully plush upholstery, the Deakin sofa takes center stage with its comfort and contemporary look. A generous seat depth makes this high-design piece comfortable enough for easy everyday living. Faux fur accent pillows add a fun flair. Sit back and relax in clean, cool style anywhere and everywhere you please with this striking sofa.

Title: Cashton Sofa
Description: Need a simple style refresh? Liven up your living room essentials with the Cashton sofa. A chunky silhouette holds invitingly ample cushioning you’ll long to lounge in. Crosshatched upholstery and accent pillows give the otherwise casual design a delightful visual texture that's perfect for settings from classic to contemporary.

Title: Mancin Manual Reclining Sofa with Drop Down Table
Description: The Mancin reclining sofa satisfies your high level of taste and yearning for comfort. The storage arms and plushly pillowed high back and seat are covered in a richly textured faux leather with diamond stitch quilting. Plus, built-in cup holders keep beverages close at hand. If convenience is a consideration, rest assured—this smart-design sofa features a drop-down table with additional cup holders, a docking station and reading lights.

Title: Nemoli Sofa
Description: The Nemoli sofa sets the scene for a modern space full of casual flair. Its textured chenille with solid microfiber upholstery provides a luxuriously soft feel that’s inviting. Gently flared arms and plush seat cushions welcome comfort and relaxation. The on-trend slate-colored upholstery offers a perfect background for the four decorative pillows to pop with beauty.

Title: Carten Sofa
Description: If you’re looking for a brilliant blend of comfort, quality and flair, you’re sure to be enamored with the simply stylish Carten sofa. Inviting in a warm khaki-hued upholstery, it's neutral enough to slip into any scene. Sporting a streamlined silhouette and USB charging, this piece is modern relaxation at its best.

Title: Valerano Sofa
Description: The Valerano sofa has the corner on casual contemporary style and everyday comfort. Chic and subtly innovative, its crosshatched chenille upholstery is a forward-thinking take on fashionable neutrals. The sleek frame gets a soft, streamlined touch with sloping track arms. Eclectic accent pillows further appeal to your relaxed approach to modern flair.

Title: Alessio Sofa
Description: Whether your home is adorned with contemporary or American classic furnishings, the Allesio sofa has a timeless sense of elegance that’s sure to fit right in. Signature elements include roll arms and cutaway side profiling for added flair. Ultra neutral and plush to the touch, the sesame-hued fabric is a brilliant reflection of your good taste. Rounded cornering gives the box cushions a softened, tailored aesthetic.

Title: Gimma 3-Piece Modular Sofa
Description: Kick back in blissful comfort with the boldly designed Gimma sectional sofa. Its neutral upholstery gets a deliciously dramatic twist with flange welting and a boucle-like weave on the fabric. Plush feather-fiber blend cushions, deep seats and on-trend track arms merge cozy seating with a contemporary aesthetic.

Title: Bralynn Sofa
Description: Timeless design for the here and now. The Bralynn sofa pays homage to traditional styling, concluding in softly curved Charles of London arms. Its crisp, clean character radiates charm. An alchemy of old and new aesthetics, this sofa smartly appeals to your love of classic motifs with a modern sensibility.

Title: Vayda Sofa
Description: Laid-back luxury meets neutral practicality in the Vayda sofa. Taking its cues from contemporary design, this clean-lined piece is outfitted with angular arms for a layer of geometric expression. Softly upholstered, sizable cushions keep you comfortable, while black faux fur accent pillows bring a touch of soft glam. With this sofa, winning style and superb functionality go hand in hand.

Title: Larkstone 2-Piece Sectional with Chaise
Description: It's love at first touch with the Larkstone sectional. Stretch out and unwind on the irresistibly soft, spacious cushions. A complementary color palette of neutral charcoal and gunmetal hues turns heads, while wide track arms lend a modern look. Amazing comfort awaits you with this visually appealing sectional that blends beautifully into your decor.

Title: Beaconfield Power Reclining Sofa
Description: The Beaconfield power reclining sofa is made exclusively for those wanting a sumptuously comfortable recliner—that looks nothing like a recliner. Far from the usual leather/faux leather option, this power reclining sofa is wrapped in a textural chenille upholstery that’s warm and cozy. Tufted box cushions and sloped pillow top armrests lend a rich, contemporary aesthetic, while exposed feet in a dark faux wood finish are something you’d see on an armchair, not a recliner. What a fashion-forward way to kick back in style.

Title: McCade Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: Comfort is yours for the taking with the McCade reclining sofa. Supportive back is plush in all the right places, enhancing your seating experience. Feel-good fabric is elevated with detailed stitching. Rounded sides are fashion-forward and topped with pillowy armrests. With one easy pull, you’re on your way to endless relaxation.

Title: Dorsten Sofa
Description: The contemporary Dorsten sofa has comfort written all over it. From the plush cushions to the textured gray fabric, it’s a total winner for relaxation. Designer throw pillows in blue, brown and tan complement the richly neutral upholstery.

Title: Renshaw Sofa Chaise
Description: Take a tonal approach to at-home comfort with the Renshaw sofa chaise. With its simply streamlined structure and neutral upholstery, it easily slips into any scene. With ample space to stretch out, this piece rounds out your relaxed living room assortment.

Title: Alessandro Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Impressive in scale while keeping an air of refinement, the Alessandro power reclining sofa stuns with soft, supple leather match upholstery in garnet. Sink into the seating area and cater to your comfort with one-touch power reclining and an adjustable headrest. Complete with USB charging, this sofa makes a surefire statement in your contemporary living room.

Title: Battleville Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Double down on sleek style with the Battleville power reclining sofa. It has a streamlined, space-conscious appeal, with two-tone upholstery in neutral hues creating subtly striking visual intrigue. And with one-touch reclining, adjustable headrests and wireless charging, this piece combines contemporary function and fashion into a single clean-lined design.

Title: Discota Sofa
Description: Everyday form, superb function. Framed with roll arms for a dash of flair, the Discota sofa sets its sights on trendy transitional design. The neutral hue meshes with multiple color palettes, providing chic seating wherever you need it most. Soft-to-the-touch fabric aids you in superior relaxation. Now that's universal style, made simple.

Title: Candela 3-Piece Modular Sofa
Description: Part of a mod, modular collection, the Candela sofa suits your style and your space wonderfully well. Sporting a crisp and clean profile with track arms and box cushions, it's covered in an earthy elegant charcoal gray upholstery with a subtle herringbone effect. Prominent contrast stitching incorporates casually cool flair.

Title: Lindyn 2-Piece Sectional Sofa
Description: Plush and posh. Showcase your eye for on-trend texture with the statement-making cord upholstery of the Lindyn sectional loveseat. Its stunningly soft fabric entices in a warm neutral hue, complementing contemporary color palettes. Sink into the cushions and plan to stay a while—this cozy living room centerpiece highlights your high-end approach to comfort and style.

Title: Karinne Sofa
Description: Craving casual refinement? The Karinne sofa has you covered. Its decidedly contemporary frame cradles sizable cushions in an ultra-soft neutral hue, lightening the mood in your living room with simple style and everyday comfort. Solid and geometric accent pillows perfect the chic-meets-cozy vibe.

Title: Caretti Sofa
Description: Easy on the eyes and irresistibly comfortable, the Caretti sofa is covered in luxurious chenille microfiber in a light, neutral hue that blends beautifully in a room. Wide track arms have a contemporary look and plush cushions cradle you comfortably. Textured accent pillows in complementary colors add subtle contrast.

Title: Henri Futon Sectional
Description: Ideal for family and friends, this sectional futon features a simple yet elegant design with square-tufted backrest and slim track arms. Enjoy the freedom of choosing which side you want to place your chaise. Its multi-positional back allows for three distinct positions: sofa, lounger or sleeper— making it perfect for accommodating overnight guests. Benefit from extra storage space directly from your chaise compartment for containing your clutter or organizing extra pillows and blankets.

Title: Atwater Living Huey Futon
Description: The recent rise of modern industrial design can be seen in every room in the house—from wood and metal dining sets to metal-studded coffee tables and bookshelves made from old piping. So it’s no surprise that the versatile Huey futon captures this look perfectly. The all-metal futon frame ensures lots of stability, with a mesh base and back to offer a comfortable place to sit back or lounge around. Plus the studded side panels made for a stunning look. The sofa bed easily converts to a full-size sleeping space so your overnight guests can comfortably spend the night.

Title: Edison Futon Sectional
Description: This small space sectional futon is the perfect combination of chic style and functionality. Upholstered in soft velvet with bolster pillows and black tapered legs that enhance the aesthetic of this modern sectional futon. Designed with a sturdy wood frame, this sectional has an interchangeable chaise that can be placed on either side to accommodate the layout of your home. Its multi-positional split-back design allows you to independently recline the backrest between three positions: sitting, lounging and sleeping. No matter the occasion, this futon is the perfect addition to host family and friends for a movie night or accommodate unexpected overnight guests.

Title: Atwater Living Brittany Futon
Description: Be embraced by the comfortable cushioning of the Novogratz Brittany Futon. With its ribbed and tufted cushioned back, this futon gives your body all the support you need to sit and relax for hours. The combination of curved armrests and slanted legs create a unique rounded look that makes a stylish statement. The chic upholstery adds another element of elegance, making this a perfect centerpiece for any living space. Designed with a multi-position split-back, this futon  independently converts between a sitting, lounging and sleeping position with an easy push and pull motion.

Title: Atwater Living Lila Futon
Description: In any small living space, multifunctional pieces are a must. This simple-looking futon is guaranteed to bring optimal function and fashion into your home. Featuring quality linen upholstery, comfortable wide track arms and simple horizontal stitching details that are echoed on both its backrest and seat, this convertible couch has a split-back design that allows you to adjust the backrest into three distinct positions: sitting, lounging and sleeping. Its sturdy wooden construction and legs ensure guaranteed support and durability.

Title: Atwater Living Alex Futon Frame, Gunmetal Grey
Description: The Every Room Alex Futon Frame is the perfect addition for any small living space in need of extra seating or sleeping space. This multi-functional piece is compact in size and can fit seamlessly in even the tightest areas. The contemporary rounded arms are simple and can easily match with any existing décor. Constructed with a mesh metal frame, it is guaranteed to provide you with optimal support and comfort. Its clever split back design allows you to convert your futon sofa into a lounger or bed within seconds. When you have a guest staying overnight, simply push down the frame to reveal a full-sized bed with ample space.

Title: Atwater Living Adam Coil Futon, Camel Faux Leather
Description: The Adam coil futon is the perfect combination of modern and mid-century appeal. Its beautiful upholstery is available in white faux leather and gray or navy blue linen. Providing glamour that will suit any room décor, its polished wood legs add style and its center legs provide extra support. This futon has a hidden secret: a split back design which allows adjustment to the backrest angle for everybody’s comfort preference. Sit up, lounge back or open the back to lie flat. Its independently encased coils offer maximum comfort in the day and supplemental support by night as a bed for overnight guests.

Title: Atwater Living Jodi Coil Futon
Description: The Atwater Living Jodi Coil Futon is a functional and stylish solution to small space living. The sublime minimalistic design is highlighted with faux leather upholstery, graceful wing-shaped armrests and tapered wood legs for added warmth. The thick encased coil and foam cushions provide supreme comfort for long hours of relaxation. Cleverly designed to accommodate multiple positions by simply lowering the back cushion to lounging or sleeping, you can enjoy this masterpiece anytime throughout the day.

Title: Fitz Sofa Futon
Description: Luxuriously designed with diamond button-tufted detailing, plush roll arms and turned wood feet, this Chesterfield-inspired futon is an elegant solution in small space living. Designed with a split backrest that lets you simply push/pull your futon to instantly convert it into a lounger or bed. The sturdy wood frame and pocket coils provide your overnight guests with a comfortable and spacious bed.

Title: Novogratz Brittany Futon
Description: Be embraced by the comfortable cushioning of the Novogratz Brittany linen futon. With its ribbed tufted cushioned back, the Novogratz Brittany Linen futon gives your body all the support you need to sit and relax for hours. The combination of curved armrests and slanted legs work together to provide a unique rounded look that stands out. The linen upholstery adds another element of elegance making this a perfect statement piece for any living space.

Title: Atwater Living Abella Futon, White Faux Leather
Description: Be prepared for guests with our EveryRoom Abella Futon. The perfect choice when in need of extra seats or accommodations. With its faux leather upholstery, spice up any room with this chic and modern futon. Easy to assemble and clean with simply a damp cloth. You’re sure to not go wrong with our Abella Futon.

Title: Della Convertible Futon
Description: Whether reserved for the occasional overnight guest—or enjoyed day in, day out—this sleek, chic futon in black proves that high style can be made comfortably affordable. Sure to please those with highly contemporary taste, it wows with square tufting, tapered chrome-tone metal legs and adjustable wing armrests loaded with flair.

Title: Atwater Living Roxy Futon Sectional
Description: This sectional futon is a host's dream come true. With coil seating and a convertible backrest, it's the perfect spot to hang out with your friends and have a comfortable place for them to stay overnight. This modern reclining sectional, with rich velvet upholstery and dark wooden legs, features a multifunctional split-back design that independently converts between three positions: sitting, lounging and sleeping. The chaise can be set up on either side of the sectional to fit your room layout.

Title: Owner's Box Dual Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: When it comes to style, you’ve got game. Rest assured, the Owner’s Box power reclining loveseat is sure to win you over with its ultra-cool looks and major league features. Showcasing all the bells and whistles, this designer reclining loveseat is inspired by sports car interiors—with a fabulous faux leather accentuated with horizonal channel tufting. An advanced one-touch power control with an Easy View™ power headrest puts you in the driver’s seat. On top of a cup holder and hidden storage on each armrest, you’ve got a center console with two more cup holders and storage for remotes and more.

Title: Battleville Dual Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: Double down on sleek style with the Battleville power reclining loveseat. It has a streamlined, space-conscious appeal, with two-tone upholstery in neutral hues creating subtly striking visual intrigue. And with one-touch reclining, adjustable headrests and wireless charging, this piece combines contemporary function and fashion into a single clean-lined design.

Title: Belziani Loveseat
Description: Providing a versatile option to layer in your living area, the Belziani loveseat exudes classic styling in a fresh new color. Whether it's used as an inviting accent or paired with the matching sofa, it makes a rich addition for those who demand the best. Chosen for quality and a luxury feel, the leather match upholstery is pure pleasure.

Title: Willamen Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: The Willamen reclining loveseat with console lets you share the most popular seat in the house with anyone you choose. Made of quality faux leather, its look and feel are rich yet affordable. Fashion-forward jumbo stitching adds the finishing touch to a handsome piece that is just waiting for some of your time.

Title: McCaskill Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Sink into the supple McCaskill reclining loveseat and prepare to be swept off your feet—literally. Its extra-wide seats and plush cushioning are divinely comfortable. It's wrapped in decadently soft leather match upholstery for a luxurious experience, saving you money without sacrificing style. Prominent stitching, linear track arms and a goes-with-anything gray hue add stylish touches. Keep beverages and remotes close at hand thanks to the center console and cup holders.

Title: Garristown Dual Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: Wouldn’t it be great if the cool look of leather could be blended with the warm feel of fabric? Find a beautiful balance of contemporary style and cozy comfort in the Garristown power reclining loveseat. Sporting a sultry gray UltraPella upholstery, this chic faux leather power loveseat is empowering in every which way. The Easy View™ power headrest allows you the perfect view of the TV, even when you’re lying back. And if you’re never far from your cell phone or laptop, you’ll surely appreciate the one-touch power control with USB charging port.

Title: Salvatore 3-Piece Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Easy on the eyes and incredibly comfortable, the high-end Salvatore power reclining loveseat with console will upgrade the look and feel of your living room. Its automotive-inspired leather and faux leather keep luxury right on budget. The modular design allows pieces to be grouped together in a variety of ways. No matter how it's arranged, this loveseat is just the right touch for reclining and relaxing in style..

Title: Discota Loveseat
Description: Everyday form, superb function. Framed with roll arms for a dash of flair, the Discota loveseat sets its sights on trendy transitional design. The neutral hue meshes with multiple color palettes, providing chic seating wherever you need it most. Soft-to-the-touch fabric aids you in superior relaxation. Now that's universal style, made simple.

Title: Catanzaro Dual Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: Let the luxury of the Catanzaro power reclining loveseat with console carry you away. Decidedly modern, with clean-lined divided back styling, this reclining loveseat entices with a combination of genuine leather and expertly matched faux leather for a supple feel. Even when you’re kicking back you’ll still be perfectly positioned to read or watch TV thanks to the Easy View™ power adjustable headrest. And how’s this for a bonus: a convenient USB charging port located in the power control, so you can recharge while you chill.

Title: Samperstone 3-Piece Power Reclining Modular Sofa
Description: City sleek living. The Samperstone sectional is loaded with luxury. An ultra-stylish diamond stitch design pumps up the piece with eye-catching drama. And talk about style with purpose. This sectional supports you with a high back and faux leather upholstery in gorgeous gray. Its USB charging station powers up your tech life as you recline in comfort.

Title: Brebryan Sofa
Description: The Brebryan sofa speaks to those drawn to fresh, contemporary style with richly neutral appeal. Wrapped in a wonderfully plush fabric loaded with multi-tonal interest, this on-trend piece has a warm, welcoming charm. Coordinating accent pillows add to the indulgence. Kick back, relax and settle in for comfort with this cool addition for modern spaces.

Title: Olsberg Sofa
Description: Seamlessly merging classic elements with modern trends, the Olsberg sofa invites you to bring home the best of then and now. Wrapped in a fabulous steel gray upholstery with sumptuous suede-like feel, this easy-elegant sofa is dressed to impress with updated roll arm styling and tailored touches including nailhead trim and window pane stitching. What you can’t see is every bit as impressive. Reversible seat cushions crafted with our highest quality coils provide a bit of bounce and plenty of comfort and support.

Title: Larkinhurst Sofa
Description: Dramatically transform your living space with the rustic look of weathered leather you love—at a fraction of the cost. That’s the beauty of the Larkinhurst faux leather sofa. Washed in earthy Southwestern tones, with generous back and seating support and jumbo window-pane stitching, it envelops you in comfort and quality. Classic elements such as roll arms and turned feet bring in just enough traditional touch.

Title: Willamen Reclining Sofa with Drop Down Table
Description: The Willamen reclining sofa with drop-down table lets you share the most popular seat in the house with anyone you choose. Made of quality faux leather, its look and feel are rich yet affordable, with a drop-down table that includes a magazine pouch and USB charging. It can be the center of attention or quietly complement a variety of design styles and color schemes. Fashion-forward jumbo stitching adds the finishing touch to a handsome piece that is just waiting for some of your time.

Title: Evey 3-Piece Modular Sofa
Description: Architecturally inclined with its sharp profile, the Evey sectional sofa is stunning from all angles. Acting as the focal point in a neutral space, the granite-hued upholstery also creates a blank canvas for adding pops of color. Positively plush seat cushions refine the art of relaxation, making you feel confident in your eye for contemporary design.

Title: Morelos Sofa
Description: When it comes to style, less is more with the Morelos sofa. Taking minimalism to the max, it wows with a crisp, clean profile, sleek track arms and a simplified 2-over-2 cushion design. Dressed to impress those who demand the best, this ultra-contemporary sofa sports leather match upholstery for incomparable comfort and value.

Title: Corvara Sofa
Description: The sumptuously soft Corvara sofa invites you to slip into something more comfortable—and contemporary. Elements include sloped setback armrests that go with the flow, reversible cushions and velvet dark gray upholstery that feels every bit as wonderful as it looks. Patterned toss pillows “neutralize” in a high-design way.

Title: Gleston Sofa
Description: Raise your standard of living with the Gleston sofa in onyx black. Reserved exclusively for those with a penchant for high-glam home decor, this ultra-chic sofa is dressed to impress with a clean-lined profile, 2-over-2 cushion styling and sleek track arms punctuated with nailhead trim. Easy on the eyes and alluring to the touch, this decidedly contemporary sofa is covered in a low-pile soft velvet that’s impossible to resist. Abstract-patterned throw pillows enhance the posh appeal.

Title: Jasper Coil Futon Convertible Sofa
Description: With this futon’s design, the classic sofa bed gets a stunning modern look with all the convenience of a sleeper. Wood legs add to the elegance, providing stability and structure, while the wing-shaped arms and rich linen upholstery add a touch of mid-century style that fits seamlessly with just about any decor. Guests will appreciate the independently encased coils and foam cushions, which work to provide the ultimate level of comfort. The split-back design comes with a multi-position backrest that converts to provide comfort in any occasion. With an easy push or pull, you can switch between a seated, lounging or sleeping position, and the backrests work independently to allow you to lie down while your partner watches television.

Title: Bayonne Sofa
Description: Dressed to impress with distinctive cutaway arms, the Bayonne sofa is an above-and-beyond choice for your fashionable abode. Wrapped in a soft flatwoven charcoal fabric that’s naturally on trend, this designer sofa is sure to suit contemporary spaces and modern farmhouse places—and look right at home with classic and eclectic furnishings. That’s the beauty of a great transitional piece of furniture. That’s the beauty of the Bayonne sofa.

Title: Safavieh Bushwick Futon Bed
Description: Make extra space for guests a stylish endeavor with this fun and fabulous futon bed. Hearkening to mid-century modern design sensibilities, this sofa bed delivers retro flair that enlivens decor while not in use as an extra bed.
