The foam fill and velvet fabric are cozy and inviting, while the durable wood legs bear up the foldable futon for years of use.

Title: Atwater Living Leona Futon
Description: Bring contemporary glamour and utmost comfort to your living room with this futon. This sofa sleeper beautifies any interior setting with its premium linen upholstery, symmetrical stitching and solid tapered wood legs. Indulge your comfort preferences by lowering the back cushions to adjust between sitting, lounging and sleeping positions. Ideal for small space living as it can accommodate overnight guests with a breeze, this versatile piece is available in a variety of stylish colors.

Title: Tulen Manual Reclining Sofa
Description: The Tulen reclining sofa puts the win in winning. Its waterfall back design and doubly plump pillow top arms team up with soft chenille fabric to go for the goal. Ample seating room makes the comfort possibilities endless. Sit back and relax. You won’t go wrong with this reclining loveseat.

Title: Atwater Living Mary Futon, Gray Velvet
Description: The Mary futon is simple, clean and meant to be seen with style that shines in any living room, guest bedroom or home office space. Featuring modern vertical tufting along the back and strong plastic legs, this convertible futon has a sturdy wood frame build and comes upholstered in your choice of soft faux leather or velvet. Multifaceted, like any true diva, this futon gives you a plethora of comfortable options¬ be it sitting, lounging or sleeping thanks to its split back reclining backrest.

Title: Hanna Convertible Sofa Sleeper Futon
Description: The stylish contemporary design of this futon showcases reinforced stitching, wide track arms and soft microfiber upholstery—adding a flair of modern luxury and comfort to any interior. A split-back design allows you to independently recline the backrests into multiple positions. Simply push or pull your futon to instantly convert it into a lounger or bed. The sturdy wood frame and independently encased coils provide comfort and support to accommodate your overnight guests.

Title: Elvia Chaise Lounger
Description: Scaled perfectly for your individual needs, this futon for one proves that small-space living can be so inviting. A lounger by day and sleeper at night, this compact futon is dressed to impress lovers of contemporary design, with eye-catching chrome-tone legs and tufted cushions for high-fashion flair.

Title: Atwater Living Ocie Storage Futon
Description: No matter how you look at this unique futon with magazine storage, it's an instant conversation piece. Perfect for small-space living, it comes with storage pockets on the outside of the arm to keep your favorite magazines and books. Do you have unexpected overnight guests? Simply fold down the wide track armrests to convert this futon into a convenient and comfortable sleeping area.

Title: DHP Chloe Futon Sofa Bed, White
Description: The Nina futon is a sleek sofa that offers you a large seating capacity and all the extra sleeping space you need. Available in faux leather, this futon is simple to keep clean with just a damp cloth. The tufted seat cushion and backrest provide a classy and contemporary style and the rounded chrome-tone legs add just the right finishing touch. The built-in mechanism lets you easily convert between three positions: sitting, lounging and sleeping.

Title: CosmoLiving by Cosmopolitan Liberty Sectional Storage Futon
Description: You need this CosmoLiving Liberty Sectional Futon with Storage. Simple and stylish, it's the perfect small space solution with functional features and a compact design. Choose between a fierce green velvet, blush pink velvet, ivory velvet, black velvet or light grey chenille finish with delicately crafted diamond tufting and brass legs for a flawless Insta-worthy look. The chaise can be positioned on either side of the futon and the wide storage compartment is perfect for stashing electronic devices or even off-season clothing. The adjustable back lets you recline comfortably or lie flat for a great night's sleep.

Title: Novogratz Tufted Split Back Futon
Description: The Novogratz Vintage Tufted Split Back Futon is the best way to make a style statement in your home! In fact, this sofa does everything for you. Made with a robust wooden frame, its elegant design pops in adventurous colors that will make sure to leave a lasting impression. The split-back feature is ideal when looking for functionality: it can be independently reclined to multiple positions, which allows you to sit, lounge and even sleep! Upholstered in soft velvet with diamond-tufted seat, cushion and arms, it has Victorian style legs that add the last touch. Pair it with the Novogratz Vintage Tufted armchair and/or ottoman to achieve a complete look and bring on the fun!

Title: Novogratz Brittany Sectional Futon Sofa
Description: Comfy and compact, the Novogratz Brittany Sectional Futon Sofa is perfect for any small living space! Add a contemporary flair and a pop of colour to your living room with this modern futon upholstered in rich linen with a ribbed tufted back. It is founded on a sturdy frame and wooden legs that are stable and durable and the chaise can be set up on either side of the sofa, offering you full on versatility and customization. What’s more, with this sectional, you can say goodbye to stressing about where your guests can sleep as this multi-functional piece effortlessly coverts from a sofa into a spacious bed in no time. Its tufted backrest and seating will guarantee optimal comfort whether you are watching TV, reading a book or napping. The Brittany is easy to maintain by cleaning with just a damp cloth. Available in multiple fun colors, it is shipped in two easy to handle boxes and assembles smoothly. Open up your living room with our Brittany Sectional Futon Sofa and have the space you’ve always wished for.

Title: Elvia Convertible Futon and Sofa Sleeper
Description: This futon sleeper is made with a gray linen upholstery, embellished with button-tufted details gracing the back/seat cushions and sheltering armrests. Offering a look of modern luxury, it features sleek chrome-tone legs that tie the whole look together. With a split-back design, this futon easily adjusts into three distinct positions: seating, lounging or sleeping. When you have an overnight guest, lower the backrest with just one push or pull. No guest bedroom? No problem.

Title: Salvatore 2-Piece Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: Easy on the eyes and incredibly comfortable, the high-end Salvatore power reclining loveseat will upgrade the look and feel of your living room. Its automotive-inspired leather and faux leather keep luxury right on budget. The modular design allows pieces to be grouped together in a variety of ways. No matter how it's arranged, this loveseat is just the right touch for reclining and relaxing in style..

Title: DHP Carson 8 Inch Thermobonded High Density Full Futon Mattress
Description: There’s nothing better than a good night’s sleep, which is why you should get the DHP Carson eight-inch thermobonded high-density polyester fill futon mattress to make sure everyone in your home is sleeping comfortably. Composed of polyester fiber pad, this futon mattress is built to last through years of daily wear and tear without losing its shape, thanks to its tufted design. Designed to fit any regular full-size futon, this mattress will provide comfort and support for when you binge watch your favorite television series or when your friends need a bed to sleep overnight.

Title: Hartsdale 3-Piece Power Reclining Modular Loveseat with Console
Description: Fit for the comfort seeker in your household, the Hartsdale power sectional has that casual contemporary sensibility you love. Pillow top cushions with a feather-fiber blend are simply sumptuous. Chic and subtle chenille microfiber upholstery weaves in so much style.

Title: Harleson Loveseat
Description: True classic character comes to life in the Harleson loveseat. Set back pleated rolled arms and warm brown exposed frame with bun feet are beautifully traditional. Lovely detailing carries itself through the herringbone weave in the soft upholstery. Seat cushions reverse to maintain durable comfort. Vintage-inspired jumbo nailhead trim graces the design. Plaid and botanical pillows in dark brown are a timeless touch.

Title: Maitelynn Loveseat
Description: Clean lines and a streamlined silhouette define the architectural attitude of the Maitelynn loveseat. Textured accent pillows in complementary colors add subtle contrast. The loveseat's plush reversible cushions beckon you to sit down, get comfy and relax completely.

Title: Paulestein Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: Room for two, comfort for days. The Paulestein reclining power loveseat does the work for you as you sit back, relax and kick up your feet. It features a timeless two-over-two cushion design, wide track arms and irresistibly soft velvety blue upholstery. Contrast stitching and tufted details offer a crisp, clean look that is always in style. Geometric accent pillows add a splash of color.

Title: Zardoni Loveseat
Description: Feed your mid-century modern nostalgia with a contemporary twist in the Zardoni loveseat. Colored in an attractive gray, it’s upholstered in a timeless texture. Classic tufted back and tapered peg legs are a nice revival. Linear profile with two toss pillows adds plenty of fresh style, perfect for small spaces.

Title: Kananwood Loveseat
Description: The sumptuously styled Kananwood loveseat proves that a richly traditional look doesn’t have to break the bank. Flared effect gives the classic roll arms a relaxed feel, while the choice of a plush chenille upholstery in oatmeal is earthy elegance at its best. Distinctively turned bun feet in a dark finish add to the loveseat's substantial presence.

Title: Bralynn Loveseat
Description: Timeless design for the here and now. The Bralynn loveseat pays homage to traditional styling, concluding in softly curved Charles of London arms. Its crisp, clean character radiates charm. An alchemy of old and new aesthetics, this loveseat smartly appeals to your love of classic motifs with a modern sensibility.

Title: The Man-Den Triple Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: Reserved for him and made for her, The Man-Den power reclining loveseat in gray delivers all the comfort and style you could ask for. Inspired by sports car interiors, the leather match upholstery has a “perforated automotive” treatment for that much more appeal. Positioned at your fingertips, the advanced one-touch power control puts you in the driver’s seat with everything from an Easy View™ power headrest and power lumbar support, to a USB port and wireless charging for your phone. Talk about fully loaded. And with integrated cup holders and hidden storage compartments under the posh, padded armrests, this designer power reclining loveseat makes the most of every inch of space.

Title: Afton 48" Rectangle Storage Ottoman
Description: When there's clutter everywhere, you need a tasteful, well-made storage solution. The Afton storage ottoman, made from durable faux leather, is the answer to all your needs. This attractive ottoman is extra strong and durable and features a beautiful stitched exterior and large storage interior. Whether you use this ottoman in your entryway, living room, family room, bedroom or condo, it will allow you to hide away all that mess.

Title: Mabton 2-Piece Dual Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: The challenge: design a cutting-edge power recliner you’d never guess was a recliner. Super sleek and streamlined, this sectional loveseat, in taupe gray with high-contrast jumbo stitching, might just be our best-kept secret. Rest assured, you’d be hard-pressed to find seating that looks so high end yet is so comfortably priced. Integrated elements include an Easy View™ adjustable headrest, which offers low-profile style when it’s down and a high level of comfort when you’re kicking back and reclining. Factor in one-touch power controls (each with a USB port) placed on the inside track arm, and you have the makings for one beautifully deceptive sectional.

Title: ACEssentials Cameron Storage Bench
Description: Enhance the look of any space in your house with the ACEssentials Cameron Lift Top Storage Bench. Perfect for storage at the end of your bed or in your living room, the top opens on hinges to provide an ideal spot for pillows, blankets or extra clothes. The cream-colored velvet features a vertical line sewing pattern on its top to create channeling. Providing seating space for two or more, the padded top is a comfortable spot to rest. The cutout side handles make for easy moving from room to room, while the sleek design ensures this piece is a modern accent for your decor. This contemporary bench is the perfect size to use as an ottoman footrest or for extra seating.

Title: Accrington Sofa
Description: Looking for the perfect blend of decadent comfort and contemporary flair? Feast your eyes on the Accrington sofa. Tufted box cushioning and thick pillow top armrests brilliantly merge style and a sumptuous feel. Wonderfully plush to the touch, the sofa’s earthy brown fabric is the ultimate choice for a richly neutral look.

Title: Baxton Studio Storage Bench Ottoman
Description: This chic ottoman features a streamlined design that makes it easy to coordinate with a wide range of decor styles. Upholstered in a soft, durable polyester fabric, the lid is foam padded and biscuit tufted to provide the utmost comfort. A large compartment under the lid provides space to store extra blankets and pillows, while the tapered wood legs add mid-century modern appeal. Use this versatile piece in the entryway, living room or bedroom.

Title: Navi Loveseat
Description: If you love the cool look of leather but long for the warm feel of fabric, you can take comfort in the Navi loveseat. Wrapped in a fabulous faux leather with a weathered hue and hint of pebbly texture to resemble the real deal, this decidedly modern loveseat proves less is more. Elements include angled side profiling and track armrests wrapped with a layer of pillowy softness for that little something extra. Prominent jumbo stitching and clean-lined divided back styling lend fashion-forward flair.

Title: Next-Gen DuraPella Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: It’s time to rethink the way you relax—and time to experience the joys of the Next-Gen DuraPella power reclining sofa. Taking a fashion-forward approach to the art of relaxation, the sofa—with a one-touch power control and an energy-efficient USB plug-in—will elevate your style and raise your standard of living. Its zero-gravity mechanism lifts the ottoman higher than traditional recliners to improve circulation. And talk about low maintenance. This designer recliner is wrapped in durable, water-repellent upholstery that's family- and pet-friendly.

Title: Regent Park 3-Piece Sofa
Description: Sit back and enjoy the velvety softness of the Regent Park sectional. Its contemporary design is accentuated by a subtle chevron pattern that masters the art of smart and sophisticated style.

Title: Paulestein Power Reclining Sofa
Description: Room for two, comfort for days. The Paulestein reclining power sofa does the work for you as you sit back, relax and kick up your feet. It features a timeless two-over-two cushion design, wide track arms and irresistibly soft velvety blue upholstery. Contrast stitching and tufted details offer a modern look that is always in style. Geometric accent pillows add a splash of color.

Title: Angleton Sofa
Description: Serving up a refined, upscale look—at an incomparable value price—the Angleton sofa lures from every angle. Crisp, 2-over-2 cushion design, wide track arms and black tapered feet lend a clean, contemporary aesthetic. Velvety soft upholstery in a chic sandstone gray upholstery takes neutral to another level. Matching feather-filled throw pillows master the art of minimalism.

Title: Mabton 3-Piece Dual Power Reclining Sofa
Description: The challenge: design a cutting-edge power reclining sofa you’d never guess was a recliner. Super sleek and streamlined, the Mabton sectional sofa, in taupe gray with high-contrast jumbo stitching, might just be our best-kept secret. Rest assured, you’d be hard-pressed to find seating that looks so high end yet is so comfortably priced. Integrated elements include an Easy View™ adjustable headrest, which offers low-profile style when it’s down and a high level of comfort when you’re kicking back and reclining. Factor in one-touch power controls (each with a USB port) placed on the inside track arm, and you have the makings for one beautifully deceptive sectional.

Title: Next-Gen Gaucho 3-Piece Dual Power Reclining Modular Sofa
Description: Modern comfort never looked so good. Sporting sloped track arms, wide, generous cushions and bustle-back stitching for high-fashion flair, the Next-Gen Gaucho power reclining sectional is the ultimate choice in comfortably cool, contemporary style. Indulging with a suede-like faux leather that emulates nubuck leather, the sectional’s family- and pet-friendly upholstery is the stuff dreams are made of. Factor in the added perks of an Easy View™ power adjustable headrest and USB charging, and you’ve got a power reclining sectional that truly caters with style, comfort and convenience.

Title: Maggie Sofa
Description: Classic comfort gets a mod twist with the Maggie sofa. Its minimalistic approach and structured silhouette bring a clean-lined design element to your living room. Sink into the positively plush cushions while relaxing solo, or curl up with a glass of wine while hosting guests. And with light neutral upholstery that suits both casual and contemporary spaces, this sofa offers endless style possibilities.

Title: Next-Gen Gaucho 3-Piece Modular Sofa
Description: Looking to upgrade your living space without draining your pocketbook? Add the upscale touch of leather at a scaled down faux leather price with the Next-Gen Gaucho sectional sofa. In a durable faux leather that emulates nubuck leather, it makes a lasting impression. The modular design lets you stage the pieces solo or rearrange them for a look that's always fresh. Designed to age gracefully, this sofa is the softer side of seating, where comfort is made in the suede.

Title: Kellway 3-Piece Modular Sofa
Description: With its casual-contemporary aesthetic and modular design that simply makes sense, the Kellway sectional makes way for high style and indulgent comfort. Rest assured, the thickly cushioned seats and wedge-cut backrests are right on point for those who fancy a clean, modern look.

Title: Drescher Futon
Description: No room at the inn? The Drescher flip flop sofa accommodates your overnight guests, as well as your love of clean-lined, modern style. Wrapped in a fabulous caramel colored faux leather rich with tonal variation for a sense of authenticity, this chic futon/sofa is dressed to impress with slim track arms, a 2-over-2 box cushion design and tapered legs with a faux wood finish. This versatile sofa easily makes itself at home in a main living room if space is limited and can be used as a sofa sleeper in a guest room, rec room or finished basement. The back fully reclines to ensure a good night's sleep.

Title: DHP Eve 8 Inch Thermobonded High Density Full Futon Mattress
Description: The DHP eight-inch Eve thermobonded polyester fill futon mattress guarantees you hours of comfortable sleeping and sitting enjoyment. Built to withstand everyday wear and tear, this easily foldable mattress is composed of a high-density polyester fill and gives your aching body medium support and just the optimal level of firmness. Designed with an easy-to-clean tufted microfiber cover that allows it to retain its original shape, this mattress fits on any standard full-sized futon frame. Add this small space living solution into your living room, home office or den instantly providing extra functionality to those who love to host, but don’t have a spare guest bedroom to accommodate overnight guests. This mattress is GreenGuard Gold Certified to ensure a healthy indoor air environment.

Title: Atwater Living Heidi Futon Sectional with Storage
Description: Create your dream living room with the Atwater Living Heidi storage futon with sectional. This contemporary sofa sectional will bring the clean and relaxed look you’ve always dreamed of. The chaise is interchangeable, allowing you to choose from whichever side fits best in your home. And the sofa converts into a lounger or bed within seconds. Whether you’re watching television, lounging around or in need of an extra sleep space, this futon sectional is guaranteed to supply all your needs. It also features extra storage space directly from your chaise compartment, ideal for storing extra pillows and covers.  Easy to assemble and clean, this tan chenille futon with sectional is the perfect marriage of style and function.

Title: Safavieh Noho Foldable Futon Bed
Description: The stylish and posh design of this futon bed makes it perfect for updating any living space. This piece is artfully designed with sleek, subtly tufted fabric and natural wood legs. It easily transforms from a sofa into a luxurious bed, offering the perfect solution for overnight guests.

Title: Mirclay Futon
Description: When space is limited, make smart use of your living area. The Mirclay flip flop sofa maximizes space by combining a sofa and bed into one streamlined piece with a sophisticated-yet-simple design. The back cushion flattens to convert it into a comfortable futon. The sofa features a drop-down console with dual cupholders, USB charging ports and cushioned armrests that double as pillows. A straightforward, sleek design and splayed metal legs provide a mid-century modern feel. The sofa's piece de resistance: black faux leather, which dresses it up while adding longevity and durability.

Title: Gaddis Flip Flop Sofa
Description: Love furniture with a mid-century modern twist? Then you’re sure to flip for the gorgeous Gaddis flip flop sofa in gray. This brilliantly styled sofa-futon is the ultimate choice if you’re short on space but long for form and function. Tailored touches including tapered wood-tone legs and tufted box cushions exude an upscale mood reflecting your fine taste.

Title: Santini Futon
Description: If you’re short on space and long for contemporary style, you’re sure to flip for the Santini flip flop armless sofa. Ideal for apartments and home office/guest room shared spaces, this ultra-contemporary option easily converts from a sofa into a “futon” to accommodate overnight guests. Canted chrome-tone metal legs and box tufting work wonders if modern moves you.

Title: Andora Coil Futon
Description: Just because you’re tight on space doesn’t mean you can’t go big on style. Case in point: the Andora coil futon. Clearly inspired by mid-century modern furniture, this high-design futon—upholstered in white faux leather—is dressed to impress with an ultra-linear profile, tufted cushions and slim track armrests. Independently encased coils provide comfort by day and extra support at night when this split-back futon opens up for overnight guests.

Title: DHP Pin Tufted Futon
Description: There’s nothing quite like velvet. Why not make the most of it with the Pin Tufted Transitional futon in tan velvet. This high-fashion futon’s bold, linear profile—with distinctive channel tufting and sleek track arms—is a chic throwback to mid-century modern design. With the greatest of ease, you can take this futon from upright to recline to fully recline positions.

Title: Card Player Dual Power Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: You can bet on turning heads while delivering superior comfort with the Card Player power reclining loveseat. Its sleek cappuccino-hued upholstery is an ace when it comes to contemporary style. An extended zero-gravity ottoman ups the ante on at-home relaxation. Topped off with a heated seat and massage function, you’ll be all-in on this recliner.

Title: Emilia 2-Piece Sectional Loveseat
Description: Catering to your contemporary lifestyle, the Emilia sectional loveseat is a handsome marriage of masculine and feminine sensibilities. Feather-fiber cushions and bolster pillows soften the look of its chunky, linear silhouette. Warmly hued leather match upholstery levels up the affordable luxury. And you'll never run out of ways to stage this seating arrangement—each piece is fully finished on all sides and capable of standing solo. Urban sophistication has never been more versatile.

Title: Bayonne Loveseat
Description: Dressed to impress with distinctive cutaway arms, the Bayonne loveseat is an above-and-beyond choice for your fashionable abode. Wrapped in a soft flatwoven charcoal fabric that’s naturally on trend, this designer loveseat is sure to suit contemporary spaces and modern farmhouse places—and look right at home with classic and eclectic furnishings. That’s the beauty of a great transitional piece of furniture. That’s the beauty of the Bayonne loveseat.

Title: Zarina Loveseat
Description: The Zarina loveseat lets you make a high-style statement at a comfortably affordable price. Richly traditional roll arms are given a modern punch care of oversized nailhead trim in a black nickel-tone finish. Linen-weave upholstery in fresh and clean sandstone beige is complemented with designer pillows that add texture and sophistication.

Title: Dandrea Loveseat
Description: Charming with Charles of London arms that beautifully go with the flow, the Dandrea loveseat in bisque beige is richly elegant yet comfortably made for everyday living. Showcasing distressed at its best, the loveseat’s turned bun feet with patina finish are aged to perfection. Three designer toss pillows make the most of moody blues.

Title: Deakin Loveseat
Description: Stealing the show in on-trend, wonderfully plush upholstery, the Deakin loveseat takes center stage with its comfort and contemporary look. A generous seat depth makes this high-design piece comfortable enough for easy everyday living. Sit back and relax in clean, cool style anywhere and everywhere you please with this striking loveseat.

Title: Woodsway Manual Reclining Loveseat
Description: Twice the style, twice the comfort. Lounge in the casual luxury of the two-tone Woodsway reclining loveseat. Pillow top armrests and a modernized bustle back pamper with the plushness you crave, while the pull tab reclining motion leaves you relaxed and rested.

Title: Antonlini Loveseat
Description: We can’t wait to see the look of comfort on your face when you sit on the Antonlini loveseat. Plush cushions are covered in linen weave chenille for an incredibly soft hand. Roll arms maintain the casual cool look. Vine motif pillows bring in a calm and steady piece of nature—perfect to curl up with as you sink back into the deep seats. And with a neutral hue, it complements your home effortlessly.

Title: Chasewood Power Reclining Loveseat
Description: You've been looking for a piece that rests and restores after a hectic day, all while elevating your living room aesthetic. Enter the Chasewood power reclining loveseat. Casually cool with contemporary bustle-back construction, it has a broad appeal thanks to an on-trend dark gray hue. Leather match upholstery provides high-style living at a price you're sure to enjoy.

Title: Nicorvo Loveseat
Description: Enticing with a coffee brown faux leather, beautified with a gently weathered effect and designer stitching, the Nicorvo loveseat merges a richly traditional sense of style with modern comfort. Roll arms, turned bun feet and prominent nailhead trim incorporate distinctive character. Pair of jacquard-patterned pillows are a sumptuous touch.

Title: Valerano Loveseat
Description: The Valerano loveseat has the corner on casual contemporary style and everyday comfort. Chic and subtly innovative, its crosshatched chenille upholstery is a forward-thinking take on fashionable neutrals. The sleek frame gets a soft, streamlined touch with sloping track arms. Eclectic accent pillows further appeal to your relaxed approach to modern flair.

Title: Mancin Manual Reclining Loveseat with Console
Description: The Mancin double reclining loveseat with console satisfies your high level of taste and yearning for comfort. The storage arms and plushly pillowed high back and seat are covered in a richly textured faux leather with diamond stitch quilting. Plus, built-in cup holders keep beverages close at hand.

Title: Baxton Studio Kelly Cocktail Ottoman
Description: Add a touch of sophisticated grace to your home with the modern-style Kelly cocktail ottoman. The ottoman is fitted with a wood storage shelf to hold books, movies and more. Padded with foam for the utmost comfort, it's upholstered in linen fabric and enhanced with elegant button tufting. Excellent craftsmanship adds a weathered feel to the ottoman, giving it a hint of rustic charm.

Title: Baxton Studio Kaylee Storage Ottoman Bench
Description: Whether it's placed in the bedroom or living room, the versatile Kaylee bench offers elegant style and handy storage space. Constructed with rubberwood, this storage bench is upholstered in a soft gray velvet fabric that adds a dose of glamour to your space. The top is padded with foam for seating comfort, and opens to reveal ample storage space for extra blankets and linens. Silvertone nailhead trim and grid stitching lend a modern look, while button tufting and turned feet add a refined elegance.

Title: Maggie Ottoman
Description: Classic comfort gets a mod twist with the Maggie ottoman. Its minimalistic approach and structured silhouette bring a clean-lined design element to your living room. Place a decorative tray on top to create a spot for morning coffee or cocktails, or simply use it to stretch out while sitting. And with light neutral upholstery that suits both casual and contemporary spaces alike, this ottoman offers endless style possibilities.

Title: Galice Oversized Accent Ottoman
Description: Don't shy away from decadence. Add a bit of bold design to your room with the Galice oversized accent ottoman. The faux fur upholstery has a luxe look, and its casual light gray hue allows this plush piece to make a stylish statement in a variety of spaces.

Title: Cardello Ottoman
Description: Effortlessly blending mid-century design with today’s fashion, the Cardello ottoman is a standout piece. Tapered accent legs set a sturdy and confident demeanor. Casual, soft upholstery with in vogue neutral gray tone is easy on the eyes and feet. Mod cushion is extra thick for extra comfort.

Title: Baxton Studio Hannah Storage Ottoman Bench
Description: For hidden storage that doubles as seating, opt for the Hannah storage bench. Constructed with rubberwood, the bench is upholstered in a soft gray velvet fabric that adds a dose of glamour to your space. The elegant button-tufted top is padded with foam for seating comfort and opens to reveal ample storage space for extra blankets and linens. Silvertone nailhead trim and walnut-finished block feet lend a chic, modern look. The Hannah is well suited for use as a bed end bench in your bedroom or as an accent piece in your living room.

Title: Enola Oversized Accent Ottoman
Description: The Enola oversized ottoman is so much more than a place to kick up your feet. Its large scale comfortably accommodates multiple guests, making for one majorly cool piece of furniture that does double time as a coffee table when topped with a tray.

Title: Bayless Oversized Accent Ottoman
Description: Get a leg up on comfort with the Bayless oversized accent ottoman. Sumptuously soft smoke gray chenille upholstery welcomes your feet with open arms. A versatile performer, this stylish stool steps in as a serving spot for impromptu entertaining.

Title: Leather Ottoman
Description: Bring sleek, casual seating to your living room or den with this modern square pouf! Covered in rich genuine leather, this gorgeous pouf strikes a square silhouette featuring hand-stitched quadrants that add texture to the piece. The recycled fiber fill offers softness and support. This pouf makes a perfect ottoman or can be pulled out for extra seating at your next at-home event.

Title: Enderlin Oversized Accent Ottoman
Description: A brilliant take on urban chic styling, the Enderlin ottoman in vibrant blue makes high design highly affordable. This generously scaled round ottoman is wrapped in a velvety soft fabric you'll love living with.

Title: Ellery Storage Ottoman
Description: Luxurious seating doubles as practical storage in the versatile Ellery ottoman. Made in China, the Ellery is comprised of a sturdy wood frame padded with soft foam and upholstered in smooth velvet fabric. Its lift up top reveals ample storage space for extra blankets and linens. Requiring assembly, the ottoman is set on a stunning gold finished metal base that lends a glamourous aesthetic.  Button tufting and silver finished metal nailheads add modern style, making the Ellery ottoman an eye catching addition to any space.

Title: Cassie Button Tufted Accent Chair
Description: The vintage-inspired Qwen Accent Chair is the epitome of beauty and grace. It showcases sweeping serpentine arms and a soft, diamond-tufted back resting elegantly on tapered posts. With this chair, it's easy to curate a cozy antique retreat.

Title: Evey Oversized Accent Ottoman
Description: Architecturally inclined with its gently curving profile, the Evey oversized accent ottoman is stunning from all angles. Acting as the focal point in a neutral space, the granite-hued upholstery also creates a blank canvas for adding pops of color.

Title: Carten Chair
Description: If you’re looking for a brilliant blend of comfort, quality and flair, you’re sure to be enamored with the simply stylish Carten chair. Inviting in a warm khaki-hued upholstery, it's neutral enough to slip into any scene. Sporting a streamlined silhouette and cozy cushions, this piece is modern relaxation at its best.

Title: Baxton Studio Valere Button Tufted Storage Ottoman
Description: Glamorous seating doubles as practical storage in the Valere ottoman. Constructed from oak wood, the Valere is upholstered in a lavish gray velvet fabric and padded with foam for the utmost sitting comfort. The elegant button-tufted top opens to reveal ample storage space, while goldtone legs add a striking look. The Valere is well suited for use as a bench in a bedroom, or as an accent piece in the living room.

Title: Austin Tub Chair
Description: If you're looking for a comfortable, attractive and practical chair to complete your room, look no further than the Austin tub chair. This chair is contemporary in design with its clean lines, slightly flared arms and tapered legs. This chair is covered with high quality durable fabrics and features high arms and a deep seat providing the ultimate in comfort. A perfect addition to any room.

Title: Barrali Sofa
Description: First impressions are everything, and the Barrali sofa sets the bar. Chenille gray fabric turns heads with its plushness—simply fabulous from top to bottom. Clean lines speak to a fresh aesthetic, accentuated by nickel-tone nailhead trim for the wow effect. Throw pillows in contemporary abstract designs and a crushed velvet kidney pillow infuse delightful textures. This sofa is a stunning ode to all that is fashion.

Title: Paxson Linen Futon
Description: Fashion trends in furniture design are bringing back the days of bold lines, low-profile shapes and wood accents. The Paxson futon combines all three for a look that will add modern-retro flair to your home. Distinctive touches include intricate diagonal stitching and rounded solid wood legs in a warm finish. Thanks to the split-back design of this futon, you can sit, lounge or recline the cushions fully to host overnight guests.

Title: Linon Stiles Accent Chair
Description: This accent chair offers casual comfort and sophisticated styling with just the right amount of pillow softness floating on a sturdy metal wire base. Trimmed with French seams, the gray velvet is plush and comfy. Metal legs in goldtone add at a bit of sophistication. Great in any youth, teen or adult bedroom, family room or dorm room. Destined to become your favorite chair to curl up with a good book.

Title: Edenfield Oversized Accent Ottoman
Description: Contemporary fashion, meet superior form. The Edenfield ottoman is strikingly streamlined in design, with its handsome charcoal upholstery speaking to tried-and-true modern color palettes. Kick back, relax and settle into the calm of your curated space.

Title: Arroyo Loveseat
Description: For a fresh spot in your space, turn to the Arroyo loveseat. This invigorating piece breathes warmth into your home with its striking caramel faux leather upholstery, modern bolster pillows and tapered legs. Wind down at the end of a long day when you sink into this canyon of comfort.

Title: Donlen Oversized Accent Ottoman
Description: Dressed in glorious gray faux leather, the Donlen oversized accent ottoman is certain to be the center of attention. With a tastefully simple design, it adds style and comfort underfoot. This versatile companion piece has a generous scale that lets you share the space with family or use it for entertaining when friends drop in.

Title: Creswell Ottoman With Storage
Description: The Creswell ottoman adds a richly neutral aspect to your living space. This versatile companion piece offers ample storage space plus a tabletop with cup holders on the reverse side of the removable cushion.

Title: Dellara Ottoman
Description: Sit back and kick your feet up in style on the Dellara ottoman with storage. Its clean-lined design pairs well with your casual and transitional furniture. Soft, tight woven texture with chalky beige hue is so in the now. Have unexpected guests? Simply lift the top and throw in clutter for quick clean-up.

Title: Caretti Ottoman
Description: Easy on the eyes and irresistibly comfortable, the Caretti ottoman is covered in luxurious chenille microfiber in a light, neutral hue. This versatile and visually appealing piece cradles your tired feet as you sit back and relax at the end of a long day. Whether it’s paired with a sectional or on its own, this ottoman feels right at home in your modern decor.

Title: Harleson Ottoman
Description: True classic character comes to life in the Harleson ottoman. Warm brown exposed frame with bun feet is beautifully traditional. Lovely detailing carries itself through the herringbone weave in the soft upholstery. Neutral tone lets you accessorize with any color. Vintage-inspired jumbo nailhead trim graces the design all around.

Title: Darcy Oversized Accent Ottoman
Description: Talk about fine lines and great curves. That’s the beauty of the Darcy oversized ottoman—made to suit your appreciation for simplicity and love of contemporary style. Tapered feet and ultra-soft upholstery that holds up to everyday living complete this fashion statement.

Title: Cascilla Ottoman
Description: Revamp your sleekly styled living room sanctuary with the Cascilla ottoman. Well-suited to contemporary spaces with a calming neutral upholstery in slate gray, it makes a subtle design statement in your space whether you’re hosting guests or enjoying a night in. Enamoring with its streamlined design, it’s a simply stylish way to kick back in superior comfort.

Title: Jayceon Oversized Ottoman
Description: If you love the idea of indulgently comfortable furniture with a casually cool sense of flair, the Jayceon ottoman is custom made with you in mind. The smooth, seamless design is so very contemporary. Its oversized scale makes it all too easy for everyone to kick up their heels in style.

Title: Linon Isabelle Tufted Ottoman
Description: The Isabelle Square Ottoman is a stylish and versatile addition to your home's décor. Perfect for use as an ottoman or coffee table, the piece has a tufted top upholstered in a soft gray fabric. Brushed silver nailheads accent the side, while turned black finished legs complete the piece.

Title: Jassmyn Oversized Accent Ottoman
Description: Round out your space in a casually cool way with the Jassmyn accent ottoman. Enticing with its hand-knitted charcoal yarn upholstery and canted wood legs, this oversized accent ottoman is sitting pretty.

Title: Neira Storage Ottoman
Description: A mastery in furniture design, the Neira storage ottoman elevates clean-lined, contemporary form with practical function. Beneath the ottoman’s hinged lift top lies a roomy storage compartment full of potential. Whether you reserve it for seasonal throws, games and toys or last-minute cleanups, you’re sure to find it abundantly handy.

Title: Linon Isabelle Square Tufted Ottoman
Description: The Isabelle Square Ottoman is a stylish and versatile addition to your home's décor. Perfect for use as an ottoman or coffee table, the piece has a tufted top upholstered in a charcoal linen fabric. Silver nailheads accent the side, while turned black finished legs complete the piece.

Title: Annie Tight Back Club Chair
Description: Add an eye-catching touch to your living room with the Madison Park Brooke Tight Back Club Chair. This accent chair features an all-over fretwork pattern on gray-hued upholstery, creating a stunning transitional look. Silvertone nailhead trim on the front of the arms and the sides of the back adds an elegant accent to the design. With a comfortable loose cushion and sturdy solid wood legs, this club chair brings a chic style to your home decor.

Title: Darcy Chair
Description: Talk about fine lines and great curves. That’s the beauty of the Darcy chair—made to suit your appreciation for simplicity and love of contemporary style. A striking flared frame, comfy pillow top armrests and an ultra-soft upholstery that holds up to everyday living complete this fashion statement.

Title: Kambria Accent Chair
Description: Crisp and cool—but not without its own curves—the Kambria accent chair lends a quiet confidence to your room. The subtle geometric pattern and slope arm design keep this grownup accent chair feeling youthful.

Title: Lindyn Oversized Swivel Accent Chair
Description: Plush and posh. Showcase your eye for on-trend texture with the statement-making cord upholstery of the Lindyn oversized swivel accent chair. Its stunningly soft fabric entices in a warm neutral hue, complementing contemporary color palettes. Sink into the spacious cushion and plan to stay a while—this cozy living room chair highlights your high-end approach to comfort and style.

Title: Linon Hutton Accent Chair
Description: This chair is the perfect mid-century accent piece that is effortless in its elegant presentation and ergonomic support. Featuring an understated bucket shape with low profile arms, the padded frame is upholstered in a seafoam green fabric. The metal X base in chrome-tone swivels 360 degrees so you can quickly turn from one conversation to the next. Please place it in your living room, bedroom, home office or den for a relaxing yet refined perch.

Title: Trelis Blue Accent Chair
Description: The bright blue Trelis chair exudes modern design and style. The gentle curves and rounded frame is accented by round splayed blonde finished legs. The bright blue upholstery adds drama and flair to the piece. button tufts and piping complete the chair.

Title: Damask Coco Damask Accent Chair
Description: Classic design meets modern appeal in this superbly comfortable upholstered chair.  Substantial, durable padding and a sturdy hardwood frame makes for long lasting utilization. The mix of fabric, button tufting and clean lines adds an air of sophistication and elegance to virtually any home décor.  A functional and artistic addition to your living room, bedroom, or den.  The dark black finish frame is complimented by the stunning gray damask fabric.

Title: Linon Isabelle Round Tufted Ottoman
Description: The Isabelle Round Ottoman is a stylish and versatile addition to your home's décor. Perfect for use as an ottoman or coffee table, the piece has a tufted top upholstered in a charcoal linen fabric. Silver nailheads accent the side, while turned black finished legs complete the piece.

Title: Elson Storage Ottoman
Description: Put a charming modern spin on your ensemble with the Elson chic storage ottoman. This fun loving boho-chic ottoman features a round-shaped faux fur fabric seat in white supported by four tapered natural wooden legs. The top can be removed to reveal a spacious compartment perfect for stowing away various household knick-knacks. Apart from seating and storage options, this stool also serves as a comfortable foot and leg rest and a stunning living room accent accessory.

Title: Nemoli Ottoman
Description: The Nemoli ottoman is the perfect addition for setting a modern scene full of casual flair. In the on-trend slate color, its textured chenille with solid microfiber upholstery provides a luxuriously soft feel that’s inviting; especially for kicking up your heels to relax.

Title: Shawnalore Coffee Table Ottoman
Description: Inspired pieces create inspired spaces. The Shawnalore ottoman coffee table charms your home with farmhouse style. White textural finish highlights the weatherworn feel of the wood tones and purposeful nail holes. Thick tufted cushion top with linen look cover is pleasingly soft. Stow away fashionable books on the planked bottom shelf.

Title: Morelos Ottoman
Description: When it comes to style, less is more with the Morelos ottoman. Taking minimalism to the max, it wows with a crisp, clean profile enhanced with fashion-forward stitching. Dressed to impress those who demand the best, this ultra-contemporary ottoman sports leather match upholstery for incomparable comfort and value.

Title: Ashlor Nuvella® Ottoman
Description: Performance infuses with style in the Ashlor oversized ottoman. Casual aesthetic is suitable for a range of room design preferences. Plush and supportive cushion is at your service as a comfortable footrest or viable tabletop for decor. Slate hue maintains its color on fade- and stain-resistant Nuvella® fabric. Wool-like menswear herringbone weave upgrades the look with effortless appeal.

Title: Kellway Storage Ottoman
Description: Make way for high style and indulgent comfort with the Kellway ottoman with storage. The plushly cushioned, removable top reveals loads of hideaway space for seasonal storage or last-minute cleanups. The ottoman’s generous scale makes it ideal as a relaxed “coffee table” or footrest for one and all.

Title: Bardarson Ottoman
Description: A feast for the eyes and pleasure for the senses, the Bardarson ottoman with storage is style, comfort and then some. Removable cushioned top reveals loads of storage space that really comes in handy for last-minute cleanups. Plush silvery gray upholstery hits just the right note if you’re looking for a richly neutral aesthetic.

Title: Jennifer Taylor Home Harrison Arm Chaise Lounge
Description: This luxurious chaise lounge is the perfect addition to any living space looking to add a bit of traditional flair. The fabric selected is a polyester velvet blend engineered for a long life. The wood frame is made from kiln-dried birchwood which provides exceptional support and stability. This unique design is accented with a single rolled arm, curved back panel and button-tufting. An ideal choice for the entryway, hallway or living room, this right arm facing chaise brings class and lounging comfort to any room in the home.

Title: Kananwood Oversized Chair
Description: The sumptuously styled Kananwood oversized chair proves that a richly traditional look doesn’t have to break the bank. Flared effect gives the classic roll arms a relaxed feel, while the choice of a plush chenille upholstery in oatmeal is earthy elegance at its best. Distinctively turned bun feet in a dark finish add to the chair’s substantial presence.

Title: Zardoni Right-Arm Facing Chaise Lounger
Description: Feed your mid-century modern nostalgia with a contemporary twist in the Zardoni corner chaise. Colored in an attractive gray, it’s upholstered in a timeless texture. Tapered peg legs are a nice revival. Linear profile with single toss pillow and bolster pillow add plenty of fresh style.

Title: Nigel Swivel Chair
Description: Update your living room with the sophisticated style of the Madison Park Dorian Swivel Chair. Upholstered in a soft, rich fabric, it features a removable seat cushion that provides exceptional comfort. The track arms and unique silhouette create a chic modern design, while a star-shaped silvertone metal base allows the chair to rotate 360 degrees. With its simple design, this swivel chair is sure to complement your living room decor.

Title: Stracelen Chair
Description: Everyone can have the best seat in the house with the Stracelen chair. Nailhead trim puts the finishing touches on the traditional roll arms you love. A reversible seat cushion with high-pile chenille fabric keeps your chair feeling plush. Turned feet in a burnished light brown finish show that style and quality flow from top to bottom.

Title: Bally Armless Accent Chair
Description: The concave Hilton Armless Accent Chair has a crisp, contemporary look. Bone faux leather and nailhead detailing make a striking statement that instantly brings bold style to your home.

Title: Soletren Accent Chair
Description: Flaunting a trendsetting silhouette, the Soletren swivel accent chair puts the contemporary in your contemporary home. Its 360-degree swivel gives you an around-the-room view to complement your comfort. Microfiber fabric satisfies your need for a piece that feels as good as it looks. Accented with soft jacquard chenille throw pillows for a splash of geometric pattern and color contrast.

Title: Bradney Swivel Accent Chair
Description: Down with uptown style. The Bradney swivel accent chair goes to town with a high-design aesthetic that's temptingly affordable. An ideal way to enhance your lounge space, this chair with a 360-degree swivel base brings casually chic style full circle.

Title: Flintshire Oversized Accent Ottoman
Description: Master the art of mid-century inspired design with the Flintshire oversized accent ottoman. Sporting a crisp, clean profile, tapered feet and a striking pattern, it has a retro-chic look that feels right on trend.

Title: Harleson Oversized Chair
Description: True classic character comes to life in the Harleson oversized chair with room for two to sit. Set back pleated rolled arms and warm brown exposed frame with bun feet are beautifully traditional. Lovely detailing carries itself through the herringbone weave in the soft upholstery. Seat cushion reverses to maintain durable comfort. Vintage-inspired jumbo nailhead trim graces the design. Botanical pillow in dark brown is a timeless touch.

Title: Bilgray Oversized Accent Ottoman
Description: Love the look of leather but long for the warm feel of fabric? Rest assured, the Bilgray oversized ottoman fits the bill beautifully. Wrapped in a fabulous faux leather beautified with windowpane stitching, this handsome square ottoman is sure to be the centerpiece of your relaxation station. Oversized scale means there’s room for everyone to kick up their heels. Firmly cushioned design makes it a practical coffee table alternative, when topped with a tray.

Title: Angleton Ottoman
Description: Serving up a refined, upscale look—at an incomparable value price—the Angleton ottoman lures from every angle. Crisp box cushioning and black tapered feet lend a clean, contemporary aesthetic. Velvety soft upholstery in a chic sandstone gray takes neutral to another level.

Title: Almanza Oversized Accent Ottoman
Description: Cushy enough for soothing comfort yet firm enough to support a serving tray, the Almanza round oversized ottoman is a pleasure to have around, indeed. Sporting a terracotta-tone upholstery with a subtle diamond pattern, this designer ottoman is sure to round out your space in style.

Title: Stracelen Ottoman
Description: Everyone can have the best seat in the house with the Stracelen ottoman. Nailhead trim puts the finishing touches on the traditional roll arms you love. A plush cushion with high-pile chenille fabric keeps you feeling relaxed. Turned feet in a burnished light brown finish show that style and quality flow from top to bottom.

Title: Gleston Ottoman
Description: Raise your standard of living with the Gleston ottoman in onyx black. Reserved exclusively for those with a penchant for high-glam home decor, this ultra-chic ottoman is dressed to impress with a clean-lined profile that simply works. Easy on the eyes and alluring to the touch, this decidedly contemporary ottoman is covered in a low-pile soft velvet that’s impossible to resist. Pair with the matching arm chair to complete your luxurious in-home escape.

Title: Bayonne Ottoman
Description: Dressed to impress, the Bayonne ottoman is an above-and-beyond choice for your fashionable abode. Wrapped in a soft flatwoven charcoal fabric that’s naturally on trend, this designer ottoman is sure to suit contemporary spaces and modern farmhouse places—and look right at home with classic and eclectic furnishings. That’s the beauty of a great transitional piece of furniture. That’s the beauty of this brilliantly done ottoman.

Title: Macleary Ottoman
Description: Get comfortable with a modern aesthetic when you add the Macleary ottoman to your home or office. A clean, linear design fits so well into any sophisticated space. With velvet upholstery and a sleek metal accent leg, this piece elevates your decor to up-to-the-minute cool.

Title: Tibbee Accent Chair
Description: Tibbee slipper chair slips clean, contemporary flair into a simply striking profile. Whether accompanying other Tibbee pieces in a living room, or bringing space-conscious seating to an office or bedroom, what a fresh style awakening.

Title: Elissa Stool
Description: Take a posh seat on the Elissa accent stool. White faux fur seat accentuated by goldtone legs is fit for a glamour queen. Place it at the foot of your bed or place two together to create a coffee table in a small space living room. This stool is a high fashion styling solution.

Title: Altonbury Chair
Description: Tailor your space with the tidy structure of the Altonbury chair. Decorative stitching and button tufting on the box cushion make for a very neat appearance. With leather match upholstery, this piece prioritizes luxury at a price you can afford.

Title: CorLiving Antonio Tub Chair in Bonded Leather
Description: Stay home in style with this barrel chair. Sink effortlessly into comfort with its gentle curved back and sloping arms. Wood frame construction gives a sturdy foundation of support while the durable and stylish bonded leather upholstery is complemented with paneled detailing. Revive your living space with this versatile tub chair as a great addition to a living room, bedroom or office space.

Title: Eltmann Oversized Ottoman
Description: Your cozy corner of the world isn’t complete without the Eltmann oversized ottoman in slate gray. Wrapped in a plush and textural chenille fabric, this gorgeous gray ottoman has an indulgent feel and generously scaled appeal that’s too tempting to resist.

Title: West Lounge Chair
Description: Accent your living area with a splash of color from INK+IVY’s Newport Lounge Chair. The tight back and seat feature a clean, tailored look accented with tufted buttons. Textured beige upholstery and a pecan finish on the wood legs give this lounge chair a warm and alluring appeal. With its mid-century design and small silhouette, it's sure to impress in your living room.

Title: Greaves Ottoman
Description: Make your living space that much more livable with the Greaves ottoman. Rest assured that its ultra-neutral upholstery with a textural chenille feel goes with anything and everything. Tailored box cushioning and tapered feet lend a clean, contemporary aesthetic. Make it even more enticing by pairing it with the available matching arm chair and reserve yourself the best seat in the house.

Title: Dovemont Oversized Accent Ottoman
Description: If you’re one who likes to have a little fun, deviate from the everyday ordinary with the Dovemont oversized accent ottoman. Top with a serving tray and make it a casually cool coffee table alternative—or make room for everyone to kick up their heels in style. The dynamic patterned upholstery is loaded with energy and interest.

Title: Enderlin Right-Arm Facing Corner Chaise
Description: A brilliant take on urban chic styling, the Enderlin corner chaise in vibrant blue makes high design highly affordable. Distinctive elements include quilted channel stitching for clean-lined allure and a velvety soft fabric you'll love living with. Sculptural track arms up the wow factor.

Title: Hallenberg Oversized Ottoman
Description: If you’re on the hunt for high style that strikes just the right balance of contemporary and classic, the Hallenberg ottoman is one enticing compromise. Its plush cushioning and richly neutral linen-weave upholstery will have you at hello. The perfect midway between beige and gray, the ottoman’s pewter-tone upholstery is sure to blend with anything and everything.

Title: Tibbee Chaise
Description: Inspired by high-end menswear, the Tibbee chaise is tailored to perfection and dressed to impress. Button-less tufting on the back cushion is richly subtle. Sleek, flared armrests enhance Tibbee’s simply striking profile, while ample scale provides plenty of room for stretching out in comfort.

Title: Hoonah Accent Chair
Description: The Hoonah accent chair is inviting with its simply chic take on versatile style. The wicker frame wows with its attention to detail and natural finish, seamlessly pairing with existing decor. Keeping comfort top of mind, a cream-colored cushion maintains a neutral appeal. What’s more, this chair is safe for both indoor and outdoor spaces.

Title: Kananwood Ottoman
Description: The sumptuously styled Kananwood ottoman proves that a richly traditional look doesn’t have to break the bank. Choice of a plush chenille upholstery in oatmeal is earthy elegance at its best. Distinctively turned bun feet in a dark finish add to the ottoman’s substantial presence.

Title: Safavieh Dilan Safari Chair
Description: A familiar classic refreshed for the modern aesthetic, the Dilan safari chair combines cherry mahogany with upholstery of woven leather straps on its back, seat and arms. Beautifully turned legs and curved seat base recall mid-century Danish modern style.

Title: Kestrel Ottoman
Description: Looking for a leg up on style and comfort? Rest your eyes on the decidedly modern Kestrel ottoman. Firmly cushioned, this easy-to-love ottoman is the perfect spot to kick up your heels or set down a serving tray. Wrapped in an easy-breezy driftwood-tone upholstery, it’s what's new in neutrals.

Title: Baceno Oversized Ottoman
Description: The generously scaled Baceno ottoman makes high style look effortlessly elegant. Textured linen-weave upholstery is warm, neutral and a natural complement for any space. Tri-block feet in a dark finish add a nice contrast and tailored touch.

Title: Kanosh Ottoman
Description: Modern comfort never looked so good. Sporting a boxy profile punctuated with jumbo stitching for high-fashion flair, the Kanosh ottoman is the ultimate choice in comfortably cool, contemporary style. Indulging with a suede-like touch and upscale feel, the ottoman's plush upholstery is the stuff dreams are made of.

Title: Floral Casey Chair
Description: This chair is a stylish seating addition to any living space or bedroom. The versatile gray and yellow floral fabric upholstery is the perfect complement to any transitional style home. Brown finished legs

Title: Almanza Ottoman
Description: The Almanza ottoman brings a classic look beautifully into the present. Loaded with multi-tonal interest, the ottoman’s wheat-hue upholstery is a fresh choice in neutrals. Clean-lined tapered feet in a dark finish infuse modern appeal.

Title: Corvara Ottoman
Description: The sumptuously soft Corvara ottoman invites you to kick up your heels in comfort and contemporary style. Rest assured, the velvet dark grey upholstery feels every bit as wonderful as it looks. Large scale makes this ottoman abundantly accommodating.

Title: Dandrea Ottoman
Description: The Dandrea ottoman in bisque beige is richly elegant yet comfortably made for everyday living. Showcasing distressed at its best, the ottoman’s turned bun feet with patina finish are aged to perfection. Oversized scale makes it abundantly practical.

Title: Abinger Ottoman
Description: If you’re looking to lighten the mood, you’re sure to find the Abinger ottoman a breath of fresh air. Covered in a cream-tone chenille upholstery loaded with plush texture, this less-is-more contemporary ottoman is one sensational sidekick.

Title: Maimz Chair
Description: The Maimz chair is mid-century revival done to perfection. Linear and minimalistic, the beautifully edited profile has all the retro elements you love, like sheltering arms, bolster pillows and tapered splayed legs. So casually cool, the caramel faux leather upholstery brings the look right into the present.

Title: Bales Accent Chair
Description: Be bold with a modern take on seating. Modular and armless, the Bales accent chair carries a checkered taupe upholstery neutral enough to fit in any style while elevating it at the same time.

Title: HomePop Classic Swoop Arm Accent Chair
Description: The graceful swoop-arm styling of this accent chair sets the tone for all proclaimed casually cool spaces. A rich wood finish, designer fabric and welted cushions perfect the laid-back vibe.

Title: Hollyann Oversized Accent Ottoman
Description: Cool takes a new shape in your living room with the Hollyann ottoman. Rounding out your stylish, urban space, this piece sports a velvety soft upholstery and sleek, tapered legs. Pop your feet up or use this oversized accent as a center table with a tray placed on top—you’ll really turn around your home decor.

Title: Dorsten Oversized Chair
Description: The contemporary Dorsten oversized chair has comfort written all over it. From the wide, plush seat to the textured fabric, it’s a total winner for relaxation. Just grab a throw blanket and cozy up to its warmth.

Title: Maggie Oversized Chair
Description: Classic comfort gets a mod twist with the Maggie oversized chair. Its minimalistic approach and structured silhouette bring a clean-lined design element to your living room. Sink into the positively plush cushions while relaxing solo, or curl up with a glass of wine while hosting guests. And with light neutral upholstery that suits both casual and contemporary spaces, this chair offers endless style possibilities.

Title: Nicorvo Ottoman
Description: Enticing with a coffee brown faux leather, beautified with a gently weathered effect and designer stitching, the Nicorvo ottoman merges a richly traditional sense of style with modern comfort. Turned bun feet and prominent nailhead trim incorporate distinctive character.

Title: Morren Oversized Chair
Description: A triumph in transitional design, the Morren oversized chair invites you to indulge in eye-catching texture and cozy comfort. Flared roll arms and loose, reversible cushions give this classically styled chair a sense of everyday ease. Soothing blue-hue accent pillow adds a wonderful layer of interest.

Title: Caladeron Ottoman
Description: The Caladeron ottoman combines the clean lines of mid-century style with the cozy softness of your favorite blanket to create your favorite piece of furniture. The textured chenille upholstery evokes a feeling of comfort and security while the faint chevron pattern and exposed black metal legs add sophistication.

Title: Dorsten Ottoman
Description: The contemporary Dorsten ottoman has comfort written all over it. From the plush cushion to the textured fabric, it’s a total winner for relaxation. Just throw your feet up and enjoy its warmth.

Title: Belcampo Ottoman
Description: The sumptuously comfortable Belcampo ottoman makes it easy to camp out in style. Inspired by quality menswear, its linen-weave upholstery naturally works in a rich jute tone. Thickly cushioned top is supportive and indulgent.

Title: Lavernett Oversized Accent Ottoman
Description: Make room for big-time comfort and style with the Lavernett oversized accent ottoman. Designed to multitask as a footrest and casually cool coffee table, this firmly cushioned square ottoman is covered in a decadently soft, plush microfiber that’s love at first touch.

Title: Romansque Accent Chair
Description: Don't leave your living room incomplete. Fill the open space with the Romansque accent chair. Slim track arms and nailhead trim give this traditional silhouette an updated and inviting appeal. The diamond tufted back cushion and attached seat cushion are an absolute pleasure to sit in. Alone or paired with other upholstery, this chair is a class act.

Title: Alesandra Ottoman
Description: Decidedly modern with a sense of relaxed ease, the Alesandra ottoman looks at home in so many different places and spaces. Sporting a subtle chevron texture, the parchment-tone upholstery takes neutral to new heights. Providing a highly distinctive look: low-to-the-floor block feet in a warm wood-tone finish.

Title: Carnaby Oversized Accent Ottoman
Description: Whether your personal style is urban glam or cozy modern farmhouse, rest assured the Carnaby round ottoman is an inspired choice. Irresistible elements include a sumptuously soft velvet upholstery and a tantalizing top with deep button tufting. What a shapely way to put your love of luxury on display.

Title: Navi Oversized Accent Ottoman
Description: If you love the cool look of leather but long for the warm feel of fabric, you can take comfort in the Navi oversized ottoman. Wrapped in a fabulous faux leather with a weathered hue and hint of pebbly texture to resemble the real deal, this decidedly modern ottoman proves less is more. Elements include jumbo stitching for fashion-forward flair.

Title: Olsberg Ottoman
Description: Seamlessly merging classic elements with modern trends, the Olsberg ottoman invites you to bring home the best of then and now. Wrapped in a fabulous steel gray upholstery with sumptuous suede-like feel, this easy-elegant ottoman is dressed to impress with tailored touches including nailhead trim and window pane stitching.

Title: Antonlini Ottoman
Description: We can’t wait to see the look of comfort on your face when you kick your heels up on the Antonlini ottoman. Plush cushions are covered in linen weave chenille for an incredibly soft hand. You’re going to love elevating your feet as you sink back into the deep seat of your chair. Extended surface gives you lots of room to spread out or show off a tray of decor. And with a neutral hue, it complements your home effortlessly.

Title: Castano Oversized Ottoman
Description: Life may be full of sacrifices, but with the Castano oversized ottoman in jewel gray, you compromise nothing to get everything you could ask for. Crisp, clean, contemporary style, pillowy softness and exceptional craftsmanship are yours for the taking at a price that’ll put you at ease.

Title: Monaghan Ottoman
Description: Firmly cushioned and generously scaled, the Monaghan ottoman provides a leg up on comfort and style. If you appreciate a touch of texture, you’re sure to love the ottoman’s chenille upholstery. Choice of sandstone beige is such a light and lovely style awakening.

Title: Arroyo Ottoman
Description: For a fresh spot in your space, turn to the Arroyo ottoman. This invigorating piece breathes warmth into your home with its striking caramel faux leather upholstery and tapered legs. Wind down at the end of a long day with your feet propped up on this canyon of comfort.

Title: Bales 8-Piece Modular Seating
Description: Be bold with a modern take on seating. The Bales accent chair set has an armless design and carries a checkered taupe upholstery neutral enough to fit in any style while elevating it at the same time. Thanks to its modular design, making the transformation from sectional to conversation pit is practically effortless.

Title: Bovarian Ottoman
Description: Whether your style is clean and contemporary or cozy modern farmhouse, the Bovarian ottoman in a stone-tone neutral upholstery has the corner on style. Merging ultimate comfort with striking good looks, this alluring ottoman makes itself useful with a hidden storage area for this, that and the other.

Title: Bales 7-Piece Modular Seating
Description: Be bold with a modern take on seating. The Bales accent chair set has an armless design and carries a checkered taupe upholstery neutral enough to fit in any style while elevating it at the same time. Thanks to its modular design, making the transformation from sectional to conversation pit is practically effortless.

Title: Bales 4-Piece Modular Seating
Description: Be bold with a modern take on seating. The Bales accent chair set has an armless design and carries a checkered taupe upholstery neutral enough to fit in any style while elevating it at the same time. Thanks to its modular design, making the transformation from sectional to conversation pit is practically effortless.

Title: Aaron Curve Back Swivel Glider Chair
Description: The Madison Park Alana Curve Back Swivel Glider Chair offers classic comfort for your living space. Track arms and subtle curves create an alluring silhouette, while tufted buttons on the back add an elegant accent. A swivel glider base provides sturdy support and allows for smooth and effortless 360-degree movement. Upholstered in a soft multi-hued blue fabric, this chair is the perfect accent piece to bring your living room decor together.

Title: Bales 6-Piece Modular Seating
Description: Be bold with a modern take on seating. The Bales accent chair set has an armless design and carries a checkered taupe upholstery neutral enough to fit in any style while elevating it at the same time. Thanks to its modular design, making the transformation from sectional to conversation pit is practically effortless.

Title: TOV Furniture Flapper Cream Swivel Chair
Description: Get ready to sink into a world of comfort and push the limit of fab design. Upholstered in sumptuous velvet with piped stitching and tassels galore, the look is completed with its brushed gold base. Available in several colors, the Flapper chair is the perfect piece to enhance any space.

Title: Modway Bequest Accent Chair
Description: Welcome leisure time with the artfully designed Bequest accent chair. Boasting a striking goldtone stainless frame and upholstered in stain-resistant performance velvet, it elevates your decor with its glam aesthetic, sleek profile and cozy comfort.

Title: Maimz Ottoman
Description: The Maimz ottoman is mid-century revival done to perfection. Linear and minimalistic, the beautifully edited profile includes tapered splayed legs for a signature retro aesthetic. So casually cool, the caramel faux leather upholstery brings the look right into the present.

Title: Bladen Ottoman
Description: If you love the cool look of leather but long for warm feel of fabric, you'll find the Bladen ottoman fits the bill beautifully. Enhancing its handsome profile: a textural, multi-tonal upholstery that’s loaded with character and interest. What a rich addition to your space, at such a comfortable price.

Title: Alandari Accent Chair
Description: The Alandari swivel chair takes style and comfort full circle. Muted striped upholstery is casually cool and beautifully on trend. Smooth-gliding 360-degree swivel lets you go with the flow.

Title: Janesley Accent Chair
Description: Warm and luxurious, but not without its own curves, the Janesley accent chair lends a quiet confidence to your room. The feel-good fabric and slope arm design set the tone for all proclaimed casually cool spaces.

Title: Morren Ottoman
Description: A triumph in transitional design, the Morren ottoman invites you to indulge in eye-catching texture and cozy comfort. Easy on the eyes and plush to the touch, this generously scaled ottoman is covered in a soothing neutral-tone upholstery paired with elegant bun feet for a polished aesthetic.

Title: Ambrielle Oversized Accent Ottoman
Description: The Ambrielle oversized accent ottoman makes a statement in modern room decor. Velvety soft upholstery is love at first touch and its stunningly simple design is right at home in an urban setting. A neutral gunmetal hue blends easily with any color scheme. Ideal for resting tired feet at the end of a long day, this versatile piece is also a convenient place to put a serving tray and an ideal spot for the game board on game night.

Title: Luxora Ottoman With Storage
Description: Stow in love. The Luxora ottoman with storage has you covered in more ways than one. Its ample scale makes it abundantly luxurious, leaving plenty of room for everyone to kick up their heels in style. For last-minute cleanups, what a lifesaver. Removable top unveils loads of handy hideaway space. Talk about beautifully practical.

Title: Accrington Oversized Ottoman
Description: Looking for the perfect blend of decadent comfort and contemporary flair? Feast your eyes on the Accrington ottoman. Its oversized square profile definitely takes center stage. Wonderfully plush to the touch, the ottoman’s earthy brown fabric is the ultimate choice for a richly neutral look.

Title: Darcy Ottoman
Description: Talk about fine lines and great curves. That’s the beauty of the Darcy ottoman—made to suit your appreciation for simplicity and love of contemporary style. Tapered feet and an ultra-soft upholstery that holds up to everyday living complete this fashion statement.

Title: Cambri Storage Ottoman
Description: Let it snow. Doubling your pleasure with its combination of form and function, the Cambri storage ottoman in a snow-tone chenille fabric invites you to stretch your style in an easy-elegant way. Whether your aesthetic is urban hip or suburban chic, this posh ottoman with removable cushioned top and loads of handy storage is sure to look and feel right at home. And how’s this for a welcome surprise: a built-in tabletop with cup holders on the flip side!

Title: Bladen Oversized Accent Ottoman
Description: If you love the cool look of leather but long for the warm feel of fabric, you'll find the Bladen oversized ottoman fits the bill beautifully. Enhancing its handsome profile and generous scale: a textural, multi-tonal upholstery that’s loaded with character and interest. A rich addition to your space at a comfortable price.

Title: Rawcliffe Oversized Accent Ottoman
Description: Make room for big-time comfort and style with the Rawcliffe oversized ottoman. Designed to multitask as a footrest and casually cool coffee table, this firmly cushioned square ottoman is covered in a decadently soft chenille microfiber that’s love at first touch.

Title: Abinger Oversized Accent Ottoman
Description: If you’re looking to lighten the mood, you’re sure to find the Abinger oversized ottoman a breath of fresh air. Covered in a cream chenille upholstery loaded with plush texture, this less-is-more contemporary ottoman is one sensational sidekick.

Title: Tanavi Oversized Accent Ottoman
Description: Blending a fresh, clean aesthetic with ultra-soft comfort that’s impossible to resist, the Tanavi ottoman sets the scene for living the dream. Whether your look is warm and cozy modern farmhouse or cool, crisp and contemporary, this masterfully crafted square ottoman tantalizes with a feather-fiber blend cushion with pillowy plushness and a linen-like fabric that’s a breath of fresh air.

Title: Altari Ottoman
Description: If style is the question, then the Altari ottoman is the answer. Its decidedly contemporary profile is enhanced with plump cushioning and a chenille-feel upholstery, so pleasing to the touch. Rest assured, this ottoman in slate gray is sure to play well with so many color schemes.

Title: Altari Oversized Accent Ottoman
Description: If style is the question, then the Altari oversized accent ottoman is the answer. Clean-lined profile is beautifully contemporary. Plush chenille fabric and plump cushioning make it so easy to comfortably kick up your heels. Richly neutral hue complements a variety of decor.

Title: Copeland Accent Chair
Description: The Copeland accent chair with shelter arm styling makes it so hip to be square. An inspired take on deconstructed design, this chair combines an antiqued brown wood frame with a two-tone upholstered effect. The combination of brown faux leather and burlap fabric makes for one cool contrast. Antiqued brass-tone nailhead trim provides a punch of character and finishing touch.

Title: Hughleigh Accent Chair
Description: The fashion-forward Hughleigh accent chair adds a cool vibe to your home. The armless design and channel stitched back is perfect for living spaces that need a spark of excitement. Bringing just enough pizazz to liven a space in a fresh, contemporary way, this accent chair is an especially smart choice for small spaces.

Title: Enderlin Accent Chair
Description: A brilliant take on urban chic styling, the Enderlin swivel chair in vibrant blue makes high design highly affordable. Distinctive elements include quilted channel stitching for clean-lined allure and a velvety soft fabric you'll love living with. Sleek track arms and a smooth 360-degree swivel up the wow factor.

Title: Zossen Accent Chair
Description: The Zossen accent chair proves that trends always come back around. Its sleek profile brings mid-century design back in style. Soft crushed velvet fabric in ivory is an upscale touch. Button tufting on the back makes this a dapper addition to your home.

Title: Wildau Accent Chair
Description: Taking cues from Scandinavian design, the contemporary Wildau accent chair welcomes you with open arms. Faux fur seat in shades of gray adds a layer of warmth and texture. Metal base is minimalistic in design but big on support. Grab a throw and cozy up.

Title: Velburg Accent Chair
Description: Velburg accent chair exudes laidback comfort with swagger. Wingback silhouette with supportive tufted back has a rugged cool vibe. Distressed brown fabric boasts the look of supple leather. Flaunt your dapper style all around with 360-degree swivel.

Title: Ballinasloe Oversized Ottoman
Description: Celebrate strength and durability in design with the Ballinasloe oversized accent ottoman. Neutral color opens doors for you to use your imagination with accessorizing the room. Softly textured chenille cushion sports stylish versatility. Throw up your feet or use it as a table for a show-stopping tray. It’s all up to you.

Title: Collbury Accent Bench
Description: The Collbury settee boasts couture-inspired detailing with its curved sides and contemporary/mid-century allure. Channel stitched back design with natural wood tapered legs elevates its luxe appeal with feel-good cognac brown colored polyester fabric putting comfort in style.

Title: Altari Chair
Description: If style is the question, then the Altari chair is the answer. Its decidedly contemporary profile is enhanced with plump cushioning and a chenille-feel upholstery, so pleasing to the touch. Rest assured, this chair in slate gray is sure to play well with so many color schemes.

Title: Southern Enterprises Roma Accent Chair
